<p>1a</p>
<p>1b</p>
<p>1b.1</p>@##/ /byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag med gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings
<p>1b.2</p>sku brnyes pa/ /kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam mchog ste/ /mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa/ /gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan
<p>1b.3</p>med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos/ /ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa/ /chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid/ /bde
<p>1b.4</p>gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go/ /tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa/ /rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms
<p>1b.5</p>dang yon tan khyad par ni/ /blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na/ /de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab
<p>2a</p>
<p>2a.1</p>spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do/ /ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bsnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de
<p>2a.2</p>yi yon tan de dag de las byung / /'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / /de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do/ /de nas kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar
<p>2a.3</p>bsgom par bya bar 'gyur/ /pha zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das/ /brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/ /tshig gis mi phebs gzhan
<p>2a.4</p>dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang / /ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag de nyid don 'dir blta/ /mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa/ /de nyid rtog
<p>2a.5</p>pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de/ /rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang / /de phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos
<p>2b</p>
<p>2b.1</p>so/ /dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya/ /skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni/ /'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing brtags pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul/ /rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na/ /de
<p>2b.2</p>dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol 'gyur ba yi rigs/ /de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur/ /gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni/ /de nyid tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur/ /lam de
<p>2b.3</p>rnam grol lam du bstan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te/ /sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /de na de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe
<p>2b.4</p>na/ /kun du rtog can yan lag ma yin kun du rtog pas rtsol med nyams/ /blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas/ /sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin/ /'du byed sna tshogs dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu
<p>2b.5</p>brtas tshe/ /sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus pas gang ba bzhin du snang / /bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i bdag med pa/ /'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye/ /rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma
<p>2b.6</p>rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed/ /ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las/ /bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog /sems 'di las rnams mtha' yas gnas
<p>2b.7</p>gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med/ /bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba/ /rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas/ /dbang phyug la
<p>3a</p>
<p>3a.1</p>sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de mi zhi grol mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor lam slad the tshom rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes/ /bdag tu brtags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral/ /chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song
<p>3a.2</p>srid par 'gyur/ /rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na/ /las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyad du snang gi rigs la tha dad med/ /de phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas/ /de la bsam pa zhen pa'i phyir na phyi ma phyi ma de la snang / /rang sems rgyun las 'phags
<p>3a.3</p>pa skye bo chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin/ /rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de dang rang gi ting 'dzin no/ /sems rgyun de las phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med de/ /de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus/ /bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang
<p>3a.4</p>skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang / /sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtag par rab tu dka'/ /'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa/ /tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med/ /dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur
<p>3a.5</p>rtog pa'i sems nyid ni/ /rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med/ /skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med/ /des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon/ /gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bras de tshe mnyam
<p>3a.6</p>'gyur de med med/ /yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang / /spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin/ /phyogs rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye/ /de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha'
<p>3a.7</p>las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral/ /bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul sgyu 'dra 'khrul la snang / /de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang / /chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang / /rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na
<p>3b</p>
<p>3b.1</p>mnyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang / /chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min/ /dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod mi 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med/ /don de'i tshul gyis don
<p>3b.2</p>dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang / /gnyis med bsam 'das chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs/ /bstan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med/ /don dam tshul gyi lam 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin/ /the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang
<p>3b.3</p>spong zhing gnas par mi byed do/ /sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la yang med/ /de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams rtag dang rang bzhin sgyu ma'ang med gyur phyir/ /yod la ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de med pa'ang med/ /mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med
<p>3b.4</p>dbus la'ang gnas par mi byed la/ /gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas/ /chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te/ /drug gis bstan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go/ /shes rab thabs kyi spyod la
<p>3b.5</p>mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi 'dra bar spyod/ /rang gi shes pa dam par byas pa kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas/ /'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong / /ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo tha snyad mi gnas
<p>3b.6</p>gnas pa la yang gnas par mi byed do/ /snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsungs/ /gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni/ /rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nyid stong pa'o/ /'khor ba'i lam gsum
<p>3b.7</p>spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud nyid de/ /de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin brtsal spangs gar mi gnas/ /'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med/ /ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min/ /'jam dpal
<p>4a</p>
<p>4a.1</p>ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de yin der mi gnas/ /bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te/ /sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin/ /rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo/ /'du byed ma
<p>4a.2</p>skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das/ /dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin/ /nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba'ang med/ /rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral/ / 
<p>4a.3</p>dran dang 'byed med gang la'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing / /mnyam nas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de stsogs bri med/ /ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang / /gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med
<p>4a.4</p>de mi 'bral mi gnas shing / /mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te/ /sems kyi dbyings su goms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro/ /brda can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub chen po yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs
<p>4a.5</p>phyir/ /de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te/ /ting 'dzin gsum po bstan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas
<p>4a.6</p>lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung / /kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur/ /de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs/ /don 'dir mos pa de yang
<p>4a.7</p>byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu bsngags/ /gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yis/ /mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/ /thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid
<p>4b</p>
<p>4b.1</p>do/ /'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do/ /skad cig tsam du dad pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang gsungs pa yin/ /tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang
<p>4b.2</p>srungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags/ /de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na/ /nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chugs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs/ /skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyi dbang song ba/ / 
<p>4b.3</p>rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur pa/ /sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag cing sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams/ /rmi lam gyis bslad bzhin du rmi lam bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa/ / 
<p>4b.4</p>lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de/ /de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'bros pa yin/ /shin tu ma sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la/ /gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la
<p>4b.5</p>sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min/ /rang gi blo gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs lta ba sna tshogs dag /mi shes chu bos g.yengs shing gsung gi nying gu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral/ /de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di/ /kun du rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul
<p>4b.6</p>thun mong ma yin yang / /goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te/ /'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas/ /skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'di
<p>4b.7</p>rab rgyas shog /'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi sU tra pin+t+ra ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres
<p>5a</p>
<p>5a.1</p>pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes sku can gtsug gi nor bu mtshan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi tshul gnas kun la khyab/ /lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog /sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag
<p>5a.2</p>'tshal te/ /mtshan brjod bdud mdzod shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang / /dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu gcig /lung dang man ngag dag la brten pa bshad/ /theg pa rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur ba/ /dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di/ / 
<p>5a.3</p>dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni/ /slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis/ /theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /dpag bsam shing chen 'dir phyogs tsam/ /ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gcig pur grub/ /mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga rim pa ste/ de la dang po sgrub pa po
<p>5a.4</p>rigs dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin/ gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin ston zhes mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / /dbang thob par ston to/ /gzhan yang / gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/ /zhes pa dang / bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/ /ji skad
<p>5a.5</p>smras pa de bzhin byed/ /ces pas bsgrub pa'i snod du rung bar bstan/ yon tan las ri dang / chu klung dang / nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung zhes pa gnas rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid dga' ba ston to/ /bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/ /zhes pas/ bsgrub dus gza' dang rgyu skar
<p>5a.6</p>dang / nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa bstan to/ /dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs/ /zhes pas bsgrub pa'i rdzas su don dam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / maN+Dal gsum dang / me tog dang / dri'i byug pa dang / mchod bya'i khyad par mang po dang / blo brtan dang / yo byad dang / 
<p>5a.7</p>tshogs par bya ba'i rim pa bstan to/ /yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang / gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa/ hUM mtshan ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed mdog nag pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ thod dbyug dang
<p>5b</p>
<p>5b.1</p>sdigs mdzub byed pa/ sbrul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/ ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes pa dang / mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ 'od zer gyi rdo rje ra ba dang / dra bar bya bar bstan to/ /snying rje chen po'i blo yi mchog /ces pa dang / phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/ /zhes pas/ sems
<p>5b.2</p>can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed par ston to/ /gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/ /zhes pa dang / a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /ces pas thog ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'i snying gar ye shes sems
<p>5b.3</p>dpa' bsam par bya ba ston to/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /ces pa dang / mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu rim gror bya ba'i 'os/ /bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog /phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i bdag /ces pa 'dis ston to/ /bdag gi snying gar a
<p>5b.4</p>dang hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / rje btsun 'jam dpal dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas/ bdag gis bltas te/ lus kyi bkod pa yan lag gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do/ /bum pa bzang po
<p>5b.5</p>che ba'i mchog /ces pa dang / dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' ltar mnyam par bsgrubs la/ snying ga'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to/ /sbyin bdag chen po'i gtso bo ste/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /bzod chen
<p>5b.6</p>'chang ba ston pa po/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin/ /zhes pa 'dis bstan te/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /bdag gi snying ga nas lha mo bzhi spros te/ gnas pa rnam pa gsum du mchod par bya'o/ /de bas na/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' chen rol
<p>5b.7</p>mo chen po ste/ /bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs/ /zhes pas bstan to/ /bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /zhes bya ba nas/ smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ /zhes bya ba dang / byang chub yan lag me tog spos/ /zhes bya bas/ phyi'i lha mo bzhi ste snying ga nas
<p>6a</p>
<p>6a.1</p>gong gi tshul du sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su dbul lo/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /zhes pa nas/ dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis/ gsang ba bzhi mchog tu gsang ba bzhis bstan to/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus
<p>6a.2</p>pa na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/ /rdo rje las kun byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di'i rkang pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dus su/ sgeg mo la sogs pa dang / rim bzhin du rkang pa bzhi dang glu blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa
<p>6a.3</p>dang / chags pa la sogs pas dbul lo/ /rgyas pas ma phye'o zhes bstan to/ /de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ yang na ni thams cad kyang bstod par shes par bya'o/ /de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar yang de nyid kyis shes par bya'o/ /byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston pas/ 
<p>6a.4</p>tshad med pa bzhi bsgom zhes so/ /rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med/ /chos dbyings dam pa zad min bdag /ces pas de'i don bsgom pa ni/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod do/ /phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong
<p>6a.5</p>par bsgom zhes ston to/ /stong nyid dam pa 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/ /zhes pas pad+ma'i steng na dngos gzhi las langs te/ dang po dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa dang / chos kyi 'byung gnas/ de'i tha ma 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du/ pad+ma
<p>6a.6</p>zla ba'i steng du muM dmar skya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng bar 'gyur ba las/ sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/ /'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shin tu dmar/ /cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog
<p>6a.7</p>mthon ka chen po can/ /zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal ldan sgeg dang sgeg par ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
<p>6b</p>
<p>6b.1</p>'chang ba/ /nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis/ rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs bstan pa yin no/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi don bstan pa/ /zhes bya bas yul bzhi'i phyag rgya sku 'phro 'du dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab par bstan to/ /phyogs
<p>6b.2</p>bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ces pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo dang lha mo rnams thugs kar spros zhes pa'o/ /de nas mdun du pad+ma dang zla ba la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa gong bzhin
<p>6b.3</p>du byas te/ ye shes sems dpa' bltas la dgug cing rang gi lus la bsgoms zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can/ /zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te/ bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i
<p>6b.4</p>dbu rgyan dang ldan zhes bstan to/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / /zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ sngags dang bcas pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul la zhes ston te/ de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do/ /bdag rig gzhan rig
<p>6b.5</p>thams cad pa/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /ces pa thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags zlos pa dang / mtshan klog par byas te/ de ltar yon tan brjod pa las kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang
<p>6b.6</p>sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' thams cad/ sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa'i ming ni/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad
<p>6b.7</p>pa'i tshig dang / yig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyi/ nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du 'chang ba'am/ klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku
<p>7a</p>
<p>7a.1</p>la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan las/ nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam/ glegs bam du byas pa la klog cing brjod la/ 
<p>7a.2</p>bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' gzugs la dmigs shing / gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs par de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin
<p>7a.3</p>te/ mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing / dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ many+dzu shrI hUM oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ maN+Dal tsakra hUM zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la/ phyag sngon du 'gro bas
<p>7a.4</p>mchod pa la sogs pas bdag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te/ mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod na/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag gzhan dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring por mi thogs par dam pas bsngags
<p>7a.5</p>pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dam par rgyud pa'i bla ma bdud rtsi 'thung / /'gro ba sdug bsngal nad kyis zin gyur la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad/ /'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan 'gyur nas/ /mi
<p>7a.6</p>rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las/ rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub
<p>7a.7</p>thabs mdo dang bsres pa rdzogs so// //[ ]@##/ /gsang ldan gyi dka' 'grel don bsdus sgron ma bzhugs/ @##/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje dang ni shes rab gnyis/ /sangs rgyas kun ltar gnyis med pa/ /dam pa
<p>7b</p>
<p>7b.1</p>lam ston lta bu yi/ /sku yi rnam par 'char mdzad pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob mas legs par rtogs phyir dang / /bdag nyid kyis kyang dran bya'i phyir/ /gsang ldan dka' 'grel 'dir brtsam bya/ /de nas dkyus nyid la 'jug par bya ste/ gang 'di la sogs
<p>7b.2</p>pa'i tshig rkang pa bzhis mchod par brjod pa ston te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa yin la/ de la slob dpon nyid lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa'o/ /zab cing la sogs pa rkang pa
<p>7b.3</p>bzhis bshad par dam bca' ba ston te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zab cing rgya che ba'i mtshan/ rnal 'byor spyi'i rgyud la brten nas/ gzhan dang bdag gi don du 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad pa'o/ /thig le bcu drug mi shig pa dbus la sogs pa rkang pa bcu drug gis gang la zhus pa
<p>7b.4</p>dang / gang gis zhus pa dang / gang gi don du zhus pa ston pa las/ gang la zhus na sku gsum la zhus pa ston te/ thig le la sogs pa rkang pa bdun gyis chos sku bstan/ gsang sngags la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis longs sku bstan la/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis sprul
<p>7b.5</p>sku bstan nas/ byang chub la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis gang gis zhus pa ston cing / blo zhan don phyir rim pa gsungs/ /zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis gang gi don du zhus pa bstan pa'o/ /de ltar klad kyi don bstan nas gzhung la 'jug par bya ste/ gang gis gang du thabs ji ltar bya ba dang
<p>7b.6</p>gsum du gnas pa las/ de la/ dang por rdo rje 'chang chen por/ /slob dpon cha lugs gnas byas te/ /zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis gang zag gang gis bya ba ston te/ slob dpon rig pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs pa/ de nyid bcu shes shing 'jigs pa med pas/ cha rkyen lnga dang ldan par bya
<p>7b.7</p>ste/ phyi nang gi khrus dang / phyi nang gi bsrung ba dang / phyi nang gi gos bgo ba dang / phyi nang gi byug pa dang / gnas dang stan sngags chus bsangs la 'dug pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang ni rjes mthun par/ /la sogs pa'i rkang pa drug gis gnas dang bsnyen pa ston pa la/ gnas ni rkang pa
<p>8a</p>
<p>8a.1</p>lngas ston te/ zlas phye ba gnyis te/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa'i gnas so/ /sogs pa'i sgras ni bsgrub pa'i gnas bsdu'o/ /der chag chag skyang nul bya zhing me tog gis nyams dga' bar bya'o/ /grogs bzang btsal la bsnyen pa brtsam/ /zhes pa rkang pa
<p>8a.2</p>gcig gis bsnyen pa bya bar dam bca' ba bstan pa'o/ /bdag dang sa gzhi yongs bsrung zhing / /la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis tshogs sogs pa'i bar chad bsrung ba bstan te/ rdo rje 'chang hUM mdzad du bsgyur la/ g.yas dang g.yon gser gyi rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa khro zhing rngam pa'i
<p>8a.3</p>thugs kar ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po bsams la de las 'od byung bas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang ra ba dang gur dang bla re dang dra bar gyur par bsam mo/ /rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyis ni/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'am/ rdo rje rtse mo dag gi rjes su 'brang ba las
<p>8a.4</p>shes par bya'o/ /'dir ni bla ma'i man ngag bsdus pa'o/ /de nas shin tu brtser ldan pas/ /sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya/ /zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis tshogs sogs pa'i yo byad sprul pa ston te/ de la spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa dang / so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis
<p>8a.5</p>brlab pa'o/ /spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin nam/ rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba ni spyir sbyang ba'o/ /rdo rje me'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsregs pa ni bsreg pa'o/ /so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa
<p>8a.6</p>ni/ til dang / nas dang / ku sha dang / 'bras yos dang / dri bzang po dang / me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i mchod yon la sngon du rdo rje'i gar byas la rdo rje'i thal mo kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya bcas la/ oM a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma'am/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ lan gsum mam bdun
<p>8a.7</p>nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de bzhin du me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang byug pa dang lha bshos dang gtor ma la sogs pa rnams mi'i las 'das nas lha'i mchod rdzas khyad par can du bsam mo/ /de bzhin du sbyin sreg la yang bza' ba zas kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste/ 
<p>8b</p>
<p>8b.1</p>gzhung bzhin du bsham zhing byin gyis brlab bo/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rab 'bad de/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa rkang pa bco lngas rten gyi zhing sprul par ston te/ de yang sngon du bsnyen pa zhes pa rkang pa bzhis rten gyi zhing nam mkha' la sprul par dam bca' bar ston la/ lag pa'i 'du byed ces pa
<p>8b.2</p>rkang pa bcu gcig gis rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas zhing spyan drangs pa ston te/ de yang bdag gi g.yas dang g.yon gyi sor mo la oM AHhUM trAM hrIHlnga bkod la/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis mthe chung gnyis so sor mdud la de bkan la/ oM badzra tsakra hUM zhes brjod cing
<p>8b.3</p>byon par bsam mo/ /gang byon zhe na rigs lnga'am gcig gam drug gam rigs gsum mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon pa'o/ /gang gis byon zhe na lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas so/ /de ltar mkha' la zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bdag dang zhing du 'brel par bya ba ston te/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor
<p>8b.4</p>gyi lha de rnams yang bems po lta bu ma yin te/ rig pa can spyan rtsa rig rig pa snyan cha khrol khrol bar bsam pa'o/ /dga' ba'i mchod pa glu yis bstod/ /ces pa tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa lngas cho ga dag pa yan lag bcu'i sgo nas bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag par bya ba ston te/ 
<p>8b.5</p>de yang dga' bas mchod ces pa rkang pa lngas phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdag dbul ba dang / dngos grub
<p>8b.6</p>blang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang dgu ste/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rjes su 'brang pa las shes par bya ste/ tshigs bcad sngags dang phyag rgyas me tog la sogs pa rnam pa lnga phul la/ oM badzra lA s+ye hUM/ oM badzra mA le trAM/ oM badzra gI ti hrIH/ 
<p>8b.7</p>oM badzra nirtI AH/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra haM/ badzra rat+na ma nut+tA raM/ badzra d+harmA ka ya ne/ badzra karma ka rod+b+ha be/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra puSh+pe trAM/ oM badzra A lo ke hrIH/ oM badzra gan+d+he AH/ sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
<p>9a</p>
<p>9a.1</p>At+na nAM nir+ya ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badzri a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma ni nir+ya ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma A gi ra dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma naM nir+ya ta na a nu rA ga Na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma bA ne hUM ho/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma naM nir+ya ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti a/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga
<p>9a.2</p>ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+na b+h+yo badzra ma ni oM/ oM na ma sarbata thA ba ta sUR+Ye b+h+yo badzra te dza ni dza la hrIH/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA sha pa ri pU ra Na tsin+ta ma Ni d+h+wa dzA gre b+h+yo badzra d+h+wa dzA gri trAM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra ti pra mor+ya ka re b+h+yo badzra hA s+ya ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu ra ta badzra d+harmA ta sa ma ti/ b+histu no mi mahA d+harma grI d+hi/ 
<p>9a.3</p>oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta ni ra ha rai stu no mi ma hA g+ho ShA nu g+he d+haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha ra pa ri bar ta d+hi sarba sU tran+ta na ye stu no mi sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta san+d+ha b+ha Sha bud+d+ha saM g+hi hi/ b+hi yaM stu no mi badzra badzre baM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga
<p>9a.4</p>ta puSh+pa pra sa s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ba ra ba ra/ oM sarba ta ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ku ru ku ru/ zhes bya ba sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rig ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya
<p>9a.5</p>ni 'di rnams te/ rdo rje bsdams pa dkur gzhag ste bcings la/ gnyis su byas pa'i khu tshur gnyis/ /bsgyings bcas gsor la gnyis ka yis/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang / /mda' 'phangs pa yin tshul dang ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag /dbang bskur
<p>9a.6</p>ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye/ /snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdung / /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar
<p>9a.7</p>bskor bkrol ba yi/ /thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag /go cha mthe chung mche ba dang / /khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /de nas phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor la yan lag lngas phyag btsal bar bsam zhing 'dis phyag bya ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra
<p>9b</p>
<p>9b.1</p>ban+d+ha naM kA ro mi/ de nas phyag bzhi bya ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba lus thams cad phab ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM niR+YA tA ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa twA d+hi tiSh+Tha swA mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las
<p>9b.2</p>rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar te/ dpral ba sa la reg par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She ka ya At+ma nAM nir+yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ zhes pa 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas nub phyogs nas ji skad bshad pa bzhin rdo rje thal mo spyi bor gzhag ste khas la reg pa dang / oM
<p>9b.3</p>sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya/ At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harmA pra brta ya maM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ snying gar sbyar la spyi bo sa la reg par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne/ At+ma naM
<p>9b.4</p>nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya ba'o/ /de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag
<p>9b.5</p>yid las byung ba'am/ chu las skyes pa'am/ thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de dag rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas
<p>9b.6</p>par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ 
<p>9b.7</p>gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba'am/ yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med
<p>10a</p>
<p>10a.1</p>pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams
<p>10a.2</p>cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe pU dza me g+has mu dra s+phar Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid
<p>10a.3</p>las byung ba'am/ rin po che'i 'od dam/ mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par
<p>10a.4</p>bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi
<p>10a.5</p>khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba'am/ yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
<p>10a.6</p>pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza
<p>10a.7</p>me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bgad pa dang / sgeg pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse
<p>10b</p>
<p>10b.1</p>'jo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / 
<p>10b.2</p>phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ya la s+ya ra ti kri Ta sau khya a nut+tar pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bzhad pa'i phyag rgya de nyid thal mo bskor ba spyi bor gzhag la/ yang thal mo khong stong du
<p>10b.3</p>sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ dpag bsam gyi shing ngam/ gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin
<p>10b.4</p>gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM
<p>10b.5</p>sarba ta thA ga tA nut+tar bo d+hi a laM ka ra bas+t+ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag ma lus par gyur cig /oM sarba
<p>10b.6</p>ta thA ga ta ma hA badzrod+b+ha wa dA na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha su mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par bral bar gyur cig /dge ba'i
<p>10b.7</p>lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra ma hA bod+hi ha ra shI la pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad mtshan
<p>11a</p>
<p>11a.1</p>dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med par bzhugs shing mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA
<p>11a.2</p>nut+tar mahA d+harma a ba bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su gzhol zhing
<p>11a.3</p>'khor ba yongs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta san+ta sa ra a pa re t+ya kA nut+tar ma hA bIr+ya pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang
<p>11a.4</p>phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ rin po che'i ri bo 'am/ rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
<p>11a.5</p>sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yaM ga rat+na a laM ka ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gdugs dang rgyal
<p>11a.6</p>mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs pas rnam par bkram pa/ brgya stong la sogs pa'i grangs snyed dam/ 'byor pa ci yod pa ltar dbul bar bya ba dang / ro brgya pa'i lha'i zhal zas dang / swa sti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'bum mam/ brgya stong snyed dbul bar bya ste/ oM a kA
<p>11a.7</p>ro ma khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/ zhes brjod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo bcu phrag stong ngam/ rol mo brgya phrag stong ngam/ rol mo bcu/ oM hUM hrIHmngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /rnam pa bcu ni 'di lta ste/ gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / rdza rnga chung ngu dang / cha lang dang / 
<p>11b</p>
<p>11b.1</p>rnga bo che dang / mr-i dang ga dang / rnga rings dang / rnga rked nyag dang / ta mi la zhes bya'o/ /shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang / oM badzra s+pha ra Na khaM/ zhes bya bas mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid
<p>11b.2</p>dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos pa byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar nas/ sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya ste/ 
<p>11b.3</p>phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ 
<p>11b.4</p>bdag ming rdo rje 'di zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha thams
<p>11b.5</p>cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med pas so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang / 
<p>11b.6</p>yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i
<p>11b.7</p>phyir bskul bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag
<p>12a</p>
<p>12a.1</p>nyid dbul gyis/ bdag dus thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ / 
<p>12a.2</p>'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog/ /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing / /sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol/ /zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/ de nas bstod pa ni 'khrugs bsdeb par bya ste/ tshigs
<p>12a.3</p>bcad glu yis bstod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstod pa ston pa ni/ tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
<p>12a.4</p>'das/ /don chen yi ge dam pa yin/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste/ /rdo rje chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /gdong drug mig drug lag drug po/ / 
<p>12a.5</p>mche gtsigs gdong brgya kun 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /'dod pa'i don grub ngan song sbyong / /mgon po nyon mongs dra ba
<p>12a.6</p>'joms/ /sa gzhi tshangs gnas rkang pas gnon/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs bya ba/ /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /a ni yig 'bru kun
<p>12a.7</p>gyi mchog /khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/ /sems ma rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /a ni 'byung ba 'gog pa ste/ /tshig tu brjod pa rnam spangs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /so sor kun rtog ngo bo nyid/ /a ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te/ /brjod
<p>12b</p>
<p>12b.1</p>pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /chos kyi rdo rje 'dzum khyod 'dud/ /bya ba nan tan ngo bo nyid/ /a ni tshig 'bru gsal bar byed/ /tshig kun gsal bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /stong pa rang bzhin 'dod chags che/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyi nyid ma grub
<p>12b.2</p>bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gnyi ga med par dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /stong pa'i don ldan mgu ba che/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /kha dog
<p>12b.3</p>che la gzi brjid ldan/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ming che mtshan bzangs rgya che ba/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bzhad cing dkyil 'khor yangs khyab pa/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /chos kyi shes rab mtshan 'chang ba/ /sangs rgyas gsung
<p>12b.4</p>pa khyod la 'dud/ /nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /grags pa rdo rje rgyu yi bdag /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /snang ba chen po gsal ba che/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /mkhas shing 'phrul 'chang rdo rje las/ /sgyu 'phrul
<p>12b.5</p>dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po go cha sra/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid gnod sbyin gtso/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul khu tshur brtan zhing sdud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /rdo rje sgeg
<p>12b.6</p>mo khyod la 'dud/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /rdo rje dpal phred khyod la 'dud/ /bzod chen 'chang ba ston pa po/ /rdo rje dbyangs mkhan khyod la 'dud/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yi/ /rdo rje gar mkhan khyod la 'dud/ /bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje
<p>12b.7</p>me tog khyod la 'dud/ /shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/ /rdo rje bdug pa khyod la 'dud/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ /rdo rje mar me gsal la 'dud/ /stobs po che la thabs che ba/ /rdo rje dag byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che/ /rdo rje 'gugs byed khyod la 'dud/ / 
<p>13a</p>
<p>13a.1</p>rdo rje zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /rdo rje 'dren byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che/ /rdo rje sdom byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal zhabs/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa khyod la 'dud/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /snying rje chen po blo
<p>13a.2</p>yi mchog /shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/ /ye shes cha grub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas pa/ /bag la nyal la byams sems can/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan la 'dud/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan/ /shugs
<p>13a.3</p>chen mgyogs pa chen po ste/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /stobs chen rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i/ /gom shugs ye shes bzhir ldan pa/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud/ /srid pa'i ri bo
<p>13a.4</p>chen po 'joms/ /mkhrigs shing rdo rje chen po 'dzin/ /drag po chen po mun pa 'joms/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po/ /phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul/ /mi shes ri 'joms sra ba po/ /mya ngan kun sel drag po ste/ /che bas che ba khyod la 'dud/ /mgon po rigs mchog
<p>13a.5</p>chen po ste/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog /theg pa'i tshul mchog lam gnas pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i mchog tu grub byed pa'i/ /pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud/ / 
<p>13a.6</p>'dud nyi shu dang spyi bstod kyis kyang bstod/ de ltar bstod pa byed pa de/ /'khor lo 'dud pa'i gtso mchog 'grub/ /ces pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bstod pa byas pa'i phan yon ston te/ de ltar bstod pas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad dang mchog gi dngos
<p>13a.7</p>grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dgyes nas bdag la lha rnams kyis/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis bstod par bsam/ /zhes bya ba rkang pa gnyis kyis lha rnams kyis bdag la bstod par ston te/ lha rnams thams cad kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu bdag gzhan gyi don du lha rnams la bstod pa
<p>13b</p>
<p>13b.1</p>legs so legs so zhes gsungs par bsam mo/ /drin gyi tshul gyis slar bstod pa/ /zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis slar yang lha rnams la bdag gis drin la lan gyi tshul gyis bstod pa thams cad dam/ 'dud nyi shus bstod pa'o/ /de dag ni mchog gi rgyal po sbyor ba
<p>13b.2</p>dang po'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa'o/ /de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa brgyad rkang pa gsum gyis yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston te/ phyag bya zhing smon pa byang
<p>13b.3</p>chub mchog gi sems bskyed sdom pa gzung ba dang / 'jug pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed pa/ ye shes lnga bsgom pa ston te/ go sla ba'i phyir 'dir ma spros so/ /de nas de la mngon 'byung gzugs/ /zhes pa nas/ de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gzhi'i ting
<p>13b.4</p>nge 'dzin ston te/ rdo rje dang mchod rten dang chos 'byung dang rgya gram dang / gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed pa ston pa'o/ /de yang / de nas yi ge rdzogs pa las/ /zhes bya bas chos 'byung nang du yi ge a kha dog sna tshogs pa'am kha dog sna tshogs pa'am kha dog dkar pos sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par 'brel to/ / 
<p>13b.5</p>de yang slob dpon la la dag rgya gram khong stong du 'dod la/ 'dir sa gzhi'i tshul du brtag par bya'o/ /de nas rkyen gyis slong ba ni/ /zhes pa nas dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang / dang po'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa bstan pa'o/ /de yang
<p>13b.6</p>dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa/ /zhes pa ni/ shar la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu rnams so/ /steng gi zhal ni lha zhal dkar po'am/ rta zhal dkar po la rngog ma sngon po can no/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru/ /zhes pa nas de dag
<p>13b.7</p>ni rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa rnams ston te/ rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du shes par bya'o/ /da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo nyid gsang sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste
<p>14a</p>
<p>14a.1</p>zhes pa nas/ de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyis lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed pa bstan pa ste/ dkyus ma nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'dir ma bkrol lo/ /'on kyang sngags don rnam par gzigs pa
<p>14a.2</p>las dkyil 'khor drug tu gsungs pa dang / gsang ldan 'di nyid las sngon du shes rab kyi 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lhag ma gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams rdzogs par bskyed
<p>14a.3</p>pa'am/ yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas cig car du sprul pa'o/ /de yang thabs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang / thabs khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bdun du shes par bya'o/ /gsang ldan 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i khongs su bsdu'o/ / 
<p>14a.4</p>khyad par gyi ni gzhal yas khang sgo gnyis pa'o/ /de nas las kyi khyad par yang / /bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste/ /sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do/ /las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pas/ las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste/ 
<p>14a.5</p>de nas las kyi khyad par yang / /bskyed pa'i zhar las 'byung ba ste/ /zhes bya bas/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed nas las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par dam bcas pa'o/ /sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do/ /zhes bya ba las
<p>14a.6</p>rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bla mas shes par bya ba'i don to/ /bla ma'i man ngag ni bcu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste/ sgo bzhi'i dbye ba dang / rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bsdu ba dang / mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' byon te/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag
<p>14a.7</p>btsal ba dang / ched du brjod pa dang / spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgos bkur gyi gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang nod pa dang / ye shes bstim pa dang / phyag rgyas gdab pa dang / lha las sbyar ba'i rim par shes par bya'o/ /de la de yang las mkhan rang byed la/ sgo
<p>14b</p>
<p>14b.1</p>bzhi dbye ba ni/ dang po sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal gyis sdigs mdzub kyi se gol gtogs shing / phreng sngags brjod pas/ sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo/ /yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug par bsams te/ khro bo hUM mdzad du bsgoms la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ 
<p>14b.2</p>mdzub mo gnyis lto sprad la drag tu brdabs pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzrod+g+ha Ta sa ma ya pra be+e sha ya hUM/ zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo/ /de ni sgo dbye ba'o/ /de nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni/ sgrub pa po'i snying gar a las sna tshogs rdo rje
<p>14b.3</p>bsams te/ mthe bo dang mdzub mo la zla ba'i steng du dzaHbsams la/ lag ngar gnyis rdo rje rgya gram gyi tshul du bsnol te/ dpung pa gnyis su se gol gtogs shing / rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po/ /oM badzra sa mA dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod cing / mtheb mdzub kyi dzaHlas ye shes kyi 'od zer lcags
<p>14b.4</p>kyu lta bur 'phros te/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa dang 'dra ba byon par bsam mo/ /de yang gzhung las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bdag /lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rjer bcing / /rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar
<p>14b.5</p>bya/ /zhes 'byung bas so/ /byon te phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa ni/ de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta/ pra Na me na badzra ban+d+ha naM ka ro mI/ zhes brjod cing
<p>14b.6</p>dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal bar bsam mo/ /de nas ched du brjod pa ni/ /e ma'o kun du bzang po yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/ /zhes ched du brjod par bsam mo/ / 
<p>14b.7</p>de nas spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drangs pa'i lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum po thams cad/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs kar zhugs nas/ spyi'i gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis
<p>15a</p>
<p>15a.1</p>brlab par bsam/ de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi lha tshogs 'thon te nam mkha' la gnas so/ /de nas sgos bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min/ /rdul phran ji snyed
<p>15a.2</p>thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur/ /zhes brjod nas/ shar phyogs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar zhugs te/ mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs nas/ mi bskyod pa'i thugs ka nas slar 'thon te/ rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin gyis
<p>15a.3</p>brlab par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyang shes par bya'o/ /de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sgrub pa pos dbang nod
<p>15a.4</p>pa'o/ /dam tshig la ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni/ rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas rigs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug mchod pa brgyad yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis
<p>15a.5</p>dbang bskur bar bsam/ bskal ba bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas sgrub po pos dbang nod pa ni/ lugs gnyis te/ ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas slar 'thon te/ gdan re re la snang ba
<p>15a.6</p>gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa la/ sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i dbang lnga'am drug nos nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa'am/ yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu 'dres nas bzhugs pa la/ sgrub pa pos dbang
<p>15a.7</p>nos par bsam mo/ /ye shes pa slar 'thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de yang dbang gis dbang rtags ni/ sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam/ sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na/ 
<p>15b</p>
<p>15b.1</p>de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas sgrub pa pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na/ yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /sems dpa'i zlos pa po
<p>15b.2</p>yin na/ sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing pa dang dgyes par bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drang ba ste/ de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so
<p>15b.3</p>so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam/ rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcings par bsam/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo/ /de nas phyag
<p>15b.4</p>rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni gnyis te/ rgyas pa dang / bsdus pa'o/ /rgyas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba las shes par bya'o/ /bsdus pa ni/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab pa/ sgrub pa po'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/ gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi
<p>15b.5</p>mjug la/ dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM many+dzu shrI/ zhes brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bsam mo/ /chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags kyi steng du hUM dkar po las yongs su
<p>15b.6</p>gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rgyugs su yod par bsam/ de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku skyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod la/ chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni/ sgrub pa po'i snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ rdo rje khu tshur
<p>15b.7</p>gnyis bcings te/ rdo rje'i gar dgu sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis/ phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni/ las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab po/ /phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ de nas las
<p>16a</p>
<p>16a.1</p>kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gnyis su bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te/ /de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/ /g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/ /byang chub
<p>16a.2</p>mchog gi phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba yis reg pa'o/ /rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o/ /tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog /gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /rdo rje
<p>16a.3</p>sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste/ /bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yin/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang / /mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /snying gar nyi ma
<p>16a.4</p>bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye/ /snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdud/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yi/ /thal mo 'gram
<p>16a.5</p>pa spyi bor gzhag /go cha mthe chung mche ba dang / /khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ /phreng ba bcings dang kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /bdug pa la sogs de bzhin
<p>16a.6</p>sbyin/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po/ /mdzub mos lcags kyu bcings pa ni/ /mthe chung las de lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan/ /sgo gnyis pa dang / gsum pa la sogs pa
<p>16a.7</p>lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re'am/ phyogs bzhir bcings pa'o/ /de rnams ni 'dir mang du spro mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab pa ni/ sgrub pa po'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/ 
<p>16b</p>
<p>16b.1</p>rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po/ /oM hUM hrIHzhes yid la zlos shing / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par/ rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni/ phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o/ / 
<p>16b.2</p>de las lha las la sbyar ba ni/ gzhung las/ de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni/ /sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do/ /zhes 'byung bas/ sgra las 'phel te bshad na/ gsang ldan nam sgo dang po'i lha las la gzhag pa ni/ lha'i dag pa dang
<p>16b.3</p>mthun par las la gzhag ste/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lha'i dag pa dang mthun no/ /sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang
<p>16b.4</p>dang / 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog sbyongs shig pa'o/ /yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi spro bsdu dran par byas pa ni las la sbyar ba'o/ /las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni/ mtshams sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas spos kyi chu dag la/ /sngags bzlas pa yis
<p>16b.5</p>bsang byas te/ /phung pos bsdu ba'i mchod pa lngas/ /rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas/ /'di dag rim pa'i rim gyis/ /se gol rim pas brdab byas pas/ /rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te/ /mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/ / 
<p>16b.6</p>sa mA dzaHzhes brjod cing / 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la/ /mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya/ /de nas gtso bo sngags rings la/ /dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing / /a haM zhes dang ldan par ni/ /bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub/ /de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ /mchod
<p>16b.7</p>nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ /gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /de dag ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste/ de dag ni yang spyi don dgu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste/ de nas spos kyi chu
<p>17a</p>
<p>17a.1\]32 ]dag la/ /sngags bzlas pa yis bsang bya ste/ /phung pos bsdus pa'i mchod pa lnga/ /rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas/ /zhes bya bas/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa ston te/ spyir sbyang zhing sreg pa dang / sgo sgo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngon bzhin no/ /
<p>17a.2</p>'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis/ /se gol rim par brdab byas pas/ /rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te/ /mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/ /zhes bya bas/ rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba ston to/ /de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags
<p>17a.3</p>dang phyag rgyas rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo/ /sa mA dzaHzhes brjod bya zhing / /'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la/ /mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya/ /zhes pas bstod pa ston te/ sngags sngon du 'gro bas de nas bstod pa ni/ 
<p>17a.4</p>mnyam med mi g.yo'am/ 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste sngon bzhin no/ /de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la/ /dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya
<p>17a.5</p>zhing / /A haM zhes dang ldan par ni/ /bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog bsgrub/ /ces bya bas/ lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ste/ de yang phyag rgyas gdab pa ni/ las mchog gi skabs bzhin shes par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ /mchod nas zhes
<p>17a.6</p>bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te/ de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni/ /thun mong gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyi nang gi lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa dang / bsgrub chos bcu drug dang / mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du dbul lo/ /phyag bzhi bya ba ni/ dang po sangs rgyas la sogs
<p>17a.7</p>pa'i/ /gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te/ de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba ni/ /shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / nub phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag btsal
<p>17b</p>
<p>17b.1\]33 ]ba dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsal ba ste/ lus kyi bca' thabs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas shes par bya ste/ sngon bzhin no/ /de'i 'og tu bla ma'i gdams ngag gis mnyam pa gsum dang bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang / 
<p>17b.2</p>mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas pa rnams ston pa ni/ de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ bsgom bzlas bya ba ni/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang bdag sku gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid
<p>17b.3</p>du bsam/ oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes brjod pas/ lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/ oM sarba sa mo\u0f85haM zhes brjod pas/ lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /de ltar mnyam pa
<p>17b.4</p>nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la bsgom pa dang / mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byed na yang / lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la/ bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byas pa'i dus su lha
<p>17b.5</p>thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas pa'i sgra 'byung bar bsam/ de ltar byas nas bsnyen pa lngar 'gyur te/ bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang / mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis so/ /bzlas pa'i bsnyen pa la/ dus kyi bsnyen pa dang / mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa dang / grangs kyi bsnyen pa
<p>17b.6</p>dang gsum mo/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o/ /de la sngags rnams 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo gI shwa ra hUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ oM badzra rat+na hUM/ oM badzra d+harma hUM/ oM badzra karma hUM/ oM badzra badzri Ni hUM/ oM d+harma badzri Ni hUM/ oM karma badzri Ni hUM/ oM badzra lA s+ya hUM/ 
<p>17b.7</p>oM badzra mA le hUM/ oM badzra gI ti hUM/ oM badzra nIrti hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ oM badzra rA dza dza/ oM badzra rA ga ho/ /oM badzra sA d+hu sa/ oM badzra rat+na oM/ oM badzra te dza oM/ oM badzra ke tu trAM/ 
<p>18a</p>
<p>18a.1\]34 ]oM badzra hA sa ha/ oM badzra d+harma hrIH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na d+hIH/ oM badzra he tu maM/ oM badzra b+hA Sha raM/ oM badzra karma kaM / oM badzra rak+Sha haM/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ oM badzra san+d+hi baM/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badzra bA sha hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badzra A be sha a/ khyad par gyi
<p>18a.2</p>snying po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye ya te na maH/ oM duHkhats+tshe da ya te na maH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya te na maH/ oM wA gI shwa ra ya te na maH/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na maH/ oM a ra pa tsa na ya te na maH/ thun mong gi sngags te/ go bzlog par shes par bya'o/ /oM sarba d+harmA a b+hA ba swa b+hA
<p>18a.3</p>ba/ bi shud+d+ha/ badzra a A aM a/ bra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA/ ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu pa da ya ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA ba tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su ba ri
<p>18a.4</p>shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aH/ zhes bya ba ni/ lha thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng sngags so/ /bsnyen pa bstan pa'o// //de nas sgrub pa la 'jug pa ni/ de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes bya bas/ bsgrub
<p>18a.5</p>pa'i gnas dang bsgrub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba spyir mdor bstan te/ de yang gnas ni nyams dga' zhing yid 'jug pa/ rgyal po dang theg pa dman pa la sogs pas dben par bya bar gsungs so/ /sa de gzhung bzhin sbyang bya dang / /gzung dang ldan pa gzhung
<p>18a.6</p>bzhin du/ /bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o/ /zhes bya bas/ sa'i cho ga rgyas par bya bar ston te/ de yang bla mas gsang ba spyi dang rtsa rgyud chen po la sogs par sa'i cho ga spyi don brgyad kyis shes par bya ba ni/ tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du gza' skar bzang po la zhugs te/ 
<p>18a.7</p>slob dpon slob ma'i spyod lam bya ba ni/ za gcig gi smyung ba dang dkar gsum bza' ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam bya'o/ /grong khyer chen po'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha khang la sogs pa'i shar ram byang phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /de nas ji tsam byed pa'i dkyil 'khor
<p>18b</p>
<p>18b.1</p>gyi sa bcad la sa'i lto 'phye brtag par byas la/ lto ba nas sa brkos te sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /sa'i ro lnga ni/ sa'i ro gseg ma dang / mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang / rdza'i ro gyo dum dang / shing gi ro mgal dum la sogs pa dang / rtswa'i ro phub ma la sogs pa
<p>18b.2</p>med par bya'o/ /rgyal pos ni dkyil 'khor khru brgya lnga bcu pa la bya'o/ /blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu pa la'am de'i phyed la bya'o/ /sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug la bya'o/ /sa brtag pa ni nyis 'gyur tshun du brtag go/ /de nas yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa la
<p>18b.3</p>bslang ba'o/ /sa'i lha mo la bslang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la bslang ba dang / sa bdag la sogs pa la bslang ba'o/ /de nas yid kyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can/ lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa cig /sa'i 'og nas sku phyed tsam 'thon par bsams la/ spos chus
<p>18b.4</p>brlan par byas pa'i lag pas sa la lan gsum brdabs la/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud
<p>18b.5</p>las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan gsum brjod pas/ sa'i lha mo'i zhal nas khyod ci bde bar bris shig zer nas sa'i nang du thim par bsam mo/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su maN+Dal khru gang gru bzhi pa cig byas la/ der mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang gtor ma
<p>18b.6</p>cha gcig bshams la/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul te/ spos kyi snod thogs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ dgongs shig bdag la sangs rgyas dgongs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang / /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ /rnam par
<p>18b.7</p>snang mdzad chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar 'tshal/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /de skad ces lan gsum brjod pas/ dkon mchog gsum gyis gnang ba byin par bsam mo/ /yang gtor ma a kA ro la sogs pas
<p>19a</p>
<p>19a.1</p>byin gyis brlabs la/ dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spos thogs te/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang / /gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin/ /yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher
<p>19a.2</p>ldan pa'i/ /'byung la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang / /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba/ /ji ltar bsams pa bzhin 'bri na/ /khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par/ /dge
<p>19a.3</p>ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod/ /da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni/ /bzod par gsol gyis mi slu bar/ /rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi/ /legs nyes ltas rnams bstan du gsol/ /lan gsum gsol ba btab pas/ sa bdag la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig pa'i
<p>19a.4</p>gnang ba byin par bsam mo/ /de nas chag chag dang skyang nul legs par bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis/ yungs kar gtor zhing bgegs bskrad nas/ oM hUM hrI zhes pa'am/ oM badzra satwa hUM zhes bya ba lan gsum mam/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o/ /de nas
<p>19a.5</p>zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /yang na dang por sa'i pra brtag par bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi pus mo nub tsam mam lte ba nub tsam brkos la/ de yang gong gi sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la oM badzra u pa ta ya zhes brjod
<p>19a.6</p>la gdeg /de nas dong gi nang du chus bkang ste/ me tog yang bcug la/ oM hUM hrI 'am/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ zlos shing shar phyogs su gom pa mi drag mi dal ba brgya phyin te/ tshur log nas chu de ma skams na dngos grub yod par ston/ chu skams na gzhan du spo bar bshad/ de nas
<p>19a.7</p>rdza so ma btang ba zhig tu rin po che sna lnga dang 'bru lnga dang sman dang snying po dang spos dang lnga blugs la/ dong gi nang du gzhug go/ /de nas brkos pa'i sa de rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags btab pa'i spos chus bral brul du sprus la nang dgang bar bya'o/ /lhag par gyur na dngos grub mchog yod
<p>19b</p>
<p>19b.1</p>par bstan/ chad nas gzhan du spo/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag gdab/ 'thas par bcags la me long gi rgyab bzhin du byas pa ni sa las dang bya bas sbyang ba'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin nam rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba dang / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas
<p>19b.2</p>pa'i thal ba dang / yungs kar gyis gtor ba ni sngags kyis sbyang ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba ni/ slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ rdo rje chen po nas gzhal yas khang la thug pa'i bar du bsgoms la sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa'i nang du sa chud par bsgom par
<p>19b.3</p>bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o zhes bsam pa sngon du btang ba ni/ sems kyi dbang gis sa bzung ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya
<p>19b.4</p>chen por bsgoms nas/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+NA duHkhats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mU rti/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ bA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na/ ya te na ma/ zhes zlos shing 'dug pa yan chad ni/ slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas bsgrub
<p>19b.5</p>pa'i grogs mchog rigs bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa bzhis/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ /bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzad/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor
<p>19b.6</p>lo che/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bgegs tshar gcad par gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de la mig byin gyis brlab pa ni/ g.yas su ma las nyi ma g.yon du Ta las zla ba/ de gnyis kyi steng du hUM gis mig 'bras tshul du byas pa ni mig byin gyis brlab pa'o/ / 
<p>19b.7</p>rkang mthil gnyis su a las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom pa na rkang pa brlab pa'o/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid/ /bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag /byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor
<p>20a</p>
<p>20a.1</p>ro/ /rdo rje lta bas tshar bcad pa'i mig g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yon phyogs su bskor bas/ bgegs thams cad gsal btab par bsam/ g.yas kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis g.yas phyogs su bskor bas bgegs thams cad bsreg
<p>20a.2</p>par bsam mo/ /de ni rdo rje lta bas tshar gcod do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas byang shar mtshams su byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du mchongs te phyin la/ kha lho phyogs su bltas la/ dril bu dkur brten la/ rdo rje lan gsum gsor zhing / tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ 
<p>20a.3</p>rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngas 'bri
<p>20a.4</p>yis/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa/ rgan po dang / rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa/ 
<p>20a.5</p>gang dag 'khod pa de dag dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas/ /myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo tshal pa brgyar dgas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rkang pa'i sor mos rdo rje rtse gcig pa sa la 'bri zhing / 
<p>20a.6</p>hUM hUM zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor ba ni rdo rje 'gros kyis tshar gcad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir rkang stabs bdun dang / lag stabs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bya ba ni/ rdo rje stangs stabs kyis thams cad thal kar gcig pu'am/ yang na de bas mang yang rung / /shar gyi
<p>20a.7</p>phyogs su gzugs par bya/ /pog phor kham pa las byas pa/ /so ma btang ba dkar po bcu/ /byas nas phyogs dang mtshams su ni/ /brgyad pa de bzhin bdun du dgod/ /pog phor dag tu ma 'byor na/ /kham pa'i phor bu'i nang nas dbul/ /de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na/ /gcig
<p>20b</p>
<p>20b.1</p>cig sgor ni gzhag nas dbul/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan pa yi/ /rta babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya/ /nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyi/ /myu gu legs par skye bar dgod/ /dril bu gdugs dang rnga yab dang / /srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni/ /rta babs sogs las phyi rol du/ / 
<p>20b.2</p>mdzes par bya phyir mkhas pas gdags/ /'bras yos 'bru dang bcas pa yi/ /me tog sil ma rab tu dgram/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du/ /phyi ma'i ri mo sdu gu bri/ /'jig rten 'di na grags pa yi/ /bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gi phyi rol
<p>20b.3</p>du/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu mkhas pas dgod/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa'i chus dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa bsang gtor bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kha'i dbus su bzhag la/ 
<p>20b.4</p>oM badzra tsakra hUM/ zhes bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas phyi dro'i dus su/ glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang / me tog dang / spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed pa dang / ci 'dod pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig
<p>20b.5</p>sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dkar po sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol te/ yang na phreng sngags sam/ yang na sangs rgyas kyi snying po oM hUM hris bzhugs su gsol la/ de bzhin du lha gzhan gyi yang sku bzhugs pa'am/ mtshan ma
<p>20b.6</p>rnams btab la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'bru gsum brjod cing 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la dkyil 'khor bslang la/ de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la/ de nas nam mkha'i lha bsre bar bya ste/ yi ge phyin ci ma log pas kha sbyar gyi sbyor ba bsal
<p>20b.7</p>lo/ /bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bkug pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bkug la bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du byas te/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas la/ byin gyis rlob cing mnyes par byas nas gzhag par bya ste/ de nas mchod
<p>21a</p>
<p>21a.1</p>pa rgya chen po mdo klog pa yan chod byas la/ spyi'am so so'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa byas la phyis 'byung ba bzhin du slob dpon rang nyid bzhugs shing dbang lha las blang ngo / /de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur bar bya bar bstan pa'i phyir dkyus ma nyid
<p>21a.2</p>'khrugs sdeb ste/ de yang / de nas 'dir dbang dam par gsungs/ /dbang bskur med na 'grub pa med/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /'di la dbang byin yon tan 'grub/ /ces bya bas dbang nod pa'i yon tan ston te/ dbang bskur zhing dam tshig dang ldan na/ dngos
<p>21a.3</p>grub rnam pa gnyis 'thob par lung gis bstan pa'o/ /dang por khrus byas gos gyon te/ /rgyal po'i cha lugs 'dra ba dang / /bud med lta bu'i tshul ldan pas/ /slob dpon bla mar gyur pa la/ /dbang rnams nod par rab tu gsungs/ /zhes bya bas/ dbang nod pa'i phyir dbang gi
<p>21a.4</p>sngon du spyod lam de'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ston te/ de nas bzlas pa dang / bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams byas la/ phyir 'byung la slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob ma las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs
<p>21a.5</p>shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs bskon la/ oM badzra tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ces mngon par bsngags la/ gos dmar po las byas pa'i gtsug tor dang / sgo srung bzhi'i snying po yongs su bzlas
<p>21a.6</p>pa'i gos dmar pos gdong bcings la/ yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su bzung ste de'i snying ga dang dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa bon gyi rnam par dgod pa/ phyogs bzhi nas sngon bzhin phyag
