<p>21a.7</p>'tshal du bcug la/ des kyang de bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed du nus par byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag la/ de bzhin du sdom pa sbyin no/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+tot+bA da yA mi/ zhes brjod do/ / 
<p>21b</p>
<p>21b.1</p>byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su/ /snying pos rab tu gzhag par bya/ /de nas su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ sid+d+h+ya badzra ya thA su khaM/ zhes bskul lo/ /de nas sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug cing / de
<p>21b.2</p>bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go/ /de nas sa ma ya hUM/ zhes brjod la slob ma nang du gzhug go/ /de nas 'di skad ces kyang bsgo'o/ /deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang
<p>21b.3</p>thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste
<p>21b.4</p>'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis/ /gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu'i snying pos lan cig bsngags la/ slob ma 'thung du gzhug go/ /de la mna'i snying po ni 'di
<p>21b.5</p>yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzrod ka Tha/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ / 
<p>21b.6</p>rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smros/ /skye bo'i tshogs na 'dug pa'am/ /dad pa med par bgad par 'gyur/ /de nas slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo shig /deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di gyis
<p>21b.7</p>zhes bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la
<p>22a</p>
<p>22a.1</p>'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'i/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go/ /'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med ni/ /de ring nyid
<p>22a.2</p>du dbab par shog /oM badzra A be sha a/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas/ de'i snying gar zhugs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' babs par gyur par bsams na/ babs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ho a ho zhes bya ba rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bkod de/ se'u'i me tog dang 'dra
<p>22a.3</p>ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying po las nges par phyung la/ badzra ban+d+ha traT ces bya bas de'i snying kha phye la/ der bcug ste/ rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ sngags brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las gyur par bsams na yang 'bab par
<p>22a.4</p>'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems dpa' phyin yang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig lan bdun nam brgyad brjod pas kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan por byas nas ni/ /bdag
<p>22a.5</p>lus kyis yin snod kyi sgo dbye zhing / /snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blta/ /sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a dmar gzugs/ /brjod pas yang dag chags par g.yo bar blta/ /zhes pas so/ /de nas oM pa ra ma su khA sha ya su la li ta/ bi sa la na mi ter/ na ma mi b+ha ga bAn ta
<p>22a.6</p>dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hi hi hi hi hiH/ pra tits+tsha badzra ku su ma/ any+dza li nA tha ho/ zhes brjod pa'i sngags 'dis phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du dor ro/ /de nas dngos grub rab 'bring me tog babs pa las brtag par bya ste/ lha rnams kyi khyad par dang / gnas kyi khyad par las brtag par bya ste/ gang tshe
<p>22a.7</p>sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi/ /dbu la me tog babs gyur na/ /de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /zhal du bab na 'grub par 'gyur/ /stod du bab na mchog rnams 'grub/ /rked du bab na 'bring rnams 'grub/ /ro smad phyogs su bab na ni/ / 
<p>22b</p>
<p>22b.1</p>dngos grub phal rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bar gyi sku la bab na ni/ /snying po la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /smad du bab par gyur na ni/ /mngag gzhug la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /rim pa de dag thams cad ni/ /rigs bzhi rnams las shes par bya/ /de bzhin lha rnams
<p>22b.2</p>gzhan la yang / /dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /gal te lha yi gzugs dag las/ /me tog ring du lhung gyur na/ /de ni dngos grub yun ring 'gyur/ /nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag /gang du 'gram pa tshun chod ni/ /de yi sa yis
<p>22b.3</p>de yin te/ /me tog de lhung de yi rigs/ /lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu/ /gal te me tog bab gyur na/ /gang du nye bar gyur pa ni/ /de ni de yi rigs su bshad/ /gal te la la'i me tog ni/ /dkyil 'khor mang po 'das nas babs/ /de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing / /de ni
<p>22b.4</p>dad pa'ang rab tu chung / /gal te me tog bor ba dag /ra ba'i ri bo la bab na/ /zhi ba'i bya bas de nas sdod/ /nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug /de ste the tshom gyur na ni/ /mkhas pas bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug /de ni gang yang nges med pas/ /de ni dngos grub 'thob mi
<p>22b.5</p>'gyur/ /gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang / /don med phyi rol ltung na ni/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /snying por me tog bab na ni/ /rtag tu don med mi 'gyur bshad/ /srad bu dag gi cho ga bzhin/ /de yi nye 'khor shes par bya/ / 
<p>22b.6</p>de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yi/ /me tog rnams ni bor ba las/ /bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ni/ /de la zhi ba brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas/ /de ni slar la 'dor du gzhug /lan gsum stsogs te bor na yang / /gal te legs par ma babs na/ /re thag
<p>22b.7</p>gcad de slar gtang ngo / /de nas me tog bab pa las lha yang dag par shes par byas nas phreng ba blangs te/ oM pra ti grih+NA swa mi maM/ sa twaM ma hA ba la/ zhes brjod nas/ de'i mgo la bcing ngo / /ye shes babs pa'i mtshan ma las/ /nye bar mtshon nas de la mig gis
<p>23a</p>
<p>23a.1</p>ci mthong zhes dris te/ des ci ltar mthong ba de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dkar po snang ba mthong na ni/ /de la dngos grub mchog bslab bo/ /gal te ser po mthong na de la don 'byung ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /gal te dmar po mthong na
<p>23a.2</p>de la rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /'on te nag por mthong ba de la mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo/ /gal te sna tshogs par mthong na/ /de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bkrol nas bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas snying po 'dis gdong g.yogs bkrol
<p>23a.3</p>te/ oM badzra sa twa ya yan te t+ya/ tsak+Shu g+ha ta na pa rota g+ha ta ma ti/ sarba k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu ma nut+ta raM/ de nas he badzra pA sh+ya/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya/ /de nas bla ma dgar gyur nas/ /slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo/ /dkyil
<p>23a.4</p>'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang / /thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur/ /dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs/ /gsang sngags la yang
<p>23a.5</p>brtson par gyis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ mi mnyam med par zur bzhi snyoms/ /dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya/ /khyams las bden pa'i rdo rje dag /gzungs rnams lha mos
<p>23a.6</p>mchod pa yin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /gdul byas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgrog pa yin/ /me long ye shes rtag mi rtog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog /nyi ma zla ba
<p>23a.7</p>yang dag ldan/ /kun 'grub mi zad bde ba ste/ /bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o/ /de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ka ba dkyil 'khor brgyad pa yi/ /dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i/ /rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ /mdo sde 'khor lo bskor
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>bas na/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs gdab cing / /thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs/ /gang dag 'jug pa tsam gyis ni/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog dang / /bde ba chen po rab 'grub phyir/ /de dag dag par yang dag 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje
<p>23b.2</p>'bebs pa nas brtsams te/ mgon po rnam snang gi bar du bstan par bya'o/ /dang po sdig pa bsreg byas nas/ /de la dbab dang dral ba bya/ /de dag kun gyi rim pa yang / /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /'dir ni de dag bya ba yin/ /zhes bya bas/ dbang bskur ba'i slob ma rgyud
<p>23b.3</p>dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa bsreg pa ni/ til gyi sreg blugs sdig pa bsreg pa'i sngags dang bcas pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la/ de nas thal mo dam du bsdams la/ sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te/ /rab tu bsdams
<p>23b.4</p>phyir rdo rje bsdams/ /badzra any+dza li zhes rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so/ /badzra ban+d+ha zhes brjod cing slob ma'i snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes dbab pa ni/ /badzra A be+e sha a zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa la/ a a zhes pa a brgyas
<p>23b.5</p>slob ma la dbab par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i lan dang sbyin pa dang / /zhes bya bas/ slob mas slob dpon la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba bstan pa'o/ /sbyin pa dang zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i sngon yon bzhin du slob dpon la dbul bar bstan pa'o/ /rim pa dang ldan pas dbang bskur te/ 
<p>23b.6</p>de nas de la chu dbang bskur/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dbang dang ni/ /cod pan dar dpyangs rdo rje dang / /bdag po ming la sogs pa dang / /zhes bya bas/ rig pa'i dbang lnga dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang dang drug bskur bar bstan pa ni/ gang du me tog bab par gyur pa de'i
<p>23b.7</p>rigs dang gzugs su bskyed la/ de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ snying po 'di dang rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur la/ rang gi mtshan
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>ma'i dbang bskur ba lag tu byin te/ mtshan ma dang rjes su mthun par sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang / /di ring khyod la bskur bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun du dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / /rang gi mtshan
<p>24a.2</p>mas bdag po'i dbang gi snying po 'dis sbyin par bya ste/ oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po 'dis dril bu sbyin par bya'o/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/ de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur/ oM badzra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa
<p>24a.3</p>mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gis ming gang brjod pa der skye zhes brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /zhes bya bas lag tu rdo rje byin la/ 
<p>24a.4</p>oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes so/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la/ spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la sngags kyis bskul ba'i tshig brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i sngags byin la/ phyag rgya bzhi'i ye
<p>24a.5</p>shes bzlas par bya ba ni/ rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo bskor ba byas la phyag bya ste/ phreng ba bcing ba la sogs thams cad gzung bar bya'o/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /dbang rnams rdzogs nas dbang byin pa/ /gsang
<p>24a.6</p>ba'i dbang dang nges pa'i dbang / /rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskur/ /de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing / /zhes bya bas/ rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba ston te/ de yang de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon bzang po phul la/ gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas
<p>24a.7</p>la/ /ji ltar mchog chen stsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas/ shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs pad+ma bris la/ slob ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i skur zla ba'i
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor las khru gsum tsam yongs su dor bar dbang bskur ba'i sgo la mngon par phyogs par byas la/ nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi
<p>24b.2</p>tshad tsam la/ zur bzhi pa la/ sgo nub phyogs su bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la/ de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris/ de'i steng du seng ge'i gdan zla ba'i steng du dkyil 'khor ras kyis bkab pa dang seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bri zhing g.yas logs su dar dang / 
<p>24b.3</p>me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs rtse mo dkar ba dang / dmar ba la gtsug tor gdugs dkar pos yongs su bzlas la/ g.yon du dar dang / ras sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan oM yongs su bzlas pa legs par bzhag la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la
<p>24b.4</p>sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing / rnga bo che dang / rnga rings dang / dung la sogs pa'i rol mo phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyi'i gar dang glu la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod cing / bkra shis kyi glu len cing / dril bu dkrol bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs
<p>24b.5</p>pa'i chu rnams kyis/ de'i sngags gdon pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid dang / rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes bya ba dang / ji srid par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar dang dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gzugs de'i
<p>24b.6</p>dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung la/ oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs byang chub bde dbang bskur/ / 
<p>24b.7</p>rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsung bkra shis gang / /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gis/ /sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /yang
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje bsgom/ /dam tshig mchog gi bum pa yang / /'dzin par mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /de tshe de la dbang bskur ba/ /rdzogs sangs rdo rje lha mo rnams/ /rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par
<p>25a.2</p>'gyur/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ma hA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi She ka na hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sarba badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na ma ste b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra su ra ta s+t+waM/ ma hA badzra sa twa oM b+hur b+hu wa swA hA/ 
<p>25a.3</p>zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de sngags brjod par bya'o/ /me tog ma'i gzugs kyis me tog gis gtor la/ deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhed pas mchod na khyed
<p>25a.4</p>mchod pa'i yan lag rdzogs shing / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang / dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par byas pa'i skur mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par
<p>25a.5</p>'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la bdug par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan la yang dag par 'bar
<p>25a.6</p>bas/ ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten
<p>25a.7</p>thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de/ phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phen du gzhug cing steng dang 'og tu
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ /de nas sha d+ha b+hany+dza ga byin la/ 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul pa nye bar longs spyod cing / gzhan dag la yang byin cig /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing / dung yang lag pa g.yas par byin te/ 
<p>25b.2</p>chos kyi 'khor lo dang / smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /di ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla
<p>25b.3</p>med pas/ /kun du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin
<p>25b.4</p>pa de kun kyang / /kun du khyod la srung bar byed/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig / 
<p>25b.5</p>rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur
<p>25b.6</p>cig /rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig / 
<p>25b.7</p>rgyal bar gyur cig /pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig /las kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
<p>26a.2</p>bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la/ de bzhin du bzhag ste/ gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po
<p>26a.3</p>kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to/ /oM/ nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ / 
<p>26a.4</p>kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu wa swaH/ gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin te/ 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung bstan par bya ste/ de la de
<p>26a.5</p>bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dbang gi slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di nyid kyang gzengs bstod pa'i phyag
<p>26a.6</p>rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'i byin rlabs dang / gsang sngags 'di'i stobs la dad par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis/ /srid pa kun las rnam grol bar/ /khyod
<p>26a.7</p>ni di ring gnas pa yin/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /slob ma gus pas bla ma yi/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te/ /de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun/ /rjes su grub par khas blang ngo / /de ltar dam bcas byas nas ni/ /cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni/ /blangs nas
<p>26b.2</p>kyang ni de la sbyin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcing / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi badzra satwaM hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ 
<p>26b.3</p>'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ /zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no/ /de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon/ /me tog dri la sogs pas
<p>26b.4</p>mchod/ /mchod phyir gdu bu bcang bar bya/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzugs/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su/ /spyi bo btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di
<p>26b.5</p>ni phul ba lags/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag par legs par blangs nas su/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /de ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin
<p>26b.6</p>par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ /sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang / / 
<p>26b.7</p>sems can rnams la mi phan pa/ /nyams pa chen por 'gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ /de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing / /zhes bya bas dbang bskur zin nas bkra shis brjod par bya ste/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis de ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams
<p>27a.2</p>la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/ / 
<p>27a.3</p>rgyal ba bzhin du 'gying bcas pas/ /g.yog dang ldan pas slob dpon la/ /lan gsum bskor bas tshigs bcad kyis/ /bla ma de ni gzengs bstod bya/ /kye bdag ni rim pas dbugs phyung ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la dgod/ /sa la nges par dbang bskur te/ /shin
<p>27a.4</p>tu gzi ldan bkra shis mchog /ces brjod pas gshegs su gsol te/ de nas rang yang khyim du 'gro/ /khyim du phyin nas 'khor dag la/ /slob dpon 'di ni dam tshig pas/ /bdag kyang dam tshig mchog dang ldan/ /'di la rim gro phun sum tshogs/ /rta dang glang po nor
<p>27a.5</p>dang 'bru/ /rin po che dang ci bzhed pa/ /khyed cag nga la ma 'dri bar/ /slob dpon 'di la de phyir phul/ /zhes bya bas/ bla ma la yon dbul ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs shing / sprul pa rang la bsdu ba dang / /tshon phyag cing dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas la sogs pa ji ltar
<p>27a.6</p>bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ de nas/ bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang / /rang srog gis rtag brten
<p>27a.7</p>byas na/ /longs spyod g.yo bas smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir bskal pa bye ba ni/ /grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtsod ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams mchog dag gis/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te/ /gang 'dir legs par gnas pas
<p>27b.2</p>na/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun dang mnyam/ /rang 'byung du yang de skyes so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /des ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer
<p>27b.3</p>mchog tu rab tu bzhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas te/ /de nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab cing bzod par gsol ba la/ nyi ma
<p>27b.4</p>'char ba'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gyen du bkrol te snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM kr-i to pa sarba satwa ar+tha/ sid+d+hi ma haM dwa ma thA nu ga ta/ gats+tsha twaM bud+d+ha bi shi yaM/ su na ra ga ma na ya tu/ badzra satwa mu de/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
<p>27b.5</p>ni/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas/ rang gi lus la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas snying ga nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na 'dug pas dbang bskur la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings pa/ go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ 
<p>27b.6</p>sarba mu Ta me draM TaM ku ru pa ra ka pa tse na baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa bkrol ba la thal mo sbyar te/ bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis bya'o/ /oM badzra tu Sh+ye ho/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ rdo rje dga' bas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so rdo rje
<p>27b.7</p>sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /theg pa chen po bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mdor bsdu ba'i/ /mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad/ /oM badzra kI li kI la
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>ya/ badzra big+h+naM badzra d+hA ra any+dza ya hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ ces bya bas phur bu bton la 'o mas bkru'o/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nut+pan+na twa ta/ zhes pa 'dis/ tshon rtsi rnams bsdus la 'bad pas/ chu klung chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas kyang ba
<p>28a.2</p>glang gi lci bas nye bar byugs la/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /ci dga' bar ni sbyin par bya/ /khyi dang bya rog la sogs la/ /cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung / / 
<p>28a.3</p>dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad/ /gal te slob mas spyad na ni/ /dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyod par mi 'dod na/ /de yi cho ga'i go rims 'di'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /de dag cho ga bzhin du
<p>28a.4</p>dbul/ /gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs/ /sangs rgyas nyid la dbul bar bya/ /gang na dang gdugs spos dri la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad snod la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag la ni slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang
<p>28a.5</p>mi bskur ro/ /dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin/ /yang na dge slong ma la sbyin/ /gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na/ /dge bsnyen dag la sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yi phyi de nyin/ /nyes byas lhag ma zhi bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pa yis ni zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /slob
<p>28a.6</p>mas bdag zhi bya ba'i phyir/ /spyan la sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang / /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byams pa chen po'ang bsgom par bya/ /nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /de nas zhi ba chen po bya/ /de dag ni gzhug cing dbang bskur ba'i rim pa'o/ /gzhan yang
<p>28a.7</p>sbyin sreg byed pa na/ /las gzhan de dag gzhan pa min/ /bdag gi las dang gzhan dag ste/ /shi dang gson gyi las su bstan/ /zhes bya bas/ bdag dang gzhan don du sbyin sreg bya ba spyir mdor bstan pa'o/ /de yang / shi dang gson gyi las su bstan/ /zhes bya bas gzhan
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>don bya ba khyad par du mdor bstan pa'o/ /de la bdag gi las bstan pa/ /zhes bya ba nas/ de ni bdag gi don bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag gi don bya ba'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'o/ /de yang / de dbus gsum las lha rnams bskyed/ /ces bya bas
<p>28b.2</p>yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan dang lha bskyed pa ste cho ga gsum la bya'o/ /de la a yis byin brlabs te/ /zhes bya bas lha'i byin gyis brlab pa ste/ dbu la oM mgrin par AH'am hrIHdang / thugs kar hUM bsam pa la bya'o/ /'di las ma gsungs gzhan dag las/ /rgyas par
<p>28b.3</p>bstan de der shes bya/ /zhes bya bas/ /gzhung 'di sbyin sreg ma rgyas pas/ /mtshan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg rgyas pa dang / rgyas pa gzhan dang gzhan bzhin 'dir bya bar gsungs pa'o/ /gzhan don bya ba'i rim pa yang / /shi dang na ba gnyis yin te/ /zhes bya
<p>28b.4</p>bas/ gzhan don bya ba mdor bstan pa'o/ /de la na ba'i las bya ba zhes bya ba nas/ na ba las thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis/ gang dag bgegs la sogs pa rnams kyis na ba la/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis zhi ba'i las bya la/ gang dag zhi bar ma gyur pa rnams la
<p>28b.5</p>drag po'i sbyin sreg gis las bya zhes pa'i don to/ /de nas shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa 'byung ste/ ro'i sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga dang / ro sta gon la gnas pa dang / ro sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba dang gsum gyi rim pa ston te/ dkyus dkrugs pa'i phyir gsal bar bya ba ni/ de nas
<p>28b.6</p>shi la phan gdags na/ /dang por gnod pa'i bgegs bsal nas/ /ro la phan pa'i cho ga ni/ /phan pa'i gnod sbyin chus btab la/ /dang por bkru ba'i las yin no/ /de nas rnam rgyal chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pas bkrus te bgegs bskrad la/ /de nas de la bsrung bar bya'o/ / 
<p>28b.7</p>a yis kun khyab spyi steng bsam/ /lhag 'gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /a las ye shes lnga yis gang / /de nas a yi spro bsdu bya/ /de nas gang shi de nyid la/ /mig la a a zhes bkod de/ /de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o/ /zhes bya bas/ ro'i sngon du bya ba'i rim pa ni/ 
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>dang por gnod pa'i bgegs bsal te/ gang zhe na/ snang la bden pa bdar ba ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pa dang / bden pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags
<p>29a.2</p>dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ tshe 'das pa 'di la gson gyi dus su brnyas byed pa/ gshin gyi dus su gcags byed pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad skad cig
<p>29a.3</p>kyang ma gnas par dengs shig ces byas la/ yungs kar brdeg cing / hUM bzhi pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus bkrus la bgegs kyis mi tshugs par bsam/ de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus bkrus
<p>29a.4</p>la sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/ de nas ro'i spyi bo'i steng du a bsams la/ de gyur pa las kho rang gi lhag pa'i lha ru bskyed/ de nas yang snying gar a bsams la/ de las ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ro ye shes lnga dang ldan par gyur par bsams/ de nas ro'i
<p>29a.5</p>lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi bor zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po bsam/ mgrin par zla ba'i steng du hrIHd+mar po bsam mo/ /snying gar zla ba'i steng hUM nag po bsam/ de nas skye mched drug la dbyangs kyi yi ge zung re re dgod do/ /de ni rten sbyang ba'o/ /de nas
<p>29a.6</p>shes pa dgug pa ni/ gong gi bden pa bdar la/ tshe 'das pa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas/ ngan song gsum la sogs pa 'gro ba gang na gnas kyang rung / skad cig gis 'dir khugs par gyur cig /de nas sngags brjod pa ni/ oM sarba bid sarba
<p>29a.7</p>pA paM A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza a Ni suM tri pre du dza/ zhes brjod cing / /snying ga nas 'od 'phros pa las khugs par bsam mo/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHbrjod la yang bstim par bsam mo/ /de nas gcags dang dbral ba ni/ gong gi bden pa bdar la/ gong ma ltar 'dir yang bgegs bskrad
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>do/ /de nas 'gro ba rigs drug nas drang ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi snying pos 'gro ba rigs drug nas ro'i shes pa drangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu thob par bsam mo/ /de nas gtang bar bya ba ni/ mchod pa'i bye brag ro la dbul ba dang / me tog gi char dbab
<p>29b.2</p>bar bya'o/ /de dag ni sngon du bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas gnas pa'i cho ga bshad/ /shi ba dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste/ /zhag lnga slob dpon smyung gnas te/ /bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni/ /'khor lo'i lha rnams mdun bsams te/ /phyag 'tshal spro bskyed la sogs
<p>29b.3</p>bya/ de nas tshig 'di ched brjod bya/ /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /gyur par bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin
<p>29b.4</p>gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dul ba'i mchog yin no/ /de nas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /rgyal mchog la sogs
<p>29b.5</p>bsgom bya ste/ /sgo dbye la sogs gnas 'dir bshad/ /de nas spos thogs la/ spyan drang tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /kye dbang bskur nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba
<p>29b.6</p>yis/ /'di la phan gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /de rjes gsang sngags 'di brjod bya/ /oM a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hri b+ha ga bA na/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ wA gI shwa ra ma hA wa tsa/ sarba d+harma/ ga ga
<p>29b.7</p>na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu/ dz+nyAn gar+b+ha AH/ zhes ni brjod pa'i sngags bzlas so/ /dang po sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang / /ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis bstod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod bya la/ /rang dbang bstod de nges pa'i mchog /'bras
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>bu 'byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /shi la phan gdags don ched du/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /des ni gsol ba gdab byas nas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i
<p>30a.2</p>rgyal ba dang / /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /nam mkha' gang bar 'di bzhes la/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin te/ /de nas til gyis de la ni/ /bskor te sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas/ ro sta gon la gnas
<p>30a.3</p>pa bstan te/ de yang de nas ro sta gon la gnas pa ni/ shin tu dben pa'i gnas su/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ lha rnams kyi gnas su me tog gi tshom bu bkod de/ dbus su khri byas la/ ras bzang po yug gcig gis dkris te/ de'i steng du ro
<p>30a.4</p>bzhag la/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkar gsum bza' zhing za gcig pa'i smyung ba byas la/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par bsgoms nas/ de nas yang sngon bzhin ro'i bgegs bskrad la/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
<p>30a.5</p>dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la sprul la/ phyag dang mchod pa dang bstod pa yan chad sngon bzhin byas la/ de'i 'og tu tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no/ /zhes pa'i bar te/ de ltar zhag lnga'i bar du nyin zhag re la
<p>30a.6</p>thun bzhi'i sbyor bas lha la mchod pa dang ro la yungs kar ram bye mas brab cing sngags rings kyi bzlas pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu nam mkha' na bzhugs pa gshegs su gsol la/ de nas zhag lnga'i nang par slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la/ de nas
<p>30a.7</p>spos thogs la spyan drangs tshig 'di brjod par bya/ kye dbang bskur nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'di la phan gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas zhag drug pa la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su/ zhi ba'i thab bcas te til nag pos sdig pa sbyang ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan
<p>30b.2</p>gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o/ /de dag ni ro sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rnams ni spyad par bya/ /dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas/ /'khor lo rim pa 'dir gsungs te/ /phyi rol phyung ste gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas
<p>30b.3</p>khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do/ /de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas/ /sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis/ /shin tu bsgyings pas brgyan byas te/ /zhag bdun nang par sbyin sreg bya/ /mi nyid shi ba'i gnas byas te/ /shi la phan pa'i dkyil
<p>30b.4</p>'khor ldan/ /gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba/ /'di la gsungs te gzhan du min/ /'di ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga ni/ /bdag gis rang bzor ma byas te/ /'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / /cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud las te/ /des na 'dir ni 'os pa yin/ /'di ni shi ba'i
<p>30b.5</p>cho ga'o/ /shi ba la phan gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas/ ro sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba ste/ de yang de nas zhag bdun pa la ro dkyil 'khor chen pos sbyang ba'i phyir/ slob dpon rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la/ dang por gtor ma btang la/ de nas sa'i cho ga dang / 
<p>30b.6</p>thig gi cho ga dang / rdul tshon 'bri ba gzhung bzhin du byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsreg khang brtsigs pa dang / rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgyas dgod pa dang / rgyan dgod pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bkug la/ de nas ro bsreg khang du
<p>30b.7</p>drangs te/ bsreg khang la lan gsum bskor la/ shar phyogs nas nang du gzhug /de nas slob dpon gyis/ dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas bzung ste/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yan chad bsgoms la/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa rdzogs par byas te/ de nas rlung
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>g.yab kyis me sbar la me'i pra brtag ste/ dam tshig gi me lha bskyed pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi me lha spyan drang ba dang / mdun gyi nam mkha' la bstod pa dang / dgug gzhug bcing bar bya ba dang / phyag rgyas gdab pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang
<p>31a.2</p>bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang bsreg rdzas phul ba yan chod byas pa ni me lha'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas me lha'i thugs kar yi ge b+h+rUM las pho brang rim pa gsum dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgoms la/ thab tu me tog re dor zhing / gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor nas me lha'i thugs
<p>31a.3</p>kar re mos sam dus gcig tu spyan drangs te/ bsreg rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mjug gi cho ga ni/ bzod pa gsol/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang / phyag rgya dgrol cing ye shes gshegs pa dang / bskyed pa snying gar bsdu ba dang / phur bu gdon zhing phyogs skyong
<p>31a.4</p>gso ba dang / mchod rdzas la sogs pa bsdu ba dang / dman ma dang rdul tshon phyags la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas spyan drangs la/ chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas ba'i rnam pa lngas skyang nul byas la/ thig la sogs pa mi mthong bar byas la/ dkyil
<p>31a.5</p>'khor gyi thog tu spyan gzigs dang / sder bzangs la sogs pa bzhag nas bkra shis brjod la/ slob ma mgu bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du phul ba'i yo byad rnams ni slob dpon bkyer bar bya'o/ /de dag ni ngan song nas drang ba'i cho ga'o/ /byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa
<p>31a.6</p>ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas phyi de nang par ram zhag gsum na yang rung ste/ rus pa 'o mas bkrus la/ dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyud chen po'am bye ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rgyud chen po nas byung ba bzhin
<p>31a.7</p>du tsha tsha btab la/ tsha tsha dang po btab pa dang ming byang la/ yid kyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur bar bya ba'am/ yang na slob ma gson po ji ltar 'jug pa ltar dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / slob dpon du dbang
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>bskur ba dang / rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas de la lam bstan bya/ /tshogs bsags dge ba'i don la sbyar/ /zhes bya bas shi ba'i lam bstan par bya ba ston te/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis me tog gcig gyen du 'phangs te/ song cig song cig rigs kyi bu/ / 
<p>31b.2</p>tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam/ /mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam/ /byang chub bar chad med pa'i lam/ /mdor na lam ni de rnams su/ /zhugs nas byang chub thob gyur cig /ces bya'o/ /de nas shi ba'i don du sbyin gtong rgya chen po bya ste/ tsha tsha gshegs
<p>31b.3</p>su gzhug go/ /ro sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba'o/ /de yang lung las/ rdo rje dril bu lag par sbyin/ /mgo la dbu rgyan bskon par bya/ /rdo rje sdom pa rnams byin te/ /bum pa'i dbang bskur rnams byin la/ /mig sogs rdo rje gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas
<p>31b.4</p>gsum dgod/ /rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor gyis/ /'du byed rab tu bya bar bstan/ /nyi ma gsum ni lon pa na/ /rus pa'i phreng ba bsdus byas la/ /dri dang 'o mas bran nas ni/ /de yis mchod rten du bya ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de mthar de nyid rtag bsgom dang / /zhes
<p>31b.5</p>pa nas/ rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gong thams cad kyi rim par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin ston te/ spyir cho ga'i rim pa thams cad zin nas/ thun mtshams sam/ thun la mi 'jug kyang rung ste/ ye shes pa gshegs shing / de nas gzhal yas khang lha la
<p>31b.6</p>bsdu ba dang / lha thams cad kyang gtso bo la bsdus la yig 'brur bsgom mo/ /yig 'bru ni thams cad kyi ngo bo a ste/ a stong pa nyid las skad cig mas lhar dran par byas nas/ dge ba'i las rnams bya bar bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'khor lo bstan par bya/ /zhes bya ba nas/ 
<p>31b.7</p>shes rab 'khor lor grags pa yin/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa bstan pa ste/ dkyus nyid gsal ba'i phyir ma bkrol lo/ /de yang shin tu zab pa dang / bla ma la rag las pa'i man ngag ston te/ de yang dang por bdag nyid khams dang zas snyoms par 'du
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>'dzi spangs la/ gnas bsam gtan gyi tsher ma med par skyil krung bcas la lag pa g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag la dpang par bkan te/ sgal pa'i steng du sgal pa gzhag la/ mig sna gong du phab la so sbyar la ma reg par byas la lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ rtsa'i
<p>32a.2</p>'khor lo bzhi ye rang chas su lus la yod pa dkyus bzhin gsal btab la/ de nas dang por lte ba'i 'khor lo la sems rtse gcig tu gtad la bsgom/ de gsal nas de bzhin du snying ga dang mgrin pa dang / mtshog ma rnams rim gyis gsal bar bsgoms la/ de nas
<p>32a.3</p>rkang pa dang / mdoms mer rlung dang me bsams te/ rlung gis me sbar te rtsa g.yas na mar zhugs/ lte ba'i 'khor lo bde ba'i thig ler zhu/ de bzhin du me rlung gis phul te snying ga dang mgrin pa dang / mtshog ma rnams rim gyis bzhu nas/ lus thams cad bde ba'i thig les
<p>32a.4</p>gang bar bsam zhing / blo bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas par bya ste/ me ni gnas der langs so zhes bya'o/ /de nas spyi bo'i haM las mes zhu bas thig le'i bde ba rtsa g.yon mar bab nas/ dang por mtshog ma'i 'khor lo gsos te/ sngon bzhin du 'khor lo nyid du gyur par bsam
<p>32a.5</p>mo/ /de bzhin du mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba'i 'khor lo rnams rim gyis gsal bar bsam mo/ /de ltar yang nas yang du rtse gcig gi sems kyis goms pas zhi gnas kyi bde ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni man ngag go/ 'di ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa/ /zhes pa nas/ de dag ni shes rab
<p>32a.6</p>kyi 'khor lo'i bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i phan yon bstan te/ dkyus nyid gsal bas 'dir ma bkrol lo/ /sangs rgyas kun dang thabs cig pa'i/ /zhes pa nas/ mi dbya dang mtshungs sems dang ldan par shog /des bya ba'i bar gyis slob
<p>32a.7</p>dpon gyis ji ltar brtsams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bstan pa ste sla bas de nyid kyi phyir ma bkrol lo/ /'di bsdus dge rtsa gang yod des/ 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal mthong shog /gsang ba'i dka' 'grel bshad pa don bsdus sgron ma rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de bA ka ra tsan+d+ra
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>dang / lo tsa ba klog skyas bsgyur ba'o/ /gsang ldan gyi tho yig bzhugs/[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs kun bdag po 'jam dpal dang / /bla ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog dang thun mong sgrub 'dod pa/ /gang
<p>32b.2</p>zag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bla ma rim pa brgyud pa yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdun gyi cho ga la/ /bsnyen pa sa dang sta gon dang / /dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga'o/ /bsnyen pa'i las su bya ba la/ /dang po las dang sbyor ba gsum/ /mchod bstod
<p>32b.3</p>bsnyen pa bya ba'o/ /dang po'i las su bya ba la/ /nye reg 'thor 'thung stong par bsgom/ /skur gyur lce dang lag pa brlab/ /bsrung dang tshogs bsags phyag lnga bya/ /sdom bzung lus bsregs skur ldang ngo / /srung la bdag dang gnas bsrung ste/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba bya ba yang / / 
<p>32b.4</p>bskyed brlab dbang dang go bgo'o/ /gnas bsrung ba yi rim pa la/ /bsnun dang bsreg dang bcing ba bya/ /khro bo rdo rje'i ra ba sgom/ /tshogs bsags pa yi rim pa yang / /sbyin sreg bya zhing mchod pa brlab/ /rten sprul bstod de gsal por sgom/ /dga' bar gyur pas bstod pa
<p>32b.5</p>bya/ /phyag mchod sdig bshags yi rang bya/ /bskul dang gsol gdab dge ba bsngo/ /skyabs 'gro lam bstan sems bskyed do/ /bstod bya gnang sbyin slar bstod bya/ /sbyor ba gsum la dang po dang / /rgyal mchog dang ni las dag go/ /dang po'i sbyor ba bya ba la/ /ye
<p>32b.6</p>shes bzhi dang gtso bo bskyed/ /ye shes me long mnyam nyid dang / /so sor chos dbyings nan tan no/ /gzhi la rdo rje mchod rten dang / /chos 'byung rgya gram bsgom pa dang / /gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa'o/ /gtso bo bskyed pa dag la yang / /cho ga rnam pa gsum
<p>32b.7</p>las su/ /gzhi yi sangs rgyas bskyed pa dang / /dang po'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo dang / /ye shes sems dang zla ba a'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pa yang / /dang por yig 'bru bskyed pa dang / /de las phyag mtshan sku phra mo/ /thig ler gyur te sku rnams bskyed/ / 
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>las kyi rgyal po mchog la ni/ /sgo dbye bsdu bskrad yon dbul bstod/ /bstims la bskrad de sgo yang bcad/ /rgyas gdab dbang bskur las la sbyar/ /mchod cing bstod pa bya ba yang / /dang po'i sangs rgyas bye byas la/ /mchod brlab sgo dbye snyan gsan
<p>33a.2</p>dbab/ /spyan drang bskrad la yon dbul bstod/ /nang du dgug gzhug bya ba dang / /bskrad cing sgo bcad go yang bgo/ /rgyas gdab dbang dang ldan par bya/ /mchod dang bstod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa bya ba'i rim pa yang / /phyag byas thugs zhugs la sngags brjod/ / 
<p>33a.3</p>sngags dgod brtan byas bzlas pa bya/ /thun mtshams dag tu rang bya la/ /mchod bstod phyag rgya dge ba bsngo/ /bzod gsol lha bsdus spyod lam bya/ /thun la bab na nang zhugs bskrad/ /sgo bcad lha dgod mchod pa brlab/ /mchod bstod phyag bya yon chab dbul/ /thugs kar
<p>33a.4</p>zhugs te gong ltar bya/ thun gsum dag la de dang 'bar/ /thun bzhi pa yi tha ma ru/ /gong ltar byas la don gsol gdab/ /smon lam btab la ye shes gshegs/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus te rang la bsrung / /brgya pa bzlas te spyod lam bya'o/ /de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o/ /bsnyen
<p>33a.5</p>pa bsdus pa bya ba yang / /gtso bo yan chad bsgom byas la/ /sbyor ba rnam gnyis gzhag pa ste/ /phyi ma gong ltar bya ba yin/ /grangs dang mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa yang / /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i khyad par ro/ /de ltar byas pa'i rjes dag la/ /phran tshegs pa ni ci rigs gdags/ / 
<p>33a.6</p>de rnams sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas sa yi cho ga ste/ /brtag dang bslang dang sbyang ba dang / /gzung dang rdo rje'i sgrub pa'o/ /brtag pa phyogs dang mtshan nyid dang / /gnas dang lto 'phye brtag pa'o/ /bslang ba snang dang mi snang ste/ /mi snang ba la bslang ba yang / /maN+Dal
<p>33a.7</p>byas la dri tshom dgod/ /bdag nyid lhar bskyed lha tshogs sprul/ /de la mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/ /lha mo bskyed la spyan drangs te/ /bskrad bstim rgyas gdab dbang bskur bya/ /mchod dang gtor dbul sa bslang bya/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bstim/ /sbyang ba
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>las dang bya ba dang / /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang byas te/ /pra brtag bum gzhug 'thas par bcag /rdo rje bsgrub par bya ba ni/ /slob dpon rgyan gyis brgyan byas la/ /stegs bu'i dbus su gnas byas te/ /dang por nye reg bya ba nas/ /bzlas la thug pa yan chod bya/ / 
<p>33b.2</p>mchod cing bstod la gsol ba gdab/ /dkyil 'khor bteg la rang yang babs/ /gnas gsum brlabs la spro ba bskyed/ /phyag byas spos thogs spyan yang drang / /bka' bsgo bskor te bsrung ba bya/ b+h+rUM mam khaM las dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /khro bo gsang ba bstim byas
<p>33b.3</p>la/ /phur bus gdab pa'i las bya'o/ /sta gon bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /lha dang bum pa sbyin sreg dang / /lha mo dang ni slob ma'o/ /lha yi sta gon bya ba la/ /gnas su dri dang me tog dgod/ /de las lhar bskyed bstims la mchod/ /bum pa mtshan nyid ldan byas la/ /mtshon
<p>33b.4</p>bya mgul chings kha rgyan te/ /bskrad bdug bsangs la bcud blug go/ /bum pa baM las bskyed byas la/ /nang du lha bskyed spyan yang drang / bstims la rgyas gdab dbang ldan bya/ /mchod cing bstod la bzlas pa bya'o/ /sbyin sreg shar du thab byas la/ /shing btser
<p>33b.5</p>me spar me lha bskyed/ /de la mchod la thugs kar ni/ /sum brtsegs bskyed la spyan drangs bstim/ /mchod cing bstod la bsreg rdzas dbul/ /spyan ma gnod sbyin dag la yang / /sbyin sreg rim bzhin dbul bar bya/ /sa yi lha mo'i sta gon ni/ /gong ltar
<p>33b.6</p>byas te mi gshegs so/ /de nas slob ma sta gon ni/ /phyi rol gtor ma byin byas la/ /khrus byas gos gon me tog thogs/ /phyag byas gsol gdab sna gtod bskul/ /sdig bshags yi rang skyabs su 'gro/ /sems bskyed lam gnas rdo rje lta bu bya/ / 
<p>33b.7</p>lhar bskyed byin brlabs de la mchod/ /so shing ku sha srung skud gdags/ /gzengs bstod nyal gzhug spro ba bskyed/ /lha la mchod cing bstod pa bya/ /phyag byas gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ /dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya/ /gsol cing bkra shis smon
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>lam gdab/ /sangs rgyas dang por mtshan 'don gnas/ /dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga la/ /thig dang tshon dang bsgrub pa dang / /'jug cing dbang bskur bya ba'o/ /thig la las dang ye shes te/ /ye shes snal ma sar pa la/ /byin brlabs bsgril te snod
<p>34a.2</p>bcug mchod/ /bzlas te rim pas gdab par bya/ /gdab pa dang po gnam thig ste/ /de nas sa thig gdab pa'o/ /tshon ni byin brlabs bzlas te dgye/ /pan tsa ra ka phyogs tshon dang / /mtshan ma'i bye brag bri bar bya/ /bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa yang / /dkyil 'khor brgyan
<p>34a.3</p>te mdo gdon gzhag /khrus byas brgyan la shar sgor gnas/ /bsrung dang bsang gtor dkyil 'khor bslang / /sgo dbye bum dgod lhar bskyed de/ /nam mkha'i lha tshogs phab la bsre/ /bdag nyid dang po'i lhar bskyed de/ /sngags bzlas phar spro tshur bsdu bya/ /lha rnams
<p>34a.4</p>stong bsgoms slar la bskyed/ /de nas sgo dbye la sogs pa/ /sngon du bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /phyi rol dag tu byung byas la/ /'jig rten pa la gtor ma sbyin/ /slar la nang du zhugs byas la/ /sbyin sreg dag gis tshim par byas/ /de nas slob ma 'jug pa yang / /lha la
<p>34a.5</p>gsol gdab gnang bar bsam/ /slob mas khrus byas me tog thogs/ /yol bas bcad la phyi rol dgug /slob mas phyag byas gsol ba gdab/ /gdong dang stod g.yogs smad g.yogs te/ /nang bkug phyag bya sdig pa bshags/ /yi rang bskul dang gsol
<p>34a.6</p>ba bdag /slob dpon 'dod phyir yang gsol gdab/ /de nas dam tshig dag ni dpog /dam tshig 'dzin par khas len gzhug /sems bskyed pa dang lhar bskyed brlab/ /dam tshig bsgrag cing de la mchod/ /las kyi bum pas dbang yang bskur/ /sgo bzhir bcug
<p>34a.7</p>la slar yang ni/ /shar sgor bzhag la mna' yang bsgags/ /mna' chu blud la ye shes dbab/ /mchod cing smrar gzhug phreng ba dor/ /mgo la bcings te snang ba brtag /mig dbye ba dang dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang / /sgrub pa po dang slob
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>dpon ni/ /sgrub pa po ru dbang bskur na/ /rang gi lhar bskyed de la mchod/ /dang po rig pa'i dbang bskur te/ /bkra shis brjod cing chu dbang bskur/ /dbu rgyan dang ni rdo rje sbyin/ /dril bu dang ni ming yang gdags/ /gsang ba'i ye shes sngags kyang sbyin/ /phyag rgya
<p>34b.2</p>bzhi brlab brtul zhugs sbyin/ /slob dpon dag tu dbang bskur na/ /shar sgor sna tshogs pad+ma bri/ /slob ma sangs rgyas dang por bskyed/ /rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya/ /dam tshig gsum dang gsang ba dang / /gsang rgyal dang ni nges pa'i dbang / /rim pa
<p>34b.3</p>bzhin du bskur bar bya'o/ /dam tshig gsum la rdo rje dang / /dril bu dang ni phyag rgya'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang la dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang slob dpon las rnams so/ /gsang rgyal dag gi dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang / /rin po che dang pad+ma dang / /las
<p>34b.4</p>kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'o/ /nges pa'i dbang la gzhan don dang / /rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /gzhan don nges pa'i dbang bskur na/ /bye brag dag dang spyi dag go/ /bye brag la yang 'di lta ste/ /de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang / /rin chen rigs dang pad+ma dang / /las
<p>34b.5</p>kyi rigs kyi nges pa'o/ /rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes brlab cing sngags kyang sbyin/ /phyag rgya bzhi brlab lung yang bstan/ /gzengs bstod pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de mthar dbang bstan bya ba'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs dag gi dbang
<p>34b.6</p>bskur ro/ /de ltar dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang / /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod/ /dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya/ /smon lam btab la don gsol gdab/ /ye shes gshegs la dkyil 'khor bsdu/ /brgya pa bzlas shing gzugs brnyan bkru/ /lhag
<p>34b.7</p>chad bskang phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /mtshan brjod pa yi gsung rab bsgrags/ /gsang ldan ma yi puN+Dar+tha/ /dkyil 'khor bdun gyi tho yig 'di/ /bdag gis bsdebs pa'i dge ba yis/ /kun gyis 'jam mgon thob par shog /gsang ldan ma'i tho yig puN+Dar+tha byas
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>pa smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sing+gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ /rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs
<p>35a.2</p>la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku mnga' zhing / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas che/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal te/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /dang por re zhig slob ma ni/ /dad ldan dam tshig brtul
<p>35a.3</p>zhugs bsrung / /rtog med rgyud gcig bla ma dang / /'jam pa'i dpal la mos pa yis/ /khro med sngags dang rgyud la mkhas/ /thos ldan rgyud 'dir dbang thob pas/ /dam tshig gsum la gnas pa des/ /dang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lha rnams sgrub pa'i thabs
<p>35a.4</p>las 'byung ba bzhin du bsnyen pa bya ste/ sngags kyi phreng ba 'bum du bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /gzhung las/ bsam gtan dang ni rjes mthun pa'i/ /ri yi phug gam chu yi 'gram/ /rdzing ngam rang dga'i gnas dag gam/ /lha khang mchod rten sogs par/ /zhes
<p>35a.5</p>gsungs pas na/ /de lta bu'i gnas der song la/ /ci tsam 'byor ba'i tshad kyis byas la/ /sa yongs su brtag pa der/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor/ dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa byas nas/ /der mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la/ sa'i lha mo las bslang ba
<p>35a.6</p>ni/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri
<p>35a.7</p>bar bya/ /zhes brjod nas/ thal mo sa la brdabs pas/ sku phyed tsam sa las 'thon pa dang / /sems can thams cad kyi don du dkyil 'khor byed pas bdag la byin zhes brjod pas/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gyis shig ces brjod nas sa la thim par bsam mo/ / 
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>sa slong ba'o/ /de nas drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog pa/ /de nyid du bdag dang blo zhi ba'i phyir sbyin sreg byas la der sa sbyang bar bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam la sogs pa brkos la sa'i ro lnga bsal te/ de rin po che lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa bcug la slar sas dgang
<p>35b.2</p>ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ris la sogs pa ji tsam 'byor pa yang bris la dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la spos kyis chag chag btab ste/ lag pa sa la reg par bya'o/ /rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /sa bzung ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas
<p>35b.3</p>bdag nyid ji snyed pa'i rgyan dang ldan par byas te/ bkra shis pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du/ /bdag bsrung ba nas bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba dang / de nas rten sprul pa nas tshogs bsags pa nas/ 
<p>35b.4</p>ye shes par gyur pa'i bar du byas la/ der gong gi dang 'dra ba'i lha mo sta gon byas la/ de nas spro ba bskyed de/ deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag ni gson pa 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/ /gyur par bdag ni som nyi med/ /byang
<p>35b.5</p>chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /mchod sbyin 'di ni bla na med/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa/ /deng bdag
<p>35b.6</p>'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas phyag byas spos thogs la/ /kye dbang ni nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng
<p>35b.7</p>'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms la/ yang sgo dbye ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nas bdag nyid ye shes pa'i gnas su
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>'dug pa'i bar du bya ste/ phreng ba'i sngags zlos pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa'i grogs lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'dud kyis bstod de/ de nas/ rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang / /dpag
<p>36a.2</p>med rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab la/ de nas langs te/ lha rnams la phyag byas nas/ bdag ni rang nyid ral gri can/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag rang nyid/ /nga ni sangs rgyas rgyal po ste/ /stobs chen ral gri can
<p>36a.3</p>bdag nyid/ /de nas mig dang rkang pa byin gyis brlabs te/ bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la/ byang shar mtshams nas bskor ba byas te/ hUM ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can/ /gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras/ / 
<p>36a.4</p>ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang tsham rngam gyi dbyangs brjod la/ hUM dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig /gnas 'dir 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor ngas 'dri yis/ /bgegs kyi rigs
<p>36a.5</p>tshogs gang yin 'byer bar gyis/ /ci ste nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/ /ye shes can gyi ral gri 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas byed cing / /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /deng sa phyogs nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa 'di/ /deng rnal 'byor
<p>36a.6</p>gyi dbang phyug chen po zhes bya bas/ sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'dri yis/ hUM lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /'byung po sha za srin po'i tshogs/ /'byung po thams cad sar song zhig /'jam dpal bka' thos
<p>36a.7</p>myur du song / /gang dag mi 'gro de la ni/ /ral gri dang ni kha T+wAM gas/ /spyi bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas 'gyur/ /lan gsum du brjod do/ /bskal pa me lta bu'i 'og nas byung nas/ gdug pa can thams cad bsreg par bsam mo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar 'dug ste/ 
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>bskal pa'i me lta bu'i khro bo'i 'byin pas gdug pa can thams cad bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas dag pa yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis shar du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas g.yon brkyang bas bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi 'gros kyis lhor song la/ /g.yas brkyang
<p>36b.2</p>bas bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'gros kyis nub tu song la/ zlum pa'i stangs stabs byas la bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas byang du rdo rje 'gros kyis song ba der sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis bgegs bskrad la/ de nas 'gying 'gros kyis shar du 'gro bar bya'o/ /yang rdo rje
<p>36b.3</p>'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba bskor la phur bu'i 'gros bya'o/ /dbus der hUM sgra rgyun mi bcad do/ /der phyed pas 'dug la rdo rje'i lta bas bgegs bsnun la/ bsreg pa bcing ba phyogs dang mtshams ra ba dra ba byas la/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ hUM badzra a na la ha
<p>36b.4</p>na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM/ badzra ne tri ban+d+ha sarba big+haM/ oM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ rak+Sha sarba swA hA/ oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM druM ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badzra pA sha hri/ oM badzra pA taM ke pA taM ke ni ra Ta/ hri badzra ka li ru Ta ma Ta/ oM badzra shi kha ri ru Ta ma Ta/ hUM badzra karma badzra ban+d+ha baM/ sarba maN+Dal hUM dza/ gsang ba 'dug la/ ma hA tsakra
<p>36b.5</p>maN+Da si a ti si ta hUM gis byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i phur bu la/ tsan+dan dmar pos byugs la/ srad bu dmar po dang me tog dmar pos bcings la stod khro bo la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug la hUM las sprin sgra la sogs pa bskyed
<p>36b.6</p>la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas/ g.yon pa khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ g.yas pa rdo rje tho bas dbus dang gru bzhir brdung ngo / /d+ha ma d+ha ma/ da ma da mas na tsun+d+ha ya tsan tsur+Na ya badzra ut+ma ka ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje tho ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad
<p>36b.7</p>bzlas la brdung bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje go cha bskon/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo bzlas pa'i spos chus byugs la gur gum dang / a ka ru dang / du ruSh+ka dang / tsan+dan dang ga bur dang gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis sngags gdab pa'i lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i dri'i thig le zlum po
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>byas la der me tog gi tshom bu la sngags bzlas te dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed la/ nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa byas la mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pas mchod la/ bstod pa byas gsol ba gdab
<p>37a.2</p>ste/ hUM bcom ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje ni/ /rig sngags rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /snying rje'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod/ /de bas byin brlabs mdzad par gsol/ /dgongs shig sangs rgyas sde dang tshogs/ /gang gzhan sngags kyi lha tshogs dang / / 
<p>37a.3</p>lha rnams bstan la mngon dga' ba/ /dkyil 'khor byin rlob dngos grub stsol/ /zhes lan gsum du'o/ /de nas dngul lam gser gyi bum pa la kha dog dkar por bsgyur la/ lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'am/ yang na rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'am las thams cad
<p>37a.4</p>pa'i bum pa ste/ las kyi bum pa la sna tshogs rdo rje bri'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la lha kun gyi mtshan ma dang / gtso bo'i mtshan ma bri'o/ /gtso bo'i bum par sman lnga dang 'bru lngas bkang la mgul chings nyis rim du bya'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba dang gdugs dkar po re
<p>37a.5</p>res g.yogs par bya'o/ /yang na bum pa bcu dgod zer te 'thad do/ /gtso bo'i bum par gong gi gsum las lha tshang bar bskyed la/ dgug gzhug dang mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /las kyi bum par rdo rje gnod sbyin du bskyed pa dang gzhug pa dang / mchod
<p>37a.6</p>bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /rnam rgyal bum pa ni bzhu bar bya'o/ /las bum ni mi bzhu'o/ /yang na kun mi bzhu zer te/ de nas bum pa rnams gtsang sar sba'o/ /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang / dngos grub thams
<p>37a.7</p>cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ gzhung bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ de nas phyi rol du gtor ma btang ste/ lha la mchod pa slob ma sta gon du gzhug pa bya ste/ shar ngos su maN+Dal byas pa'i rtsar 'dug ste/ bla ma la gsol ba gdab ste/ ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o/ /byang chub
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid dam tshig rig pa dang / /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod/ /de nas bla mas/ rtog pa rnams ni legs
<p>37b.2</p>par bsdus pa yis/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon/ /brjed ngas blo la 'jam pa'i dbyangs sogs rnams/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /bag med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang / /bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang yin pa/ /de
<p>37b.3</p>dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni/ /spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags/ /bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang / /rgya che 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed pa de las gzhan pa la/ /rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo / /thugs rjes
<p>37b.4</p>khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur pa/ /blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/ /ma lus pad+ma'i rigs kyi nang bzhugs pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba ste/ /dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi
<p>37b.5</p>skyabs byed 'tshal/ /srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis mnan pa'i mchog/ /gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing / /blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rjer ldan pa yi/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su
<p>37b.6</p>mchi/ /srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i lus bdag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyis dag las rgyal 'gyur ba/ /snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs/ /mnyam med byang chub bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas slob
<p>37b.7</p>ma'i gnas gsum du dri'i thig le byas la/ rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang / oM AHhUM gis bskyed de gzhag go/ /de nas spos dang me tog la sogs pa re re byin la/ de nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad nye bar gnas par gyis shig ces brjod do/ /da nas so shing me
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>tog gi phreng bas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas te byin la/ slob ma rang gi so brud maN+Dal gyi steng du bor te/ ltas lta ba so shing mdun drang por bor la/ de tshe bdag la lta ba dang / /rtse mo gyen du 'dren gyur na/ /de tshe dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ / 
<p>38a.2</p>de tshe shar du kha bltas na/ /de tshe dngos grub 'bring du 'gyur/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub thob/ /so shing bor ba rgya zhig la/ /thur du bltas nas sa 'og go/ /de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po bzlas te/ stan dang sngas su sbyin
<p>38a.3</p>no/ /de nas srung skud la sngags kyi phreng ba de'i dpung pa g.yon par gdags so/ /de brtan pa'i phyir yang rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa yang brjod do/ /de nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi gzengs bstod la bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig dang / dkyil 'khor chen po
<p>38a.4</p>mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nang par ji lta ba'i rmi lam zlos shig brjod la btang ngo / /de nas nang par rmi lam dri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'dzem pa med par bzlas te/ rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs
<p>38a.5</p>mthong / /de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang / /dge slong dag dang chos nyan rnams/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rmi lam brtags la ngan par gyur na sbyin sreg bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag mchod pa bzlas pa dang / bsgom pa la sogs pa ci nus par mchod bstod la
<p>38a.6</p>sogs pa byas la/ de nas sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang / shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par kha sbyar byas la gzhag go/ /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig tu bsam gtan
<p>38a.7</p>la mnyam par nyal bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid skye rengs shar ba'i dus su lha'i sbyor ba byas la/ nyi ma 'char kar bdag nyid rgyan thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor dris nye bar byugs te/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa so sor bkal la rim pas bzhag ste/ 
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>oM hUM trAM hrIHa rang gi sa bon rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams kyi gnas su btang la/ 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i srad bu bkal la/ a na la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsgrims la/ tsan+dan la sogs
<p>38b.2</p>pa bsgos pa'i snod du bzhag la mchod de/ bzlas pa byas la/ de nas rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i snying ga nas/ grogs po rdo rje 'dzin la dza dza zhes pa phyung la/ ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba ser po'i snang ba bskyed la/ dza zhes pas sgrub pa'i grogs kyi lag tu
<p>38b.3</p>gtad la/ g.yon khu tshur gyis srad bu bzung la ci bder gdab par bya ste/ de yang tshangs dang logs dang zur dang logs thig rnams la/ de bzhin phyi dang nang gi cha chen po nyi shu brgyad du nam mkha' la gdab par bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ zhes
<p>38b.4</p>nga gyen du btab pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul/ yang na cha chen po bcu drug tu bya/ de nas kha dog gcig pa'i skud pa las thams cad pa'i skud par byin gyis brlabs la/ sa thig gdab ste/ kha cig na re rdo rje dbyings bzhin du thig gdab bo zhes zer/ 
<p>38b.5</p>kha cig na re cha chen po brgyad du thig gdab bo zhes zer/ 'dir ni nges pa kho nar cha chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad du gdab bo zhes phyi nang du phye ste/ 'khor lo rim pa gsum gyis gdab bo/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i sgo/ /phyi 'jig rten pa'i sgo rkyang ba bya'o/ /rdo rje ra ba dang me ri la
<p>38b.6</p>sogs pa'i thig gdab bo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ tshon sna lngas bkang la/ thig bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ oM sa ma ya tsi tra hUM/ zhes pa 'dis sba bar bya'o/ /des byang shar mtshams su tshon sna rnams mdzub
<p>38b.7</p>gang ba lag pa g.yon pas drangs te/ chos kyi dbyings de dag pas ni/ /sems can khams ni rang grol byas/ /rgyas pas 'jam dbyangs rdo rje nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /zhes brjod la phur bus gdab bo/ /de nas dbus nas rim pas
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>bris te/ de yi rim pa 'di yin te/ /sngon po ser po dmar po dang / /ljang gu dkar po rim pas dgye/ /de yang shar du sngo la lho ru ser/ /nub tu dmar po byang ni ljang / /dkar po dbus su shes par bya/ /gsungs pas na de ltar bri'o/ /de
<p>39a.2</p>ltar bris la mtshan ma dgod pa ni/ sku'am gsung ngam thugs su dgod pa ste/ dbus su dpal rnam par snang mdzad do/ /'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir bde bar gshegs pa rigs bzhi'o/ /mtshams su yum bzhi'o/ /de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa grwa
<p>39a.3</p>bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o/ /rtsibs bcu drug la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go/ /grwa la lha mo brgyad do/ /sgo la sgo ba bzhi'o/ /de'i phyi rol du 'jig rten pa'i yon tan brjod pa las dgod par bya'o/ /de nas dgongs ka'i dus su bab pa dang / yo byad dang dkyil
<p>39a.4</p>'khor gyi rgyan rnams dgram par bya ste/ mchod pa lnga dang rgyan thams cad dang / de bzhin du phur pa dang mda' dang / tshon skud kyi dra ba dang / ral gri la sogs pa dang me long la sogs pas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i glegs bam bzhi
<p>39a.5</p>yang phyogs bzhir gzhag go/ /phyogs mtshams su spos snod brgyad la sogs pas bdug par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan cha zin nas/ de nas rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa zlos shing / dkyil 'khor de dbang ldan nas brtsams te bsang gtor bya'o/ /dkyil
<p>39a.6</p>'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang sngags bzlas so/ /de nas bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan pa khyams su 'dug ste/ dang por bdag med pa nas sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du/ gtso bo'i sku bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' dang
<p>39a.7</p>gnyis su med par byas la rgyas gdab ste/ dbang bskur la dkyil 'khor de sngags dang phyag rgyas blang ba la/ sku dang yig 'bru phyag mtshan gang yin pa'i cho ga gsum gyis bskyed la/ kha sbyar gyi sbyor ba bsams la phab ste gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de nas bdag
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>nyid dkyil 'khor lan gsum du bskor zhing lhag pa dang ma tshang ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sngags kyi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la me tog dbul lo/ /de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed du byas la dbus su 'dug nas sgo dbye'o/ /yang
<p>39b.2</p>na bar 'dir lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ bum pa dang yo byad rnams nang du gzhug go/ /bum pa rnams la bzlas pa byas la gnas su gzhag go/ /de nas mchod pa byas la bdag nyid dbang dang dam tshig can du bya ba'i phyir/ rje btsun gyis mchod pa byas pas dbang dang / 
<p>39b.3</p>dam tshig dang ldan par bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas sgo phye la sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs la/ nam mkha' la byon pa la bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la dgug gzhug bya ste/ rgyas gdab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang mchod
<p>39b.4</p>yon la sogs pa phul la/ mchod pa lnga dang nyi shu la sogs pas mchod la/ rje btsun gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do/ /rje btsun gyi sngags kyi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa la/ gsol ba btab la de nas 'byung po dang chos skyong rnams la gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin du
<p>39b.5</p>gtor ma byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du sbyin sreg rgyas par bya'o/ /dus 'di ru phyag rgya dang glu la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas lha la phyag byas la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma
<p>39b.6</p>rnams ni 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas gang zag gi rim pas zhu phul la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa'i slob ma gang yang rung ba'i rgyan dang ldan par bya ste/ yol ba'i phyi rol du bla ma la gsol ba gdab bo/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su
<p>39b.7</p>gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/ /de nas slob ma la/ rdo rje bsrung ba bzlas pa yis/ /stod g.yogs smad g.yogs bskon byas
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>la/ /sgo srung gi sngags bzlas la g.yogs te/ me tog thogs te phyag bzhi 'tshal/ /bshags dang rjes su yi rang dang / /bskul ba dang ni gsol ba bya/ /slob dpon 'dod na 'di skad brjod/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa
<p>40a.2</p>nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog pa yi 'khor lo 'byor/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /gsang ba chen por 'jug
<p>40a.3</p>par bgyi/ /gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug 'gyur/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
<p>40a.4</p>yid 'ong ma/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang chen po ni rmad byung ba/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas bla mas lha rnams la/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang
<p>40a.5</p>chub chen po 'di nyid ni/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /yang ni bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs pa yi/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /de yang 'tshal
<p>40a.6</p>zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag la/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar
<p>40a.7</p>gyis/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje che/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ / 
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las
<p>40b.2</p>kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par
<p>40b.3</p>bya/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /gal te nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /'dod pas log par mi spyod cing / /brdzun du
<p>40b.4</p>smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni/ /chang ni yang dag spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum
<p>40b.5</p>dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su skyong / /theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang / /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag
<p>40b.6</p>rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dag /mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /des/ slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gsol/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba/ /de dag bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /de nas
<p>40b.7</p>sdom pa gzung bar brjod/ /sdom pa mi 'dod gang zag la/ /'jug pa tsam zhig ni bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba ni mi bya'o/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su/ /de yi snying gar snying pos ni/ /rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya/ / 
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ dang po'i sangs rgyas byin gyis rlobs/ /mchod pas mchod de yon blangs nas/ /las kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro/ /sems mas bcings te sgo bzhir gzhug /de nas shar sgor 'dug byas la/ /dus 'di
<p>41a.2</p>nyid du khyod nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas rigs su chud pas na/ /nga yi rdo rje ye shes sbyin/ /sangs rgyas rigs su 'grub par gsungs/ /gang zhig 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i/ /mdun du smra bar ma byed cig /bag med smras na nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan smra bar bya'o/ / 
<p>41a.3</p>snying gar rdo rje gtugs la smra'o/ /de nas rdo rje mgor bzhag la/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste/ /'ga' la smras na glad pa 'gas/ /tsan+dan gur gum la sogs pa'i/ /mna' chu byin la 'di skad brjod/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par
<p>41a.4</p>byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'grub/ /'thung zhig rdo rje'i chu la 'thung / /oM badzra ya tha hUM/ mna' bor ro/ /de nas 'di skad smras te/ dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yin gyis/ /nga yis ji ltar bka' stsal te/ /khyod kyis skyo ba med par
<p>41a.5</p>gyis/ /gang yang nga la ma mos min/ /de bzhin mos par ma byas na/ /bdud kyis bcom nas myos par 'gro/ /de bas dam tshig gnas par gyis/ /de nas/ yi ge brgya pa mnyam gzhag bstan byas la/ /bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo phye ste/ /snying la gnas
<p>41a.6</p>pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta/ /sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a gzugs dmar/ /brjod pas yang dag pas g.yo ba lta bu'i/ /slob ma'i lus 'di sgo nas dbye bar bya/ /zhugs nas rdo rje byams pa'i snying la gnas/ /ma lus kun la kun du gang nas su/ /rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa
<p>41a.7</p>mnan nas su/ /sngags pas slob ma'i rkang pa de la dbab/ /kun du dril bu'i sgras ni yang dag dkrol/ /lag pa pad+ma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya bca'/ /mi bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams/ /rang gi phyogs rtogs las byung 'di phab pas/ /legs
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>phab gyur bar rang nyid lus la blta/ /gang zhig des kyang babs par ma gyur na/ /lag pa g.yas pas til gyi sa bon gzhag /dbus su yi ge hUM yang rnam bkod do/ /rdo rje 'od 'bar bar ni rnam par bsam/ /g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag rgyar bcas pa yi/ / 
<p>41b.2</p>bslang bar byas la sdig pa bsreg par bya/ /lus ni thal bar byas pa rnam dag pa/ /bsod nams lus la sngags kyis dgang / /ye shes dbab pa nyid du bsam/ /rdzas bzhin dbab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /de nas babs par gyur pa dang / /sku gsung thugs
<p>41b.3</p>kyi rtags gsum 'byung / /gar dang gar gyi lan dang ni/ /glu dang glu len yang dag bya/ /brtan par byas la 'di skad brjod/ /'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs btsud nas/ /lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dang / /'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra
<p>41b.4</p>bar/ /de bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /'dis ni dngos grub gang grub dang / /rigs rnams gang gi snod gyur dang / /bsod nams mthu ni gang yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /phreng ba bor te ltas rnams blta/ /gal
<p>41b.5</p>te bcom ldan dbu la babs/ /dbu yi gtsug tor 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhabs la babs na sngags rnams 'grub/ /stod dang smad dang bar du babs/ /dngos grub rab 'bring gsum du shes/ /lha yi gzugs las ring du gyur/ /de la dngos grub rim pas
<p>41b.6</p>'grub/ /mchod pa'i 'gram pa tshun chad nas/ /de yi de rigs de yin te/ /me tog btang ste de yi rigs/ /lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu/ /babs na gang du nye ba yin/ /gal te dkyil 'khor las thal na/ /lan gsum bar du bskyar du gzhug /de
