<p>41b.7</p>las rgal na re thag chad/ /de nas phreng ba blangs te 'di skad do/ /sems ni stobs chen 'di long shig /oM pra ti gr-ih+NA s+t+waM mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ brjod la mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas mig gis ci mthong dri/ /dkar po mchog ni dngos grub la/ /ser po
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>don 'byung dngos grub ste/ /dmar po thugs rje chags pa'o/ /nag po mngon spyod las su bshad/ /sna tshogs dngos grub thams cad do/ /gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ /rdo rje chags pa deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /rdo rje'i
<p>42a.2</p>mig ni bla na med/ /he badzra pA sh+ya/ gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan/ /shar phyogs sgo nas lcags kyu ma'o/ /lho phyogs nas zhags pa ser po/ /nub phyogs nas lcags sgrog dmar skya'o/ /byang sgo nas dril bu ljang gu'o/ /shar khyams nas rim
<p>42a.3</p>pas/ byams pa dkar po'o/ /'jam dpal/ spos kyi glang po/ ye shes tog /lho'i khyams la rim pas/ zla 'od/ bzang skyong / blo gros rgya mtsho/ spobs pa brtsegs pa bzhi sku mdog ser po/ nub kyi khyams la/ mthu chen thob/ ngan song kun 'dren/ 
<p>42a.4</p>mya ngan kun 'joms/ dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dmar po/ byang gi khyams la/ zla 'od gzhon nu/ 'od dpag med/ nam mkha' mdzod/ sgrib pa kun sel sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /grwa la shar lhor bdug pa ma dkar mo/ lho nub tu me tog ma ser mo/ nub byang du mar me
<p>42a.5</p>ma dmar skya/ byang shar du byug pa ma ljang gu/ shar gyi 'khor lo la rim pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ rgyal po ser ba/ chags pa dmar ba/ legs pa ljang gu'o/ /lho'i 'khor lo la rim pas rdo rje rin chen ser ba/ gzi brjid dmar ba/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan sngo
<p>42a.6</p>ba/ rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po/ nub kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje chos dkar dmar/ rdo rje rnon po sngo ba/ rdo rje rgyu ser ba/ rdo rje smra ba dmar ba'o/ /byang gi 'khor lo la rdo rje las khra bo/ /rdo rje srung ba ser ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po/ rdo rje khu tshur ser po/ gru chad la/ shar lhor
<p>42a.7</p>sgeg mo dkar mo/ lho nub tu phreng ba ma ser mo/ /nub byang du glu ma dkar dmar/ byang shar grwa la gar ma ljang gu/ de nas 'khor lo'i shar du mi bskyod pa sngon po/ rin chen 'byung ldan ser ba/ snang ba mtha' yas dmar ba/ don yod grub pa ljang gu'o/ /mtshams
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>kyi 'khor lo la/ rdo rje sems ma dkar ba/ rin chen ma sngo bsangs ma/ chos ma dmar mo/ las ma ljang gu'o/ /dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dkar ba/ dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' dkar/ de ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o/ / 
<p>42b.2</p>kha cig 'dir rnam dag gsum ston te mi 'thad do/ /de nas dbang bskur te/ sgrub pa dang / slob dpon no/ /de la grub pa ni/ de nas shar ngos zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ slob ma yi dam du bskyed pa la byin gyis brlabs la/ las kyi bum pas dbang bskur la mchod pa dang / 
<p>42b.3</p>bkra shis brjod cing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas mchod la/ bum pa'i dbang bskur te/ oM na mo many+dzu shrI badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas dbang bskur te/ rigs kyis dbu brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas dbu rgyan stong nyid sngon du 'gro bas yig 'bru las lhar bskyed la/ de bzhin
<p>42b.4</p>bcug la slob ma'i mgo la bskon la/ oM rat+na ku la mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas dbu rgyan dar dpyang dang bcas pas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las 'od dpag med du bskyed la ye shes bcug la/ de gyur pa las rdo rjer gyur te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i
<p>42b.5</p>dbang / /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / /oM badzra a ti pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas dril bu yang a mo ka si bskyed la/ ye shes bcug pas dril bur gyur pa de byin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM
<p>42b.6</p>sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nut+ba n+na twA ta/ zhes pas byin no/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bzung la mi dbang rnam snang chos kyi ngo bo sbyin/ oM na ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas byin te/ lha gang la babs pa'i ming sbyin no/ /de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i ye shes
<p>42b.7</p>blang ba dang / mchod pa dang brtul zhugs kyi dbang sbyin la/ slob mas thal mo bskor te/ bla ma la yon dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon phul la/ gsol ba gdab ste/ bdag dang gzhan don byed pa
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>yi/ /slob dpon gyi ni dbang byin pas/ /thugs rje'i bdag pos gsol te zhu'o/ /de nas slob ma rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la/ dbang rtags shar ngos su gru bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas pa tshon sna lngas pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris la/ de'i steng du/ seng ge bla re
<p>43a.2</p>dang dar dang gdugs/ me tog gi phreng ba dang rgyal mtshan la sogs rol mo'i cha byed glu gar sogs/ de ltar brgyan pa'i slob ma rnams la/ rnam rgyal bum pa nas bzung ste/ sgo'i bar du dbang bskur ro/ /'jam dbyangs sku gzugs nas bzung ste/ oM many+dzu shrI ma hA su kha badzrad
<p>43a.3</p>sa twa dzaHhUM baM ho/ su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas slob dpon chen por gyur/ bkra shis brjod de/ shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i ral gri las byung ba/ /byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub de dbang bskur/ /'jam dbyangs lha tshogs rnams kyis legs gsung gang yin
<p>43a.4</p>pa/ /de ni dbang bskur mchog la dus kun bkra shis shog /'grub na lha kun la sbyar ro/ /byang sems rdo rje la sogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing / /srid pa'i snying po rnam grol sgeg mo la sogs pa/ /bde byed rab mchog legs par glu blangs pa yi bkra shis gang / /di ring
<p>43a.5</p>khyod kyi dbang mchog 'di la bkra shis shog /shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul byung ma lus pas/ /sems can bde gshegs rtogs 'dzin dbang bskur ba/ /dpag med lha'i tshogs kyis legs gsung bkra shis gang / /de ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /dpal
<p>43a.6</p>ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog dbang bskur ba/ /lha yi tshogs kyis btud de dbang bskur gang / /de ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ / 
<p>43a.7</p>rdzogs pa'i rin chen cod pan bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags legs gsung bkra shis gang / /de ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /nam mkha'i snying po nor bu rin chen 'byor pas nyams dga' ba'i/ /don rnams kun grub bde byin dbang bskur
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>chen po la/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs mdzad legs gsung bkra shis gang / /de ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /de nas dbu rgyan dang rdo rje dang dril bu dang rdo rje dbang bskur byin la/ me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de nas dam tshig la sogs pa'i dngos grub byin
<p>43b.2</p>te/ rdo rje byin la de kho na nyid bstan te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po thams cad bdag /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /ho las dril bur bskyed la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes
<p>43b.3</p>'gror 'dod/ /rtag par khyod kyis gzung ba yin/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub mchog rab kyi/ /srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bdag mdzod/ /phyag rgya chen pos gzhag la/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /de bas
<p>43b.4</p>dam tshig srung bar gyis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bya bzhin/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /sku yi dam tshig go/ /de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ gsang ba'i dbang bskur te/ dkyil 'khor dang
<p>43b.5</p>lha rnams dang slob dpon la brlabs te/ dkyil 'khor ni mi mnyam med par zur bzhi ste/ dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi dang / /bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin kha khyer shes par bya/ /kha khyer la brten rdo rje'i mchog /gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin/ / 
<p>43b.6</p>rgyan rnams kun gyis bkram pa yang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /gdul bya bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin/ /me long ye shes rtag me tog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog /nyi ma zla bar
<p>43b.7</p>yang dag bshad/ /kun grub mi zad bde ba ste/ /bde ba chen po zhes grags so/ /de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ka ba dkyil 'khor dra ba yin/ /dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba/ /rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems/ /'di des 'khor lo
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>bskor bar ni/ /rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na/ /'khor lo rnams dang ldan pa yin/ /gang du 'jug pa tsam gyis na/ /mi mtshungs pa dang mi ldog pa/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub phyir/ /de dag dang por yang
<p>44a.2</p>dag 'gyur/ /de nas lha'i rnam par dag pa ni/ rang rig pa'i sgyu ma gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum yin te/ de yang gzugs dang gti mug dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ spyi'i cha nas 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad do/ /'di la sku
<p>44a.3</p>gsum du brtsi'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / zhe sdang rnam par dag pa me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /tshor ba'i phung po dang ser sna dag pas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /nga rgyal gyi sgrib pa 'du shes kyi phung po dang 'dod chags
<p>44a.4</p>dag pa/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni snang ba mtha' yas so/ /sgrib pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / khro ba dag pa bya ba nan tan don yod grub pa'o/ /dang por 'dzin pa la sogs bzhi bkag pa'i rnam thar bzhi'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes des/ dgag
<p>44a.5</p>bya nang dang phyi dang / phyi dang nang snod bcud du zhen pa bkag pa'i rig pa'i cha me long lta bu'i me long / me long lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid/ /me long lta bu'i so sor rtog pa/ /me long lta bu'i bya ba nan tan no/ /shar gyi 'khor lo ser po bzhi'o/ /de bzhin stong pa'i cha bzhi byang
<p>44a.6</p>chub sems dpa' bzhi'o/ /des 'gre'o/ /dgag bya bkag pa'i rim pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' la/ stong pa'i cha nas byang chub sems dpa'o/ /ser sna dag pa sbyin pa ste sgeg mo'o/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa spangs ba phreng ba ma/ 'khor ba spangs pa glu
<p>44a.7</p>mkhan ma/ /phrag dog spangs pa gar mkhan ma/ /brnab sems spangs pa me tog ma/ /shes rab 'chal ba spangs pa bdug spos ma/ /log pa'i smon lam spangs pa mar me ma/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / phung po'i bdud spangs pa dad pa'i stobs lcags kyu ma/ 'dod
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs sgo ba zhags pa ma/ las kyi sgrib pa dang 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa dran pa'i stobs sgo ba lcags sgrog ma/ skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud spangs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sgo ba dril bu'o/ /lha'i
<p>44b.2</p>rnam par dag pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon rnam par dag pa rnams kyang ji ltar bslab pa'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /mchod pa gser thur thogs la/ ji ltar mig mkhan mkhas pa yis/ /'jig rten ling thog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ / 
<p>44b.3</p>rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra nai tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hri/ me long blangs la/ chos kyi dbyings nyid bstan te/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung / / 
<p>44b.4</p>ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /de ltar chos rnams shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas dril bu dkrol te/ chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /kun kyang mnyam
<p>44b.5</p>pa nyid du gsal/ /a zhes pas dril bu'i snying po sbyin no/ /de nas ta thA mnyes par gyis zhes pa dang ho zhes pas gzhu byin la/ phyogs bzhi steng 'og tu 'phan du gzhug go/ /yang me long bstan la/ rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ / 
<p>44b.6</p>sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin gyi/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/ /me long 'dzin pa oM many+dzu shrI a/ rkang pa'i bar du 'khor lo bzhag la/ lag par dung byin la/ de ring 'jig rten thams cad la/ /skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo skor/ /chos kyi dung ni blang
<p>44b.7</p>med pa/ /kun du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan thogs drin du gzo bar la gyur/ / 
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang / /khyod la rtag tu srung bar byed/ /'khor lo dang po 'di byin yang / /'jig rten kun la khyad par du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de bzhin du
<p>45a.2</p>rdo rje dang khro bo dang / pad+ma dang nor bu'i 'khor lo bskor zhes rjes su gnang ba byin no/ /de nas gzengs bstod la lung bstan te/ oM nga yis khyod la lung bstan yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa kun du rab sgrub phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las
<p>45a.3</p>bton/ /rdo rje che ge mo b+hur b+hu swa/ zhes pas gzengs bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings la/ g.yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa ltar byas la brjod do/ /ngan song phyir mi ldog ces bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i ye shes bslab ste/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu
<p>45a.4</p>yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral ba/ khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /ma hA sa ma ya ha na phaT/ de lha'i sngags byin la/ phyag rgya bzhi yang bslab par bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyis mi mkhas pa'i gang zag la sngags dang phyag rgya ma ston
<p>45a.5</p>cig/ /de yi spyad na som nyi thos/ /gnyis ka ngan song nyid du lhung / /der khas blangs la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badzra sa
<p>45a.6</p>ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyings kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsung / /dril bu byin no/ /rjes gnang mthar thug sbyin to/ slob ma rgyan dang
<p>45a.7</p>ldan pa la/ /spyi bor gdugs bzung thal sbyar nas/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas pas bskor phyogs su/ /spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas bu'i slob ma de/ /lag pas bzung ste 'di skad bsgo/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon nyid du 'gyur/ /sngags dang rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ / 
<p>45b.2</p>sems can kun la snying rje'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ /sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang / /sems can rnams la phan pa'o/ /nyams pa che bar gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis kyang mi
<p>45b.3</p>bya'o/ /de nas slob ma re re yi/ /lag pa bzung la sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas la bdag bsrung ste/ /sngags pas yon blang slob ma dag la byin/ /slob mas bskor ba phyag byas bdag nyid dbul/ /bla mas mchod cing yid la gang 'thad dbul/ /dngos grub dam pa

<p>45b.7</p>grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du stsol/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul pa rnams rang la dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bsdus la/ de nas snying ga nas 'byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rang la dbang bskur ba/ mdzub mo gnyis
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>kyis phreng ba bcing ba dang / go cha bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba mu tra me ti ku ru ba ra ka ra brtsen baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing la bkrol/ thal mo sbyar te/ mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / oM badzra tuSh+ya hoH/ zhes pa dang / yi ge brgya pa brjod la

<p>46a.5</p>du/ /cho ga bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /gdugs dang rnga yab sil snyan stsogs/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya/ /gdan dang bdug spos la sogs pa/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad sgo la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /

<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>can/ /rang gi bu nyid yin yang de la ni/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni sbyin mi bya/ /mtshan gyi yang dag brjod pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i don/ /bdag 'dra'i blo yis dpag par mi nus kyang / /bla ma'i man ngag rim pa'i bsrub shing gis/ /cho ga'i rim pa bdud rtsi 'di brtsams

<p>46b.4</p>gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por bsnyen pa ni/ gnas dben par 'dug ste/ rnal 'byor pas khrus dang / bsrung ba dang / gos brje ba dang / byug pas byugs te/ gnas dang stan
<p>46b.5</p>bsangs te 'dug nas/ rang rdo rje 'chang du mos pa'i snying gar nyi ma/ de'i steng du hUM las rdo rje/ de'i lte ba la hUM las 'od 'phros pas gnas bsrungs te/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje 'khor los zhing sprul nas/ bdag dang 'brel par byas la/ tshogs

<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>ye shes kyi lus su ldang / de nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom mo/ /de dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bsgom mo/ /de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas khang bu'i dbus su/ seng ge
<p>47a.2</p>dang pad+ma'i steng du/ a las rdo rje 'chang du bskyed de/ sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas so/ /de dag ni dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas snying ga'i
<p>47a.3</p>ye shes sems dpa' la dmigs te/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mtshan ma bzang po ma byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de dag ni thun mong gi bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du/ ro la bsnyen pa zhag lnga bya ste/ kun rig gi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus
<p>47a.4</p>bkru/ de nas bgegs bskrad pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa bden pa bdar la/ tshe 'das pa 'di la gson gyi dus su brnyas byed cing / gshin gyi dus su gegs byed pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad skad cig kyang
<p>47a.5</p>ma gnas par dengs shig ces byas la yungs kar brdeg cing / sngags khro bo'i snying po/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ ces bzlas so/ /de nas shes pa dgug pa ni/ gong gi bden pa bdar la tshe 'das pa ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas/ ngan song
<p>47a.6</p>gsum la sogs pa 'gro ba gang na gnas kyang rung skad cig gis 'dir khugs par gyur cig /oM sarba bid sarba pA paM A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHa Ni suM tri pre du dza/ zhes brjod cing snying ga nas 'od zer 'phros pas kyang bkug par bsam mo/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bstims la gzhag go/ /de nas
<p>47a.7</p>yang dug gzhom pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / kun rig gi sngags kyis bkrus la/ ro byin gyis brlabs te/ rang gi lha ru bsgoms/ yi ge a spyi bor bsams nas/ 'od 'phros pas ye shes lnga yis gang bar bsam mo/ /de nas rang a'i spro bsdu'o/ /de nas rang gi

<p>47b.3</p>pa'o/ /de nas phyag byas spos thogs la/ spyan drang tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /kye dbang bskur nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'di la phan
<p>47b.4</p>gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / /las rgyal mchog rnams bsgoms la/ sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis lha rnams bsal bya'o/ / 
<p>47b.5</p>de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur la dam tshig la gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas zhag lngar ro'i lhag pa'i lha'i snying po'am/ sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar khru gang dor bar zhi ba'i thab khung byas la/ til nag po
<p>47b.6</p>la sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ sdig pa sbyong ba'i sbyin sreg zhag gcig bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i ched du 'dud nyi shus bstod par bya'o/ /de nas gsol ba gdab byas nas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgoms/ / 
<p>47b.7</p>de dag ni shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de dag ni khyad par gyi bsnyen pa'o/ /de dag ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi nang par sbyin sreg chen po bya'o/ /slob mas gsol ba gdab pa dang / slob ma yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga byas la/ de nas dang po sa'i cho ga

<p>49a.1</p>dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhis dgug gzhug bcing ba byas la/ ting nge 'dzin dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa phul la bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas mthong ba nang gi 'jug pa bya'o/ /de dag ni lha bsgom zhing mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
<p>49a.2</p>nas oM dz+wa la dz+wa la zhes me sbar la pra brtag par bya'o/ /pra legs na me'i dbus su 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bskyed la de zhu ba las drang srong chen po me lha zhi ba la ba ka zhes bya ba/ zhi zhing dkar po dbu gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ mig gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs
<p>49a.3</p>dang ldan pa/ phyag dang po na ber dkar/ gnyis pa na mchog sbyin/ g.yon dang po na phreng ba/ gnyis pa na gun+d+he/ gos dang rgyan dkar po/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po/ yan lag thams cad nas rdo rje dkar po 'byung ba mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsgom mo/ /de nas 'thor
<p>49a.4</p>'thung dang bsang ba bya la/ mtshan nyid med pa'i me spyan drang bar bya ste/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che/ /lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /bsreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du/ /'bar ba'i nang du gshegs su gsol/ / 
<p>49a.5</p>zhes brjod la/ rang gi snying ga nas khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po spros la/ Tak+ki hUM dzaHzhes brjod do/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ bya ba la sogs pas bstod do/ /de nas nang du dgug gzhug bcing dbang du bya'o/ /de nas badzra san+d+hi zhes
<p>49a.6</p>brjod do/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par bya/ byin gyis brlab dbang bskur/ de nas oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod la dam tshig la gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra ban+d+ha zhes brjod la las 'di mdzod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i yan lag gis mchod/ 
<p>49a.7</p>de nas bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas bsreg rdzas rnams dbul te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsangs la/ me lha'i lce dang gzar bu'i kha la lha'i sa bon bkod nas/ pus mo'i bar du lag pa bzhag nas/ dang po mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo/ /oMag+na
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>ye ha bya ka bya ba ha ne di byA di byA d+hi pa ye shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes dbul lo/ /bgegs kyi mtshan ma yang shes par bya'o/ /yang bsang gtor byas la/ mar gyi dgang blugs bdun dbul lo/ /oM sarba pA baM da ha na swA hA/ til gyi'o/ /oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ zho'i'o/ /oM sarba b+ha smi ku

<p>49b.3</p>dkar gsum gyi'o/ /oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM ma hA pa lA ya swA hA/ sran ma sha'i'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma re swA hA/ gro'i'o/ /oM badzra a dz+nyAn swA hA/ yam shing dang / dUr ba'i myu gu'i'o/ /oM bo d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa'o/ /oM badzra ra ta
<p>49b.4</p>ya swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM badzra ya ka ra swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /lan grangs ci nus dbul lo/ /de nas bstod pa bya/ de dag ni me lha'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bsang gtor byas la/ de nas me lha'i snying gar gzhal yas khang bsgoms la/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil
<p>49b.5</p>'khor nas bsreg khang du me tog gi ri mo'am/ dus gcig tu spyan drang zhing dbul lo/ /spyan drang ba ni/ hUM ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing / /bdud sde dpung bcas ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa/ /bcom ldan
<p>49b.6</p>'khor bcas 'dir ni gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bstod pa dang / de nas dgug gzhug bcing dbang du bya/ oM badzra san+ti baM zhes brjod/ mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul/ phyag rgyas gdab/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis

<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>nas bsang ba dang / 'thor 'thung byas la gong ma ltar rdzas sngags sam/ yang na spyi sngags sam/ lha'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /de nas bsang ba dang 'thor 'thung byin la/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul la 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o/ /yi ge brgya pa
<p>50a.2</p>bzlas/ oM badzra muHzhes phyag rgya bkrol la bskyed pa snying gar bsdu/ spyan drangs pa gshegs su gsol te/ 'gro ba 'di dag kun gyi dpung / /sems dpa' chen po brtan mdzod la/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang gshegs par mdzad du
<p>50a.3</p>gsol/ /de nas bsang gtor byas la/ slar yang me thab tu bsams la/ mchod yon la sogs byin la/ rdzas lhag ma kun sbyin sreg byas/ tha mar yang / dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung phul la/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /phyag rgya dgram
<p>50a.4</p>par byas la/ snga ma bzhin gshegs su gsol te/ oM AHhUM muH/ zhes brjod la/ khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings/ gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol/ gtor ma gtang / phyag btsal/ mchod bstod/ bzod par gsol/ dngos grub blang / 
<p>50a.5</p>dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ phyag rgya dgrol/ bskor ba bya/ gshegs su gsol/ bskyed pa bsdu/ dman ma phyag /phyogs skyong gsol/ tha ma slob ma bsrung la dgye'o/ /de nas skar ma bzang po la/ rus pa bsdus la/ tsha tsha 'debs par gzhag go/ /bdag gis sgrub
<p>50a.6</p>thabs legs sbyar bas/ /'jam dpal mtshan mchog thob gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po pra dz+nyA gu rus mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu
<p>50a.7</p>shrI nA ma sang+gi ti tsakra kra maH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog med dus mtha' nam mkha' bsod nams dpag med pa/ /mkha'
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>mnyam sems can sgrol phyir thams cad mkhyen bsngos pa'i/ /'jam dbyangs mtshan ldan dus gsum bde gshegs dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'i tshul/ /kun du gzigs par lung bstan bsam gyis mi khyab de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bla ma dam pa'i
<p>50b.2</p>gzhung lugs las/ /man ngag rgyas par rab bstan pa/ /snyigs ma'i sems can blo zhan rnams/ /rnam rtog g.yeng bas mos pa nyung / /de la dran phyir bsdus pa 'di/ /grub dang lung bstan ma thob kyang / /sman pa phan par zhugs pa bzhin/ /bdag gis 'di ni byas pa
<p>50b.3</p>yin/ /dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge a ni rnam bsams nas/ /de yi 'od kyis bla ma dang / /bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /mdun du mngon sum
<p>50b.4</p>lta bur dmigs/ /lus ngag yid kyis yang dag par/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya chen 'dod pa thams cad gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /sangs rgyas
<p>50b.5</p>byang chub sems bskyed pa'i/ /dge ba kun la rjes yi rang / /mngon sangs rgyas nas mi ring ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /bskor phyir bdag gis bskul bar 'tshal/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa/ /de bzhin
<p>50b.6</p>gshegs pa thams cad la/ /bskal pa rab mang bzhugs par ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba 'debs/ /gang yang bdag gi mchod pa rnam drug dang / /dge ba bzhin byas de dag thams cad ni/ /bla med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob phyir/ /bdag gis chos bzhin
<p>50b.7</p>yongs su bgyi/ /chos la dbang bskur sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du skyabs su mchi/ /e ma sems can bla med bsgral ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur cig /bdag nyid dngos po 'bul lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>chub sems rnams kyis/ /ji ltar bzhed pa mdzad pa'i phyir/ /bdag lus so sor bzhes su gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /khyad 'phags lam ni bdag gis bsten/ /de nas ye shes rnam lnga yi/ /gzugs brnyan tsam la
<p>51a.2</p>rab dmigs la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dag pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ nam mkha' lta bur rab dmigs la/ /yi ge b+h+rUM las byung ba yi/ /stong gsum tshad dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod rten bde gshegs gzhal
<p>51a.3</p>yas ni/ /rim pa drug dang ldan par bsgom/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par bsam/ /dbus kyi snying po'i pho brang du/ /dbus su seng ge'i gdan nyid de/ /gzhan yang rim pa ji bzhin bsam/ /de yi dbus ma'i gdan thog tu/ /a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan
<p>51a.4</p>'das/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /zhi ba rgyan spangs byang chub mchog /kun du zhal gyis rnam par mdzes/ /de thugs d+hIHlas bskyed pa yi/ /gdong lnga zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/ /g.yas pa bzhi na ral gri ste/ /g.yon bzhi shes rab pu sti bsnams/ / 
<p>51a.5</p>rgyan dang na bza' gzhon nu'i tshul/ /thugs kar a las byung ba yi/ /'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan/ /ji ltar gsang sngags dgod pa ni/ /'khor lo'i cho ga mthong ba yis/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kar bsam/ /lte bar a las byung ba yi/ /ye shes sems dpa'
<p>51a.6</p>zhal drug pa/ /ut+pal dmar dang sngon po ni/ /po tis mtshan pa bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan ldan thugs kar ni/ /zla ba'i steng du a dkar bsam/ /de las so sor 'phros pa yis/ /rim bzhin thams cad snang byas nas/ /nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam
<p>51a.7</p>sems can gyi/ /ma rig mun pa bsal byas nas/ /slar 'dus rim bzhin rang nyid kyi/ /yi ge'i nang du 'dus par blta/ /de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo yi/ /mtshan brjod rim par bklag pa yang / /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes pa dang po nas brtsams
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>nas/ /don chen yi ge dam pa'i bar/ /rang gis de nyid brjod pa yin/ /khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/ /tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/ /de mthar thug pa yum bzhi yin/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /chags pa thams
<p>51b.2</p>cad sel bar byed/ /de dag mthar ni rigs lnga ste/ /bde gshegs yab dang yum rnams kyang / /mtshan gyi don la rab dmigs te/ /mnyam par bzhag nas mtshan brjod ni/ /rim bzhin klog pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rang gi de nyid yi ge las/ /rim bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba
<p>51b.3</p>yis/ /rang rang gdan la dgod par bya/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams nas ni/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/ /de yi mthar thug sems dpa' ni/ /bcu drug 'khor lo rab tu dgod/ /yi ge a las bskyed pa dang / /sems can don byas
<p>51b.4</p>slar 'dus te/ /rang gi gdan la dgod par byas/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar/ /phyi nang lha mo bskyed par bya/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /de bzhin theg chen tshul gnas par/ /yi ge
<p>51b.5</p>a las bskyed pa yi/ /bskal bzang phyi rol rim bzhin du/ /'khor lo gsum la dgod par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji srid bsgoms pa'i mthar thug pa/ /tshigs bcad bcu bzhi dag gis ni/ /mtshan gyi don rnams bstan pa yin/ /'od zer 'phro
<p>51b.6</p>zhing bsdu ba dang / /gzugs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa/ /pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rim gnyis chos dbyings ye shes kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dgod pa bstan par byas/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /rdo rje lcags
<p>51b.7</p>kyu zhags pa che/ /mthar thug oM gyi rnam par spro/ /gti mug spyod pa dag byas te/ /slar 'dus rim pa gnyis pa las/ /rnam par snang mdzad tshul gyis ni/ /mtshan gyi don rnams grangs bzhin du/ /phyogs bzhi dag nas bzhugs pa yin/ /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>ru/ /tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba/ /'di yi don la dmigs shing dgod/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa ru/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /tshul nas rab tu bstod pa ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces pa dang por brtsams nas ni/ / 
<p>52a.2</p>sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /ces pa yi ni mthar thug par/ /hUM gi rnam par spro zhing bsdu/ /mi bskyod pa yi rnam par dgod/ /tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa yi/ /tshigs bcad bcu yis phyogs bzhi ru/ /gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa gcig spros/ /zhe sdang
<p>52a.3</p>btul nas rnam par gnas/ /de nas rim pa bzhi pa ni/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /ces pa dang por brtsams nas ni/ /ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal/ /de mthar thug pa spro bsdu ste/ /snang ba mtha' yas rnam pa yis/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam par
<p>52a.4</p>gnas/ /so sor kun rtog ye shes ni/ /hrIHyi rnam par spro bsdu ste/ /'dod chags rnam par dag byas la/ /tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /mtshan don gzhung las byung ba bzhin/ /phyogs bzhi rnam par bgos pa'o/ /de nas rim pa lnga pa yi/ /dkyil
<p>52a.5</p>'khor bdag gis bshad par bya/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /nor bu chen po rin chen tog /de mthar thug pa mnyam nyid kyi/ /ye shes tshigs bcad nyi shu gnyis/ /'od zer 'phros shing 'dus pa yis/ / 
<p>52a.6</p>ser sna can ni rnam bcom zhing / /mtshan gyi don ni grangs bzhin du/ /rin chen 'byung ldan tshul du gnas/ /trAM gi rnam par 'phro zhing 'du/ /de nas rim pa drug pa'o/ /don grub dkyil 'khor dgod pa yang / /tshigs bcad bco lnga'i mtshan don ni/ /sangs rgyas
<p>52a.7</p>kun gyis rtogs bya ba/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /de yi mthar thug mtshan rnams ni/ /a yi rnam par spro zhing bsdu/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi/ /'gro ba phrag dog rnam sbyangs te/ /don grub rnam
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>par rim bzhin dgod/ /de lta bu yi tshul nyid kyis/ /'od zer spro zhing bsdus nas su/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad ni/ /gang gi 'od zer reg gyur pa/ /de yi sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la reg 'gyur zhing / /bsdu zhing bdag dang mnyam
<p>52b.2</p>par sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang / /mdog dang gdan dang phyag rgya rnams/ /de bzhin dang po'i sangs rgyas dang / /'khor lo la sogs rim pa yang / /ji ltar grags pa bzhin du dgod/ /de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnams
<p>52b.3</p>bkug cing / /bdag dang mnyam par sbyar byas nas/ /rang bzhin mchod pa'i sprin tshogs bstims/ /bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yang / /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /ces pa'i
<p>52b.4</p>tshigs bcad bzhi bzhi yis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga la bsdus te bstod/ /de nas mtshan gyi yon tan ni/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa/ /yon tan sgo nas bstod pa yin/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / / 
<p>52b.5</p>zhes pa lnga yis rnam phye la/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan ni/ /rim pa bzhin du mkhas pas dbye/ /de yis tshigs bcad mtshan rnams ni/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan grags/ /oM sarba d+harmA zhes pa nas/ /dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHyi bar/ /sku yi phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni/ / 
<p>52b.6</p>de la brtan zhing rab gnas par/ /sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ /de yi mthar thug bsdus pa yi/ /sgo nas yang dag ston pa yin/ /de ltar gang zhig sgom
<p>52b.7</p>byed cing / /ngag gi 'khor lo rnam 'phros te/ /rnam gsum don la dmigs pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs 'dul dbang gis/ /yon tan gzhung sogs thams cad kyang / /ma lus de yis thob par 'gyur/ /sa mchog bcu gnyis rab bgrod nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>'dra bar 'gyur/ /thun bzhi'am ni thun gsum gyis/ /mtshan ma brtan po byung gi bar/ /de ni rgyun du bklag par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dang / /zhi sogs las rnams bsam par bya/ /gzhan yang shi la phan pa dang / /cho ga'i bye brag
<p>53a.2</p>ma lus kun/ /cho ga chen por mthong bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i rim pa yang / /rim bzhin yi ge a las te/ /de nas thig le dmigs pa med/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du spyod lam brtag /dam pa'i gzhung lugs gsal mod kyi/ /bsdus la dga' ba'i ngor byas
<p>53a.3</p>nas/ /bdag 'dras brtsams par mi 'os te/ /khab len dbang gis lcags bsdu bzhin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la mos pa yin/ /rang dbang med par rtsom pa la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzod par mdzod/ /de las bdag gis dge ba gang thob des/ /'gro ba rnams
<p>53a.4</p>kyi don rtogs zhi gyur nas/ /bdag sogs 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra gyur te/ /nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam sems can grol bar shog /'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bla ma dam pa'i cho ga chen po'i gzhung rnams las/ /blo zhan pa'i
<p>53a.5</p>don du mos pa tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa phra mo rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Dal bi d+ti tsin+tA ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems
<p>53a.6</p>dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / /ye shes sku nyid la btud nas/ /'jam dbyangs kyis khyab dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsdus dang dbye ba'i bye brag gis/ /thun mong thun
<p>53a.7</p>mong ma yin pa'i/ /cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /dang po re zhig rnal 'byor bas/ /'gro ba 'dun pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yid dga' ba yi sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sgyu ma'i lus kyi snying ga ru/ /rang gi sa bon bsams nas su/ /'od 'phro ba
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>yi sbyor ba dang / /dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rang gi 'khor lo sprul par bya/ /phyag lnga bya ba'i sbyor ba dang / /mchod pa rnam pa lnga yis mchod/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs ltar/ /gsum pa skyabs 'gro la sogs bya/ /de rjes bstod pas mnyes
<p>53b.2</p>bya ba/ /thun mong dang ni de ma yin/ /thun mong rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /dang po mdo nyid ji bzhin pa/ /'chad pa'i 'dud pa nyi shu'o/ /thun mong min par rang gi'o/ /nyi shu pa yi rnam pa yang / /mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang / /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid
<p>53b.3</p>can/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag nyid de de bzhin nyid/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /srid
<p>53b.4</p>pa'i 'dod chags la sogs spangs/ /srid pa'i dga' ba chen po pa/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ /gsang sngags don kun skyed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sems
<p>53b.5</p>can kun la shas cher chags/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med/ /sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas
<p>53b.6</p>'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ha ha hi hi 'jigs par sgrogs/ /rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa/ /gad mo chen mo gad rgyangs can/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' khyab par
<p>53b.7</p>gar byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /tshig kun rab tu gsal ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ /smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal/ /smra ba'i
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas/ /tshig bden pa dang bden par smra/ /bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/ /sangs rgyas
<p>54a.2</p>kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mya ngan 'das shing mya ngan 'das/ /legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/ /bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /theg pa chen po'i
<p>54a.3</p>tshul la gnas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la
<p>54a.4</p>'dud/ /dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/ /sgyu
<p>54a.5</p>'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /skye med chos
<p>54a.6</p>de sna tshogs ston/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ /'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang ba/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod/ / 
<p>54a.7</p>rab tu mos pas gus byed na/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje ngo bor 'gyur/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du
<p>54b.2</p>yang ni mi spong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po pa/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re ji bzhin dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam
<p>54b.3</p>bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar
<p>54b.4</p>bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar
<p>54b.5</p>bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de ltar sdom pa 'dzin byed na/ /bdag nyid snod du rung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sa bon 'od kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon gzhug /de las ye shes me 'bar bas/ /rnam smin
<p>54b.6</p>phung po bsregs pa yis/ /skad cig gis ni sgyu 'drar 'gyur/ /de nas snying rje skyed pa ni/ /sdug bsngal chos dang dmigs med pas/ /byang chub rnam pa lnga bsgom ste/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni ye shes la/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni snang ba ni/ /de las 'don pa'i bsam pa ni/ /sdug bsngal la dmigs
<p>54b.7</p>snying rje'o/ /bdag stong sems can chos rnams kun/ /stong pa nyid du rab sbyor bas/ /kun gyi stong pa las 'jug pa/ /chos dmigs snying rje mnyam nyid do/ /de yang ma skyes pa'i phyir stong par shes pa ni/ /so sor rtog pa shes pa las/ /sems can thams cad
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>dgod bsam pa/ /dmigs med shes rab so sor rtog /sems can don ni rtog med las/ /nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon bzhin/ /gang dang gang 'dod snang byed pa/ /dmigs med snying rje bya grub pa'o/ /bdag dang gzhan sogs rtog pa rnams/ / 
<p>55a.2</p>slar zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /gang la chags dang rnam bral ba'i/ /chos dbyings ye shes rnam par bsgoms/ /de dag ni tshogs gnyis kyi yongs su ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas nam mkha' stong pa la/ /b+h+rUM byung 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
<p>55a.3</p>gnas par/ /hUM ni 'jigs pa bsgom byas te/ /'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pa las/ /hUM bcu 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ /khro bo bcu gcig skad cig rdzogs/ /hUM mdzad gnod mdzes gtsug tor dang / /gshin rje gshed dang gzhan mi thub/ /rta mgrin
<p>55a.4</p>dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'dod rgyal mi g.yo mgon po dang / /dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis par/ /bskyed la de nyid rnam 'phrul ba'i/ /bgegs bcu bkug par bka' bsgo bas/ /bkug ste zhabs 'og phur bus
<p>55a.5</p>gdab/ /rdo rje gsang sngags brjod bya bas/ /skad cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur/ /hUM mdzad thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros phyogs mtshams steng 'og tu/ /'phros pas dra ba gur dang ni/ /ra ba gnyis dang sa gzhi dang / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom
<p>55a.6</p>par bya/ /phyogs mtshams dkyil 'khor bcings pa yi/ /phyis kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhi ba'i bsam pa yi/ /kun du bzang por hUM mdzad gyur/ /de las chos kyi 'byung gnas bsam/ /dbus su b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang / /spyi dang thun mong
<p>55a.7</p>khyad par ni/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa dang sgo yi mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /de yi rim pa'i nang bzhugs nas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi ma dang mtshungs par/ /mtshan nyid thams cad shes bya ste/ /ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa ru/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni/ /kun gyi thun mong yin par 'dod/ /bsdus dang so so'i mtshan
<p>55b.2</p>nyid ni/ /phyi nas 'byung ba las shes bya/ /dbus su saM gaM taM hraM aM las/ hUM gnyis ldan las byung ba'i gdan/ /ming las mtshon te shes par bya/ /a las zla ba'i steng du bsam/ /de dag ni steng gi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas sa bon las bskyed pa/ /a las rnam
<p>55b.3</p>par snang mdzad che/ /mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag gnyis pa/ /mnyam gzhag pa'am byang chub mchog /rna rgyan la sogs spangs pa ni/ /rtag pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'o/ /thugs kar pad+ma gnas pa las/ /hrIHlas dang po'i sangs rgyas ni/ /zhal lnga byis pa'i
<p>55b.4</p>rgyan dang ldan/ /phyag brgyad g.yas bzhis ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon bzhis shes rab po ti 'dzin/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thun mong pa'o/ /sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru/ /a las gyur pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs drug pa la mu khyud bzhi/ /lte bar a las 'od
<p>55b.5</p>'phros pas/ /don byas 'dus pa'i sngags su 'gyur/ /lte bar a ste mu khyud gnyis/ /nang ma'i mu khyud la dgod pa/ /oM sarba d+harmA a b+hA ba/ bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM aH/ phyi rol du ni dgod pa ni/ /rtsibs bcas sam ni rtsibs med par/ /dbyangs yig
<p>55b.6</p>bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rim rtsibs drug la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan pa/ /dang po'i rtsibs la dgod bya ba/ /oM badzra tIk+Sha ya te nA ma/ gnyis pa'i rtsibs la dgod bya ba/ /oM duHkha ts+tshe da ya te nA ma/ gsum pa'i rtsibs la dgod bya ba/ / 
<p>55b.7</p>oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye ya te nA ma/ /bzhi pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te nA ma/ lnga pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /oM wA gI shwa ra ya te nA ma/ drug pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /a ra pa tsa na ya te nA ma/ 'khor lo mu khyud gsum pa la/ /ye shes sems dpa'i sku yi
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>sngags/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bA na/ dz+nyA na mUrti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA wa tsa sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi pa la/ /ka sogs k+Sha la thug par dgod/ /shes

<p>56a.3</p>dang po gnyis/ /mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis pa gnyis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gsum pa gnyis/ /sku ni dung ltar dkar ba'o/ /thugs kar zla ba sa bon no/ /rnam snang chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'o/ /so
<p>56a.4</p>sor dbye ba'i sbyor ba yang / /dbus su rang gi gdan stengs su/ /hrI hUM a a oM a las/ /pad+ma gar dang hUM byed dang / /rnam snang rta mchog rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go rims bzhin/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te/ /ting 'dzin bdud 'dul byang chub mchog/ / 
<p>56a.5</p>skyabs mdzad mchog sbyin 'gying bcas pas/ /'on kyang khyad par yod pa'o/ /pad+ma rdo rje rdo rje dang / /rdo rje sna tshogs rin chen dang / /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste/ /mdog ni bsdus pa'i zhal gyis te/ /dang po sangs rgyas d+hIHdkar la/ /sngar gyi kun gyi thun mong gis/ /'jam
<p>56a.6</p>dpal dag tu thams cad mchog /de yi thugs kar shes rab kyi/ /'khor lo sa bon rnams la bskyed/ /rtsibs brgyad yin te rnam snang gi/ /rtsibs bcu pa ni yin par 'dod/ /mu khyud bzhi sogs snga ma bzhin/ /yi ge gyur pas sngags rnams ni/ /rtsibs
<p>56a.7</p>la dgod pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /ye shes sems dpa'i ming can du/ /bsdus pa'i sngags rnams phye ba'o/ /kha dog sngar bzhin shes par bya/ /shes rab 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /lte ba rnams su sa bon gyi/ /spro bsdu las grub ye shes sems/ /zhal
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /dmar po la sogs kha dog drug /rdo rje rnon po sdug bsngal gcod/ /shes rab ye shes ye shes sku/ /ngag dbang phyug dang pa tsa'i mtha'/ /ral gri kun gyi g.yas pa ste/ /rang mtshan g.yon na 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsgom
<p>56b.2</p>pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni/ /bsdus dang phye ba'i bye brag gis/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa/ /go rims bzhin du shes par bya/ /bsdus pa rnam pa gsum yin te/ /rnam snang gnyis dang rdo rje sems/ /de gsum gtso bo gang rung
<p>56b.3</p>ngam/ /yang na rang bzhin gcig yin pas/ /gcig tu bsdus pas shes par bya/ /thugs bsdus pa la 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /so so la ni sngar bzhin 'dod/ /de yi thugs la sa bon rnams/ /spros pas rang rang dkyil 'khor 'byung / /las byas 'dus nas dkyil
<p>56b.4</p>'khor du/ /'og tu 'chad pa'i rim pas gnas/ /dbus dkar shar sngo lho ser zhing / /nub dmar byang gi ljang gu ru/ /kha dog la sogs shes par bya/ /kun gyi dbus kyi mtshan ma ste/ /'og kyang khro bo'i rdo rje dang / /rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs mtshan/ /nyams dang
<p>56b.5</p>de dang 'dra bar ram/ /yang na 'grel par bshad pa bzhin/ /ming dang zhal mdog mtshan ma sogs/ /tha dad par ni shes par bya/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin nor bu bzhin/ /so so rang rang sa bon las/ /rang rigs thams cad
<p>56b.6</p>sprul byas nas/ /'dod chags can sogs gdul byas nas/ /'dus nas dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog yin par 'dod/ /rjes kyi las rgyal ting 'dzin ni/ /'od zer spro bsdus 'gro ba sbyor/ /kun gyi phrin las mthun pas ni/ /khyad
<p>56b.7</p>par dbye ba ma bshad do/ /sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /rang gi gtso bo'i sbyor ba yis/ /lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje bcing / /se gol rdeb cing sngags brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>sogs bcas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dus par 'gyur/ /sngar bzhin bstod pas bstod nas su/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ /sgo bcad bsrung ba rdzogs pas 'grub/ /gtso bo'i dam
<p>57a.2</p>tshig mchog bcings pa/ /snying gar hUM las rdo rje bsam/ /dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes gtso bo'i sngags kyis rjes 'gro ba'o/ /lce la pad+ma bsam bya ste/ /gtso bo'i snying po bkod byas pas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya gsung sgrub po/ /gtso bo'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing / /spyi
<p>57a.3</p>bor rdo rje kun dngos bsam/ /las kyi phyag rgya phrin las 'grub/ /ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga ru/ /rang gi mtshan ma bsam byas nas/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings pas ni/ /phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dbu rgyan bsams
<p>57a.4</p>nas ni/ /mchod dang mnyam nyid la sogs bstod/ /de nas bzlas brjod bya ba ni/ /shes rab 'khor lo'i sngags rnams las/ /'od zer de 'dra 'jig rten du/ /'gro ba'i don byas der 'dus thim/ /dang po'i bzlas pa yin par 'dod/ /yang na mtshan mchog
<p>57a.5</p>brjod pa ni/ /gnyis pa yin te der yang gnyis/ /bsdus la kun te phye ba la/ /dum bu drug tu gdon byas na/ /phan yon drug tu rgyud bzhin 'gyur/ /bsdus pa'i man ngag 'di yin te/ /rnam snang che dang rnam snang dang / /rdo rje sems la mdo gnyis te/ /snying las
<p>57a.6</p>mtshan rnams thon byas nas/ /sku yi grangs kyis 'jig rten du/ /chags can gti mug can don byas/ /'dus te dbyangs nas gsal byed la/ /thim pas 'od kyi 'khor lor 'gyur/ /dbus kyi cha la gnas pa'o/ /shar sogs mi bskyod la sogs pa/ /rang rang
<p>57a.7</p>mtshan gyi gnas skabs su/ /sngags don rigs kyi lhar 'phros te/ /zhe sdang can sogs dbang byas nas/ /'dus te rang gi 'khor lo ru/ /sngags la 'dus te sngar bzhin no/ /so so rang rang mtshan gyis so/ /dang po'i ming gi sbyor bas so/ /phyi nas sngags ni nus
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>tshad bzlas/ /gal te gtong bar 'dod na yang / /sngar bzhin mchod bstod sngon 'gro bas/ /lhag chad nyes pa zhi ba dang / /bzod pa gsol dang gsal ba dang / /sngar bcings dam tshig phyag rgya dgrol/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzod/ /rjes su mthun pa'i
<p>57b.2</p>dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad par rigs/ /sprul pa'i 'od kyis der bsdus la/ /stong pa'i nga rgyal brtan bsgoms na/ /bsrung ba dam pa yin par 'dod/ /spyod lam bzhi yi dus su yang / /'jam pa'i rdo rje nga
<p>57b.3</p>rgyal 'chang / /yid la yang ni sbyar bar bya/ /snying po'i ting 'dzin sbyar ba'o/ /de ltar bsnyen par byas nas ni/ /gang 'dod las ni rdzogs 'dod pas/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs las rnams bya/ /grong la sogs pa'i phyogs bdun ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis spang bar bya/ / 
<p>57b.4</p>yon tan kun dang yongs ldan pa'i/ /byang shar mtshams ni yongs su gzung / /sems la nus pa dang ldan na/ /gang du yid dang mthun par bya/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su/ /drag dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ /sa ni sbyang ba 'grub par bya/ /gyo mo gseg ma
<p>57b.5</p>thal ba dang / /rus pa phub ma la sogs grub/ /bsal bas gnod pa med par 'gyur/ /dbus su sa ni brkos byas la/ /dag pa'i chu yis bkang byas la/ /me tog dkar po bzung byas la/ /shar du gom pa brgya phyin nas/ /log ste dngos grub brtag par bya/ / 
<p>57b.6</p>de nas maN+Dal sngon 'gro bas/ /bruM ser las byung lha mo la/ /bslang ba gzhung dang mthun par bya/ /sa yi dbus su ting 'dzin gsum/ /snga ma bzhin du bsgom bya ste/ /'on kyang khyad par dbye ba yod/ /rten gyi 'khor lo rdzogs byas la/ /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ / 
<p>57b.7</p>bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam 'gyur bar/ /gyur par bdag nyid som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /spos snod lag tu thogs nas ni/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
<p>58a.2</p>ba ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /de nas ting 'dzin gsum pa ni/ /snga ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /de nas gtso bo'i sbyor ldan pas/ /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i/ /nga rgyal
<p>58a.3</p>'dzin pas sngar bzhin bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ /de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /phyogs rnams kun du phyag byas
<p>58a.4</p>nas/ /nga ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag rang gis/ /nga ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po'i bdag /byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /mig dang rkang pa byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor
<p>58a.5</p>steng du bdag byas la/ /deng shig ces ni brjod byas la/ /g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis/ /bgegs kyi tshogs ni gzhom par bya/ /de nas phur bus gdab pa yis/ /'og gi bgegs ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /de nas skyang nul byas nas ni/ /spos kyi
<p>58a.6</p>dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ /bdag po'i gnas su gru bzhi ste/ /lhag ma'i gnas su zlum po ru/ /rang rang gi ni snying po'am/ /sku yi gsang sngags zlos pas so/ /de nas bum pa bya ba yang / /rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa/ /rtsa ba nag po ra ri med/ /rang gi mtshan mas
<p>58a.7</p>mtshan bcas pa'o/ /'bras chags lcug mas kha brgyan nas/ /ras zung gis ni mgul pa bcings/ /'bru sna rin chen sna lnga dang / /snying po lnga dang ldan par bya/ /dri zhim chu yis rab bkang la/ /steng du mchod yon chu bzhag la/ /rang gi chos kyi sa bon las/ /rang gi
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>lha ru brtags nas ni/ /bsdu dang bstod dang dgug pa dang / /rgyas gdab la sogs sngar bzhin bya/ /de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /bzung ste sku yi sngags bzlas la/ /mchod yon phul la gnas su gzhag /lag bzangs zhus pa'i rgyud gsungs pa'i/ /chogs
<p>58b.2</p>gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga yis/ /sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya/ /gson po'i slob ma'ang lha gnas bya/ /'khor bzhi rnams kyi nang nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor cho gas rjes bzung bas/ /rang la bslab par shin tu ldan/ /theg pa che la rab tu
<p>58b.3</p>mos/ /blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gzhug /gzhan dag rjes su gzung mi bya/ /de nas slob mas phyag byas te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag
<p>58b.4</p>'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul
<p>58b.5</p>gyi mchog /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ / 
<p>58b.6</p>dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /skyob pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de phyir kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas slob
<p>58b.7</p>mas brjod bya ba/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'i/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bgyi/ /sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer/ 
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /sa ma ya a/ su ra ta s+t+waM sa ma ya ho/ /badzra satwa ya thA su khaM/ snying ga la sogs par byin rlabs/ /a shwat+tha la sogs pa'i shing / /sor ni bcu gnyis me tog bcas/ /byin nas kha dang so yang
<p>59a.2</p>brud/ /rtse nas bcem ste dor ba dang / /hub gsum chu yang sbyin par bya/ /dpung pa g.yon par srung skud bcing / /ku sha byin la rmi lam brtag /nga la nang par smros zhes bsgo/ /'jig rten na ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res
<p>59a.3</p>'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /gsang sngags kyi ni tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gang dag spyod pa'i mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo bas/ /de dag
<p>59a.4</p>kun ni 'khor ba'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung bden pa bcad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su
<p>59a.5</p>bzung nas skyob bzhin par/ /sang ni rab tu 'dor bcas nas/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams 'dir ni 'dod pas na/ /rang byung skal ba chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>59a.6</p>par gyur pa yin/ /zhes bstan par bya'o/ /snyan gsan dbab pa rgyud bzhin bya/ /tho rangs dus su langs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor steng du sngar bzhin bzhag /sku yi gsang sngags bzlas pa yi/ /dri yis dkyil 'khor byugs byas la/ /sar pa legs par bsgril pa
<p>59a.7</p>la/ /kha dog lnga ni legs gyur nas/ /ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngar/ /byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan dkyil 'khor thig gdab phyir/ /rdo rje'i thig ni bdag la gsol/ /btang ba bsdus te bkang nas ni/ /legs par bsgril te mchod cing bzlas/ / 
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>sgrub pa'i grogs kyi lag gtad la/ /dkyil 'khor brtags te tshad bcal nas/ /phyi nas thig ni gdab par bya/ /nub nas shar du tshangs thig gdab/ /lho nas byang du'ang de bzhin no/ /byang dang lho dang shar nub dang / /rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs bltas nas/ /dbang po chu
<p>59b.2</p>dang nor gshin rje/ /zur thig gnyis dang gdab byas nas/ /ngos bzhi dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'gyur/ /so so'ang cha chen bcu drug tu/ /so sor rnam par phye bar bya/ /dbang po'i phyogs nas bcal bya ste/ /cha dang po yi mtha' gnyis nas/ /bzhi cha gnyis ni gdab par
<p>59b.3</p>bya/ /gnyis pa mnyam po bzhi ru'o/ /gsum pa phyed kyi phyed ma gnyis/ /bzhi pa dang po'i tshad dang mtshungs/ /cha ni bcu drug dag tu 'gyur/ /gdugs dang 'khor lo pad+ma dang / /rim pa bzhi dang nam mkha' brgyad/ /dgu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum pa/ /de gsum lnga
<p>59b.4</p>lngar bgo bar bya/ /ya phubs 'gram dang logs su 'gyur/ /de kun ring thung cha gnyis pa/ /bcu dang bcu gnyis gnyis pa ni/ /logs su gcig 'das gcig gis ni/ /bzhi cha logs te de yang yin/ /cha phyed 'das ni phyed kyi phyed/ /nang ma lngar byas khyud du 'dod/ / 
<p>59b.5</p>de nang cha chen lha snam yang / /cha phyed gnyis byas phyi ma la/ /mtha' gnyis nas ni bzhi cha gdab/ /gdugs dang pad+ma 'khor lo'o/ /gnyis pa'i nang ma bzhi ru bya/ /skas la sogs pa lta bur 'gyur/ /de yang gnyis gnyis byas nas su/ /phyi
<p>59b.6</p>ma gnyis byas de yi nang / /sngar byas ya phubs yin par 'dod/ /nang gi cha chen de yi ni/ /bzhi cha gnyis su byas pa las/ /mtha' gnyis dag tu byas pa yang / /lnga char byas pas 'gram dang ni/ /ngos su gyur te de kun yang / /cha gnyis nas ni ring ba med/ /khyud dang
<p>59b.7</p>logs ni rang gi tshad/ /phyi las dpag pas nang gi tshad/ /phyed tshad gnyis kyi bzhi char 'gyur/ /phyogs gsum yang ni des shes bya/ /kun gyi thun mong yin par 'dod/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang / /bsdus pas gnyis te dbye ba drug /mkhas pas so
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>sor shes byas te/ /bsdus pas 'dod pa brtsam par bya/ /cha chen rnam pa bzhir gnas pa'i/ /re re'ang bzhi bzhir byas nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i thig las logs de ru/ /drug pa spyi yi ka bar 'gyur/ /bcu bcu las ni mchog rnams 'dod/ /cha phyed
<p>60a.2</p>pas ni zlum thig gis/ /bskor te cha phyed phyir bor ba'i/ /cha phyed par ni bskor byas pas/ /nang gi mu khyud dag tu 'gyur/ /dbus dang phyogs bzhi brgyad rnams ni/ /gnyis gnyis su ni byas pa yis/ /bcu drug dag tu 'gyur ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po kun gyi ni/ / 
<p>60a.3</p>rta babs sgo la sogs pa yi/ /phye ba bzhir te der shes bya/ /kun gyi phrang gnas lugs dang ni/ /rdo rje dbyings dang khams gsum rgyal/ /don grub 'gro 'dul las kyi rigs/ /de nyid 'dus pa rgyud kyi rtse/ /'di ru bya zhes mkhas pas 'dod/ /yang na thun mong min pa ste/ / 
<p>60a.4</p>'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas/ /ka ba brgyad dang rtsibs rten bcas/ /de yi phyir rim rtsibs bcu drug /rtsibs rnams rten dang bcas par bri/ /zur brgyad dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni/ /lha yi snam bu'i phyogs bzhin du/ /'khor lo rtsibs dang rtsibs rten dang / / 
<p>60a.5</p>lte bar bcas pa'i thig gdab bya/ /phyir yang rdo rje me 'od bskor/ /so sor phye ba'i dkyil 'khor yang / /sngar bzhin rnam pa gnyis shes bya/ /thig gdab pa yi rim pa'o/ /de nas tshon gyi las bshad de/ /sngo ser dmar po ljang gu dang / /dkar po rnams la rim bzhin
<p>60a.6</p>du/ /hUM trAM hrIHa A las ni/ /mi bskyod rin dbang tshe dpag med/ /gdon mi za dang rtag pa bskyed/ /mig gi 'bar ba'i lcags kyu yis/ /rang bzhin gnas pa kun nas ni/ /'dres pas ro gcig gyur bsams nas/ /bzlas pa bya ste dge ba brtsam/ /dang por rdo rje
<p>60a.7</p>slob dpon gyis/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams nas dgye/ /phyi nas kun du slob mas so/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po che/ /lho na ser dang yang dag ldan/ /nub ni pad+ma rA ga ste/ /byang du ljang gu yin par 'dod/ /dbus kyi
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar dkar ba bla na med/ /sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma chags pa'i ngo bo gzhan/ /de bzhin gzhan ni margad de/ /dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par grags/ /de nas lha rnams
<p>60b.2</p>dgod pa yang / /dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus su ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /seng ge yi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /yang na dbus ma dang po la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ / 
<p>60b.3</p>yang na rnam snang chen po'o/ /lnga po kun gyi shar phyogs su/ /mi bskyod glang po la gnas shing / /bdud 'dul rdo rje bsnams shing sngo/ /kun gyi lho yi phyogs su ni/ /rin chen dbang gis rta la bcibs/ /mchog sbyin rin chen bsnams shing ser/ /dkyil 'khor
<p>60b.4</p>kun gyi nub phyogs su/ /tshe dpag med pa rma bya bcibs/ /ting 'dzin pad+ma bsnams shing dmar/ /lnga po kun gyi byang phyogs su/ /gdon mi za ba mkha' lding bcibs/ /skyabs mdzad sna tshogs bsnams shing ljang / /rdo rje 'degs pa sngon 'gro bas/ /snying po brjod cing
<p>60b.5</p>bri bar bya/ /de nyid 'dus pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /lnga la rang gi 'khor gyis bskor/ /yang na 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug /rigs kyi mdog ltar dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sems ma rin chen chos/ /las mchog mas te dpal ldan ma/ /mtshams kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs
<p>60b.6</p>la dgod/ /bzhi yi mtshams bzhi po las ni/ /me mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs lnga ni/ /shar sngo lho ser nub dmar zhing / /byang du ljang zhing dbus dkar la/ /rigs lnga'i sgeg mo rnam lnga ni/ /dbus su de bzhin gshegs rigs dkar/ /rdo rje shar du sngon po ste/ / 
<p>60b.7</p>lho ru rin chen ser mo'o/ /nub du pad+ma dmar mo ste/ /byang du las ma ljang ba'o/ /de bzhin lho nub phreng ba dang / /nub byang glu ma dbang ldan du/ /las ma la sogs de bzhin no/ /phyi yi lha rnams mtshams su ni/ /bdug pa la sogs de bzhin dgod/ /byams
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>pa yang ni rigs lnga'i lnga/ /'khor lo lag na de bzhin te/ /rigs kyi mdog gi dbye bar bya/ /'khor dang gtso bo phyogs sogs ni/ /lA se la sogs bshad pa bzhin/ /bskal bzang gzhan yang de bzhin no/ /sgo rnams kun gyi nang du yang / /sgo srung
<p>61a.2</p>bzhi yang lnga lnga ru/ /gtso bo 'khor yang sngar bzhin brtag /phyag mtshan la sogs dbye ba ni/ /rgyud las ji skad gsung bzhin bya/ /'khor lo bcu tshan gsum dang gsum/ /brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lnga ru/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /de ltar phyag rgya chen
<p>61a.3</p>po'am/ /yang na lag pa'i phyag rgyar bcas/ /yang na mtshan ma dgod pa'am/ /yang na yi ge dgod pa'am/ /yang na gdan gyi mtshan ma'am/ /gal te 'byor pa med na yang / /phyag rgyas yongs su bsgrub ste bsam/ /dkyil 'khor bdun du brtag pa'o/ /so sor phye

<p>61a.5</p>yongs skong mdzad/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyi/ /steng du bteg pa dgug pa dang / /gzhug cing dbang du bya ba'o/ /de nas bum pa bya ba yang / /rtsa ba nag po ra ri med/ /mgrin par ras mchog gis brgyan pa/ /'bru sna rin

<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma gang yin 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas slob ma thams cad kyis/ /gson pa zhes bya'i khyad par te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon nyid ni bdag la dgongs/ / 
<p>61b.2</p>byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pa/ /skyob pa chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum song la bdag skyabs mchi/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur gshegs
<p>61b.3</p>shig theg chen gyi/ /lam chen snod ni khyod yin te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /'jig rten
<p>61b.4</p>spyod pa rjes 'jug phyir/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas rgyun bshags byed du gzhug ste/ yol ba'i mtha' ru gnas pa las/ /gdong la gos kyis g.yogs pa yis/ / 
<p>61b.5</p>dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung / /byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can rnams ni bdag gis mgron du gnyer/ /'gro
<p>61b.6</p>la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces brjod du gzhug go/ /de nas oM su ra ta s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ zhes pas sems ni bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas che ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems ni yongs bzung nas/ /dam tshig mchog dang
<p>61b.7</p>gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'di ni 'jug par 'dod/ /de nas slob ma la bsgrags pa/ /sdom pa thams cad dbog pa ni/ /nus pa'i nyams la dpag ste sbyin/ /slob mas yang ni de bzhin gzung / /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs zhugs/ /tshul 'di gzhan la ma
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>brjod cig /gal te smras par gyur na ni/ /'jam pa'i rgyal po rab khros nas/ /bdun rgyud rigs dang bcas par bzlog /de nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra u da kas chu blud do/ /gal te gsang na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu yis 'grub/ / 
<p>62a.2</p>deng nas brtsams te bu khyod kyi/ /'jam dbyangs rgyal po nga yin gyis/ /brnyas mi bya zhing mnyan par gyis/ /ye shes dag pa dbog pa dang / /brtan pa'ang gzhung bzhin bya ba ste/ /phreng ba dor dang bcing ba dang / /gdong g.yogs bkrol zhing dkyil 'khor bstan/ /bla ma
<p>62a.3</p>brgyud pa shes par gyis/ /'jug pa rdzogs nas dbang bskur ba/ /lhar bskyed chu dang cod pan dang / /rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni/ /brtul zhugs rjes gnang gzengs bstod dang / /lung bstan dbugs dbyung la sogs pa/ /cho ga mthong bas shes par bya/ /gson po'i las ni
<p>62a.4</p>yongs rdzogs nas/ /gal te shi la phan 'dogs na/ /ro'am rus pa gos la ni/ /sku yi sngags kyis btab pa yi/ /chu mchog gis ni bkru dang gtor/ /de nas de la gnas pa yi/ /gnod pa'i bgegs rnams bsal ba ni/ /shin tu khros pa'i 'jam dpal du/ /bdag
<p>62a.5</p>nyid rab tu bsams nas ni/ /gshin rje gshed dam bdud rtsi yi/ /gsang sngags drag po rab bzlas pa'i/ /yungs kar rdo rjer bsams nas ni/ /de la lan gsum rab tu brab/ /de nas de yi bgegs bral la/ /snying ga'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po yis/ /bar do'i shes pa dgug
<p>62a.6</p>par bya/ /a la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis/ /ye shes sems dpa' rab bskyed la/ /sems bskyed sdom bzung la sogs dang / /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug pa rnams/ /gson po'i tshul bzhin byas nas su/ /dbang bskur ba yang rim bzhin bya/ /rnam par dag pa de yi ni/ / 
<p>62a.7</p>lte ba snying ga lkog ma dang / /spyi bo rnams ni rim bzhin du/ /shes rab 'khor lo gdags bya ste/ /lte bar shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /mu khyud bzhi dang rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /mu khyud bzhi la sngags bzhi ni/ /sngar bzhin dgod par shes par bya/ /rtsibs la'ang dbyangs yig bcu
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>gnyis te/ /lte bar a yig bsam pa'o/ /snying ga mgrin pa spyi bo yang / /de bzhin bsam pa byas nas ni/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i 'od kyis ni/ /de yi lus kun khyab par bsam/ /de la sogs pa'i gzugs rten no/ /sbyin sreg tu ni dbul bar bya/ /de yang / thabs
<p>62b.2</p>dang dgang gzar blugs gzar rdzas/ /shing dang sgrub pa po dang snod/ /rdzas bsang dgod dang me blang dang / /bsang gtor dang ni me sbar dang / /ku sha dgram dang gnas pa dang / /me bskyed pa dang spyan drang sogs/ /srung skud bcing dang mchod pa dang / /zhabs bsil sgrub dang
<p>62b.3</p>dbang bskur dang / /dam tshig bsgo dang mchod yon dang / /bsang gtor 'thor 'thung sreg blugs dang / /me bsang brtag dang dgang blugs dang / /kun bsregs bsang dang lha dgod dang / /bsdus dang bstod dang dgug pa dang / /sngon bzhin phyag rgyas dbang
<p>62b.4</p>bskur dang / /mchod dang mchod yon 'thor 'thung bsang / /dgang blugs cig shos las bskul dang / /lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa dang / /me lha dgang blugs mchod yon bcas/ /bsang gtor sogs dang gshegs gsol ba/ /cho ga ji ltar mthong ba yi/ /gang
<p>62b.5</p>na las kyi cho ga med/ /de ni spyi yi cho ga las/ /rgyas pa'i cho ga sngags pas bstan/ /de shes pa la nyes pa bral/ /de ltar byed pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor sngon bzhin mchod pa dang / /yi ge brgya pa brjod pa dang / /bzod pa
<p>62b.6</p>gsol dang bsngo ba dang / /phyag rgya dgrol ba'i rim pa bya/ /oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /oM badzra muH/ 'phags pa 'jam
<p>62b.7</p>dpal gyis khyab pa'i/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga ni/ /thun mong thun mong min par sbyar/ /nongs pa mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod/ /gsang bar 'os pa sba ba'i phyir/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga byas/ /'di las dge ba ci thob pa/ /'gro kun 'jam
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>pa'i dbyangs thob shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal rigs bsdus pa dang phye ba'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon zla bzangs grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul
<p>63a.2</p>khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam
<p>63a.3</p>pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam sangs rgyas/ /snying po'i don ldan sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/ /snying po don gyi rgyud nyid las/ /brten nas bdag gis sgrub thabs brtsams/ / 
<p>63a.4</p>de nas gnas chen yid 'ong ba'i/ /nags tshal shin tu mdzes la sogs/ /dad dang dbang bskur rjes su ldan/ /byams sems ldan pas 'di brtsam mo/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i blos/ /khro bo drug gis bsrung bar bya/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA la rU pa hUM/ oM badzra ya
<p>63a.5</p>mAn+ta ka hUM/ zhes bya bas bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas byams pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug nas/ /mdun du dkyil 'khor spyan drang ste/ /phyag dang mchod pa bya ba ni/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hU pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na maHsarba ta
<p>63a.6</p>thA ga ta badzra puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra nai wi t+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na maH 
<p>63a.7</p>sarba ta thA ga ta shab+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes mchod pa sngon du song nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /a b+ha ba swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ 
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>zhes bya bas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /dang po a yi rang bzhin las/ /'od 'phros hUM las rdo rje ni/ /khro zhal drug ldan me dpung ldan/ /bum pa'i nang du mchod rten ni/ /rin chen lnga las grub pa bskyed/ /chos sku la brten gzugs sku
<p>63b.2</p>ni/ /e las byung ba'i bum pa'i nang / /kha dog dkar po bskyed par bya/ /de nang b+hUM gyi 'phro 'du las/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi tshom bu lnga/ /bcu drug 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i/ /dbus su seng ge gti mug gdan/ /shar du glang chen zhe sdang
<p>63b.3</p>gdan/ /lhor ni rta ste nga rgyal gdan/ /nub tu rma bya chags pa'i gdan/ /byang du shang shang phrag dog ste/ /lnga yi bdag nyid bcom pa'i gdan/ /zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa ste/ /gzhan yang de bzhin zla ba'o/ /dang po dbyangs yig rang bzhin las/ /gti mug blo ste tshul
<p>63b.4</p>khrims mchog /chos dbyings rang bzhin zhi ba'i sku/ /dbus su rnam par bsam par bya/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas skye med pa'i/ /zhal lnga phyag brgyad pad+ma'i steng / /'di ltar sangs rgyas skye med pa'i/ /'dab bzhi a ra pa tsa na/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas skye med pa'i/ / 
<p>63b.5</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthing ga ste/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i bar/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bsgom/ /zhe sdang chen po bzod pa'i bdag /me long rang bzhin mthing ka ste/ /brtan pa'i
<p>63b.6</p>rtags can mi bskyod pa/ /cung zhig khros pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs/ /chags pa chen po sbyin pa'i bdag /mnyam pa'i rang bzhin ser po ste/ /chags pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mnyam pa yi ni tshul gyis bzhugs/ /bsam gtan rang bzhin 'dod pa'i

<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>tshul gyis bzhugs/ /don chen stong pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /me long ye shes mthing ka ste/ /rdo rje bsnams pa 'gying bag can/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs/ /brjod pa bral bas mtshan ma med/ /mnyam nyid ye shes mthing ka ste/ /rin chen

<p>64a.3</p>bsnams shing 'gying bag can/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs/ /byang chub mchog gi 'dod pa'i bdag /sku mdog mthing ga chen po ste/ /shes rab chen po'i sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin gyi/ /sku mdog ser po'i sku 'chang ba/ / 
<p>64a.4</p>byams pa'i rang bzhin lcags kyu 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /dga' ba'i mchog gi rang bzhin gyi/ /sku mdog dmar po sgra yi bdag /dbyer med thugs kyi mda' gzhu 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /mgu ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /sku mdog ljang
<p>64a.5</p>gu'i mdog can te/ /phrag dog spangs pa mgu ba'i bdag /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /gzugs kyi che ba'i bdag nyid can/ /sku mdog gser dang 'dra ba ste/ /dbul ba sel mdzad rin chen 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /kha dog shin tu gsal ba
<p>64a.6</p>yi/ /sku mdog ban+du la yi mdog /gnyen po mthar 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /mtshan thos pas ni snyan pa ste/ /ljang gu sna yi rnam shes sku/ /snyan pa yis ni tog 'dzin pa'i/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /snying po 'dus pas mi bzad
<p>64a.7</p>mdzod/ /sku ni mthing ga'i mdog can te/ /'gyod pa med pas so phreng 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed/ /sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /chags pa med pas pad+ma 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /nyon mongs pa yi
<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>'dzin pas bcings/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od dang ldan/ /nyon mongs gcod byed ral gri 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /snang ba bzhin du gsal bar rtogs/ /mthing ka lce yi rnam shes sku/ /gzhan yang ltos pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i
<p>64b.2</p>steng / /rtog pas rang 'dra de rtog byed/ /sku mdog gser bsregs 'dra ba'i sku/ /smra bar byed pa'i lce bsnams shing / /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /mkhas pas gnyen po sna tshogs brten/ /ljang gu'i mdog can mdzes pa'i sku/ /sbyor ba'i bdag nyid rgya
<p>64b.3</p>gram 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin don kun 'grub/ /sku mdog mthing ka chen po ste/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i mche ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /byams dang snying rje dga' bas dga'/ /sku mdog gser 'dra mdzes pa'i sku/ / 
<p>64b.4</p>dman pa'i lus grol go cha 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /'bras bu chos sku sgyu ma'i sku/ /mig 'phrul sprul pa mthing ga'i mdog /rang bzhin don grub khu tshur phyag /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan cing / /bzhi bzhis yongs
<p>64b.5</p>su bskor ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo gtso/ /sku mdog dkar mo me long 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /shar lho mtshams su bsam par bya/ /tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng ba ma/ /sku mdog ser mo phreng ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / / 
<p>64b.6</p>lho nub mtshams su bsam par bya/ /bzod pa'i bdag nyid glu ma ni/ /sku mdog dmar mo pi wang 'dzin/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /nub byang mtshams su bsam par bya/ /brtson 'grus bdag nyid gar ma ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu gar ma ste/ /rdo rje skyil krung
<p>64b.7</p>zla ba'i steng / /byang shar mtshams su bsam par bya/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig las byung ba'i/ /shes rab dkyil 'khor bskyed byas nas/ /'khor lo bcu drug dag la ni/ /thabs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin no/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag med pa'i/ /byang chub
<p>65a</p>
<p>65a.1</p>sems dpa' byams pa ni/ /sku mdog dmar ser gun+d+he bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /snying rje shes rab mchog gi sku/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni/ /ljang ser phyag na ut+pal bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil
<p>65a.2</p>krung zla ba'i steng / /dga' ba'i shes rab blo chen ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos glang po/ /mthing ga phyag na spos phor 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /mkhas pa btang snyoms thabs che ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog /dkar po phyag
<p>65a.3</p>na tog bsnams te/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /rdzu 'phrul snying rje'i stobs dang ldan/ /sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho ni/ /gser mdog phyag na rin po che/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /shugs chen byams pa'i stobs dang ldan/ / 
<p>65a.4</p>sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa/ /gser mdog phyag na rin chen 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dga' ba'i bdag /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong ni/ /mdog sngon phyag na spos kyi shing / /sems dpa'i skyil
<p>65a.5</p>krung zla ba'i steng / /bdag gzhan sde 'joms btang snyoms bdag /byang chub sems dpa' spobs brtsegs ni/ /mthing ga'i mdog can pu sti bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /srid pa'i ri 'joms dga' ba ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'
<p>65a.6</p>mthu chen thob/ /mdog dmar phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /sra zhing mkhregs pa btang snyoms sku/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngan song 'dren/ /dmar ser phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / / 
<p>65a.7</p>drag po chen po byams pa'i sku/ /byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan 'joms/ /dung mdog phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /snying rjes 'jigs pa che las skyob/ /byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can/ /mdog dkar phyag na dra ba bsnams/ / 
<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /mgon po'i rigs te btang snyoms sku/ /sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nu ni/ /dkar ser phyag na zla ba bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /dga' ba'i byin brlabs che ba'i mchog /byang chub sems dpa'
<p>65b.2</p>'od dpag med/ /mdog dkar phyag na lcags kyu bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /byang chub snying rje'i lam gyi bdag /sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /sku mdog ljang khu ral gri 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /theg
