<p>65b.3</p>chen byams pa chen po'i bdag /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod/ /mthing ka rin chen zur brgyad sgrom/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /bsam gtan gyi ni bdag nyid de/ /dri yi lha mo bdug pa ma/ /mthing ka'i mdog can spos phor 'dzin/ /sems
<p>65b.4</p>dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag /mdzes pa'i me tog lha mo ni/ /dkar mo phyag na me tog 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /thabs kyi shes rab pha rol phyin/ /mdzes pa'i dri yi lha mo ni/ /dmar mo phyag na dri chab
<p>65b.5</p>bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /smon lam gsal ba'i pha rol phyin/ /ro dang ldan pa'i zhal zas ma/ /ljang gu phyag na ro mchog bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /ye shes snying rje chen po yi/ /khros pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma/ / 
<p>65b.6</p>mthing ka phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng / /byams pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i stobs/ /khros pa'i lha mo zhags pa ma/ /ser mo phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng / /dga' ba'i pha rol phyin pa'i stobs/ /khros
<p>65b.7</p>pa'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma/ /dmar mo phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng / /ye shes zad med btang snyoms bdag /khros pa'i lha mo dril bu ma/ /ljang gu'i mdog can dril bu ma/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng / /dang po'i
<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>dbyangs yig rang bzhin las/ /lha rnams de ltar bskyed par bya'o/ /oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi tA/ mu pA da ye ta a/ zhes spyan drang bar bya'o/ /a A i I u U e ai o au aM
<p>66a.2</p>a/ s+thi to hr-i di dz+nyA na mUrti/ ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ t+r+ya d+h+wa warti ni/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na/ duH khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH/ zhes phyag btsal bar bya'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes bya bas gnyis su med par bstim par bya'o/ / 
<p>66a.3</p>oM sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrti a/ zhes bya bas zla ba'i steng du sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba d+harma ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ zhes bya bas dbang bskur
<p>66a.4</p>te/ rigs rnams kyis mtshon pa'o/ /de nas bsgom pa rab tu brtsams/ /ma yengs gsal bar byas te bsgom/ /a ra pa tsa na a zhes bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan gyi sngags brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan rnams bsdus nas gtso bo la zhu ste kun du zhal rnam par snang
<p>66a.5</p>mdzad du'o/ /gzhan du ni gtso bo zhu ba dang rjes kyi gtso bo zhu ba'o/ /gti mug can sbyangs nas/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrti a zhes bya bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal bar byas te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /zhe sdang can sbyangs nas duHkhats+tshe da zhes bya
<p>66a.6</p>bas me long lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /'dod chags can sbyangs nas oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na zhes bya bas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /nga rgyal can sbyangs
<p>66a.7</p>nas oM wA gI shwa ra zhes bya bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /phrag dog can sbyangs nas dz+nyA na kA ya zhes bya bas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>longs sku dang sprul sku'i sngags brjod nas bstod pa ni/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya bas stong pa nyid de dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
<p>66b.2</p>pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /yum bzhis chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ / 
<p>66b.3</p>ces bya bas nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgo nas shar phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhis chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung
<p>66b.4</p>nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ces bya bas chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de lho'i phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /med pa las byung khyod la
<p>66b.5</p>'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya bas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid de
<p>66b.6</p>nub phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan
<p>66b.7</p>nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de byang phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsa k+Shu aM a/ zhes bya bas bzlas pa bstan nas gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas spyod
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /bdag gis bla ma'i gdams pa la brten nas/ rgyud don dbang po rdo rje'i tshig don sbyar/ /mkha' 'gro'i rjes su 'brangs nas de brtsams pas/ /'gro kun ye shes sems dpa' rtogs par shog /'phags pa
<p>67a.2</p>'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs u rgyan gyi slob dpon shrI a wa d+hU tI pa chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // 
<p>67a.3</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti no pi ka /bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med
<p>67a.4</p>pa/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan 'dud/ /dang por sngags pas dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan par byas te/ yid dga' ba'i gnas su 'dug la/ tho rangs kar kha'i sgo dag par byas la/ snying gar zla ba'i steng du/ yi ge
<p>67a.5</p>muM rnam par bsams la/ 'od zer gyis bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la/ phyag btsal ba dang / mchod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
<p>67a.6</p>bsngo bar bya'o/ /de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la stong pa nyid bsgoms te/ oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sngags 'di'i don la dmigs pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsgom mo/ / 
<p>67a.7</p>de nas yi ge d+hIHlas pad+ma'i gdan dmar po bsam zhing / de'i steng du a las zla ba'i gdan rnam par bsams te/ dbus su yi ge muM dmar skya 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro zhing 'du ba bsam par bya'o/ /de nyid thig ler gyur pa las/ /ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>dkar po sprin dkar dag pa lta bu rdo rje skyil krung can/ phyag bzhi dang ldan pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na mdzes pa'i ral gris 'debs shing shes rab kyi pusti 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma gnyis na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan can no/ /de ltar rnam par bsgoms
<p>67b.2</p>te/ At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes brjod la/ nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la snying ga'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ yi ge las byung ba'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du bzhugs te/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rnam par mchod la/ rang dang gnyis su med par
<p>67b.3</p>bsre bar bya'o/ /snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang spyi bo rnams su/ rdo rje dang pad+ma dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo rjes rgyas btab ste/ thugs ka'i 'od zer kyis nam mkha' khyab pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskul bas lha mo'i tshogs kyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis dbang bskur
<p>67b.4</p>te/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur ro/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ hrIHyongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar po zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa/ zhabs gnyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ byis pa'i rgyan
<p>67b.5</p>thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i na bza' can/ g.yas bzhi na mdzes pa'i ral gri/ g.yon bzhi na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsnams te/ lce drug pa kha dog drug dang ldan pa/ mu khyud
<p>67b.6</p>bzhi yis bskor ba/ lte bar yi ge a dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas te/ slar 'dus te de nyid la thim pas/ rtsa ba'i sngags dgod par bya'o/ /oM sarba d+harmA a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+ha
<p>67b.7</p>badzra a A aM aH/ de'i phyi rol mu khyud la dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis dgod do/ /de'i phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa ste/ dang po'i rtsibs la oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya te nA ma/ gnyis pa la oM duHkhats+tshe da ya te nA ma/ gsum pa la oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye ya te nA ma/ bzhi pa
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>la oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te nA ma/ lnga pa la oM wA gI shwa ra ya te nA ma/ drug pa la oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te nA ma/ phyi'i mu khyud dang po la ye shes sems dpa'i phreng sngags/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya zhes bya ba nas/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHzhes bya ba'i bar du dgod do/ / 
<p>68a.2</p>phyi'i mu khyud tha ma la yi ge ka nas ha'i mthar gsal byed kyi yi ge dgod do/ /de ltar snying gar bsam zhing / de las 'khor lo de'i dbus su a las bskyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar zhing / in+d+ra nI la'i
<p>68a.3</p>gtsug phud can/ nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra bas bskor zhing / zhi ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis kyis ut+pal dmar po dang sngon po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam gyis mdzes pa g.yas dang g.yon na rim pa bzhin bsnams pa rgyan thams cad kyis
<p>68a.4</p>brgyan cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i dbus su yi ge a bkod de/ de las 'od zer 'phros shing / 'khor lo'i sngags kyi kha dog ji lta ba bzhin 'od zer 'phros te/ rang dang 'jig rten gyi khams kun khyab par
<p>68a.5</p>byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gsal bar 'gyur zhing / sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar bsdus nas/ bdag nyid la lan gsum bskor te/ snying ga'i sngags dang zla ba dang bcas pa gcig tu
<p>68a.6</p>'dres par gyur nas/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i tshul gyis/ bdag med pa brtan por bsgom mo/ /de lta bu'i tshul gyis sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sngags bzlas pa dang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag pa yang rim pa des yang dang
<p>68a.7</p>yang du bya'o/ /thun mtshams su ni ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol zhing ji ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bdag nyid la bsdu bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs pa la lha'i rnal 'byor du langs te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis dkyil 'khor dang
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>gtor ma dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / mdo gdon pa la sogs pa mchod rten gyi las dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / lus ngag gi spyod pa thams cad lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/ /zas la sogs pa ni
<p>68b.2</p>rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por sngags kyis btab la tshim par bya'o/ /phyi'i khrus don du gnyer ba'i tshe yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rang bzhin rnam par dag pas bkru'o/ /nyal ba'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la snyoms par zhugs pas nyal lo/ /ldang na gzugs
<p>68b.3</p>kyi sku'i rim pas so/ /tshul 'di lta bur gang zhig sgom par byed pa de ni 'dul ba'i dbang gis de nyid ring por mi thogs par nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /ye shes sems dpa' sprul pa'i sku yi sgrub thabs 'di/ /rgyud dang sgeg pa'i rdo rje byang chub mchog
<p>68b.4</p>ldan dang / /'jam dpal grags pa bla ma'i man ngag rim pa 'di/ /gsang ba'i mtshan ldan rdo rje las grub kyis/ /dam pa nyer bsten dan hri badzra las/ /byang chub sgyu 'phrul sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di/ /rnyed nas 'di la gus phyir bdag gis bris/ /'di yis 'gro kun
<p>68b.5</p>ye shes sems dpar shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Dal bi d+hi kri ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / 
<p>68b.6</p>'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyab pa'i bdag po ye shes sku/ /de bzhin nyid dag dri med pa'i/ /tshig la smra mkhas brjod pa'i gsung / /khyab bdag sku lnga la bstod de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lam/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad/ /thabs
<p>68b.7</p>dang shes rab don ldan pa'i/ /dad ldan thos pa la brtson dang / /dbang thob gnang ba sbyin pa'i phyir/ /dben pa'i gnas kyi bar chad bsal/ /byams sems ldan pas bsnyen pa brtsam/ /slob mas thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas phul nas/ /bdag ni 
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>mi shes rang bzhin gyi/ /lam gyi dam pa bstan du gsol/ /gsol btab gnang sbyin ched du ni/ /rdzas rnams la sogs gnang ba sbyin/ /byams ldan bsnyen pa la 'jug bya/ /gtso bo la 'bum gzhan la khri/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkhats+tshe da/ 
<p>69a.2</p>pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa na hUM d+hIH/ phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma btang / /bsod nams bsags pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i mtshan byung nas/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las brtsam bya/ /dang po sangs rgyas skur gsal
<p>69a.3</p>la/ /lha mnyes sa bslang sa brtag dang / /nags tshal spang ljongs nyams dga'i gnas/ /sngar byas rang yid dga' bar brtsom/ /dri zhim chus gtor me tog dgram/ /de ltar sa brtag de ru ni/ /mchod pa lnga yis lha mo mchod/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad
<p>69a.4</p>kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha ma khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri/ /lan gsum brjod pas
<p>69a.5</p>sa la thim/ /de yi rtags ni shar la sogs/ /mthon dman rtags kyis brtag par bya/ /rko ba lto 'phye'i lte bar brko/ /dri yi chu yis spangs la bzhag /de nas lag mthil ltar mnyam bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam/ / 
<p>69a.6</p>logs dang steng yang de bzhin no/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor lha mchod pas/ /lha rnams khyed ni dpang du gyur/ /bdag gzhan sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rin chen sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas dbu rgyan stod g.yogs dang / /rgyan bgos rdo rje dril thogs nas/ /oM
<p>69a.7</p>badzra d+hU pe AHhUM/ oM badzra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badzra A lo ke AHhUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he AHhUM/ oM badzra nai bi t+ya AHhUM/ zhes mchod pa lngas mchod/ /sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa/ /sgyu ma sprul pa bdag nyid kyi/ /'ja' tshon lta bur so sor gsal/ /thabs
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>dang shes rab sku mnga' ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khong nas 'byung ba shes rab thabs/ /shes rab dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /nyon mongs dug rnams sel mdzad pa'i/ /thabs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /oM pradz+nyA maN+Dal pra be+e
<p>69b.2</p>sha /oM u pa maN+Dal pra be+e sha /de nas phyogs bcu khro bos bsrung / /bka' bsgo stangs stabs bya bar bshad/ /gur dang bla re la sogs pa/ /rak+Sha'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /ba yi rnam lngas legs byugs te/ /de steng dri yi thig le dang / /me tog tshom bu dgram
<p>69b.3</p>par bya /tshogs bsags stong nyid bsgoms nas ni/ /b+h+rUM las gzhal yas as lha bskyed/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug gzhug bya/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas skyed byed yum/ /khong nas 'byung ba skye med bdag /smra bsam brjod med spros bral yum/ /gsang ba'i yum la
<p>69b.4</p>phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /ma rig mun sel 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /zhe sdang ma lus 'joms mdzad cing / /mkhregs
<p>69b.5</p>shing rdo rje chen po 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po nga rgyal che/ /nga rgyal ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'dzin/ /rin chen 'byung ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /'dod chags
<p>69b.6</p>ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /sprin dkar dag bzhin pad+ma bsnams/ /snang ba mtha' yas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po phrag dog che/ /phrag dog ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/ /phyag 'tshal don yod grub la bstod/ /dang
<p>69b.7</p>po sangs rgyas rgyu med cing / /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /glegs bam ral gri phyag na bsnams/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel/ /dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba/ / 
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>shes rab 'khor lo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba/ /ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can/ /ye shes sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod pa chen po bde chen ldan/ / 
<p>70a.2</p>dga' ba don ldan mgu bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'/ /shes rab sems dpa' bcu drug bstod/ /sbyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo la/ /tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng ba ma/ /bzod pa'i bdag nyid pi wang ma/ /brtson 'grus bdag nyid gar mkhan
<p>70a.3</p>ma/ /lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes rab mar me bsam gtan bri/ /thabs ldan me tog smon lam ro/ /phyag 'tshal lha mo bzhi la bstod/ /sems can don la rab brtson pa'i/ /snying rje chen po blo mchog ldan/ /byams pa la sogs thabs kyi
<p>70a.4</p>bdag /thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bstod/ /stobs ldan lcags kyu zhags pa ma/ /ye shes lcags sgrog dril bu ma/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi/ /sgo ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas grub pa'i las brtsams nas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lha
<p>70a.5</p>rnams kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ /thal sbyar pus btsugs dril bu gsil/ /spos thogs de ltar gsol ba gdab/ /de nas bsgrub pa byas nas ni/ /gsol ba btab pa sngon song
<p>70a.6</p>nas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la gdab/ /nyi zla'i bar du mkha' la gdab/ /de nas slob ma gzung bar bya/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen bo bdag 'tshal
<p>70a.7</p>lo/ /dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /dkon mchog gtso 'khor bcas pa dang / /skyabs dang grong mchog 'jug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur lam chen 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /bu tshur theg chen rten yin te/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ / 
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>khrod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /lam 'di la ni brten nas ni/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar rnams/ /byang chub shing gi gdan drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /bdud sde dag kyang 'di yis bcom/ /de bas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis lam 'di bsgrub
<p>70b.2</p>par gyis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang dkon mchog gsum/ /dus 'di rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo slob dpon la/ /dus 'di rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /bla med dkon mchog dkyil 'khor lha/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dus
<p>70b.3</p>'di nas gzung byas te/ /tshangs spyod dam tshig sdom pa gzung / /phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams bzhugs pa'i/ /bla ma slob dpon yi dam lha/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dam chos rnams la bdag sdig bshags/ /bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas
<p>70b.4</p>dang / /dkyil 'khor chos dang dge 'dun gyi/ /yon tan yongs su sgrogs rnams la/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /bde gshegs mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu'i bla ma yi dam lha/ /dkyil 'khor gtso 'khor bcas pa
<p>70b.5</p>dang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /snying po byang chub mchis bar du/ /di ring nyid du skyabs su mchi/ /bdag ni deng du gzung du gsol/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed ltar/ /de bzhin sems can phan don du/ /bdag
<p>70b.6</p>gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /rnal 'byor sangs rgyas sdom pa gzung / /rdo rje rin chen khyad par gyi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sdom pa gzung / /thabs dang shes
<p>70b.7</p>rab bsam pas ni/ /slob dpon nyid du sdom pa gzung / /rin chen 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dam tshig la/ /nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa yi/ / 
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>dam pa'i chos kyi sdom pa gzung / /phrin las 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /tshul khrims gsum ldan bya ba dang / /rgya che gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa gzung bar bya/ /de ltar sdom pa rab bzung nas/ /slob ma bsrung bar rab tu bya/ /'bru
<p>71a.2</p>gsum sngags kyis rab bsrungs nas/ /gnas gsum byin brlabs rab brtan nas/ /mchod pas slob ma brtan phyir mchod/ /de nas maN+Dal ba ko tsam/ /bshams nas so shing dor bya ni/ /ut+pal pad+ma dri zhim ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis 'bus ma zos/ /dri dang
<p>71a.3</p>me tog shin tu bcings/ /shar bltas mi g.yo steng du dor/ /bza' zin nas ni mi g.yo dor/ /steng bltas mchog thob phyogs su ni/ /so so'i phrin las mtshams su ni/ /dngos grub tha ma 'og gis 'og /de nas dri ma dag pa'i phyir/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa
<p>71a.4</p>ra/ ma hA pa tsa bi sho d+ha sarba pA paM rU pa tsit+ta bAka a pa ya na hUM/ bzlas pa'i chu yis lus ngag yid/ /so sor dag phyir hub gsum btung / /de nas rgyud ni sbyong ba'i phyir/ /dad dang mi lus thob pa dang / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon/ /me tog u dum+bAr bzhin/ /lam
<p>71a.5</p>bzang rnyed pa de bas kyang / /shin tu sdig pa zad byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbang ni thob par dka'o/ /dbang ldan nus pa thob dka'o/ /de nas oM AHhUM ma ni bi shung+d+ha hUM/ sarba pA paM bi shud+d+ha hUM/ ku sha byin brlabs sngas su gzhug /ldang ba'i stobs kyis smon lam gdab/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM kA
<p>71a.6</p>la rU pa hUM phaT/ gnyis kyis bsrung ba'i skud pa bya/ /byin brlabs srog gnas nyid du gdags/ /de nas gtor ma gtang byas nas/ /slob ma seng ge'i nyal thabs nyal/ /rmi lam rtags ni so sor brtag /rtags bzang spro ba ngan na ni/ /sbyin sreg gzhan gyis sdig pa sbyong / / 
<p>71a.7</p>slob dpon dkyil 'khor nang zhugs te/ /slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /de nas rin chen lnga las byas/ /bum pa kha dog dkar po ste/ /pad steng so so'i mtshan ma dgod/ /mgul chings kha dog so sor bcings/ /'bru dang rin chen lnga dang ni/ /snying po lnga dang spos lnga
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>blugs/ /'bras bu can gyi kha rgyan shing / /sbyangs nas de nas dgram par bya/ /lha grangs mthun pa'i bum pa dgram/ /bi shud+d+ha yi sngags kyis sbyangs/ /bruM las rin chen bum pa bskyed/ /nang du so so'i lha rnams bsam/ /dgug gzhug la sogs rdzogs pa dang / / 
<p>71b.2</p>mchod nas bstod cing 'dud kyis bstod/ /oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUr+t+tir haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA wa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ oM badzra tre+ek+Sh+Na AHhUM/oM
<p>71b.3</p>duHkhats+tshe da AHhUM/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ya AHhUM/ oM bA gI shwa ra AHhUM/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya AHhUM/ oM a ra pa tsa na a hUMH/ zhes pas ni rigs so so dang tha mas ni las thams cad pa'i bum pa byin gyis brlab po/ /de ltar bsgrub pa'i dus su maN+Dal byas la/ me tog go
<p>71b.4</p>rims so sor dgram/ /mar me mchod pa so so'i grangs/ /zin nas ras kyi steng du gzhag /de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te/ /dang por thig gi las bya'o/ /sar pa tshad dang mtshan nyid ldan/ /dri zhim chu dang snod du gzhag /bdag nyid shar du 'dug nas ni/ /thig ni
<p>71b.5</p>ye shes lnga ru bskyed/ /phyogs bcu'i ye shes bkug nas bstim/ /oM a ra pa tsa na ma ti kra ma hUM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas oM AHhUM zhes pas sum sgril du bya'o/ /de nas slob mas blangs la dang po mkha' thig gdab bo/ /sa yi thig gdab slob dpon nub/ / 
<p>71b.6</p>slob ma shar 'dug tshangs thig gdab/ /slob ma lhor 'dug slob dpon byang / /slob dpon shar lho lho nub ste/ /de bzhin logs thig gdab par bya/ /zur thig de nas cha chen gdab/ /de nas cha chung bcu drug gdab/ /de nas phyi dang nang du dbye / /nang du bcu drug de bzhin dbye/ / 
<p>71b.7</p>phyi dang de bzhin cha yis dbye/ /cha rnams dbye ba sgo rgyan te/ /nang gi phyed cha pho brang ste/ /tshom bu lnga ldan pad 'dab bzhi/ /de ltar thig ni so sor gdab/ /ye shes skud pa mchod pa ni/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu/ /de nas rdul tshon dgye ba ni/ /rin chen
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>lnga yi phye ma'am/ /yang na 'bras kyi phye mas bri/ /kha dog so sor dgram nas ni/ /oM hUM swA aM hA go rims su/ /ma dag bshig nas dag pa bskyed/ /ye shes lnga ni spyan drangs bstims/ /oM a ra pa tsa na sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes lan bdun bzlas nas
<p>72a.2</p>ni/ de nas tshon rtsi rim bzhin du/ /dbus nas brtsams te bri bar bya/ /sgo ni shar nas dbye bar bya'o/ /dang po'i tshon la mchod pa ni/ /yid kyis mchod nas tshig 'di brjod/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag la/ /sems can yongs dag zhing 'dir bri/ /nyes pa'i dri
<p>72a.3</p>ma kun bral phyir/ /rdul tshon ye shes lnga yis bri/ /dang po dbus su pad+ma ni/ /sna tshogs shin tu ze 'bru dkar/ /shar gyi sna tshogs ze 'bru mthing / /lho yi sna tshogs ze 'bru ser/ /nub tu sna tshogs ze 'bru dmar/ /byang du sna tshogs ze 'bru ljang / /rdo rje'i gdung dang
<p>72a.4</p>'dra ba bskor/ /pad+ma nyi mas rab tu bskor/ /de ni nang gi pho brang ngo / /gru chad ljang la sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs la sogs bcas pa'o/ /de yi phyi rol cha chen gcig /rtsibs bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /shar mthing lho ser nub dmar po/ /byang ljang gru chad ljang gu ste/ / 
<p>72a.5</p>sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi ldan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor legs par rab tu bri/ /nam mkha' dang bsre thugs mtshan dgod/ /dbus su sa bon a bris nas/ /phyogs bzhi gzhan gyi don bzhin no/ /dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma rgya gram dang / /gtso bos phyed nas
<p>72a.6</p>mtshan ma so sor sbas/ /shar gyi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol dgod/ /lho yi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /rin chen nyi ma tog dang so phreng dgod/ /nub kyi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce dgod do/ /byang gi pad+ma 'dab ma
<p>72a.7</p>bzhi po la/ /rgya gram mche ba go cha khu tshur dgod/ /gru chad bzhi la nang gi lha mo ni/ /me long phreng ba pi wang chags shing dgod/ /de ni nang gi mtshan ma dgod pa'o/ /de nas phyi yi mtshan ma dgod pa ni/ /shar du gun+d+he ut+pal spos phor rgyal mtshan no/ /lho ni rin chen 'bar ba spos
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>phor pusti'o/ /nub tu pad+ma lcags kyu ral gri bri ba'o/ /byang du zla ba lcags kyu ral gri rin chen sgrom/ /phyi yi lha mo dgod pa ni/ /me tog mar me dri dang bshos/ /de dag go rims so sor ni/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu'o/ /lha rnams phyogs skyong
<p>72b.2</p>rnams kyang dgod/ /ye shes gnyis med bsres la dgod/ /de nas bla re ba dan sogs/ /bum pa mchod rdzas la sogs dgram/ /de nas rol mos bum pa ni/ /spyan drang bskor byas dgram par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid shar bltas te/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug
<p>72b.3</p>nas/ /bgegs rnams yongs su bskrad nas ni/ /rten la mchod dang sdig bshags dang / /byang chub tu bdag sems bskyed bya/ /stong nyid sngags kyis stong nyid bsgom/ /de nas hUM las rdo rje bsgom/ /khro zhal drug ldan bum par ni/ /bruM las chos sku nam mkhar ldan/ / 
<p>72b.4</p>gru gsum nam mkhar bruM bsams nas/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi tshom bu bzhi/ /thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /de nas tshom bu lnga la ni/ /seng ge glang chen rta dang ni/ /rma bya shang shang a las bskyed/ /pad+ma'i steng du rang sems a/ /de las rnam par snang mdzad
<p>72b.5</p>ni/ /zhi ba mdog dkar zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag rgya byang chub mchog gi sku'o/ /thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas so/ /shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ste/ /de steng ye shes sems dpa'o/ /phyag rgyas ral gri pusti ste/ /gzhan ni so so'i phyag mtshan no/ /mthing ka ser
<p>72b.6</p>po dmar dang ljang / /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las/ /sa gnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin skyabs sbyin te/ /de bzhin yum gyi mdog dang phyag mtshan so so'o/ /mthing ga ser po margad ljang gu ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol ni/ /so so'i phyag mtshan legs par bsnams
<p>72b.7</p>pa'o/ /sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs pa'o/ /gser mdog dmar dang ljang gu mthon ka'i mdog /rin chen nyi ma tog dang sor phreng bsnams/ /rin chen nyi ma tog dang bzhad pa'i dpal/ /so so'i rgyan ldan sku ni mdzes pa'o/ /dmar dang ljang gu mthing ga gser
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>bsregs mdog /ma chags sems gcod sems rgyud gsal bar smra/ /kha dog so sor gsal zhing ma 'dres 'dzin/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo lce rnams so/ /ljang gu mthing ga gser bsregs margad mdog /las dang gnod sbyin go cha khu tshur dang / /rgya gram
<p>73a.2</p>mche ba go cha khu tshur te/ /bzhugs tshul zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /sgeg dang rin chen phreng dang glu ma gar/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang gu dang / /me long phreng dang pi wang chags shing bsnams/ /pad steng rgyan ldan sgeg pas bzhugs pa'o/ /byams
<p>73a.3</p>pa 'jam dpal spos kyi glang po tog /dmar po ljang ser mthing ga dkar ba ste/ /gun+d+he ut+pal spos phor rin chen tog/ /so so'i phyag mtshan ma 'dres bsnams pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros mi zad bzang skyong spobs pa brtsegs/ /gser dang gser bsregs in+d+ra nI la
<p>73a.4</p>mthon ka chen po'i mdog /rin chen rin chen 'bar ba spos phor pusti bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng na bzhugs shing mdzes/ /mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren dang mya ngan dra ba can gyi 'od/ /dmar dang pad+ma rA ga dung mdog shin tu dkar dang ut+pal mdog /pad+ma
<p>73a.5</p>lcags kyu ral gri dra ba bsnams/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan 'dzin sku dang ldan/ /zla 'od gzhon nu thugs rje'i stobs dang nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha'i mdzod/ /zla ba lcags kyu dang ni ral gri 'bar ba rin chen sgrom ni g.yas g.yon 'dzin/ /dkar ser dkar dang ljang gu mthing
<p>73a.6</p>ka'i mdog /sku mdog shin tu gsal bas ma 'dres gsal/ /bdug pa me tog dri dang ro/ /mthing ka dkar dang dmar po ljang / /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /mthing ka ser dmar ljang gu'o/ /de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed nas/ /thugs kar mtshan ma rab tu
<p>73a.7</p>gsal/ /pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA ya du ta sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ta a/ yongs su dag pa'i ye shes so/ /zhing nas ma lus spyan drang ngo / /dkyil 'khor rim bzhin ye shes rim bzhin du spyan drang ngo / /s+thi to hr-i di dz+nyA na mUrtI ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ 
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>t+r+ya d+h+wa war+t+ti mAM zhes pas sku bzhi la phyag bya'o/ /de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bstim zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni/ oM hUM hrIHzhes pas so/ /da ni dbang bskur te gsol ba gdab pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ 
<p>73b.2</p>de ni slob dpon 'jug pa'o/ /de nas slob ma 'jug pa ni/ /ras kyis gdong ni bkab nas su/ /las kyi rdo rje lam bstan nas/ /shar sgor slob ma 'dug stangs ni/ /thal sbyor gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug /de nas gsol ba gdab bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ / 
<p>73b.3</p>slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dkyil 'khor gtso 'khor bcas la yang / /bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes brjod la maN+Dal dbul/ de nas slob dpon gyis gsol ba ni/ de bzhin
<p>73b.4</p>gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i grong mchog tu/ /bdag gis khyed ni gzhug par bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gong gi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byed du gzhug /de nas sdom pa'i cho ga sbyin pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
<p>73b.5</p>'dun gsum/ /gsum la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yid 'ong / /sdom pa rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /thabs ni rdo rje shes rab dril/ /thabs dang shes rab sdom pa gzung / /de ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchog /sdom pa de ni gzung bar bya/ /nyin re bzhin
<p>73b.6</p>nam dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa rtag tu gzung ba'o/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung / /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po ste/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba gzung / /sdom pa
<p>73b.7</p>thams cad ldan pa dang / /mchod sbyin las kyang ci nus bya/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa dag kyang gzung bar bya/ /da ni khyod kyis 'di gyis shig /las rnams su la smra mi bya/ /'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu/ /'di las 'das na brlag par 'gyur/ / 
<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>oM a mr-i ta hUM hUM hUM pany+tsa hri/ zhes pas lan gsum sbyin no/ /da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo slob dpon nus pa dang ldan pas slob ma nyid la bstims nas bsrung / phrin las rnam bzhi'i kha dog brtag /s+thi to hr-i di dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti a/ zhes pas byin gyis brlabs
<p>74a.2</p>de nas me tog dor byas nas/ /spyan ni legs par dbye bar bya/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po ltar/ /de bzhin du ni spyan dbye'o/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aHbstod pa bzhin spyan dbye'o/ /gdong g.yogs phud la 'di skad do/ /dkyil 'khor dam
<p>74a.3</p>pa 'di la ltos/ /da ni dang ba rab tu bskyed/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi ba dang / /dngos grub rnam gnyis 'di las 'byung / /de phyir 'di la nan tan gyis/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags bsgrub byos/ /zhes byas nas/ rang gi gu h+ya na ma dang / /yi dam lha rnams gsal bar
<p>74a.4</p>bstan/ /lha rnams phung po khams su bshad/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad/ /gru bzhi tshad med bzhi dang ni/ /sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi/ /rta babs yang dag spong ba bzhi/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa yang / /yang dag spong ba bzhi pa'o/ /ka ba brgyad ni 'phags
<p>74a.5</p>lam brgyad/ /tshom bu lnga ldan pha rol phyin/ /rdo rje'i gdung ni shes rab bo/ /'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /stong pa bcu drug phyi yang ngo / /de nas maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /yo byad rdzas kyis bla ma mchod/ /de rjes dbang ni rab bskur phyir/ /sgo lhor sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng / / 
<p>74a.6</p>slob ma blo ldan de steng gzhag/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas/ /las kyi khro bo'i sprul pa spro/ /bdud rtsi chu yis bsrung bar gtor/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM khaM/ oM kA la rU pa hUM hriH/ bar chod bgegs rnams bsal nas ni/ /dra ba gur gyis bsrung ba dang / /khro bo
<p>74a.7</p>drug gis bsrung ba la/ /rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /bum pa'i chu rnams thams cad kun/ /gtso bo'i bum par kun bsdus nas/ /bdag nyid lha yi skur gsal bas/ /slob ma byin brlab bya ba'i phyir/ /de nas bum pa blang nas ni/ /slob ma'i mgo la rab
<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>gtugs te/ /oM a b+he Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM duHkhats+tshe da hUM/ de nas dbu rgyan ni/ ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin
<p>74b.2</p>gyis/ /so so yang dag rab gsal phyir/ /bstims nas mchod cing bstod nas ni/ /mnyam nyid gzung 'dzin spang bas bskur/ /oM bA gI shwa ra trAM/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /ye shes lnga ldan log lta 'joms/ /stong nyid don ston rdo rje che/ /bu
<p>74b.3</p>khyod thugs la gnas par gyis/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na hrIH/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med don/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro don phyir/ /mchod cing bstims nas dbang bskur phyir/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya ha/ mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs
<p>74b.4</p>pa'i/ /shes rab ye shes gnyis med mtshan/ /pusti glegs bam mchod nas bstim/ /di ring bu khyod ming dbang bskur/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta pa ye oM/ ye shes lnga ldan drug rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog /spyod lam rgyun du phreng ba'i dbang / /di ring khyod
<p>74b.5</p>la bskur bar bya/ /oM a ra pa tsa na hUM/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcod pa dang / /shes bya ma rig bsal ba'i phyir/ /shes rab mtshon chen ral gri 'di/ /bu yis rtag tu gzung bar gyis/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ye/ badzra byAk+Sh+Na/ duHkhats+tshe da d+ha ra hUM/ lha rnams mchod
<p>74b.6</p>dang sems can mnyes/ /zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa rnams/ /las rnams thams cad khyod kyis gyis/ /bsam pa bzang pos de gyis shig /de nas da ni bdag gis ni/ /ri dwags rna ba bzhin du gos/ /gyon nas khyod la lung bstan gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>74b.7</p>'dus pa yi/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis thob bya'i phyir/ /'gro drug dug rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'gro drug thar pa'i lam 'di thob/ /sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya b+hur b+hu ba swaHhUM/ chos kyi dung de sgra chen ldan/ /chos kyi gaN+Di sgra bo che/ //phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga sgra sgrogs/ /chos
<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>kyis bskyab phyir gdugs phub bo/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+t+ta ye/ saM gI ti pa oM/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na gaN+Di hrIH/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya dun+du ha/ oM duHkhats+tshe da tsha tra~M` hUM/ oM bA gI shwa ra rat+ne trAM/ oM a ra pa tsa na dz+nyA nai ka tsak+Shu bi mA la hUM/ de ltar dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang / / 
<p>75a.2</p>mchod cing bstod la sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar rdzogs nas gtor ma gtang / /ye shes gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /swa ar+thany+tse wA pa ra ar+thany+tse wa/ sA d+hi taM gats+tsha mu pa da ye ti a/ /de ltar gshegs nas muHzhes brjod/ /dam tshig bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor
<p>75a.3</p>rdul tshon mtha' nas bsdu/ /rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ /dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya/ /de nas sa yi cho ga ni/ /blang dang brtag dang bsrung ba dang / /sbyin zhing byin brlab bsrung bar bya/ /de nas bum pa sta gon bya/ /gser dngul zangs la sogs pa yi/ /sa bon mtshan
<p>75a.4</p>ma so sor bri/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen blugs/ /'bras bu dri dang kha rgyan gdags/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-I da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga wAn nadz+nyA na mUr+t+ti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA wa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ lha rnams bum
<p>75a.5</p>par gsal bar bskyed/ /sa bon mtshan ma so sor bri/ /maN+Dal du ni go rims dgod/ /rnam rgyal bum pa rdzogs par ro/ /de nas go rims bzhin du gzhag/ /maN+Dal dri yi thig le bya/ /mchod pa la sogs gzhung bzhin dbul/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskyed
<p>75a.6</p>nas ni/ /ye shes spyan drang bstims nas ni/ /mchod dang rtsa ba'i bzlas pa bya/ /oM a ra pa tsa na hUM/ de nas mkha' la gdeg par bya/ /stan ni sbyang ba legs byas nas/ /khrus ni yongs dag rdzogs byas nas/ /yar gyi ngo yi zla ba dang / /snga dro dri med gtsang ma'i gos/ /gyon pa'i slob dpon
<p>75a.7</p>thig las bya/ /tshon gyi las kyang rdzogs byas nas/ /bskyed dang mchod dang bstod sogs byas/ /de nas rab tu gnas pa bya/ /thams cad sku gsum dag tu bskyed/ /de nas spyan ni drang bya ste/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin gnas na bzhugs pa la/ / 
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>chos dbyings gnas su gshegs pa ltar/ /'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'og min gnas na bzhugs pa las/ /bde ba can du gshegs pa ltar/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom
<p>75b.2</p>ldan 'das/ /dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la/ /sprul pa'i sku ru gshegs pa ltar/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /oM pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haH/ sarba d+harmA/ ya du ta/ oM pra kr-i ta ba ri shud+d+ha saM bo ta dza tu ta/ oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha ni mA na dza tu ta/ oM s+thi to
<p>75b.3</p>hr-I di dz+nyA na mUrti/ ra haM bud+d+hi bud+d+ha nAM/ t+r+yai d+h+wa warti mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya AHhUM/ zhes bya bas mchod nas de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pas bstim par bya'o/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho/ /badzra tsak+Shu badzra tsak+Shu badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ 
<p>75b.4</p>de nas a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-I da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ho/ /badzra d+hA tu/ duHkha ts+tshe da/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-I da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ rat+na d+hA tu bA gI shwa ra/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ a sarba ta thA ga ta dr-i da ya/ 
<p>75b.5</p>ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ pad+ma d+ha tu/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ karma d+hA tu/ dz+nyA na kA ya dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a ma la
<p>75b.6</p>su pa ri shud+d+ho/ d+harma d+hA tu/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ye/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ bum pa lngas dbang bskur te/ oM hr-IHkA la rU pa hUM/ zhes bya bas bgegs bskrad la phyag rgya ni lag pa mnyam par sbyar zhing bcings pa la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du gzhag rtse mo ltar byas
<p>75b.7</p>pa ni rdo rje ste sdug bsngal gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa mnyam par thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dang gung mo gnyis rtse mo so sor byas pa ni rin po che ste ngag gi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar nas phan tshun du bsnol ba la gung mo bsgrengs te tshigs
<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>bcag nas rtse sprad pa ni pad+ma ste rdo rje rnon po'i'o/ /lag pa thal mo mnyam par sbyar te gung mo gnyis nang du mnyam par sbyar te srin lag gnyis bsnol la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis phyir bskyed de/ mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar ba ni rdo rje rgya gram ste dz+nyA na kA
<p>76a.2</p>ya'i'o/ /lag pa rgyab sbyar nas sor mo bsnol te mthe bong mthil du sbyar ba ni 'khor lo ste pradz+nyA dz+nyA na'i phyag rgyas bum pa blangs la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas 'khor los dbang bskur ba ni/ oM badzra satwa dz+nyA na tsakra hUM/ de nas dung gis dbang bskur ba ni/ oM badzra shaM ka dz+nyA na satwa
<p>76a.3</p>hUM/ de nas gdugs kyis dbang bskur ba ni/ /oM badzra d+h+wa dza tsha tra~M` zhes pas so/ /de nas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin bya/ /gtor ma btang nas dkyil 'khor bsdu'o/ /bdag gis 'di byas dge bas ni/ /thams cad 'bras bu thob par shog /shar nas lho ru za hor yul du ni/ / 
<p>76a.4</p>zla dang 'od kyis gang ba'i skal ldan la/ /gnyis su med cing sbas pa'i don la mkhas/ /chos kyi dam pa de nyid dpal du byung / /chos kyi dam pa bzang po'i gdams ngag 'di/ /rin chen lta bur 'grel pa rnam gnyis thos/ /de bsgrubs dngos grub 'bras bu thob gyur nas/ /thams
<p>76a.5</p>cad bla med gnas su 'dren gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon gnyis su med pa sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang
<p>76a.6</p>pos bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu shrI tat+ta sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs
<p>76a.7</p>rgya mtsho'i 'ching gcod pa'i/ /sdug bsngal gcod la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lam gyi rim pa yang dag don/ /dran nas bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /re zhig yid 'ong gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /mchod cing bstod nas sdig bshags bya/ /tshad med bzhi
<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>ni rab tu bsgom/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes bsgom mo/ /dang por bdag nyid a bsgom ste/ /paM las pad+ma 'dab bzhi ni/ /chos 'byung rdo rje'i nang du bsgom/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i steng bsam mo/ /de las sdug bsngal gcod pa ni/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'gying bag
<p>76b.2</p>can/ /rdo rje ut+pal brtan pa'i sku/ /zla ba'i steng du a bsam mo/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni/ /a A aM aH/ tshad med bzhi ldan yum bzhi ni/ /'gying bag ut+pal bcas pa'i sku/ /rdo rje skyil krung mdun bdar nas/ /go rims bzhin du rab tu bsam/ / 
<p>76b.3</p>ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas/ /sku gsum byin brlab dbang bskur ro/ /de nas don dang rab ldan pas/ /mtshan rnams rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM duHkha ts+tshe da/ na ma ste ba ra da badzA gra/ b+hU ta ko Ti na ma stu te/ na ma ste shUn+ya tA gar+b+ha/ bud+d+ha bo d+hi na ma stu te hoH/ de nas
<p>76b.4</p>ldang bar 'dod na muHdang bcas pas gshegs su gsol la/ dam tshig gis ldang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ni/ /rin chen ut+pal gser gyi mdog /pad+ma 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng / /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng
<p>76b.5</p>du ni/ /a A aM aHyum bzhi'o/ /spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas/ /byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no/ /oM bA gI shwa ra bud+he rA ga na ma ste stu/ bud+d+ha kA ma na mo na maH/ bud+d+ha prI ti na ma stu b+h+yaM/ bud+d+ha tu b+h+yAM pu ta na maH/ zhes brjod nas/ muHzhes
<p>76b.6</p>gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i nang / /'dab bzhi dmar ba'i zla ba'i steng / /a las byung ba rnon po ni/ /mdog dmar pad+ma ut+pal bsnams/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng / /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni/ /a A aM
<p>76b.7</p>aHyum bzhi ni/ /'gying bag gtso la phyogs pa'o/ /spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas/ /byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no/ /oM badzra tAk+Sh+Na/ bud+d+ha mo da na mo na maH/ bud+d+hA smi ta na ma stu b+h+yaM/ bud+d+ha hA sa na mo na maH/ bud+d+ha bA tsa nA ma ste stu/ bud+d+ho b+hA ba na mo na maH/ 
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>zhes brjod nas muHzhes gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /shes rab rang bzhin stong pa'i nang / /snying rjes mtshon pa'i gdan bsams te/ /byang chub sems kyi sa bon te/ /shes rab ye shes a las bskyed/ /sku mdog
<p>77a.2</p>dkar po rab tu mdzes/ /'khor lo ut+pal yang dag ldan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bsam/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni/ /a A aM aHyum bzhi bsgom/ /pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haH/ sarba d+harmA ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU ba pU dza me
<p>77a.3</p>g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta ni bi t+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba
<p>77a.4</p>ta thA ga ta shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes mchod nas dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bstim mo/ /oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na murti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA wa tsa/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ zhes brjod
<p>77a.5</p>nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya'o/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ a b+ha bod+d+ha ba na ma stu ste/ na ma ste bud+d+ha saM b+ha ba/ ga ga nod+d+ha ba na ma stu b+h+yaM/ na ma ste dz+nyA na saM b+ha ba/ zhes bstod nas muHzhes brjod nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /shes rab kyis ni hUM las
<p>77a.6</p>bskyed/ /snying rje ma chags pad+ma'i gdan/ /byang chub sems las byung ba'i steng / /a ni rab tu gsal bar bya/ /ye shes sku ni ljang gu ste/ /rgya gram ut+pal bsnams pa yis/ /sems bskyed pa yi sa bon te/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /'dab bzhi zla
<p>77a.7</p>ba'i steng na ni/ /a A aM aHyum bzhi bskyed/ /ye shes gnyis med bstim byas nas/ /byin brlab dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang / /mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bya/ /de nas bstod pa 'dis bstod do/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya/ mA ya dzA la na ma stu b+h+yaM/ nA ma ste bud+d+hA nA Ta ka / 
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>na ma ste sarba sarbe b+h+yaM/ dz+nyA na kA ya na ma stu te/ oM AHhUM muH/ zhes spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /dri med ye shes las byung ba/ /dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /'gro rnams srid pa las grol nas/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs slob
<p>77b.2</p>dpon gnyis su med pa sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hi piN+Di ta/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor byas pa/ 'jam
<p>77b.3</p>dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang po sngags pa ni/ /rang lus 'jig kyang gzhan phan brtson/ /rnyed dang bkur sti ma chags sems/ /sems can don phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /dang por sa'i cho ga dang sta gon cho ga bya ste/ rang yid du 'ong ba'i sar thig
<p>77b.4</p>gdab ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thab khung rgyar khru gang zabs su de'i khru phyed pa kha khyer sor bzhi byi dor bya/ nang du pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan pa/ byug pa dang dri dang me tog dkar pos brgyan pa/ mtshams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / kha khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o/ /shin
<p>77b.5</p>tu sar pa'i ras kyis g.yogs par bya/ de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas dang / yam shing bud shing dang dgang gzar la sogs pa bshams te/ mchod rdzas g.yon du gzhag sreg rdzas g.yas su gzhag /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar mar ni mdun/ de nas bsod nams
<p>77b.6</p>tshogs bsags la/ /tshad med bzhi ldan sems bskyed bya'o/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ de nas bdag nyid lha ru bskyed/ /spyan drang byin brlab dbang bskur bya/ /ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal/ /de nas raM las me'i dkyil
<p>77b.7</p>'khor gru gsum 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /zhes pas de nas a las me lha ni/ /sku mdog dkar po tshangs pa'i gzugs/ /dbyug pa bgrang phreng 'dzin par bskyed/ /spyan drang mchod bstod byas nas bstim/ /bum pa'i chu yis
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>bgegs bskrad bya/ /de nas mar ni dgang blugs gsum/ /me lha nyid la dbul bar bya'o/ /me mtshan ngan na spogs pa bya/ /de nas mchod rdzas dbul bya zhing / /sreg rdzas phul nas bstod pa bya/ /nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/ /zhes
<p>78a.2</p>pa ni/ de nas thugs kar pho brang bca'/ bgegs bsal la sogs gong bzhin bya/ /sreg rdzas mchod rdzas thams cad dbul/ /gdags pa zhi ba shAn+tiM ngo / /sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /de nas bum pa'i chus
<p>78a.3</p>bsangs la /sreg rdzas mchod rdzas thams cad dbul/ /dgang blugs gnyis kyang dbul bar bya/ /de nas phrin las bcol bya zhing / /bstod pa'i rim pas gzhung bzhin bstod/ /rtsa sngags muHdang bcas pas gshegs/ /bdag gis dge ba 'di brtsams pas/ /dge ba
<p>78a.4</p>dri med gang thob des/ /bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/ /rje btsun 'jam dbyangs thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon mya ngan med pa'i dpal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+ya
<p>78a.5</p>di bud+d+ha nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma bar dang mthar sangs rgyas/ /srid pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag
<p>78a.6</p>pa'i sku/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la btud nas/ /snying po bsdus pa'i mtshan rgyud las/ /ye shes lnga yi sgrub thabs 'di/ /ma rig 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir/ /gsung gi sgrub thabs gsal phyir bri/ /gnas khang yid du 'ong bar ni/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /tshad med
<p>78a.7</p>bzhi po bsgom byas nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsakra a A aM aH/ de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /a hUM las byung rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po zhal drug ldan/ /me dpung 'bar ba dang
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>bcas pa/ /'jigs pa'i rdo rje bskyed par bya/ /dang po yi ni dbyangs yig las/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /ye shes mig gcig e yi nang / /nyon mongs dri med pad+ma'o/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig las byung ba'i/ /paM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng / /rdo rje skyil krung
<p>78b.2</p>rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje rnon po rang bzhin zhal/ /tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ /rnam dag shes rab ye shes zhal/ /smra ba'i skyes mchog dam pa yi/ / 
<p>78b.3</p>bcom ldan sdug bsngal gcod pa'i zhal/ /stobs dang ldan pa smra ba'i rgyal/ /gsung dbyangs rdo rje chos kyi zhal/ /smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /rdo rje zab mo sku yi zhal/ /smra ba'i seng ge nyon mongs sel/ /kha dog so sor mtshungs med zhal/ /kun du lta ba mchog tu
<p>78b.4</p>dga'/ /sku ni gzi brjid phung po yi/ /mtshan dang dpe byad blta na sdug /'od bzang rin chen 'bar ba yi/ /g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi pusti 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag bzhi yis/ /'dod dang bcas pa'i ral gri 'phyar/ /sman pa che mchog gzhon nu'i sku/ /ljon pa'i shing
<p>78b.5</p>dang bcas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung che ba/ /rtsibs bzhi mu khyud gsung yang yin/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na nub tu'o/ /duHkhats+tshe da shar du'o/ /pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye dbus su'o/ /bA gI shwa ra lho ru'o/ / 
<p>78b.6</p>dz+nyA na kA ya byang du ste/ /a ni dbus su dkar po'o/ /pa ni shar du mthing ga'o/ /tsa ni lho ru ser po'o/ /ra ni nub tu dmar po'o/ /na ni byang du ljang gu'o/ /gsal byed dang ni dbyangs yig ni/ /mu khyud bzhi la bsam pa ste/ /de ltar shes rab 'khor lo'o/ /sangs rgyas
<p>78b.7</p>kun gyi thugs che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /rdo rje nyi ma shes rab che/ /rdo rje zla ba thabs kyi bdag /chags dang chags bral yig 'bru mchog /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /oM pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haH/ sarba d+harmA ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ 
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>many+dzu shrI mu pa da ye ti a/ a A i I u U e ai o au aM aH/ s+thi to hr-i di dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM bud+d+ho naM/ t+r+ya d+h+wa brti naM/ oM badzra d+hU pe swA hA/ oM badzra puSh+pe swA hA/ oM badzra A lo ke swA hA/ oM badzra gan+d+he swA hA/ oM badzra nai bi t+ye swA hA/ o badzra shap+ta swA hA/ 
<p>79a.2</p>oM sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrti bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA wa tsa/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+h+wa tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aH/ de ltar bskyed nas bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas par
<p>79a.3</p>bya/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkha ts+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ bA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na ya te na maH/ da ni mtshan nas brjod pa ni/ sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par/ /chos
<p>79a.4</p>kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor/ /'gro dang 'dug pa spangs pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /de ltar bsgoms nas mtshan brjod do/ /gtor ma phul nas gshegs su gsol/ /bdag nyid spyod lam gnas par bya'o/ /mdo rgyud snying po'i don las ni/ / 
<p>79a.5</p>man ngag la brten gzhung 'di brtsams/ /de yis bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /'gro rnams 'jam dbyangs thob par shog /slob dpon chen po a wa d+hU tIs mdzad pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi
<p>79a.6</p>bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsi t+yo sA d+ha na bi d+hi paN+Di ta/ bod skad du/ mchod rten gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid dang bsdus rtog pa'i dri ma bral/ /rang bzhin yongs dag yon
<p>79a.7</p>tan ldan pa'i sku/ /thugs rjes sprul sku 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /sku gsum ye shes mchod pa'i rten la 'dud/ /de don 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /rgyud don la brten bdag gis brtsam/ /mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che/ /sa rnams kun gyi rgyan ldan bskyed/ /ces bya ba ni/ 
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>sa bslang zhing byin gyis brlab pa bstan nas/ kong bu byin gyis brlab cing gdab pa ni/ /shes rab chen po'i skad cig la/ /chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang / /zhes bya bas thabs shes rab gnyis su byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkha ts+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrti ye dz+nyA na kA ya
<p>79b.2</p>bA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na a/ zhes bya bas gdab bo/ /btab pa de ji ltar bsam zhe na/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/ /rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang / /brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /rdo rje rin
<p>79b.3</p>chen dbang bskur gnas/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu rim gro smon lam gdab/ /rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa/ 'bras bu chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid/ ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sku bum pa na 'od dang bcas pa sems can rgyud smin pa 'od 'phro ba bsam mo/ /dge ba dri
<p>79b.4</p>med gang thob des/ /'gro kun sku gsum thob par shog /a wa d+hU tIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems
<p>79b.5</p>dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /rigs gsum bdag po ye shes sku/ /rje btsun 'jam dpal phyag 'tshal te/ /de nyid rjes dran cho ga bshad/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lugs nyid kyis/ /gang zhig yang dag mngon dbang bskur/ /rjes
<p>79b.6</p>gnang thob pa'i sgrub pa po/ /deng 'dir yid la gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /gshin rje'i dgra'am zhal drug la/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos bsrung bar bya/ oM hrI kA la rU pa hUM kha hUM swA hA/ AHya mAn+ta ka hUM/ de nas gshin rje gshed po'i sngags/ /oM
<p>79b.7</p>AHhUM zhes bya ba 'dis/ mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yang bsgom/ /de nas chos kun dngos med par/ /rang gi blo yi rnam par bsgom/ /oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+haH/ sarba d+harmA ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>pa rA ya ti/ de nas thams cad stong pa las/ /paM las byung ba pad+ma las/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor a las byung / /de dbus yi ge a dkar las bskyed pa/ /rnam snang che mchog zhi ba sku mdog dkar/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mnyam par 'dzin/ / 
<p>80a.2</p>sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs bdag nyid bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar d+hIHlas byung ba yi/ /pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rnam par bsam par bya/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas de yi thugs kar yang / /shes rab 'khor lo
<p>80a.3</p>nyes kun sel ba bsgom/ /pad+mar gyur pa 'khor lo de dbus su/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom par bya/ /s+thi to hr-i di dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM/ bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ t+r+ya d+hAbarti nAM/ zhes bya ba dang / lte ba dang bcas mu khyud nang ma gnyis/ /de nas rtsibs rnams rim par ldan pa la/ / 
<p>80a.4</p>de nas yang ni phyi yi mu khyud gnyis/ /de la rtsa ba'i sngags sogs rim bzhin dgod/ /ye shes sems dpa' pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /de steng rdo rje skyil krung legs bzhugs pa/ /phyag gnyis ting 'dzin phyag rgya ut+pal mtshan/ /de steng shes rab pustis gnyis ka brgyan/ / 
<p>80a.5</p>nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ /cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog mthon ka chen po can/ /nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zhes bya'o/ /oM sarba d+harmaHa b+hA ba/ swa b+hA ba/ 
<p>80a.6</p>bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM aH/ nang gi mu khyud mchog la'o/ /a A i I u U e ai o au aM aH/ phyi rol ma la'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rtsibs drug la shar nas brtsams te sngags kyi rgyal po drug drug go/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga bAn/ 
<p>80a.7</p>dz+nyA na mUrti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA wa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ mu khyud phyi rol ma la'o/ /de'i phyi rol ka la sogs pa'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug pa la sogs pa'o/ /oM AHhUM/ de nas mngon par dbang bskur te mi bskyod pas ni dbu brgyan
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te slar bsdu bar bya'o/ /dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na lhag par rtogs pas chos thams cad la yang 'jam pa'i dpal du byed cing / 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
<p>80b.2</p>pas snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa' dang / mnyam par sbyor zhing sngags kyi tshig gi ming dag gdon no/ /oM AHhUM muH/ slar yang khro bo gnyis gang yang rung bas bsrung la langs te/ phyi rol tu a kA ro la sogs pas gtor ma sbyin no/ /'di ltar dus gsum du ste/ rnal
<p>80b.3</p>'byor gyi dus ma yin par ni 'jam pa'i dpal gyi sngags gang 'dod pa bzlas pa'am/ mchod rten bya zhing bskor ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a shwo
<p>80b.4</p>ka shrI dang / lo tsA ba 'a zha rgya gar brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// //badzra tIk+Sh+Na dmar/ duHkha ts+tshe da sngo/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye dkar/ dz+nyA na kA ya ljang / wA gI shwa ra ser/ a ra pa tsa na dkar/ i ti// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha
<p>80b.5</p>na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu khros shing gdug pa 'dul/ /ma lus log pa'i bdud 'dul ba/ /zhal dang phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /ma he'i zhal la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub
<p>80b.6</p>pa'i rim pa zhig /bdag gis dran nas brtsam par bya/ /dang por yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdag nyid khrus byas te stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ oM badzra b+hai ra wa dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ zhes pas lus bsrungs nas/ bla ma dkon mchog la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag
<p>80b.7</p>par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ zhes bya bas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /de nas bdag nyid yi ge ar gnas pa las de'i 'od zer kyis tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang / nyi zla'i steng du a zhu ba
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>ut+pal 'khor los mtshan pa de zhu ba las bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na ut+pal 'dzin pa/ gzhon nu'i cha lugs la rgyan gyis brgyan par bsam mo/ /de'i thugs ka na nyi ma la hUM gnas pa can du
<p>81a.2</p>bsams te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par byung bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /tshur hUM la thim pas/ zhe sdang gi skur gyur pa ni/ zhal drug phyag rnam pa drug dang ldan pa/ stobs che ba/ ma he'i zhal can/ sku mdog mthing nag /mi mgo brgya'i do
<p>81a.3</p>shal can/ zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon gyi dang po keng rus kyi dbyug pa dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi bar pa na mda' gzhu dang ral gri/ tha ma na sna tshogs rdo rje dang mdung bsnams pa'o/ /de las tshad med pa bzhi'i khro bo 'phro ba can no/ / 
<p>81a.4</p>zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa bsgoms/ de'i thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du hUM bsams la/ spyan drangs pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang gsang sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-IHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM/ zhes pa'am/ oM duHkha ts+tshe da hUM hUM/ zhes pa bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan
<p>81a.5</p>kyi sgo nas bstod do/ /gtor ma btang nas gshegs su gsol te ldang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis dge ba 'di byas pas/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon a shwa ka shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba
<p>81a.6</p>chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri kA la sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /log pa'i lta ba gcod mdzad cing / /shes rab
<p>81a.7</p>snying rjes rab tu khros/ /mche ba gtsigs shing bzhad mdzad pa/ /gshin rje'i dgra la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas/ /bdag gis sgrub pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /sgrub la phan phyir brtsam par bya/ /dben zhing me tog gcal
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>bkram pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /lha dang dkon mchog spyan drangs nas/ /mchod dang sdig bshags la sogs bya/ /a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /nam mkhar a ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje me dpung rab
<p>81b.2</p>tu 'phros/ /rdo rje'i steng du a bsams te/ /gyur pas shes rab ye shes ni/ /mdog dkar 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin/ /nyi steng hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /gyur pas gshin rje gshed po ni/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po ste/ /lus ni rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /phyag na rdo rje
<p>81b.3</p>be con dang / /shugs dang bcas pa'i sbrul zhags bsnams/ /tshad med bzhi ldan khro bo ni/ /shin tu khros pa rnam par bsgom/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgyes pa bskyed nas/ oM swa hUM/ gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs
<p>81b.4</p>nas dbang bskur bya'o/ /de nas bsgoms pas skyo na bzlas pa bya ste/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ zhes brjod nas/ mtshan brjod de gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /de ltar bstod nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /bdag gis 'gro la phan phyir brtsams/ /dge bas 'bras
<p>81b.5</p>bu tshad med shog /gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon a shwa ka shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/'phags pa
<p>81b.6</p>mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje rnon po la phyag 'tshal lo /gsung sgra zab mo'i sgra sgrogs shing / /'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/ /mtshan gyi don la rab brten te/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs rab tu bshad/ /me tog khang pa mdzes par ni/ /bde ba'i stan la
<p>81b.7</p>nyer 'dug ste/ /rang gi snying ga'i a las ni/ /dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs te/ /phyag 'tshal mchod la sogs pa bya/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ de nas a las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje rnon por rab bskyed de/ / 
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>mdog dmar pad+ma ral gri bsnams/ /glang chen steng du rab tu bsam/ /nyi steng ral gri'i 'phro 'du las/ /mi g.yo bar ni rab tu gyur/ /ral pa gcig bsdus 'gying bag can/ /sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs byed che/ /glang chen ko ba rlon pas
<p>82a.2</p>brgyan/ /shugs dang bcas pa'i klu yis brgyan/ /zhags pa ral gri phyag na bsnams/ /ha ha hi hi rdo rje'i sgra/ /me yi phung po rab 'phro bas/ /tshad med bzhi ldan bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma a yi sa bon las/ /bde gshegs spyan drangs rab tu mchod/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis
<p>82a.3</p>rgyas btab nas/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs la sogs bya/ /de nas skyo na bzlas bya ste/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na a tsa la d+hIH/ de nas gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /oM badzra muH/ spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /dri med ye shes las byung 'di/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs las byung ba/ / 
<p>82a.4</p>dge ba zla ltar gsal ba gang / /de yis sku gsum thob par shog /mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon a sho ka shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba li bi
<p>82a.5</p>d+hiH/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang / /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas 'dra ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /sems can kun don byed la 'dud/ /gtor ma'i rim pa bshad par
<p>82a.6</p>bya/ /dang por lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du kha zas kyi 'byor pa dri dang kha dog dang ldan pa sna tshogs bcug la/ gtor ma'i nang du yi ge a las yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'bar ba zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsams la/ de las bdud
<p>82a.7</p>rtsi'i chu rgyun dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rnam par spras pas snod dang bcud chos kyi dbyings khyab par bsam zhing bsgom pa ni/ yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang / /khyab dag rin chen kun gyi mchog /ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i d+hIHlas/ /dpag bsam shing chen
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>rgyas pa ste/ bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /ces bya ba ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/ bum pa bdud rtsis gang ba'i 'bras bu smin pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'dzag pas gtor ma'i rgyun rgyas par bsam mo/ /thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud
<p>82b.2</p>rtsi dbab ste gnyis su med par bsam mo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrti bA gI shwa ra ma hA wa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ oM AHhUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes/ / 
<p>82b.3</p>'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig /ces bya ba ni/ de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa dang / khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad bkug ste/ de dag thams cad snying gar yi ge a bkod pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam
<p>82b.4</p>par sbyangs te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal du bsam mo/ /gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ dngos sam yid kyis lus dpag tu med par sprul la mchod do/ /nam
<p>82b.5</p>mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod cing / /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ der ljags kyi 'od zer kyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun la zhugs te/ kun gyi yid tshim par dmigs shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis tshim par bya'o/ /de nas/ chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po
<p>82b.6</p>ste/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /zhes bya ba'i phreng ba'i sngags dang / a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta/ oM AHhUM/ zhes pa dang tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pas chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /shes rab kyis ni de
<p>82b.7</p>thob shog /byang chub chen por bsngo zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdab/ /oM AHhUM muH/ zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ pha rol phyin dang rgyud rnams ma lus dang / /bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis/ /kun gyi bdag nyid khyab par thugs la gnas/ / 
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>ye shes lus can mtshan don rgya che ba/ /sna tshogs tshul las bstod kyis di ring bdag gis 'dir/ /dam pa'i gdams ngag nyer bstan rnal 'byor lam du sbyar/ /'di la dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /bdag sogs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'
<p>83a.2</p>'drar gyur cig /'jam dpal mgon po'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI tsar+ya marga bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyod lam gyi cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal
<p>83a.3</p>lo/ /zab pa'i don ldan bde gshegs chos nyid sku/ /thugs rje rang 'byung ye shes sku lnga'i bdag /gnyis med don ldan spros med bdag nyid can/ /rje btsun 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba la brten nas/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ / 
<p>83a.4</p>gdams ngag bsgrub pa'i rim pa cig /legs par btus te bshad par bya/ /lam kyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig go/ /rigs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dbang thob dam tshig ldan par bya/ /de nyid 'dod pa'i gnas btsal
<p>83a.5</p>nas/ /de mdun maN+Dal legs par bya/ /bla ma dkon mchog yi dam lha/ /cho ga shes rab me tog bkram/ /b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang bskyed do/ /gshin rje gshed dam rdo rje gur/ /me ri la sogs bsrung ba bya/ /bar chad zhi byed gtor ma dang / /dang por khrus byas
<p>83a.6</p>gos rgyan gdags/ /stan bde ba la 'dug byas te/ /tshad med bzhi la sogs pa bya/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM aH/ zhes pas so/ /d+hIHlas dang po bdag nyid bskyed/ /dgug pa la sogs gsang sngags ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa dang / 
<p>83a.7</p>byin brlabs dbang bskur mi bskyod pa'o/ /de ni bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /khrus ni dang po bum pa stong / /stong pa nyid las a de bskyed/ /nang du bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis dgang / /ye shes bdud rtsi dbab cing bstim/ /dang por sgo lnga'i rnam shes bkru/ /ye shes sems
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>dpa' bcom ldan 'das/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /bag chags dri ma dag gyur cig /de ni khrus kyi cho ga'o/ /bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/ /sa bon yig 'bru'i
<p>83b.2</p>rnam pa dang / /d+hIHbadzra tIk+Sh+Na/ duHkhats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na d+hIH/ ye shes sems dpa' zla ba'i gdan bcas thugs kar ro/ /phyag mtshan ral gri'i yu ba d+hIH'i yig 'bru dang bcas pa'o/ /bzlas pa'i'o/ /gtor ma a las
<p>83b.3</p>rin chen 'bru lnga bcud/ /as bskyed yid bzhin nor bu can/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dpag bsam las/ /mgron ni 'jam dpal rang bzhin no/ /zas ni mi dmigs stong pa las/ /paM las pad+ma a las nor bu'o/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dgug bstim mo/ /de nas rang nyid
<p>83b.4</p>lhar gsal bas/ /thugs ka'i lha mchod mnyes par bsgom/ /de nas zas kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /dang por byams dang snying rje dang / /ldan pas lus ngag byin brlab po/ /de nas spyan drang phyag bstod bya/ /mchod cing sdig bshags rjes yi rang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
<p>83b.5</p>bskul dang / /mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab/ /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs bya'o/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /de nas a las chos 'byung ni/ /dkar po gru gsum 'bar ldan pa/ /de nas pad+ma zla steng du/ /d+hIHlas dang po'i sangs rgyas bskyed/ /dgug
<p>83b.6</p>dang dbab sogs rdzogs pa dang / /bstod pa'i tshul du gdon pa'o/ /nyal dang 'gro ba 'dug pa dang / /gzhan yang bskor ba bya ba ni/ /mya ngan 'das par bzhugs pa dang / /de nas thon pa lta bu dang / /pha rol phyin pa drug bden bzhi/ /sAts+tsha 'debs dang klog dang bshad/ / 
<p>83b.7</p>kha dog dri dang spyod dus su/ /'jam dpal sku dang 'bral mi bya/ /sgyu ma lta bus gnas par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal can dag mthong gyur na/ /byams sems ldan pas dge ba bsngo/ /rnal 'byor mi gtsang 'dor ba kun/ /bdud rtsir byin brlab gnyis med bstim/ /'byung po yi
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>dwags kun la sbyin/ /tshim par byas la gshegs su gsol/ /dpe med gcig cig mthong ba la/ /bde dang sdug bsngal du mar snang / /sems kyi rnam 'gyur brtan pa yin/ /zhes spyod lam gyi rim pa'o/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ /mtshan ma
<p>84a.2</p>dang bcas mtshan med pa'o/ /mtshan ma sku dang yig 'bru dang / /phyag mtshan la ni dmigs pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa bstan pa ni/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu ste/ /zhes pa ni/ shes rab 'khor lo thabs dang shes rab gnyis med la dmigs pa'o/ /yang na/ sangs
<p>84a.3</p>rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang / /zhes pas tshogs bsags pa'o/ /rnam par gnon zhes pa ni bsod nams kyis bsod nams ma yin gnon/ ye shes te nam mkha' dang 'dra bas mkha' ltar mtha' med do/ /gsum rig ste sku'i bskyed pa'o/ /'bras bu mngon par shes pa lnga phra
<p>84a.4</p>man bcu drug go/ /gnas pa rtsa/ /g.yo ba rlung / bgrod pa byang chub ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /zhes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes pa'o/ /de yang mtha' yang dag par stong pa ste/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'/ /de las de nyid de
<p>84a.5</p>chos sku'o/ /gzhan rig pa ste/ longs sku dang sprul sku'o/ /dpe byad ces pa dang / gtso bo zhes pa gnyis kyi don to/ /de ni bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /bla ma'i gdams ngag rgyud 'grel la brten nas/ /dri ma med pa'i dge ba gang brtsams pa/ /des ni dge
<p>84a.6</p>ba gang thob des/ /'gro kun 'jam dbyangs thob par shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a sho ka shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong chos kyi bzang pos dro mo d+ha ra dang nye ba'i rtsar zhus te bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ 
<p>84a.7</p>badzra many+dzu shrI g+ha tra bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal rdo rje'i bum pa'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags zhing / /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag phyir/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /bum pa'i
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>cho ga bshad par bya/ /dang por mtshan nyid ldan gnas su/ /sa slong sbyong zhing maN+Dal bya/ /thig gdab tshon ni byin gyis brlab/ /tshom bu lnga ldan 'khor lo bcu drug ldan/ /gru chad bzhi ldan sgo bzhi rta babs ldan/ /'khor lo bcu drug gru chad bzhi dang ldan/ /pany+tsa rat+na
<p>84b.2</p>'dod yon snam bu dang / /rin chen pha gu sgo bzhi rta babs bri/ /rin chen bdun las byas pa'i mchod pa'i rten/ /gdugs dang ba dan cod pan dril bus brgyan/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags las byas/ /bum pa kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru
<p>84b.3</p>sna lnga dang ni/ /sman lnga dri lnga dkar la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /bdud rtsi'i chus bkang kha rgyan 'bras bu can/ /mgul chings gzungs thag bum pa'i rigs dang sbyar/ /so so'i lha yi gdan du gnyis po dgod/ /dang por bla ma dkon mchog spyan drang ste/ /phyag
<p>84b.4</p>mchod sdig bshags yi rang bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan mi 'da' lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo/ /tshad med bzhi ldan byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /stong pa'i ting 'dzin sngags kyis kun nas bskul/ /de nas gur dang dra ba'i steng du ni/ /hUM las rdo rje bruM las mchod rten ni/ /d+hI
<p>84b.5</p>las chos 'byung a las rdo rje'o/ /de steng b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang pa'o/ /gdan lnga zla ba'i gdan ni so sor gsal/ /yi ge a las rnal 'byor rnam gsum bsgom/ /dam tshig 'khor lo a las sku bskyed do/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug cing bstim par bya/ /sku
<p>84b.6</p>gsum byin brlabs dbang bskur nyid kyis mtshan/ /thabs dang shes rab bum pa rab tu don/ /thabs dang shes rab 'od zer bdud rtsi dbab/ /mchod rten rnams ni lha yi rang bzhin gsal/ /so so'i thabs dang shes rab ma lus ldan/ /thugs ka'i a las rgyud ni gdon par
<p>84b.7</p>bya/ /de las dad pa'i sangs rgyas 'dud bstod bya/ /de yi thugs 'od mchod pa rnam lngas mchod/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang / /brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>ldan/ /ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang / /nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /las kyi khams rnams zad byed cing / /chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal/ /nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs/ /bag chags bcas pa gtan tu spangs/ /zhes
<p>85a.2</p>so/ /lung dang man ngag la brten nas/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra'i phan gdags cho ga brtsams/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba dri med gang thob pa/ /des ni 'jam dpal rdo rje thob par shog/ /dpal 'jam dpal mgon po'i bum pa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po mya ngan med pa'i
<p>85a.3</p>dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal u rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po d+harma shrI mi tra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bod kyi shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na
<p>85a.4</p>satwa sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /ma lus bde gshegs kun gyis mtshan gyur pa/ /rdo rje 'chang chen kun gyi rdo rje'i glu/ / 
<p>85a.5</p>zab cing rgya che byang chub sems dpa' nyon/ /byang chub sems bskyed lhag pa'i sku ru bsgom/ /sgyu ma rten 'brel rnam gsum sbyor ba la/ /ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab 'khor lo bsgom/ /ma skyes mi 'gag rnam gsum sgyu ma ni/ /shes rab mig gis gsal bar blta bar bya/ /sgyu
<p>85a.6</p>ma brag ca nam mkha' las byung bzhin/ /yongs su shes nas ma zhen sems kyis bklag /rnal 'byor lam chen gsang sngags 'di yin te/ /ji ltar dngos rnams mkha' la gnas pa bzhin/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che la gnas/ /don ni mi shes dka' ba'i las
<p>85a.7</p>gzhan gyis/ /'khor ba'i grong gsum dag las de mi g.yo/ /de lta'i don shes rang bzhin nyes pa spangs/ /spos kyi glang pos ke te dug zos bzhin/ /nyes pa'i tshogs bcom gzhung tshogs yon tan ldan/ /'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /thugs kyi
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>gsang mdzod gtsug gi rin po che/ /rang bzhin 'gro kun chos rnams ma lus bcad/ /rgyud don dbang po rdo rje'i tshig tu gnas/ /mkha' 'gro'i rjes 'brangs nye bar bsdus pa yin/ /slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa'o// // 
<p>85b.2</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sgrub pa pos sngar langs te/ kha la sogs pa dag par byas la/ bsam gtan gyi khang par rab
<p>85b.3</p>tu zhugs te/ bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas nas/ snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba la dmar zhing dkar ba'i muM bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'od zer gyi tshogs lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyis bkug pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'od 'byung ba'i mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan dang gdan dang nye bar
<p>85b.4</p>ldan pa mdun du rnam par bsgom ste/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya zhing / byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon du
<p>85b.5</p>byas te/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' la hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i 'od zer gyis ji lta ba'i sbyor bas/ rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur dang
<p>85b.6</p>sa 'og kun rdo rje'i sa gzhir dmigs la/ rdo rje yang 'od zer du kun nas rdo rje'i ra ba las phyi rol du phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar gnas par blta'o/ /de'i rjes su rdo rje'i nang du hrIHdmar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'o/ /pad+ma'i steng du a las zla ba'i
<p>85b.7</p>dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du dmar zhing dkar ba'i muM las sangs rgyas mang po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par bsgoms la/ de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dmar zhing dkar ba pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po dmar po
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>g.yas sngon po g.yon dkar po zhes bya ba'i zhal gsum pa bsgom par bya'o/ /phyag bzhi ji lta ba'i sbyor bas shes rab kyi pusti dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang
