<p>106b.7</p>phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing / mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma a ba bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dang por gar bskor byas nas ni/ /de nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems
<p>107a.2</p>dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa na sa pa ri t+yaM ga a nut+ta ra ma hA bIr+ya pA ri mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ 
<p>107a.3</p>dang por gar bskor bya ba dang / /me tog phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur cig /bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
<p>107a.4</p>dang / rig pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA sau khya bi ha ra d+ha na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ shes rab pha rol phyin 'gro ba'i/ /bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sems can thams cad
<p>107a.5</p>'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang ye shes rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste/ bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan la gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang / de kho na nyid mthong
<p>107a.6</p>ste/ nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kle sha ts+tshe da sarba d+harmA sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pra dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ / 
<p>107a.7</p>bza' dang bca' sogs dad pa yis/ /phyi rol ji lta ba bzhin gzhag /dpag tu med par dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug gsang sngags ni/ /bzlas pa dag kyang legs par bya/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas/ /mtshan brjod pa dang dkyil 'khor bstod/ / 
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>'bad pa yis ni smon lam dag /de nyid rig pas 'don par bya/ /yo byad thams cad 'byor pa yis/ /yongs su gang ba'i gtor ma sbyin/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pa n+na twA ta swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis so/ /gal te go skabs yod gyur na/ / 
<p>107b.2</p>phyogs bcur snod rnams bsam pa la/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni/ /bcing ba bla na med pa'o/ /khur ba 'bras chan 'bras yos dang / /til rnams kyi ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha'

<p>108a.1</p>dang / /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus dbul ba/ /'di dag bzhes nas btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /

<p>108b.4</p>ba/ /thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs spros pa yin/ /de ltar gcig mchod 'khor lo ma lus pa/ /mchod rgyas 'di nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yin/ /shi bar gyur kyang bla yi dad med par/ /mchod bral skad cig ma yin sdig thob 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'di dag rnam bsams

<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>pa dang / /taM gyis baM la mngon phyogs byed/ /byang du rta mchog sku mdog ljang / /nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs/ /a byung sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /dril bu'i sgra yis phyogs kun khyab/ /saM gaM baM saM g+haM sa bon rnams/ /oM hUM trAMhrIHldan pa las/ /gdan

<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>chags pa pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /mda' dang gzhu ni bsnams pa yin/ /rdo rje legs pa sku mdog ljang / /phyag gnyis legs so sbyin pa'o/ /rin chen btso ma gser gyi mdog /rin po che dang dril bu bsnams/ /rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma'i mdog / 
<p>112a.2</p>g.yas pa nyi ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje dpal ni margad mdog /g.yas na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa yin/ /bzhad pa kun+da zla ba'i mdog /g.yas pa so yi phreng ba bsnams/ /'di gsum pa yi g.yon pa ni/ /skyil krung gdan la brten nas so/ /chos
<p>112a.3</p>ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /g.yon pa pad+ma dmar po bsnams/ /g.yas pas rnam par 'byed pa yin/ /de ni rgyas par byed pa yin/ /rnon po bdud rtsi 'od zer mdog /ral gri dang ni pusti bsnams/ /rgyu dang smra ba g.yas pa na/ /'khor lo dang ni lce bsnams pa/ / 
<p>112a.4</p>bdag nyid mdzes pa g.yon pa yi/ /phyag gi pad+ma gdan la brten/ /las ni sngo ljang sna tshogs pa'i/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsnams/ /bsrung ba gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag gnyis go cha 'bar ba'o/ /gnod sbyin mig sman nag po'i mdog /phyag gnyis mche
<p>112a.5</p>ba rnam par mdzes/ /khu tshur rmad byung mdzes pa'i mdog /phan tshun khu tshur rdo rje 'dzin/ /bdag po rnam pa bzhi yi phyir/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni dran par bya/ /lha mo bcu bcu 'di rnams kyi/ /'khor du yang dag dran par bya/ /skyil krung phyed mar ldan pa yi/ /rang rang
<p>112a.6</p>bdag po'i mdog bzhin no/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan de bzhin shes rab dang / /smon lam ye shes zhes bya ba/ /'bras bu'i gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /mdog dkar rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /'khor
<p>112a.7</p>du de dag gnas pa yin/ /de nyid lam gyi ngo bor ni/ /bdud la lcags kyu 'debs pa gzhan/ /ser po rdo rje rgyal po yi/ /'khor du de dag gnas pa yin/ /de nyid rnam par dag ngo bor/ /mda' dang gzhu yis rnam brgyan pa/ /mdog dmar rdo rje chags pa ni/ / 
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>thams cad dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor/ /gzhan don ngo bor gnas de nyid/ /phyag gnyis legs so sbyin pa dang / /sku mdog ljang khu'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /rdo rje legs pa bskor ba'o/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /gsum pa de bzhin 'od byed dang / / 
<p>112b.2</p>'od 'phro sbyang dka' de bzhin du/ /mngon gyur ring song mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sku mdog ser po 'bras bdag nyid/ /dar dpyangs bcing ba'i tshul gnas pa/ /rdo rje rin chen 'khor du gnas/ /de nyid lam gyi grangs kyis
<p>112b.3</p>ni/ /nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma bsnams/ /rdo rje nyi ma nyid bzhin du/ /rjes su byed par gnas pa yin/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang / /'gog dang lam dang de bzhin du/ /chos shes rjes su shes pa dang / /kun rdzob shes dang de bzhin du/ /don dam
<p>112b.4</p>de bzhin mi skye ba/ /zad pa shes pa'i ye shes ni/ /rang bzhin phun sum tshogs dge ba'i/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan bsnams pa dang / /mdog ljang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa bsgom par bya/ /gzhan don phun sum bdag nyid kyi/ /de bzhin zla
<p>112b.5</p>ba'i 'od zer mdog /rdo rje bzhad pa la brten pa/ /so yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /bden pa rten 'brel thub pa yi/ /gnas dang gnas min bdag po dang / /dus gsum bden pa rnam pa bzhi/ /'dus byas 'dus ma
<p>112b.6</p>byas dge ba/ /rdo rje chos kyi 'khor du bsgom/ /don dang phyag g.yon pad+ma ni/ /bsnams nas g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad/ /gcig dang rgyu dang za ba dang / /byed pa dang ni dbang sgyur dang / /bdag po'i don dang brtag pa dang / /nyon mongs pa dang dag pa'i
<p>112b.7</p>gnas/ /rnal 'byor can dang ma grol grol/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa skye ba nyid/ /de dag gcod pa'i sku mdog gnag /phyag na pu sti bsnams pa dang / /nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje rnon po'i 'khor du brjod/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>bsam gtan/ /shes rab de bzhin sha yi spyan/ /lha dang shes rab chos dang ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang dbang po yi/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sku mdog ser/ /lha mo 'khor lo bsnams pas bskor/ /gnas dang gnas min rnam smin dang / /mos
<p>113a.2</p>pa dang ni sna tshogs khams/ /dbang po kun 'gro'i lam dag dang / /nyon mongs rnam par sbyang ba dang / /sngon gnas rjes dran skye 'chi dang / /zag pa zad pa nyid kyang de/ /rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog /phyag gis lce bsnams 'khor gyis bskor/ /nam mkha'
<p>113a.3</p>rnam shes mtha' yas dang / /de las gzhan pa'i zil gnon brgyad/ /rdo rje las ni sku mdog ljang / /sna tshogs rdor dril thogs pas bskor/ /'byung ba rnam pa bzhi po dang / /sngon po ser po dkar dmar dang / /nam mkha' de bzhin sems dang ni/ /zad par
<p>113a.4</p>rnam dag ldan pa yi/ /bsrung ba ser po go cha bsnams/ /rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid de kho na/ /phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid dang / /'bras bu rgyu yi de kho na/ /phra ba dang ni rags pa dang / /grags dang rnam par dag yul dang / /sdud dang dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / /mkhas
<p>113a.5</p>de kho na rnam bcu ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag /phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams pa'o/ /tshe dang sems dang yo byad dang / /las dang skye ba mos pa dang / /smon lam dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang / /ye shes la ni dbang ba dang / /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar/ /phyag gnyis
<p>113a.6</p>khu tshur bsnams pa'o/ /so so'i gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskyed/ /rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dang / /rdo rje'i skyil krung phyed kyis ni/ /'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin/ /'di ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /ji skad
<p>113a.7</p>gsungs pa bzhin du thob/ /dngos grub gzhan ni smos ci dgos/ /'di rnams kyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /mkhas pas sgeg mo la sogs bsgom/ /sgeg mo mdog dkar rdo rje bsnams/ /phreng ba ma ni gser gyi mdog /rin chen phreng ba bsnams pa yin/ /glu ma sku mdog
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>dmar mo ste/ /pi wang rdeb pa'i mchog yin no/ /gar ma rdo rje ljang gu ni/ /rtse gcig bsnams nas gar mdzad do/ /spos dang me tog mar me dri/ /de rnams rjes la dran par bgyi/ /spos khang me tog snod dang ni/ /mar me yi ni mchod sdong dang / /dri yi
<p>113b.2</p>dung chos rim bzhin no/ /'di rnams kha dog sgeg sogs bzhin/ /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu zhes grags pa/ /dkar po ser po dmar po ljang / /shar la sogs pa'i sgo la bstan/ /ming dang mthun par phyag mtshan gnas/ / 
<p>113b.3</p>phyi rol bskal pa bzang po ni/ /shar la sogs par bsgom par bya/ /rnam pa bzhi yi dbye ba yi/ /de dag bcu drug yang dag dgod/ /rang gi bdag po'i rjes mthun par/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan mdzes pa yin/ /yang na gzhan du phyag mtshan rnams/ /rim pa
<p>113b.4</p>bzhin du bsam par bya/ /de la mgon po byams pa ni/ /phyag na klu shing bsnams pa yin/ /'jam dpal ral gri pu sti dang / /ji ltar rim bzhin mtshan pa yin/ /spos kyi glang po spos chu yi/ /dri yi dung chos char 'bebs pa'i/ /thod dang bcas pa'i cod pan
<p>113b.5</p>ni/ /ye shes tog ni bsgrings nas bsnams/ /bzang skyod ba ni nam mkha' mdzod/ /bslang nas mtshan par byed pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho yid bzhin nor/ /phyag gi pad+ma mdzes pa yin/ /dpag bsam shing dang bum pa bzang / /blo gros mi zad phyag g.yon na/ /pu sti
<p>113b.6</p>mtshan pa'i pad+ma ni/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin du/ /phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yin/ /mthu chen thob pa ral gri bsnams/ /ngan song kun 'dren rgyal mtshan no/ /mya ngan mun pa nges 'joms ni/ /dpal be'u g.yung drung 'khyil pa ni/ /dra ba can gyi 'od
<p>113b.7</p>rnams so/ /zla 'od gzhon nu zhes bya ba/ /zla tshes g.yer ka rgyal mtshan mdzes/ /'od dpag med pa pu sti dang / /ral gri rin chen mdzod 'dzin pa/ /nam mkha'i snying por shes par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri ni/ /bsnams pa sgrib pa rnam par sel/ /byang
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>chub sems dpa' zhes 'dod do/ /'di rnams phyi yi sgo skyong dag /sngar ni ji skad smos pa bzhin/ /de ltar bsgoms pa'i rjes la ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas/ /de nyid gsum gyi yi ge yi/ /rnal 'byor rig pas byin brlab
<p>114a.2</p>bya/ /de la rim pa 'di yin te/ /spyan drang sngon 'gro phyag 'tshal te/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa da ban+da na ka ro mi/ /e ma kun du bzang po yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>114a.3</p>mdzes/ /de nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhugs nas/ /byung nas rang rang rigs pa ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad pa yin/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med/ /rdul phran thams cad ji snyed kyi/ / 
<p>114a.4</p>sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gyur/ /de nyid gsum gyi byin rlabs dang / /'khor lo'i bdag nyid dbang bskur nas/ /rang bzhin dag par bsgom par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM/ /de ltar ting 'dzin gsum dang ni/ /mkhas pas cho
<p>114a.5</p>ga byas nas ni/ /de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod pa yang dag brtsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ldan g.yo bas/ /a r+g+ha'i snod ni bzang ba dang / /g.yas pa ba dan gsum dang ni/ /de nyid gsum gyis bsam par bya/ /de nas mkhas pas me tog
<p>114a.6</p>gsol/ /de yi chu yis bsang bar bya/ /oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM/ soM badzra a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan na twAta oM AHhUM/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje ldan pa yi/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba dang / /se gol brdabs la
<p>114a.7</p>dgug pa dang / /phyag byas nas ni ar+g+ha dbul/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badzra pA a ahUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badzra A be sha AH/ zhus nas yi ge gsum gyis ni/ /byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sngar bshad rim pa yis/ /mchod pa rnams
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>kyis mchod pa dang / /de las gzhan pa'i rig ma ni/ /bcu drug gis ni mchod bstod bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum phyag mtshan dang / /ji srid thig le'i rim pa dang / /snang ba la sogs rim pa yis/ /spros pa thams cad zhi ba dang / /stong nyid sogs
<p>114b.2</p>rim thob pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lhan skyes mdzes pa yin/ /de ltar goms pa 'jug pa rnams/ /mi shes chu bo ma lus pa/ /bskams shing sems kyi zla ba ni/ /shar ba skal ba bzang po yin/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /ji srid sgrub pa mi skyo'i bar/ / 
<p>114b.3</p>de ltar yang dang yang du bya/ /langs nas sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ /de nas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa las/ /a las byung zhing sku mdog dkar/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsnams/ /thugs kar dang po
<p>114b.4</p>sangs rgyas ni/ /sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /de la mya ngan 'das 'khor lo/ /a ra la sogs yi ger ldan/ /de steng a ra pa tsa na/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /'di yi nye ba'i snying po ni/ /sngar ni bstan zin gang yin pa'o/ /oM a ra pa tsa na
<p>114b.5</p>ya te nA ma/ sngags kun rigs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po yang / /zhal bzhi sku mdog dud 'dra zhing / /bsam gtan phyag rgyar ldan pa'o/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo 'di rnams kyang / /rtsibs drug pa la
<p>114b.6</p>rigs drug gis/ /yongs su bskor bar ldan pa'o/ /de la gnyis med 'jam pa'i dpal/ /mdog dkar zhal drug a las byung / /phyag gnyis ral gri pu sti bsnams/ /gnyis kyis ut+pal bsnams pa dang / /gnyis ni ting 'dzin phyag rgya ni/ /yang dag snang
<p>114b.7</p>ba snang ba che/ /'di dag so so'i snying po ni/ /sgrub pa'i thabs las gsal bar bstan/ /bshad pa'i 'khor lo bdag nyid ni/ /lha rnams nyi shur mnyam pa la/ /gcig gi bdag nyid chen po ni/ /blo chen rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad gtso bo yis/ / 
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa la/ /'di rnams rang gi ngo bo ni/ /kho bos sngar ni bstan zin to/ /'on kyang 'di yi khyad par ni/ /da ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'gengs pa dang / /rnam rgyal phyag rgya rdor dril dang / /ral
<p>115a.2</p>gri rdo rje zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu dang ni lcags sgrog bsnams/ /lha chen u ma mnan pa ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad ces brjod do/ /'di yi rin chen hUM mdzad ni/ /phyag drug rnam rgyal phyag rgya med/ /zhal drug zhal ni re re la/ /spyan ni gsum gsum ldan
<p>115a.3</p>pa'o/ /'di yi pad+ma'i hUM mdzad ni/ /mche gtsigs ha la ha lar ldan/ /'di yi las kyi hUM mdzad ni/ /rnam rgyal rang gi phyag rgyar ldan/ /lcags kyu zhags pa ral gri dang / /gtun shing lhag ma phyag na bsnams/ /gang yang rdo rje rin chen ni/ /'khor los
<p>115a.4</p>sgyur bar 'dod pa la/ /ser po rin chen gyis mtshan pa/ /kun kyang rin chen cod pan can/ /de la rnam snang sngar bshad bzhin/ /don kun grub pa mi bskyod pa/ /rdo rje bsnams nas sa gnon no/ /rin chen gtsug phud snga ma bzhin/ /rin chen pad+ma sku mdog ser/ / 
<p>115a.5</p>pad+ma'i phyag rgyas ldan pa dang / /laM las byung ba'i sa bon ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pad+ma la/ /g.yas pa bkod nas g.yon pa la/ /bsam gtan dang po'i bar du gnon/ /rin chen don yod don yod do/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni thams cad la/ /rang ming rin chen
<p>115a.6</p>sgra dang ni/ /yang dag ldan pa'i sku yin no/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rdor tshig la/ /khro gnyer ldan par shes par bya/ /g.yon pas rdo rje gnon pa dang / /g.yas pas 'dod pa gnon pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen nyi ma 'od/ /rin chen dpal ni rgyal mtshan brjod/ /gang yang
<p>115a.7</p>pad+ma gar dbang phyug /'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa la/ /rdo rje'i gnas su pad+ma'i tshig /lha gzhan kun la shes par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs la pad+ma'i tshig /sngon song rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /rin chen rin chen gtsug phud dang / /pad+ma gar gyi dbang la
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>yang / /ting 'dzin sgra yi sngon du ni/ /pad+ma zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /pad+ma nges pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /pad+ma'i don yod grub pa yin/ /gzhan gyi khyad par 'di dag kyang / /nor bus byas pa'i rin po che/ /nyi ma nyi ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dpal ni zla ba'i
<p>115b.2</p>ngang pa las/ /gnas pa ku mu ta la ni/ /zla bas mtshan pa'i gdugs bsnams pa'o/ /bzhad pa la ni zhal bcu gcig /pad+ma'i sgrol ma brgya byin mdog /pad+ma'i 'khor lo khyab 'jug 'dra/ /smra ba tshangs pa'i rjes su byed/ /las ni gzhon nu lta bu ste/ /de las
<p>115b.3</p>gzhan pa khyad par med/ /rta mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid dam/ /rnam pa lnga'am rnam pa gcig /sngon po gsum gyi bdag nyid ni/ /ral gri mda' gzhu ut+pal bsnams/ /'di yi lha mo gnyis po ni/ /g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams/ /de la gtsang ma
<p>115b.4</p>sku mdog dkar/ /pad+ma sngon pos rnam par mdzes/ /dag ma pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /pad+ma dmar pos rnam par mdzes/ /'di yi nang gi skye mched rnams/ /sa snying la sogs byin gyis rlobs/ /phyi yi skye mched rnams la ni/ /gzugs rdo rje sogs byin brlabs
<p>115b.5</p>pa'o/ /g.yon pas 'dod pa'i 'jig rten gnon/ /g.yas pas mnan pa bsam gtan yin/ /rta skad 'tsher ba phyogs kyi zhal/ /bsam gtan dang po'i bar du reg /lnga yi bdag nyid snga ma bzhin/ /yang na 'od dpag med pa bzhin/ /pu sti dang ni ral gri dang / / 
<p>115b.6</p>mda' gzhu bsnams pa yid 'phrog pa'o/ /tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug ni/ /pa ba sangs dang skar ma 'di gra/ /zhabs kyis pad+ma bskor ba yis/ /grong khyer sum rtseg pa gnon pa/ /'phrog pa'i lha mo rnams kyang ni/ /'di dag 'khyud nas bzhugs pa'o/ /rta yi
<p>115b.7</p>gdong can thams cad kyang / /'khor kun yongs su shes par bya/ /de ltar zla gcig zla drug gam/ /lo gcig mtshan ma thob par du/ /de srid bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor las la 'jug par bya/ /gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>phyogs su/ /tshad ldan tsha sgo med par ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /rgyal pos khru ni brgya lnga bcu/ /blon po chen pos nyi shu lnga/ /tshong dpon ded dpon nyi shu'am phyed/ /sgrub pos bcu gnyis sam de'i phyed/ /der ni mngon spyod sbyin sreg
<p>116a.2</p>dang / /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg dag /byas nas sa ni sbyang bar bya/ /yongs su gzung bar bya ba yin/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yongs sprul nas/ /gong du ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs sngon song nas/ /mchod pa yongs su rgyas par bya/ /de nas
<p>116a.3</p>sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /sa yi lha mo spyan drangs la/ /sna tshogs mchod pas mchod nas ni/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo
<p>116a.4</p>khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya'i seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /mig gnyis nyi zla rkang mthil ni/ /rdo rje rgya gram byin brlabs nas/ /zhal nas hUM gi sgra sgrogs shing / / 
<p>116a.5</p>yongs su bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs rnams rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / /rdo rje ra ba dra ba bsam/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dril ldan dang / /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa yi/ /tshul gyis bgegs la bka' bsgo dang / /phur bus btab pa la sogs bya/ /de nas de nyid dris
<p>116a.6</p>byugs la/ /lha yi gnas su tsan+dan la/ /sogs pa'i dri yi thig le dang / /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /de rjes nam mkha' la gnas pa/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams bkug nas ni/ /mchod pa lnga dang brgyad rnams kyang / /mchod nas 'di ltar brjod par
<p>116a.7</p>bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la brtse bar gyur nas ni/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs/ / 
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang bzhugs dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang du lha yi spyan mnga' ba/ /sems can
<p>116b.2</p>bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming / /'di zhes bya ba ci nus kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bri lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ / 
<p>116b.3</p>thugs ni brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes ni lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /lha rnams lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas 'og nas 'chad pa yi/ /bum pa mtshan nyid
<p>116b.4</p>ldan pa dang / /'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang / /bcas pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /gzhan yang sbyin sreg cho ga dang / /gtor ma shin tu rgya chen po/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /de la khrus byas gtsang ma yi/ / 
<p>116b.5</p>gos gon nas ni slob ma yis/ /thal mo me tog bcas pa dang / /phyag byas nas ni 'di skad brjod/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ / 
<p>116b.6</p>dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen po/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ / 
<p>116b.7</p>gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar bzhugs pa'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam med brnyes/ /gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de
<p>117a.2</p>yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas cho ga'i yan lag kun/ /byas la byin gyis brlab pa dang / /mchod nas a shwat+tha sogs pa'i/ /so shing ku sha srung skud sbyin/ /rig sngags ldan pa'i srad bu ni/ /tshad
<p>117a.3</p>dang ldan par bkal ba dang / /phan tshun legs par bsgril ba yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmAHs+pha ra s+pha ra a nu ga ta/ sarba d+harmAHad+yan+ta a nu pra bish+Ta sarba d+harmA hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ shar
<p>117a.4</p>nub byang dang lho phyogs dang / /mngon par bltas la tshangs thig gnyis/ /me dang gnod sbyin dbang ldan dang / /gshin rje mngon par phyogs pa dang / /rlung dang gshin rje bden bral dang / /gnod sbyin phyogs su kha bltas la/ /shar dang nub tu thig gdab bo/ / 
<p>117a.5</p>me dang bden bral srin po dang / /dbang po rlung dang dbang ldan dang / /rlung gi phyogs su kha bltas la/ /go rims bzhin du lho byang gi/ /thig gnyis de bzhin gdab par bya/ /slob dpon slob ma bskor phyogs su/ /'gro zhing me dang rlung mtshams dang / /bden bral
<p>117a.6</p>dbang ldan mtshams su ni/ /gnas nas thig gnyis gdab par bya/ /gsar pa las ni bkal nas kyang / /tshad dang mthun par mdzad pa yi/ /thig ni mkhas pas ci nus kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab bo/ /gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs
<p>117a.7</p>bzhi yis mdzes byas la/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /de yi rim pa'i nang
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>zhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi/ /thig gis yongs su bskor bya zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas la/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil
<p>117b.2</p>'khor brgyad/ /de ltar lung dang bla ma yi/ /gdams ngag dag la brten nas ni/ /cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab bo/ /oM tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes ni lan gsum mngon bzlas pa'i/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa dang / /byin gyis
<p>117b.3</p>brlabs nas tshon rtsi ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin gzhan ni margad 'dra/ /dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /de ni tshon gyi rim pa bshad/ /shar phyogs
<p>117b.4</p>su ni sngon po ste/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar dkar ba bla na med/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing / /rab mnyam gzhag pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /lha rnams
<p>117b.5</p>rang rang gnas su ni/ /gzugs dang phyag rgya sogs pa yi/ /kha dog dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /bris nas sngon gsungs mchod pa rnams/ /rgya chen po yis mchod bya zhing / /gzhan yang zhal zas sna tshogs dang / /'dod yon lnga dang rin chen dang / / 
<p>117b.6</p>gos kyi bye brag sna tshogs dang / /rta dang glang po'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa rnams/ /mgrin par ras dkris tsu ta la/ /sogs pa lo mar bcas pa yi/ /shing gi kha rgyan rin chen dang / /'bru dang sman lnga dri zhim pa'i/ /spos chu
<p>117b.7</p>me tog la sogs pas/ /rab tu bkang nas rang rigs kyi/ /mtshan mas mtshan nas bum pa la/ /rang rang rigs kyi lhar bskyed nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang / /mchod pa la sogs byin brlabs nas/ /cho ga bzhin du gnas par bya/ /'bras
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>chan nas chan snum khur sogs/ /bza' ba shin tu rgya chen po/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas/ /gtor ma shin tu rgya chen gtang / /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za
<p>118a.2</p>srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal sbyar khyed rnams la ni gsol 'debs kyis/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /gnas nas phan gdags
<p>118a.3</p>slad nas 'dir spyon zhig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na
<p>118a.4</p>lhag par gang gnas dang / /mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma dag na gang gnas dang / /grong dang grong khyer phyugs lhas stong pa dang / /khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang grong khyer gnas dag gam/ /dka'
<p>118a.5</p>thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang bzhi mdo dang ni 'dun sa dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung / /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas rnams
<p>118a.6</p>dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus
<p>118a.7</p>phul bas/ /'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>bdag/ /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang / /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang / /steng gi nyi zla tshangs po chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng klu/ /ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus pa/ /so so so sor gtor ma phul ba
<p>118b.2</p>'di/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bzhes nas kyang / /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas/ /'di dag
<p>118b.3</p>btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang / /bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /mngon spyod kyi ni dbye ba yis/ /thab khung mchod rdzas rnal 'byor dang / /'dug stangs tshul bzhin shes par bya/ /de la re zhig zhi ba ni/ / 
<p>118b.4</p>sa gzhi dkar po thab khung ni/ /zlum po'i chur ni khru gang dang / /zabs su khru ni phyed kyi tshad/ /sor bzhi dor la dpangs su ni/ /sor bzhi stod la sor bzhi smad/ /phyi rol kun nas gru bzhi pa/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /u dum wA ra pa la sha/ /a mra p+lag sha kang
<p>118b.5</p>smra rgya/ /a shwat+tha la sogs pa yi/ /yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis dang / /nas zho 'o ma 'bras yos dang / /til dang dUr ba ku sha sngo/ /sA lu 'bras chan me tog dkar/ /spos dang sbrang rtsi mar la sogs/ /srog chags med pa'i mchod sbyin shing / /dgon
<p>118b.6</p>pa'i lci ba 'o ma shing / /gos dkar gon nas snying rje'i sems/ /rnal 'byor pad+ma'i 'dug stangs so/ /rang gi sa bon las byung ba/ /las dang rjes mthun b+ha ba ka /rdo rje rtse gsum phreng ba dang / /dbyug pa gun+d+he 'dzin bsams nas/ /ye shes me lha dgug pa dang / / 
<p>118b.7</p>gzhug dang bcing dang dbang byas nas/ /phyag rgya bzhis gdab dbang bskur ba/ /oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa b+hasmi ku ru sarba/ de nas mchod yon sngon song ba'i/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /mchod pa lnga dang sgeg mo sogs/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>mchod/ /de rjes gsang sngags 'di dag gis/ /mar gyi dgang blugs gsum phul nas/ /bgegs ni yod med brtag par bya/ /oM a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ 'bar ba'i me la yam shing ste/ /de nas mar dang de 'og til/ /de nas
<p>119a.2</p>'bras chan la sogs pa'o/ /cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdu ba'o/ /de nas me yi dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams dmigs pa dang / /ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas ni/ /mchod pa yongs su rgyas par bya/ /me la bsang gtor 'thor 'thung dang / /dgang
<p>119a.3</p>blugs dang ni mchod pa dag /byas nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub phyir/ /gsol ba btab la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang / /dge slong sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/ /slob ma dag la cho ga bzhin/ /rim bzhin gzhug cing dbang bskur ro/ /stod
<p>119a.4</p>g.yogs smad g.yogs ldan pa dang / /lag na me tog bcas pa dang / /phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa dang / /bshags pa la sogs byas nas ni/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ / 
<p>119a.5</p>bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i rigs mchog thams cad du/ / 
<p>119a.6</p>slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ / 
<p>119a.7</p>dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing / /dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>'di la gzhug par 'tshal/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed 'dod dam/ /'tshal zhes brjod la 'di skad ces/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su
<p>119b.2</p>song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis/ /bla ma
<p>119b.3</p>sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi
<p>119b.4</p>nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis/ /mchod
<p>119b.5</p>pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa
<p>119b.6</p>bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /la sogs tshig ni brjod nas ni/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ /rdo rje lcags kyu sogs sngags
<p>119b.7</p>kyis/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang dbang byas nas/ /deng khyod ces bya la sogs dang / /nam mkha'i snying po brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras gyur na/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ / 
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>oM badzra u da ka Tha / de nas ye shes dbab pa dang / /me tog dor dang gdong g.yogs ni/ /bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /de nas chu dang cod pan dang / /rdo rje'i bdag po ming dang ni/ /brtul zhugs rjes gnang la sogs pa/ / 
<p>120a.2</p>cho ga bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /de nas slob dpon la ni yon/ /rjes su mthun par dbul byas la/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi 'khor lo rnams/ /ma lus par ni gshegs su gsol/ /lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag rjes 'brangs nas/ /rgyud rnams
<p>120a.3</p>kun gyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal mtshan brjod kyi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga tshul bzhin byas las bdag gi dge ba ni/ /thob pa gang des 'gro kun 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhal mthong shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
<p>120a.4</p>pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon so ma shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sarba
<p>120a.5</p>maN+Dal sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa/ phyi dang nang dang de'i nang na/ /sku gsum bdag nyid la bzhugs pa/ /snying rje shes rab rjes zhugs pa/ /gzhon nu khyod la phyag 'tshal
<p>120a.6</p>lo/ /rnam kun rnam par byang chub dang / /rnam kun dri ma med pa dang / /chos rnams kun la gnas pa dang / /chos kun gcig tu ston pa dang / /rnam kun tshul la 'jug pa dang / /rnam kun tshul la gnas pa dang / /rnam pa kun gyi don tshul gcig /'jam pa'i dbyangs
<p>120a.7</p>la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgeg dang bzhad dang mi sdug dang / /drag po'i ngo mtshar nyams bdag nyid/ /nyon mongs gcod dang shes rab can/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod la 'dud/ /srid dang zhi ba spangs pa dang / /srid dang zhi bar bzhugs par mdzad/ /zla ba gzhon
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>nu ltar mdzes pa/ /chos sku de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rnams thams cad stong nyid kyi/ /srog tu khyod ni bzhugs pa yin/ /mtshan ma la yang mtshan ma med/ /dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod mi bzhugs na spros 'di la/ /ji ltar yang ni smon
<p>120b.2</p>pa yin/ /khyed 'dir rjes su zhugs na ni/ /'di la smon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /'di ni rang nyid 'od gsal ba/ /phrin las rjes su 'jug pa yin/ /sna tshogs ston la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lta ba rtog dag las 'tsho ba/ / 
<p>120b.3</p>rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyi/ /'phags pa'i yan lag 'khor lo mdzes/ /'khor los sgyur la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang bzhin gyis ni kun rdzob dang / /sems can rnams kyi bsdu ba dang / /dge ba dri med snang ba dang / /smin byed de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / 
<p>120b.4</p>zang zing mi 'jigs sbyin byed dang / /byams pa sbyin byed mchog dang ni/ /chos sbyin chos kyi dbang phyug gi/ /chen po de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gro/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab kyi/ /ral
<p>120b.5</p>gri bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can khams ni mgu ba dang / /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa chen pos gnon/ /bstan pa so so rang rig gi/ /skyob pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /go cha chen po bgos pa dang / /'jug pa che la gnas pa dang / /so sor rtog
<p>120b.6</p>par byed pa dang / /bya ba nan tan de la bstod/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab stobs chen dang / /thabs dang smon lam ye shes kyi/ /pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /brgya dang drug cu'i grangs kyis ni/ /dpal gyi byang chub
<p>120b.7</p>'gro ba'i gtso/ /gang zhig gcig kyang rnam bcu drug /'dod chags che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byams pa'i ya lad bgos pa dang / /shes rab go cha bgos pa dang / /snying rje chen po blo ldan dang / /ye shes tog la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bzang po'i lam la
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>sems can rnams/ /'jog cing skyob par byed pa dang / /zab pa'i blo dang rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mi zad blo yi gter la 'dud/ /dbyer med spobs pa dag gis ni/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin la 'dud/ /bgrod dka'i ngan song chen po las/ /kun
<p>121a.2</p>du 'dren la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mya ngan mun pa nges 'joms dang / /dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam kun bdud rtsir 'dzag pa yi/ /zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'od dpag med dang sprin med pa'i/ /nam mkha'i snying po phyag 'tshal
<p>121a.3</p>bstod/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan/ /shes rab kyis ni rjes bsrungs pa/ /srung ba med kyang 'od dag ni/ /gnon pa rmad byung rgyal la 'dud/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
<p>121a.4</p>bdag nyid kyi/ /la lar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /nyon mongs shes bya spangs pa yi/ /la lar rnam par snang mdzad dang / /la lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / /la lar pad+ma gar dbang phyug /la lar rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /rgya chen rmad byung chen po mdzes/ /gcig gi bdag nyid rta
<p>121a.5</p>mchog dang / /la lar gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / /gang zhig rnam lnga'i sna tshogs pa'i/ /skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med 'byung ba'i chos nyid phyir/ /'khor los sgyur gyi rigs 'dzin pa/ /gcig kyang sna tshogs bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam par snang mdzad
<p>121a.6</p>che la 'dud/ /mtshan brjod dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /bstod pas bsod nams gang skyes pa/ /dge ba 'di yis sems can rnams/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'grub par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor
<p>121a.7</p>thams cad la bstod pa/ /slob dpon so ma shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba liM baM d+hiH/ bod skad du/ 
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang / /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas 'dra ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /sems can kun don byed la 'dud/ /gtor ma'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /dang po lha'i
<p>121b.2</p>rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du kha zas kyi 'byor ba dri dang kha dog dang ldan pa sna tshogs bcug la/ gtor ma'i nang du yi ge a las yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'bar ba zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsams la/ de las bdud rtsi'i
<p>121b.3</p>chu rgyun dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rnam par spras pas snod dang bcud chos kyi dbyings khyab par bsam zhing bsgom pa ni/ yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang / /khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi gdugs/ /zhes bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i d+hIHlas/ dpag
<p>121b.4</p>bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /ces bya ba ni dpag bsam gyi shing nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/ bum pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i 'bras bu smin pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'dzag pa'o/ /gtor ma'i rgyud rgyas par bsam mo/ /thugs ka'i
<p>121b.5</p>'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dbab ste gnyis su med par bsam mo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrti bA gI shwa ra ma hA wa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ oM AHhUM/ zhes pas byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /sna
<p>121b.6</p>tshogs gzugs can yid la skyes/ /'jig rten gsum yang gzhon lus gcig /ces bya ba ni/ de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa dang / khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad bkug ste/ de dag thams cad snying gar
<p>121b.7</p>yi ge a bkod pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par sbyangs te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal du bsam mo/ /gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ dngos sam yid
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>kyis lus dpag med sprul la mchod do/ /nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod cing / /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /de ltar ljags kyi 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun la zhugs te/ kun kyang tshim par dmigs shing 'dod pa'i longs
<p>122a.2</p>spyod kyis tshim par bya'o/ /de nas/ chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po ste/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /zhes pas phreng ba'i sngags dang / /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rma NAM/ Ad+ya nu t+pan+na twA ta/ oM AHhUM/ zhes pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pas
<p>122a.3</p>chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /shes rab kyis ni de thob shog /byang chub chen por bsngo zhing smon lam rgya chen por gdab/ oM AHhUM zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ pha rol phyin dang rgyud rnams ma lus dang / /bder gshegs
<p>122a.4</p>rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyi/ /kun gyi gtso bor khyab pas thugs la gnas/ /ye shes lus can mtshan don rgya che bas/ /sna tshogs tshul can bstod kyis deng 'dir bdag gis 'dir/ /dam pa'i gdams ngag nyer bstan rnal 'byor lam dang sbyar/ / 
<p>122a.5</p>sbyar ba 'di la dge ba gang yod 'dis/ /bdag sogs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'drar 'gyur shog /gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba ra ha s+ya ni ban+d+ha ra ha pra dI po nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal thams cad
<p>122a.6</p>gsang ba'i bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyud du gsang byas pa/ /rang gi sku gsung thugs dngos sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud ni de brten nas/ /gsang ba'i sgron ma
<p>122a.7</p>bshad sbyar brtsam par bya/ /lus kyi tshogs rgyas par gyur pa rnams ni sbyin pa la sogs pa dka' ba'i spyod pa rnams kyis yun ring por byang chub par 'dod pa rnams la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ mi rnams kyi lus ni phyag dar
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>gyi phung po dang mtshungs pa yin gyi/ sems ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'byung lnga nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te/ 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang las kyis bskyed pa sdug bsngal sna
<p>122b.2</p>tshogs kyi rgyur gyur pa sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams te lnga po nyid kyis so/ /nges pa ni brtag mi dgos pa'o/ /mthong ba dag ces bya ba ni tshad mar grub pa'o/ /mi rnams kyi lus de lta bu yin du zin kyang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /ci
<p>122b.3</p>zhig byas pas she na/ rang sems rab tu bsgoms pa ste rab kyi mthar thug par bsgoms pas so/ /ji ltar bsgoms pas she na/ dngos der bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ste dngos po der 'gyur ba'i phyir te sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dngos po gang sems kyi
<p>122b.4</p>de kho na nyid sgom pa gang yin pas so/ /nges par zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gzhan dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ rang shes gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang gi
<p>122b.5</p>ye shes te rang gi sems nyid ni dpal gyi yon tan dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mdzad do/ /rang gi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ gsang ba zhes bya ba ste 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dam pa ni 'jig rten las
<p>122b.6</p>'das pa thams cad las mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi phyir rang gi sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes yin pas so/ /dris pa gnyis su snang ba
<p>122b.7</p>nyid kyis 'khrul cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i so so'i skye bo'i sems te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can te/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin te/ gnyis su snang ba stong pa nyid kyi
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>rang gi ngo bor gyur par yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu yin du zin kyang gnyis kyi tshul can te zhes bya ba ste/ brdzun yin du zin kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tshul du so sor snang ba'i phyir/ de ni mi bden pa yin/ glo bur gyi 'khrul pa can
<p>123a.2</p>yin gyi/ de ni rang bzhin gyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin pas/ rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin no/ /de lta bu'i ye shes nyid la ni sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu 'dud par mdzad de/ chos kyi sku la sogs pas gtso bor gyur pa'o zhes bya ba'i
<p>123a.3</p>tshul gyis so/ /de bas na rang sems nyid la phyag 'tshal ba yin te/ de ltar phyag 'tshal ba ni rtag par rab tu 'dud ces bya ba ste/ 'di ni khyad par du 'phags pa nyid du gsungs pa yin te/ 'dis ni shin tu myur du byang chub ma thob cing bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
<p>123a.4</p>mam/ mang por rab tu 'dud do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang dag par phyag 'tshal ba rnams ni myur ba nyid du byang chub rtogs pas yang phyag 'tshal bar mi byed do zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ chos
<p>123a.5</p>thams cad dmigs pa la rang gi sems ni gnyis su snang ba nub par gyur pa ni bdag med pa ste rgyu nyid kyi sbyor ba'o/ /de las yang dag par byung ba ni yang dag par shes pas sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor byung ba ste/ 'bras bu 'di kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don
<p>123a.6</p>to/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dbyer med pa'i ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te smra bsam las 'das pa'o/ /de las byung ba ni 'di dag ma lus pa rdzogs par gyur pa yin pas na/ gnyis med ye shes las byung ba/ /zhes bya ba ste/ de'i 'og tu/ sdug dang mi
<p>123a.7</p>sdug rnam spangs pa/ /zhes bya ba ste/ sdug pa ni thob par bya ba'i chos rnams so/ /mi sdug pa ni spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams te de ma lus pa rnam par spangs pa ni thob dang spangs pa mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid thob pa'o/ /de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni ci la
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>yang phyag ni mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste/ bya ba byas pa'i sgrub pa la sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par phyag 'tshal ba de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing de nyid la 'jig rten rnams nges par sbyar ba'i phyir/ ma skyes pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs
<p>123b.2</p>pa gsungs te/ rang gi shes pa ste/ rang gi sems gnyis su snang ba dang bral ba'i tshul gyis sngar ma skyes pa de'i tshul du bskyed la/ skyes par gyur pa'i pha rol te/ /rjes la sangs rgyas kyi skur ni zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rtag tu zhes bya ba rtag pa nyid
<p>123b.3</p>kyis bsgom par bya ste/ phyag 'tshal ba de la rang nyid de nyid la rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis zhugs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de la lus kyis rab tu zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku las tha dad pa'i rang gi lus mi dmigs pa'o/ /tshig gis rab tu
<p>123b.4</p>zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas ni bdag go zhes smra'o/ /'di gnyis las gzhan du yid mi g.yeng ba ni sems kyis rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /lus la sogs pa'i rab tu 'jug pa 'di nyid ni de'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal ba'i mchog yin te/ myur ba nyid du byang
<p>123b.5</p>chub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /'dir yang sangs rgyas kyi sgras byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyang gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rnal
<p>123b.6</p>'byor gyi rgyud la bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor 'di la ni 'di'i skal ba dang ldan pa ma yin no zhe na/ rnal 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dir rnal 'byor ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so/ /de nyid ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu yod
<p>123b.7</p>pa yin pas na rnal 'byor ba ste/ sems can thams cad do/ /gal te thams cad rnal 'byor pa yin na/ 'dir skal ba med pa ni 'ga' yang med pas 'khor bar ga la 'khor bar 'gyur zhe na/ /de'i phyir nyon mongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ ni zhes bya ba'i
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>sgra ni dga' ba'i don te/ nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyis sun phyung bas 'gro ba de dang der 'khor bar gyur pa'o/ /lus can zhes bya ba ni lus thob pa rnams so/ /rgyu gang gis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyis lus 'thob ce na/ de'i phyir sdug dang
<p>124a.2</p>zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sdug pa ni gnas dang longs spyod la sogs pa'o/ /mi sdug pa ni de dag gis rnam par 'byed pa'i khyad par la yongs su rtogs pa'o/ /de las ni bag chags te/ de nas yang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de nas
<p>124a.3</p>de gnyis thob pa dang spang bar srid par skye la/ des ni lus 'thob pa yin no/ /dris pa lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal la sogs par 'khor ba na/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba ni ci zhig yod/ ji ltar na 'khor ba yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la
<p>124a.4</p>sogs pa gsungs te/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang las las byung ba'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i lus dang longs spyod dang gnas rnams ni/ gang gis spyod pa dang gang la spyod pa dang / gang du spyod pa ste/ de ni lus dang lhan cig 'byung bas na lus 'byung ba'o/ /gang sems dang sems
<p>124a.5</p>las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid ni sdug bsngal lo/ /de skad du/ gang zhig zag bcas nyer len pa'i/ /phung po de dag thabs bcas kyang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang / /lha gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin/ /zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar yin na go/ 
<p>124a.6</p>'jig rten rnams sdug bsngal ba yin na ji ltar thar bar 'gyur zhe na/ sems de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sdug bsngal de gnon cing shes pa'i 'gro ba ni sems kyis so sor rtogs shing yongs su shes par brten pa ni rtogs pa yin te/ gdams pa'i rtsa
<p>124a.7</p>ba yin no/ /de bas na gdams pa po ni 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed pa yin no/ /de su zhig yin zhe na/ rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ thams cad du thogs pa med cing shin tu rnam par dag la rtag pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshul can yin pas na/ 
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>khyab pa rnam par snang mdzad pas na rnam par snang mdzad do/ /rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi longs spyod skyed par mdzad pas na rgyal ba'o/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na mgon po ste ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dang rim bzhin du sbyar ro/ / 
<p>124b.2</p>de ltar dang po'i tshig ni bstan pa yin la 'og ma gsum ni bshad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ de rnams kyi ro gcig pa ni bsdus pa zhes bya ste/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi don yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs
<p>124b.3</p>rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ de nyid sangs rgyas rnams la logs shig tu byas nas bshad pa yin te/ 'dis na/ sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs 'gyur ba/ /zhes bya ste/ 'di ni rgyal ba'i don yin no/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po/ /zhes bya ba ni mgon po'i don yin no/ / 
<p>124b.4</p>dris pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi don gyi mthar byon pa yin nam/ 'on te gzhan dag kyang sgrol bar mdzad pa yin nam/ 'on te ltos par mi mdzad pa yin zhe na/ de'i phyir sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sems can kun la phan pa de nyid ni
<p>124b.5</p>don yin te 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de la thugs rje 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid ni nyams pa yin te/ rab kyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de dang yang dag par ldan pa ni rtag tu bcas pa ste/ de bas na btang snyoms med pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /gdams
<p>124b.6</p>pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir rgyu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ shin tu myur ba dang shin tu bde bar byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid do/ /de'i mnyam par sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /de las gang du zhes bya ba ni bstan pa de'i gong du zhes bya ba'i don
<p>124b.7</p>to/ /'bras bu'i de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o/ /de ston pa ni de'i sbyor ba ston par mdzad pa'o/ /ci bcom ldan 'das de gzhan dag kyang ston par mdzad dam zhe na/ 'bad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyu
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>dang 'bras bu mi phyed pa'i ye shes la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid mi 'dod de/ bya ba byas pa nyid rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir slar 'dod par mi byed do/ /de bas na thun mtshams su gnyis pa
<p>125a.2</p>la sogs par ni 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor nyid bya'i/ rgyu'i rnal 'byor ni so sor rab tu sgom pa yin la sngar grub pa'i rim gyis 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs par gyur na/ de nyid gal te yang 'dod par gyur na ci 'gyur zhe na/ gang du zhes bya ba la sogs
<p>125a.3</p>pa gsungs te/ gnas skabs gang du 'dod pa skyes par gyur pa de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin zhing dngos grub kyi gegs su gyur pa yin te/ slar srid pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bas na 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas ni dngos grub kyi
<p>125a.4</p>mthar thug pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs te/ 'di ni gdams pa gsungs pa yin no/ /'dir dris pa gal te 'gro ba'i don la grogs su mdzad pa yin na/ de'i tshe des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
<p>125a.5</p>sgom pa ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na/ yid la 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ yid la 'dod pa ni sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa ste des na sgom pa sna tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su rtogs shing gsungs pa yin no/ /gang las she na/ theg pa
<p>125a.6</p>de'i nang nas gdams pa gcig pa nyid bstan pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par gyi don to/ /bshad ma thag pa'i sgom pa gcig gis rnal 'byor gyi de kho na nyid thams cad dang 'brel par gnas pa gcig po de nyid ni rnal 'byor 'byung
<p>125a.7</p>ba'o/ /des na gdams pa gcig pa nyid yin no/ /da ni gtso bo ston te/ de yang rnal 'byor nyid las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus pa 'thob par 'byung ba 'di yin pas na rnal 'byor 'byung ba ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i bsgom pa gang yin pa de las
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'thob pa yod pa ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo la spyod pa'i sgom pa las ni de 'byung ba yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang rnal 'byor 'di dang 'dra ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba'i spyod pa
<p>125b.2</p>yongs su rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de rnams las 'byung ba yin te gdams pa bstan pa'o/ /gdams pa bstan pa bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes dran zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ rjes su dran pa gnyis kyi tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa las/ rkang
<p>125b.3</p>gnyis te lha dang mi de rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'o/ /b+ha gar ling+ga zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang mtshan ma'o/ /rab tu gzhag ces bya ba ni legs par bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas skur zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgom
<p>125b.4</p>pa ste/ /bsgom pa 'di nyid ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa des sangs rgyas sprin zhes bya ba bsdus nas byon pa'i rgyal ba thams cad rnam par bsgom par bya zhing / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bstan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya'o/ / 
<p>125b.5</p>de nas snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rjer bsam par bya ste/ de yang / sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos kun ni/ /snying ga'i rdo rje rnam par bsam/ /zhes rdo rje rtse mo las gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /chos rjes su dran pa bstan pa'i phyir/ b+ha
<p>125b.6</p>gar ling+ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje bsam pa'o/ /rdo rje chos ni zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi snying po rnams so/ /chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi'o/ /char rab 'bebs zhes bya ba ni snying
<p>125b.7</p>ga'i rdo rje nyid las rnam par bsgom zhing brjod pa dang spro ba bya ba'o/ /'dir ling+ga zhes gang la bya zhe na/ mtshan ma ling+ga zhes bshad de/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ 'dir mtshan ma nyid la ling+ga zhes bshad kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no/ /mtshan ma de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ phyag
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ ting nge 'dzin brtan pa'i khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas phyag rgya nyid la mtshan ma zhes bshad de/ de ni lha'i de kho na nyid ston par byed pa yin pas na phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste/ de yang dpal rdo rje rtse mo las ling+ga'i
<p>126a.2</p>mtshan ma zhes bshad de/ mtshan skyes blo ldan yin par 'dod/ /byang chub sems ni theg chen po/ /'di ni ling+ga zhes byar grags/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma
<p>126a.3</p>dang / lha mo'i mtshan ma dang / khro bo rnams kyi mtshan ma'o/ /sangs rgyas smon pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad do/ /yang na rnam par dbye bas de rnam dbye'i dngos su ni 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas yin te gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal
<p>126a.4</p>'byor pa rnams la 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'dir b+ha ga zhes gang la bya zhe na/ 'joms pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te 'dir 'joms pas na b+ha ga zhes bya'o/ /de nyid gang zhe na/ nyon mongs 'joms pa dam pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs
<p>126a.5</p>te/ gang nyon mongs pa 'jig cing 'joms pa mchog dam pa ste/ de yang rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag rnams ni nyon mongs pa yin la/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'joms pa ni dman pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs
<p>126a.6</p>pa can ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgrib pa yin pas na nyon mongs pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de bas na nyon
<p>126a.7</p>mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni 'dir b+hag yin te/ ji skad du dpal rdo rje rtse mo las kyang / gang zhig nyon mongs nges 'joms pa/ /'joms pas b+ha ga zhes bshad de/ /shes rab nyon mongs de gsod pas/ /de bas shes rab
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>b+ha gar bshad/ /ces gsungs pa yin no/ /don 'di nyid kyis na byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la 'dir b+ha ga zhes bshad do/ /de'i de kho na nyid ni byang chub kyi sems yin pas de bstan par bya ba'i phyir sems can kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
<p>126b.2</p>te/ rang gi sems ni b+ha ga yin par sbyar ro/ /ji lta bu'i rang gi sems she na/ chos ni bsdus pa yin zhes bya ba gsungs te/ chos rnams ma lus pa 'dzin pa po yin pa ste chos thams cad la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na/ bsad na zhes
<p>126b.3</p>bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gal te zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o/ /de yang gang rang nyid shi ba ni bsad pa'o/ /bsad pa de ci zhig yin zhe na/ sems can kun gyi dngos po kun/ /zhes bya ba ste/ lus dang gnas dang longs spyod dang sems dang sems las
<p>126b.4</p>byung bar chos kyi bsdu bas bsdus pa'o/ /ci ltar bsad ce na/ chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ chos thams cad mi bden par yongs su brtags pa'i dmigs pas gnyis su gzung ba'i ngo bo'i bye brag tu snang ba nub par gyur pas/ gnyis
<p>126b.5</p>su med pa'i rnam par shes pa tsam gyi tshul gyis snang ba'i bdag nyid can sdig pa med cing ro mnyam par gyur pa ni chos bdag med pa ste/ rnal 'byor de la rang gi sems mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ de bsad na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ rang nyid kyis kyang lus dang
<p>126b.6</p>gnas dang longs spyod la sogs pa gnyis su snang ba'i ngo bo nyid nub pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa yang rang snang ba'i bdag nyid can dang / sems can thams cad kyi snang ba'i bdag nyid can ro gcig pa nyid yin te/ 'dir yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / 
<p>126b.7</p>sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid gang gi tshe mi dmigs par gyur pa'i ye shes des rim pa bzhin du mi dmigs pa'i shes rab dang snying rje dang / 'di dag gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid can byang chub kyi sems ni shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par rtog
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>pa'i sa bon 'byin par byed pa yin pas na/ nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa yin te/ de ni b+ha ga'i de kho na nyid do/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs ltar na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te de ni 'dir phyag rgyar byas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
<p>127a.2</p>nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor de'i don te/ dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yang dag pa'i snang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i don yin no/ /ling+ga'i phyag rgya'i gzugs
<p>127a.3</p>kyang mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yin par gsungs la/ de'i de kho na nyid ni mdor na byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yin pas/ byang chub kyi sems brtan par gyur pa yin te/ de bstan pa ni rang gi sems nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang gi
<p>127a.4</p>sems nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems nyid kyis shes bya thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /des na de nyid rtogs par bya ba yang yin te/ de nyid kyis shes bya thams cad bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsad bya ba
<p>127a.5</p>zhes bya ba ni gsad pa dang 'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang spangs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no/ /rang gi sems nyid gzung ste sgrib pa'i sa bon thams cad dgag pa yin gyi/ thams cad du chad pa ni ma yin no/ /sems nyid ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya bar
<p>127a.6</p>bshad de sgrib pa rnams nges par 'gog par byed do/ /de lta bu'i ye shes dang spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na 'tshang rgya ba 'di byang chub kyi sems nyid yin no/ /de ltar spyod pa yongs su bsdus pa ni ling+ga'i de kho na nyid do/ /de ltar rjes su dran pa gnyis
<p>127a.7</p>kyis b+ha ga dang ling+ga bshad pa yin te lhag ma ni go sla'o/ /de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyor ba mdor bsdus nas bstan pa yin la/ de byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rdo rje dang zla ba nyid kyi rim gyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni rnam
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>pa lnga ste/ zla ba la zla ba dang / rdo rje la rdo rje dang sku ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rnam pa lnga'o/ /bsgom pa 'di dang ci 'dod par bzlas pa'i rang bzhin grub pa'i sngags lnga po dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang rdo rje rtse mo dang zla gsang thig le dang gsang ba'i mdzod las rgya cher
<p>127b.2</p>gsungs pa yin no/ /bsgom pa'i 'bras bu yang zla gsang thig le dang gsang ba'i mdzod dag las gsungs pas de brjod par bya ste/ de nas bsam gtan gyi phyag rgyas gnas la/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid bsam par bya/ phyi dang nang du bcas
<p>127b.3</p>pa 'di dag thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba yin gyi/ sems dang sems las byung ba las tha dad pa gzhan dag yod pa ma yin no zhes yid la nges par bsams la chos thams cad ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ skye ba med cing rang bzhin
<p>127b.4</p>gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin no zhes yid la brjod do/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid kyis na gnyis su med cing stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid du de bsam par bya'o/ /ji ltar bsam par bya zhe na/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems brtan par byas la/ de
<p>127b.5</p>rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pas bsdus pa'i bye brag tha dad pa bsal nas gnyis su med pa'i stong pa nyid du snang ba'i bdag nyid can sdig pa med par mthong ba 'di ni de rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yin te/ de la dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa'i
<p>127b.6</p>tshul gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba ni yang dag pa nyid la rab tu blta ba'o/ /de'i ngo bo nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid du nges pa yin pas de bstan pa ni thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te/ 'di ni zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
<p>127b.7</p>gyi dmigs pa'i phyi dang nang gi dmigs pa'o/ /thams cad ces bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid kyis so sor snang zhing sems kyis brtags pa rnams so/ /de ltar na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis po 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin par kun du brtags pa ste/ yang dag
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>pa ma yin pa kun du brtags pa'i sems nyid ni kun du brtags pa dang / gzhan dbang dag bstan par gyur pa las/ yang dag par so sor rtog pa mthong ba ni go rims bzhin du med pa dang / med bzhin du snang ba nyid kyis na yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo
<p>128a.2</p>nyid gnyis su med pa'i stong pa rnam par shes pa tsam nyid de/ de'i yang dag par so sor rtog par bstan pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sems ni rnam par shes pa ste de las tha dad cing lhag pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gzhan dag yod pa ma
<p>128a.3</p>yin te/ gnyis pos stong pa'i rnam par shes pa ni don dam pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de ltar yid kyis brjod ces bya ba nges par byas nas so/ /gang gis she na/ yid kyis te yid kyis brjod nas de'i 'og tu bsam par bya'o zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro/ /mnyam pa nyid du
<p>128a.4</p>mthong ba'i rjes la mnyam pa nyid du nges par bya bar bstan pa ni/ skye ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis skye ba med pa nyid yin no/ /de ci lam gyis yongs su sbyangs pas skye ba med pa yin nam zhe na/ de ma yin pa'i
<p>128a.5</p>phyir gzod nas skye ba med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gnyis po ni rtag tu mnyam pa nyid yin pas na ngo bo nyid des gdod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis de kho na nyid ces bshad cing dri ma med ces
<p>128a.6</p>bshad pas/ gnyis su rtog pa'i dri ma rnams ni rtsa ba mi brtan pa nyid yin pas na glo bur du 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas oM tsit+ta pra ti bi d+haM ka ro mi zhes phra bar bzlas pas dang por zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta'o/ /de'i de kho na nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs
<p>128a.7</p>pa'i sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa nyid kyis na/ sngar kun gzhi zhes bshad pa'i sems de'i de yongs su zad pas zag pa med pa'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa gnas yongs su gyur pa zag pa med pa'i dbyings gnas med pa bshad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ dag pa de nyid ni zla ba'i don
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>yin no/ /tshogs yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad a la sogs pa'i gzugs zla ba dang shel lta bur dkar ba'i tshul gyis 'dir rab tu zhugs te/ a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM aH/ de'i steng du oM bo d+hi tsit+ta
<p>128b.2</p>ut+pA da yA mi zhes phra bar bzlas la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsgom par bya'o/ /'dir yang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du zhugs te/ ka kha ga g+ha dang / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa
<p>128b.3</p>pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di'i de kho na nyid ni b+ha ga zhes bshad pa byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /de'i steng du tiSh+Tha badzra zhes phra bar bzlas pa las bdag nyid rdo rje dkar po 'od zer dang bcas par bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i de kho na nyid
<p>128b.4</p>ni byang chub kyi spyod pa bsdus pa'i byang chub kyi sems brtan par gyur pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes phra bar bzlas nas rdo rje de nyid las rdo rje dbyings rnams kyis nam mkha' khyab par spro ba dang bsdu ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i de kho na nyid ni chos kyi sku 'thob
<p>128b.5</p>pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ zhes phra bar bzlas pas zla ba gnyis dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i de kho na nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams
<p>128b.6</p>cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa yin no/ /de yang rdo rje rtse mo las/ /sku yi gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ /spyod yul thugs su chud pa ste/ /lnga po de dag kun gyi spyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam bdag nyid/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na
<p>128b.7</p>med/ /ces gsungs pa dang / dpal mchog dang po las kyang / de bzhin du mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rang sems so sor rtog pa las/ byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de nyid de yi sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom pas so/ /zhes
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>gsungs pa yin no/ /de ltar na dang po'i rnam pa bzhi ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid la lnga po ni 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid yin no/ /dris pa/ 'bras bu ni rgyu la rag las pa yin pas na rgyu'i sbyor ba nyid bya'i 'bras bu'i sbyor bas ci zhig bya zhe na/ de'i phyir sbyor dang zhes bya
<p>129a.2</p>ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sbyor ba nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du gyur pa nyid de/ de dang gang yang dag par 'brel pa med par ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las kyang dngos po 'byung bar ma gsungs te/ de yang 'di las byung bas na srid pa ste rgyu'o/ /dngos po de nyid du 'byung bas
<p>129a.3</p>na/ srid pa gang du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /zhes bya'o/ /la las ni/ srid pa ru ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /zhes zer te gnyis ka yang rnal 'byor rgyud gang du yang rgyu'i sbyor ba 'ba' zhig las 'byung ba ma yin zhes ston to zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'o na ji ltar 'byung zhe na/ gang tshe zhes bya ba
<p>129a.4</p>la sogs pa gsungs te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas su gyur par sgom pa'i bsgom bzhin pa la bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas bdag ces bya ba ste/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes bstan pa'i nges pa bsgom pa ste/ 
<p>129a.5</p>de'i tshe ni sbyor ldan zhes pa rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te/ de'i tshe rnal 'byor des byang chub sgrub pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs te/ de yang sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni sangs rgyas rnal 'byor te/ gang yang rgyu'i rnal 'byor nyid kyis
<p>129a.6</p>'tshang rgya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dang bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa las bshad pa ste/ de ni dus shin tu ring bas 'byung ba yin no/ /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams su ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sbyor ba la sogs pas theg pa chen po mtha' dag bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu myur ba nyid du byang
<p>129a.7</p>chub thob pa yin no/ /de bas na ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te/ mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba dus mdor bsdus pas 'tshang rgya ba gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin ye shes las byung ba zhes bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ye
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te de gnyis las 'di yang dag par byung zhing skyes pa yin pas de skad ces bya'o/ /phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir te de'i phyir ro zhes shes par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nye bar bsdus pa yin te/ gang 'di dpal de kho
<p>129b.2</p>na nyid bsdus pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid/ /gzhan du sangs rgyas 'gyur ma yin/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i don gang yin zhe na/ don 'di yin te mngon par byang chub
<p>129b.3</p>pa rnam pa lnga'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim gyis ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la phyis rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yun ring du gnas par bya ste/ rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la sems mnyam par gzhag nas/ ji srid 'dod kyi bar du gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ / 
<p>129b.4</p>rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sbyor ba bstan pa'o/ /'bras bu'i sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes gsungs pa de la yang dag par zhugs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de las gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ phra mo'i zhes bya ba la
<p>129b.5</p>sogs pa gsungs pa yin te/ rang gi sems nyid chos thams cad dmigs pa na spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad nub par gyur pas gnyis su med par snang ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba ro gcig par gyur pa gang yin pa
<p>129b.6</p>de/ dag pa'i bdag nyid gang gis ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ni dang po mthong ba ste/ de'i 'og tu rang gi sems de stug par gyur pa ste zla ba dang rdo rje dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang gang las she na/ dngos dang zhes bya ba la
<p>129b.7</p>sogs pa gsungs te/ gang gi phyir dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i khyad par du bsgom pa de la chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i phra bar gyur ba ni dngos po med pa'i khyad par ro/ /phra bar gyur pa de'i 'og tu stug por gyur pa ni dngos po'i khyad par te de lta bu'i dngos po
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>dang / dngos po med pa'i khyad par sgom pa kun du brtags pa yin zhes bya ba ste/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams su bsgom pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no/ /de dag kyang gang las she na/ dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dngos po 'ba' zhig ni
<p>130a.2</p>bsgom pa ma yin te/ rnam pa bzhi po la sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes pa yin du zin kyang / rang bzhin gyi sku las shin tu dman pa yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa ni phra ba'i dngos po ste/ sgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te bsgoms kyang bsgom pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ / 
<p>130a.3</p>ji ltar sgom pa yin zhe na/ des don dam pa mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar bsgom pa ma yin zhe na/ mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgoms pa'i 'og tu shin tu myur bar byang chub 'thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas ci zhig ce na/ bsgom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 
<p>130a.4</p>phra ba'i dngos po bsgoms pas ni don dam pa mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos po sgom pa ste/ dngos po de bsgoms pas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba ste/ yongs su dag pa'i las dag pa'i gnas skabs so/ /de bas
<p>130a.5</p>na rgyu dang 'bras bu ni rang gi sems nyid las gzhan ma yin no zhes nges par byas pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so/ /gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu rang gi sems nyid yin na/ de'i tshe de nyid ni de'i rig pa yin pas rnal 'byor pa de sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur
<p>130a.6</p>te/ de thams cad mkhyen na bdag nyid dang gdul bya rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa mi shes pas ji ltar sangs rgyas pa yin zhe na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa ni yul ma yin zhing gzung bar bya ba ma yin pas na sangs rgyas kyi yul
<p>130a.7</p>lo/ /sems can ni gdul bya rnams te de rnams ni gzung bar bya ba ma yin pas de skad ces bya'o/ /gal te de gzung bar gyur na ni de'i tshe de la gnyis kyi rtog pa yod pas 'khrul bar 'gyur gyi 'tshang rgya bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ /'o na ji ltar sangs rgyas par 'gyur zhe na/ rang
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>gi sems rtogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang gi sems nyid kyi chos thams cad ro gcig par rtogs pas rang rig pa tsam gyi 'khrul pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas te zhes bya ba ni byang chub cing thams cad mkhyen pa'o/ /nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir
<p>130b.2</p>gnyis med sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la mnyam par gzhag pa'i ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin ni 'bras bu'i sbyor ba'o/ /de'i ye shes ni yongs su shes pa ste/ de kho na nyid nges par brtag pa'o/ /de'i
<p>130b.3</p>don brtag pa ni bskyed pa'o/ /rgyu'i de nyid ji ltar zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid mthong ba gang yin pa'o/ /de nyid yin zhes bya ba ni mthong ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bstan pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes bstan par bya
<p>130b.4</p>ba'i phyir/ rgyu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rgyu ni zla ba la sogs pa'o/ /'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa ste/ de gnyis la ni de kho na nyid cung zad kyang med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /med pa nyid ni gcig dang du ma dang du ma bral ba yin no/ /de yang
<p>130b.5</p>'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las/ ji ltar me long dag la gzugs/ /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs par/ /snang yang de la yod ma yin/ /de bzhin dngos la dngos rnams so/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /rgyu nyid ni rgyu'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /de nyid de ni de
<p>130b.6</p>bzhin zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid du ste don dam par ro/ /ye shes de la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes de la'o/ /kun du spyod ces bya ba ni yang dag par spyod pa'o/ /ji ltar yang dag par spyod ce na/ rgyu yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ de yang gnyis
<p>130b.7</p>pos stong pa'i rnam par shes pa tsam ni yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes de la kun brtags pa dang / gzhan dbang gi rang bzhin can gyi yongs su shes par gang gyur pa de la ni rgyu la rgyu'i ngo bor yod pa ma yin la 'bras bu la 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bor
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>yod pa ma yin no/ /brtag pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i brdzun par nges pa'i yongs su shes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul du gzung bar byar med pas so/ /de ltar na med pa las de 'dzin pa nyid du rang gi sems snang ba yin te/ so sor snang ba gnyis ka med
<p>131a.2</p>pa'i shes pa ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du yongs su shes pa yin te/ de bas na 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa tsam nyid yin no/ /'di lta ste/ rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ni stong pa nyid yin no zhes gang yongs su shes pa de ni de'i phyin ci ma log pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi ye
<p>131a.3</p>shes so/ /de ltar med pa yin na ji ltar zla ba la sogs par rang nyid mi snang zhe na/ med pa ni snang ba'i gzugs dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rang nyid so sor snang bar gyur pa de la ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir/ rgyu 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/ /de bas na so sor snang ba
<p>131a.4</p>de la nam yang ci yang yod pa ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na sems ji ltar med pa'i tshul gyis snang zhe na/ gang gi phyir snang ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sems de ni gzugs su 'khrul cing gzugs las gzhan na med pa yin te/ de bas na gzugs de ni gzugs
<p>131a.5</p>las gyur pa ma yin la/ de gzugs med pa yang ma yin te/ sems snang ba'i tshul yin pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid dang de las gzhan par snang ba'i 'brel pa dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /de bas na snang ba nyid du yang yod pa ma yin te/ shes pa las don gzhan shes pa'am gzugs
<p>131a.6</p>su 'khrul pa med de/ nyams su myong bar grub pa ni 'khrul pa ste/ de yang sems nyid gzugs su 'khrul pas snang ba dang snang ba ma yin pa'i 'khrul pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de bas na gzugs kyi rang gi ngo bo ltar gzugs su 'khrul par gyur pa'i rjes su myong bar grub pas
<p>131a.7</p>snang ba yin te/ de la yod pa dang med pa'i rgyu med pas 'gal ba nyid du 'khrul pa yin la/ nges pa de yang rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa la zhen pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa tsam yin la/ de bas na mngon par zhen pa rnam par dag
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>pa'i yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa legs par bsgoms pa'i rim gyis yang dag pa'i ye shes skye ba yin no/ /de bas na 'khrul pa nyid du grub pa 'di dag nges pa yin no/ /de yang 'di ltar de'i bdag nyid du 'khrul pa las kyang so sor snang ba 'gal ba yin te/ rgyu yang
<p>131b.2</p>de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang / byis pas ji ltar rnam brtags bzhin/ /phyi rol don ni yod min te/ /bag chags kyis ni bsgos pa'i sems/ /rang gi sems ni phyi rol snang / /zhes gsungs pa
<p>131b.3</p>yin te/ bsgom pa ni bcom pa'o/ /kun brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang yongs su shes pa de las ni de bzhin nyid yongs su shes la/ de bzhin nyid ni rang bzhin gyi chos rnams so/ /de bas na de shes pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes bstan pa'o/ /dris pa rgyu dang 'bras
<p>131b.4</p>bu'i sbyor ba ni yod pa ma yin pa las snang ba'i phyir 'khrul pa yin la gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes kyang shin tu 'khrul pa yin te/ brjod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin na/ ji ltar na 'di dag bsgom pa byang chub kyi lam yin zhe na/ 'dir
<p>131b.5</p>brjod par bya ste/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad la spros pa med pa'i ye shes dang po skyes pas chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba dang kun du rtog pa dang de'i stobs kyis ye shes 'di dag dus dang rnam par dbye bas ji lta bas nye bar mtshon pa'i khyad par rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
<p>131b.6</p>de nas de bzhin nyid yongs su gcod par byed pa rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad na rab rib can gyis nam mkha' la skra shad mthong ba lta bus ji ltar brjod pa med pa yongs su spyod par 'gyur zhe na/ so sor rig par gyur pa la shin tu byang bar gyur pa rang gi
<p>131b.7</p>lus la sogs pa rjes su myong ste/ brtag pa dang bdag tu yongs su gcod pa bzhin no/ /rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs las kyang ji skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pas ni shes bya dang khyad par
<p>132a</p>
