<p>231b.4</p>lam gyi mthus/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i rtsod pa'i dus su 'dam gyi pad+ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las/ nga dang gzhan dag byas dus de/ /shAkya seng ge rtsod pa'i dus/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rtsod pa'i dus 'di ni lta ba'i snyigs ma la
<p>231b.5</p>gnas pas/ lta ba tha dad pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis glags pa yin pa'i phyir/ theg pa sna tshogs pas gdul bya dag 'dul gyi/ rdzogs ldan la sogs pa'i dus kyi sems can ltar/ theg pa gcig gis ni 'dul bar mi nus te/ rta cang shes dang / dmu rgod dag lta bu'o/ / 
<p>231b.6</p>de'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ mdo sde dang gsang sngags kyi lam ston pa'i gzhung rab tu mang po gsungs la/ 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi ngo bo bstan pa'i gzhung yang rab tu rgya cher gsungs mod kyi/ de dag gis 'dul ba ma yin pa lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med
<p>231b.7</p>pa la sogs pa'i ched du/ yang 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su dga' ba'i tshal der gsungs so/ /der gsungs pa'i rgyud 'di ni dbang po'i rim pa gsum gyis nyan pa la sogs par
<p>232a</p>
<p>232a.1</p>byed de/ 'di ltar sngon gyi byed pas kyang dbang po tha dad de/ nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes lta bu mgo smos pas go ba dang 'phags pa cang shes kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa'i lnga sde bzang po la sogs pa don rnam par phye bas go ba dang / sa nu la sogs pa don rnam par spros pas
<p>232a.2</p>go ba dag dang / 'phags pa lam bstan la sogs pa tshig lhur len pa'i gang zag dag srid pa'i phyir ro/ /rkyen gyis kyang de tha dad de/ ji skad du/ ma ga d+hA pa zur gyis go/ /ko sa la pa yig phyed kyis/ /pany+tsa la pa brjod na shes/ /nub mi ma smras ni shes so/ /zhes brjod pa lta
<p>232a.3</p>bu ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rno ba dang 'bring dang / dbang po rtul po de dag gi dbang du byas te/ rgyud 'di tshul gsum gyis bshad par bya'o/ /mgo smos bas go ba'i dbang du byas te/ don dang ldan pa'i mtshan rnam par gzhag pa dang / don rnam par phye bas go ba'i dbang du byas te/ 
<p>232a.4</p>rgyud kyi don rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par spros pas go ba'i dbang du byas te/ yan lag lngas gzhung bshad pa'o/ /tshig la 'chi bdag kyang / thugs rje'i dbang gis mtshan 'dzin pa la sogs pas sbyor bar dgongs pa nyid ji lta bar yul du byas pa'o/ /ji skad du/ mkhas
<p>232a.5</p>pa 'jig rten 'das sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung / /chos nyid skyon med chos rnams ston pa 'di gnas te/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid 'di rjes su rtogs/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang / 
<p>232a.6</p>'du shes tsam yang spangs pa'i phyir/ /rang gi ngo bor bstan du med/ /ye shes rang gcig ces bya ba/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs shes bya/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bas na tshig 'di gnyis kyis ni me long lta bu'i ye shes bstan la/ ye shes de yi mtshan nyid ni/ /mdo sde'i rgyan
<p>232a.7</p>las ji skad du/ /me long ye shes mi g.yo ste/ ye shes gsum po de la brten/ /mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog /bya ba grub pa kho na'o/ /me long ye shes nga yi med/ /yongs su ma chad rtag tu ldan/ /shes bya kun la ma rmongs la/ /rtag tu de la mngon phogs min/ /ye shes kun gyi rgyu mtshan phyir/ /ye shes
<p>232b</p>
<p>232b.1</p>'byung gnas chen po 'dra/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /ye shes gzugs brnyan 'byung phyir te/ /zhes so/ /de'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis yul du mdzad la/ kun rdzob pa'i dngos po ji
<p>232b.2</p>ltar snang ba yang skad cig la ma lus par snang zhing snang ba la mngon du phyogs pa yang med de/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gal te ye shes 'di de lta bu ma yin du zin na/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la/ ye shes 'di lta bu sgyu ma tsam du
<p>232b.3</p>mi gnas ni/ gal te bdag gcig med du zin na ni/ de yi spyod yul zhi ba stong pa'ang med/ /rang 'byung rdul rnams shin tu bsal ba yi/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung / /zhes 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las gsungs pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa
<p>232b.4</p>mang por de lta bur goms par byas pa'i phyir/ rgyu'i byed pa'i mthu las rjes su dpag par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam skye ba'i bar chad ji snyed pa ni dgra zhes bya ste/ dgra dang chos
<p>232b.5</p>mthun pa'i phyir ro/ /ye shes gang gis spangs pa de ni bcom pa ste/ 'dis ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bstan la/ ye shes de'i mtshan nyid kyang / mdo sde rgyan las/ bsgom pa dag pas sems can la/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod/ /mi gnas zhi bar zhugs pa ni/ / 
<p>232b.6</p>mnyam nyid ye shes yin par 'dod/ /dus rnams kun du byams pa dang / /thugs rje chen po dag dang ldan/ /sems can rnams la mos pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sku ni nges par ston/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang na ye shes 'di dang ldan pa ni mchod par bya ba yin pas na/ a
<p>232b.7</p>ra had ces bya ba ni mchod par bya ba'am/ yang na ye shes 'di dang ldan pa ni chos kyi rgyal por 'os na a ra had ces bya ba ni 'os pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la/ chos rnams kyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa la yang dag par ro/ /saM zhes bya ba ni saM pur+Na
<p>233a</p>
<p>233a.1</p>ste rdzogs par ro/ /de'i phyir saM ni chos rnams kyi dngos po ji snyed pa mkhyen par ro/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu rtogs pa ste skyes bu legs par sad pa bzhin no/ /de'i phyir yang dag par zhes bya ba dang rdzogs par zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
<p>233a.2</p>'di nyid 'chad pa'o/ /yang na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu rgyas pa ste/ me tog pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa lta bu'o/ /'dis ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bstan te/ ye shes de'i mtshan nyid ni mdo sde rgyan de nyid las/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni/ /shes bya kun la rtag
<p>233a.3</p>mi thogs/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyi/ /gter dang 'dra ba kho na yin/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /'byor pa thams cad ston mdzad pa/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa yin/ /chos chen char ni rab tu 'bebs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /ngan song thams
<p>233a.4</p>cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba la/ ngan song ni dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags rnams so/ /thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus par ro/ /yongs su zhes bya ba ni mthar thug par ro/ /sbyong ba zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid dag par bya ste/ ji skad du 'di nyid las/

<p>233a.7</p>don bsdus pa yang / de nyid las/ 'dzin pa'i phyir dang sems mnyam phyir/ /yang dag chos rab ston phyir dang / /bya ba grub pa nyid kyi phyir/ /ye shes bzhi po yang dag 'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /ye shes de dag bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes

<p>233b.1</p>bya ste/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings chung zad kyang dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir chos kyi dbyings de nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog yin pas ming de skad ces bya'o/ /ye shes de dag gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyi sku ni/ 'dir phyir mi rtog pa'i phyir
<p>233b.2</p>bzlog pas bstan pa'am rtog pa zhes bya ste/ gdul bya rnams kyis de la kha dog dang dbyibs mtshan ma mang por rtogs pas so/ /de ltar yang 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni/ /rtag tu rnam mi rtog las byung / /mi
<p>233b.3</p>rtog pa yi ye shes la/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / mi rtog gang la rtog nyid du/ /brtags pas rtog las byung ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de ltar na
<p>233b.4</p>'bras bu'i rgyud bstan te/ rgyu de'i 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan to/ /rgyu de'i 'bras bu de rkyen gang gis bskyed ces phyogs snga ma la/ rtog pa zhes bya ba la bzlas nas brjod de/ kalpa ti kalpa zhes bstan pa'i dbang gis/ dam tshig dang dbang dang bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs
<p>233b.5</p>kyi bdag nyid lam zhes bya ba ni/ 'dir rtog pa zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod la/ de bas na 'dir rtog pa zhes bya bas ni/ cho ga rgyas pa nyid bstan la/ cho ga rgyas pa'i ngo bo dam tshig la sogs pa yan lag bzhi ni/ 'dir sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs te/ de bas na kalpa zhes bya ba
<p>233b.6</p>ni/ bi d+hi bi d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /'di ni thabs kyi rgyud do/ /de ltar na dbang po rnon po dag la rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thabs kyi rgyud kyi mtshan tsam zhig bstan pa byas pa'o/ /da ni bsdus pa'i don rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par spros te bshad pa la 'jug par bya ste/ 
<p>233b.7</p>de lta 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud kyi don ma lus pa ni/ dgos pa dang bsdus pa'i don/ tshig gi don dang / mtshams sbyar ba dang / brgal ba'i lan rnams kyis legs par
<p>234a</p>
<p>234a.1</p>bshad par bya'o/ /de yang 'dir ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs su snang ba rnam par shes pa bstan/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid brjod par byed pa'o/ /des bstan par bya ba'i don ma lus pa ni brjod par bya ba'o/ /de dag rgyu 'bras kyi bdag nyid kyis gnas pa ni 'brel pa
<p>234a.2</p>ste/ 'brel pas don blos rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o/ /ngan song la sogs pa dang bral ba nas brtsams te/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i bar du dgos pa'i dgos pa'o/ /de lta na 'dir ni 'jug par rung ba nyid du ston to/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
<p>234a.3</p>gshegs pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan yon tan dang ldan pas brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa dngos su brjod cing 'brel pa la sogs pa yang don gyis drang bar bya'o/ /da ni bsdus pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la glegs bam mi
<p>234a.4</p>mthun pa mthong zhing / gtsug lag dang rig pa'i bstan bcos sngon byung ba gzhan la yang de ltar snang ba ni klog pa'i slob dpon la sogs pas rab tu nyams par zad do/ /de las 'dir ni glegs bam bar ma'i dbang du byas pa ste/ de la bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa bzhi'o/ /ji lta
<p>234a.5</p>zhe na 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ bzhugs te bya ba'i bar gyis ni gleng gzhi bstan to/ /ngan song gi rgyud thams cad ces bya ba nas brtsams te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gleng bslang ba bstan to/ / 
<p>234a.6</p>de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan las langs nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni yongs su shes par bya ba rgyud kyi dngos po bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ mngon
<p>234a.7</p>par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni/ mngon par bstod pa bstan pa'o/ /da ni bsdus pa'i don de dag zhib tu brjod par bya ste/ blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bla ma'i gdams ngag ston te/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la gleng gzhi gang yin pa ni/ sdud pa po dang / 
<p>234b</p>
<p>234b.1</p>dus dang / bstan pa dang / ston pa dang / gnas dang / 'khor dang / mchod pa brnyes pa dang / zhus pas phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gleng bslang ba gang yin pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar 'jug pa dang / lha rnams kyis yang dag par bstan pa zhus pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ / 
<p>234b.2</p>rgyud kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de yang 'di rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i bye brag gis gnyis su bstan cing rtsa ba'i rgyud gang yin pa der ni/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po cho ga rab tu rgya cher bstan pa'i phan yon dang / /rtog pa yang dag par gzung bar bstan pa dang bcas pa'o/ /rtog pa phyi ma gang yin pa der
<p>234b.3</p>yang sngar ji ltar bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtsug tor rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang / yang bcom ldan 'das tshe tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te/ gang yang lha'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i mthar thug
<p>234b.4</p>pa'o/ /rtog pa phyi ma las byung ba'i rang bzhin phyi ma'i phyi ma der ni/ ma lus par mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po gnyis dang / gang dag rtsa ba dang / phyi ma'i dum bu dag tu ma bstan pa'i brjod par bya ba/ las kyi tshogs dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / 
<p>234b.5</p>zhi ba la sogs pa'i rol mo'i cha byad brdung ba rnams dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slob ma gang dag dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'am/ yang gang dag rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyan pa don du gnyer ba de dag la legs par bslab pa dang sngar ji ltar bstan pa'i dbang gis rtog pa khyad par can skyes
<p>234b.6</p>pa'i dbang las byas pa shes pa'i ngo bor bstan pas/ lan du mchod pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /de nas brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pas bstod pa mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba bstan te/ de ltar na rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa/ gleng gzhi dang / gleng bslang ba dang / rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma dang / 
<p>234b.7</p>phyi ma'i phyi ma dang / mngon par bstod pa ni 'di'i lus zhes bya'o/ /de la ston pa po la mngon par bstod pa ni/ gang gis bstod pa dang / ji ltar bstod pa dang / gang la bstod pa dang / sems kyi khyad par gang gis bstod pa dang / yon tan ji lta bus bstod pa dang / bstod
<p>235a</p>
<p>235a.1</p>pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o/ /de la yon tan ji lta bus bstod pa ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ mi slob pa dang slob pa'am/ spangs pa dang brnyes pa'am/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi dbang gis bstod pa byas la/ rgyas par ni ci
<p>235a.2</p>rigs par shes par bya'i/ tshig mangs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dir ma brjod do/ /de las kha cig na re rdo rje khro bo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ ci'i phyir drag shul spyad pa ma gsungs she na/ thugs rje'i dbang gis so zhes zer te/ de ltar na sngar bstan pa ji ltar drang / 
<p>235a.3</p>kha cig na re sdud pa pos thugs brtse bas ma bsdus so zhes zer te/ de yang nyes pa snga ma bzhin no/ /bdag gis ni de'i lan sngar btab zin to/ /de ltar bsdus pa'i don bstan nas/ tshig gi don dang / mtshams sbyar ba dang / brgal ba'i lan dag ni gang dang gang du bab pa de
<p>235a.4</p>nyid rjod par byed do/ /chos yang dag par bsdu ba la 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges pa skyed pa sbyin dgos pa'am/ rtag tu rgyud la sogs pa la/ ston pa la sogs pa yid ches pas byed pa sbyin dgos pas na/ gleng gzhi ste/ de yang 'dir sdud pa pos
<p>235a.5</p>bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin dam bcas pas tshad mar gyur pa dang / ston pa'i mngon sum gyi slob mar gyur pa dang / nga rgyal spangs pa dang / thos pa che bar bstan pa'i phyir/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba smos so/ /dus phun sum tshogs pa yang / dus
<p>235a.6</p>gcig na zhes bya bas bstan te/ ji lta zhe na dper na dpyid kyi dus rnams kyi mchog tu gzhag pa ni/ shing la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi myu gu la sogs pa rnams skyed par phyogs shing gso ba'i dus can yid dga' bar byed pa'i dbang gis yin pa ltar/ bde ba'i myu gu skyed par byed
<p>235a.7</p>pa'i rgyud dpag bsam gyi shing chen po myu gu lta bu'i 'byung ba'i dus de yang dus gzhan pas mchog nyid de/ de'i phyir 'gran zla med pa'i don gyis na/ dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni/ dus gcig pu na zhes zla med pa'i tshig tu sbyar ro/ /'di zla ba dang / tshes grangs dang / snga blo la
<p>235b</p>
<p>235b.1</p>sogs pa'i nges pa ci'i phyir mi smos/ gzhan du na gnas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum mam lha yul na zhes pa tsam smos par rigs so zhe na/ rtsod 'gyur mtshams 'phra mi mthun dang / /mchog tu bstan la mi rigs phyir/ /dus ni gnas ltar nges min nam/ /gnas kyang dus dang 'dra
<p>235b.2</p>bar mthong / /zhes gzhan dag tu bstan pa kho nar zad do/ /de bzhin du dus gcig na zhes bya ba 'dis ni/ shin tu dkon pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis/ chos dkon mchog 'di ni bstan pa gzhan nas mchog tu yang dkon te/ bcom ldan 'das mi yul du lo brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'tsho ba
<p>235b.3</p>las/ 'di ni dus gcig gi tshe kho na zhig gsungs kyi/ yang dang yang du ni ma yin te/ ji skad du/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' zhig/ /byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ / 
<p>235b.4</p>de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bas na dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni/ rnyed par dka' ba bstan la de bzhin du don chen po byed pa nyid dang / snang bar byed pa nyid dang / rin che ba nyid dang / gnod pa 'joms pa nyid dag kyang 'dis mtshon par bya ba nyid do/ /de bas na 'di
<p>235b.5</p>skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya bas ni rab tu yang 'jug par bya ba nyid du ston te 'og ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ /bdud bcom shes ldan ye shes ldan/ /'jigs bral srid dang zhi ba bral/ /srid 'gro las 'das gang yin 'di/ / 
<p>235b.6</p>bcom ldan 'das zhes nges pa brjod/ /ces ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba yang 'di drangs te/ 'di chen po'i chen po'am/ cher bsil bar 'gyur bas na tshangs pa chen po'o/ /'di nyid gang zhe na/ rje btsun shAkya thub pa nyid yin te/ 
<p>235b.7</p>ji ltar rdo rje gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rtsom pa dang / dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni/ /dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /shAkya'i bdag po dgyes mdzad pa/ /thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /'o na 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi
<p>236a</p>
<p>236a.1</p>dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nyid ci'i phyir ston pa por mi brjod ce na/ 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i mi slob pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams te/ mtshan nyid 'di dag las gzhan pa'i
<p>236a.2</p>lha rnams las/ 'di rnams mchog tu 'gyur bas na 'dir drug pa'i mang po'i tshig bsdu ba'o/ /'di la kha cig ni bsdu ba gzhan brda sprod pa ltar 'dod de/ sgra rnams ni don gyi mthus nus pa gcig tu med do/ /de la dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis ni gang dag de rnams su gtogs pa'i
<p>236a.3</p>lha rnams ni gang rnams she na/ rab tu rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sgrub pa po dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma dag gi phyir/ rtsa ba'i rgyud du gzhag pa'i bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor te dang po'o/ /gang dag mos pa dman pa'am/ 
<p>236a.4</p>lag mi bzo ba'am/ 'byor ba chung ba la sogs pa'i slob ma la sogs pa'i tshad du ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rdo rje gtsug tor zhes bya ba gsungs pa'o/ /gang dag rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba bzlog pa dag gi ched du/ snga ma gnyis
<p>236a.5</p>las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor tshe dpag tu med pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /de nas yang gdul bya dman pa la mos pa rin po cher bor nas mching bu'i nor bu len pa lta bu de dag gi ched du/ 'jig rten pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor drug gsungs te/ de yang dang po ni rgyal po chen
<p>236a.6</p>po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyogs skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas gza' chen po dag gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas klu chen po dag gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas ni
<p>236a.7</p>'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum ste/ kha cig las dang rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 'chi ba'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar bar 'dod pa bde bzhin gshegs pa tshe mtha' yas la dad pa de dag gi phyir ni/ tshe dpag tu med pa 'byung ba gnyis pa de bzhin
<p>236b</p>
<p>236b.1</p>gshegs pas bdag po mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so/ /de dag ni rgyud phyi mar gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu'o/ /de nas ni rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i rtog par ma gsungs pa'i cho ga lhag ma rnams bstan pa/ rgyud phyi ma'i phyi mar rigs ma lus pa bsdus pa'i bdag nyid kun tu
<p>236b.2</p>bzang po la sogs pa gtso bor byas pa bzhi pa'i mchog bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / shin tu 'jigs par byed pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma me rdo rje zhes bya ba gnyis gsungs so/ /de la kha cig na re dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi go rims nges par brjod dgos la/ 
<p>236b.3</p>'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi sngon du 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor drug bstan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang brjod dgos so zhes zer te/ dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'dir rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor yin pas thog mar brjod par rigs la/ nus pa dman pa dag gi ched
<p>236b.4</p>du dkyil 'khor chen po nyid bsdus te bstan pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor yin no/ /dkyil 'khor lhag ma bcu ni/ de ltar gzhag pa la gnod pa med pa nyid go rims nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni mtshan nyid yin no/ /'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon du brjod pa ci'i phyir zhes zer ba yang de
<p>236b.5</p>dag sngags dbul ba'i bsam pa de ltar skyes pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan te/ gzhan ci zhig dgos 'di dag 'jig rten las 'das par gzhag pa yang gnod pa ci zhig yod/ gzhan yang 'dri ba 'di la ni mtha' med par 'gyur te/ 'dir ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa yang
<p>236b.6</p>ci'i phyir ma bstan/ lha 'di dag gi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams gzhan yang yod na 'di ltar ston pa ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glags su 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir de ni don med pa'i rtog pa tshegs dang bcas par gzhag par bya'o/ /gal te nges par byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa
<p>236b.7</p>nus na su zhig 'gog pas smra la rag go/ /da ni lha rnams brjod de/ de la rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge brgyad phyogs su bltas pa'i steng du pad+ma'i rgyal po seng ge'i dbus kyi sa las 'thon pa'i 'dab ma sna tshogs seng ge rnams khebs pa'i 'dab ma'i bar nas rdo rje rtse
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>mo lnga pa brgyad 'dab ma ltar 'thon pa'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su rje btsun thams cad rig pa/ zhal thams cad du tha le ba/ sku mdog dkar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i mtshan ma 'chang ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i
<p>237a.2</p>rgyal po ltar sku brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba/ 'od zer tshad med pa lnga lang long du 'khrugs pa'i dbus na skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa dar dkar po la'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs bsnams pa spyan yid tsam 'dzum pa 'di lta bur bzhugs pa'o/ /shar du glang po
<p>237a.3</p>che gnyis kyi steng du pad+ma rdo rje dang bral ba'i steng gi zla ba la/ rje btsun ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po sku mdog dkar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor ni rje btsun rin chen sku mdog sngon po phyag g.yas g.yon mchog sbyin
<p>237a.4</p>dang ting nge 'dzin du mdzad pa la rin po che margata cha dgu pas phyag g.yon pa mtshan pa/ rta gnyis kyi steng du pad+ma rdo rje dang bral ba'i zla ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /nub tu ni rje btsun shAkya thub pa gser btso ma lta bur gsal ba/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin nam ting nge 'dzin la/ phyag g.yon
<p>237a.5</p>pa'i mthil na lhung bzed 'dzin pa/ rma bya gnyis kyi steng gi pad+ma rdo rje dang bral ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /byang du rje btsun me tog kun du rgyas pa rin po che margata lta bu/ phyag g.yas pa skyabs sbyin pa g.yon pa ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'i dbus na rdo rje kun du rtse 'dzin pa/ nam mkha' lding
<p>237a.6</p>gnyis kyi steng gi pad+ma rdo rje dang bral ba la bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gi cha lugs ngur smrig dmar po gser gyi ngang ris can tshul du shis par bsnams pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /kha cig na re lnga char dge slong gi cha lugs sam/ 
<p>237a.7</p>yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bya'i/ khyim na gnas pa'i 'khor du rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs su byas pa gnas pa ni rab tu mi bsngags pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/ /shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar du ni/ spyan dang bdag nyid mA ma kI dang gos dkar
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>mo dang sgrol ma/ lha'i rgyal po'i btsun mo'am bud med rin chen ltar bcas pa lo bcu drug lon pa/ mdog dkar po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dag la/ g.yas pa rnams na mig gi 'bras bu dang / rdo rje rtse lnga dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal rang rang gi mdog dang 'dra
<p>237b.2</p>ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams mchog sbyin pa/ gtso bo la mngon du bltas pa/ pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'khod pa ste/ 'di ni snying po rim pa'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug la/ shar nas brtsams te rdo rje sems dpa' nas rdo rje khu tshur
<p>237b.3</p>gyi bar du/ shar phyogs pa bzhi ni dkar ba/ lho phyogs pa bzhi ni sngo ba/ nub phyogs pa bzhi ni dmar ba/ byang phyogs pa bzhi ni ljang ba/ g.yas rnams na/ rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang / /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan mdzub/ /pad+mo ral gri 'khor lo ljags/ /las dang
<p>237b.4</p>'jigs byed go cha bcangs/ /zhes bya ba rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'am/ yang na lag pa gnyis kas rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin par brtson pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba la sogs par skyil mo krung gis 'khod pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu thu bo brgyan
<p>237b.5</p>ltar/ dar la ba bcing bcas pa rab tu dpa' zhing spro spro ltar gnas so/ /de nas rtsibs mchan gyi shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar du sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba rnams la/ dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu'i mdog can lag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / 
<p>237b.6</p>rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wang dang / gar gyi lag pa can sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi sems dpa'i skyil mo krung la na tshod la sogs pa spyan la sogs pa lta bu'o/ /de nas gru chad bzhi la shar lho nas brtsams te/ me tog la sogs pa bzhi ste/ lag na me tog gi gzhong bu dang / pog
<p>237b.7</p>phor dang / dri'i dung phor dang / mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa/ stan dang mdog dang na tshod la sogs pa spyan la sogs pa lta bu bzhin no/ /de nas sgo bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba bzhi la shar nas brtsams te/ lcags kyu ma la sogs pa mdog spyan la sogs pa dang 'dra ba/ rab tu khro ba mig
<p>238a</p>
<p>238a.1</p>gsum pa zlum zhing 'bur ba/ stag gi pags pa dang / sbrul gdug pas brgyan pa/ g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ bgegs chen po la rnam par 'tshe zhing khang pa brtsegs ma'i sgor srung ba la mngon par brtson pa/ lag pa g.yas rnams lcags kyu dang / zhags pa
<p>238a.2</p>dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams bgegs ma rungs pa la bsdigs pa'o/ /kha cig na re 'di rnams kyang zhi ba'i sku can no zhes zer ro/ /de ni mi rigs te/ rgyud phyi ma las/ sgo ba rnams kyang khros pa la/ /khros pa'i dbang du gyur par bris/ /zhes
<p>238a.3</p>gsungs pa ni kun du drang bar rigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi khyams la byang shar nas brtsams te/ pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i lte ba'i zla ba la byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po che dang / ye shes tog rnams dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir bskal pa bzang
<p>238a.4</p>po pa rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas par brtag go/ /de nas sgo khyud kyi rtsar pad+ma'i zla ba la 'phags pa gshin rje gshed sngon po g.yon brkyang bas ma he la brdzis pa/ g.yas na be con gdengs pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub can spyan gsum pa rab tu khros pa stag pags dang / thod
<p>238a.5</p>pa dang / sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ hUM gi nga ros skrag par byed pa me'i 'od 'phro ba ste/ khro bo lhag ma rnams kyang cha lugs de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas sgo khyud cig ngos kyi rtsa nas bzung ste/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma re re ba drug la dang por rang sangs rgyas 'jigs med dang snang ba la sogs pa'o/ /de nas
<p>238a.6</p>'phags pa nyan thos kauN+Di n+ya dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang 'od srungs rnams so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa
<p>238a.7</p>dang / rang sangs rgyas dpa' bo 'dul ba dang / gdung ba sel ba dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rab 'byor dang / kun dga' bo dang / gyad bu nor dang / 'char ka rnams bri'o/ /nub phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang / ngan song thams cad spong dang / 
<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / rang sangs rgyas shes rab mgyogs chen dang / dug gsum sel ba dang / 'phags pa nyan thos chu klung 'od srungs dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / sgra
<p>238b.2</p>gcan 'dzin dang / nye ba 'khor rnams so/ /byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / rang rgyal smra ba chen po dang / 'jigs med seng ge
<p>238b.3</p>dang / 'phags pa nyan thos ga ya 'od srungs dang / ba lang bdag dang ma 'gags pa dang / dga' bo rnams so/ /de ltar lho phyogs pa ma lus pa sngon po'o/ /nub phyogs pa dmar po'o/ /byang phyogs pa ljang gu'o/ /'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni lhung bzed lag pa gnyis
<p>238b.4</p>kyis lte bar 'dzin pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rin po che pad+ma dang rdo rje sna tshogs pa'o/ /khro bo lhag ma gsum ni ral gri dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje g.yas na 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon rnams sdigs mdzub kyis bgegs la
<p>238b.5</p>bsdigs pa'o/ /'di ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha rnams so/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rim pa dang po la/ shar du brgya byin ser po rin po che'i go rgyan can/ sa srung dkar po la zhon pa/ g.yas pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa de la sogs
<p>238b.6</p>pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ /lhor tshangs pa dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa gdong bzhi pa g.yas na phreng ba dang bdug spos kyi yu ba nas 'dzin pa/ g.yon pad+ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ shi ri dang dbyangs can ma dang shAn+ta la sogs pas bskor ba'o/ /nub tu khyab 'jug nag po rin po che'i cod
<p>238b.7</p>pan can nam mkha' lding la zhon pa/ nub tu lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang klu chen dkar po sbrul mgo bdun bdun gyi gdengs ka byas pa/ pad+ma dkar po'am sbrul gnyis 'khril ba la 'dug pa/ ut+pal g.yon na 'dzin pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin pa/ chung ma sbrul mgo gsum pas
<p>239a</p>
<p>239a.1</p>mgul nas 'khyud pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba chas pa lta bu'o/ /yang na mtha' yas ser po rin po che 'dzin pa/ 'jog po ser po ut+pal 'dzin pa/ stobs kyi rgyu sngon po sprin 'dzin pa/ rigs ldan dkar po rin po che'i sdong bu 'dzin pa/ nor rgyas kyi bu ser po rin
<p>239a.2</p>po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa/ dung skyong ljang gu dung 'dzin pa/ pad+ma dkar po pad+ma 'dzin pa/ chu lha dkar po zhags pa 'dzin pa dag dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' dkar po de dag dang 'dra ba las/ sprin 'dzin pa gnyis dang / klu'i rigs lnga dang / gsang ba rnams so/ /byang du ni gnod
<p>239a.3</p>sbyin rnams so/ /de nas rang rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa la/ shar du pa ba sangs dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lag pa na ku mu da thogs pa'o/ /lhor phur bu mdog dkar po zla ba la gnas pa/ dar la ser po'i stod g.yogs
<p>239a.4</p>bgos pa/ g.yon pa glegs bam thogs pa/ g.yas pa chos 'chad pa 'dra ba'o/ /nub tu zla ba dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa/ lag na pad+ma thogs pa/ drung na bud med rnga yab thogs pa'o/ /byang na gza' lag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon na ut+pal thogs pa/ g.yas
<p>239a.5</p>dam pa sbyin pa'o/ /shar lhor mig dmar dkar po byis pa'i gzugs can g.yas g.yon mchog sbyin can no/ /lho nub tu nyi ma snga ma bzhin no/ /nub byang du spen pa nag po gos dmar po bgos pa lag na ral gri thogs pa'o/ /lho nub bam byang gi stod du/ sgra gcan dud
<p>239a.6</p>ka dmar nag lte ba man chad sbrul/ lte ba yan chad skyes pa/ gdong phal che ba/ sma ra dang ag tshom 'bar ba skra gyen du brdzes pa 'jig rten gsum za bar byed pa/ mche ba bzhi pa brang gi g.yon phyogs su thal mo sbyor ba'o/ /de nas phyogs kyi gza' re re rtsa na rang gi 'khor rgyu skar
<p>239a.7</p>bdun bdun gnas pa ni/ shar phyogs na smin drug dmar po bum pa'i steng na 'dug pa/ snar ma ljang gu khyu mchog dkar po la zhon pa dang / mgo ser po ri dwags sha ba la zhon pa dang / lag dmar po sbrul 'khyil pa la zhon pa dang / nab so ser po pad+ma la 'khod pa dang / rgyal ljang gu
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>bum pa la gnas pa dang / skag ljang gu pho rog chen po la zhon pa rnams so/ /lho phyogs na mchu ser po ma he la zhon pa dang / gre dkar po pad+ma la 'khod pa dang / dbo ljang ser rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa dang / me bzhi ser po glang po che la 'khod pa dang / nag pa ljang gu rma bya la zhon pa
<p>239b.2</p>dang / sa ri dmar po srad bu la gnas pa dang / sa ga ljang gu ra skyes dkar po la zhon pa rnams so/ /nub phyogs na gnas pa rnams ni/ lha mtshams ser po bya rog dkar po la zhon pa dang / snron dmar po stan nang tshangs can la 'khod pa dang / snrubs ljang gu rus sbal la 'khod pa
<p>239b.3</p>dang / chu stod ser po la phug la gnas pa dang / chu smad ljang gu mi la zhon pa dang / byi bzhin ser po stan nang tshangs can la 'khod pa dang / gro bzhin ser por bal gyi skon bu la 'khod pa rnams so/ /byang phyogs na gnas pa rnams ni/ mon gru dmar po stan nang tshangs can la 'khod
<p>239b.4</p>pa dang / mon gre ljang gu khyu mchog dkar po la zhon pa dang / khrums stod ljang gu gser gyi khri la 'khod pa dang / khrums smad ser po gser gyi khri la 'khod pa dang / nam gru dmar po rta la zhon pa dang / tha skar ljang gu mi la zhon pa dang / bra nye sngon po 'khor lo'i steng na 'khod pa rnams te/ 
<p>239b.5</p>'dir 'di dag 'od zer kha dog lnga pas bskor ba thal mo sbyar ba'am/ ji ltar dga' ba'i lag ca 'dzin pa rnams so/ /rim pa bzhi pa las shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi lha dpag tu med pa dang / mtshams rnam pa bzhir khyim dang ri dang lo tog gi lha dag dang / 
<p>239b.6</p>sprin dang shing dang / kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / nags dang chu klung dang / sman gyi lha dag dang / rgya mtsho dang / dur khrod dang / grong khyer gyi lha dpag tu med pa shar lho la sogs par kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / lag ca sna tshogs par gnas pa'o/ /'dir dkyil 'khor chen por
<p>239b.7</p>gsungs pa tsam zhig smos su zad de/ rnal 'byor pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dus dang / chos bstan pa'i tshe ni 'khor dpag tu med pa 'dus par shes par byas te/ ji skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje gtsug tor las/ /gsang sngags la sogs ldan pa yi/ /rig sngags khro bo mang po kun/ / 
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>rgyal ba'i sku la mngon phyogs par/ /bsam gtan ngoms phyir rtag tu gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pas pad+ma dang zla ba'am/ nyi ma la bzhugs par bya la/ 
<p>240a.2</p>'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes dang tshogs phyogs gcig pa yin pa'i phyir/ de dag ni pad+ma 'dab ma ya re zhig la 'khod par bya zhing tshangs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha de dag ni/ tshogs ma lus par bsags par 'dod cing / khams gsum la chags
<p>240a.3</p>pa dang bral ba'i phyir pad+ma dmar po la 'khod par bya la/ 'jig rten pa phal pa rnams ni yon tan de dag dang yang mi ldan pas rang gi stan smos pa med na/ sa nyid la 'khod par bya ste/ ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa las gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas rnams
<p>240a.4</p>ni thams cad dang / /de sras blo can rnams kyi gdan/ /pad+ma yid las 'byung ba'i mchog /bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyis bsngags/ /rang sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom pa/ /phyogs gcig shes rab gang grags pa/ /de dag stan du shes par bya/ /pad+ma las byung 'dab ma
<p>240a.5</p>pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang / /tshangs sogs pa yi 'jig rten grags/ /de dag stan ni pad+ma dmar/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/ /phal pa rnams ni ci rigs par/ /sa yi bye brag dag la bsam/ /zhes so/ /de bzhin du gang du kha dog dang dbyibs dang / 
<p>240a.6</p>tshad nges par ma gsungs pa der/ rang gi yid la ji ltar dga' bar bsgom par bya'i 'di lung gsal po med do zhes yid gnyis mi bya ste/ de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de nyid las/ gzugs ni gnyis su shes par bya/ /bud med dag ni skyes
<p>240a.7</p>pa nyid/ /yang na kun du thams cad kyi/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te/ /bsam pas ye shes las byung bas/ /de bas de rnams bsam yas te/ /ye shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ /sems can don phyir tha dad gyur/ /yid kyi rgya ni ji tsam par/ /stan dang phyag rgya
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>dag dang ni/ /lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin/ /de tsam du ni shes par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rim pa bzhi po de nyid la sngags pa de'i snying rje rab tu bskyed pa dang bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas ngan 'gro bkug par ston pa'i bdag nyid/ shar du sems can dmyal
<p>240b.2</p>ba rnams dang / lhor dud 'gro rnams dang / nub tu yi dwags rnams dang / byang du phug ron dkar po dang / sbrul nag po dang / rtsangs pa nag po dang / phag rnams las phag gis gsum po za ba ltar gnas par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan
<p>240b.3</p>nas/ da ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi lha rnams ston te/ dbus su ni rje btsun dam pa shAkya thub pa gser btso ma lta bu phyag g.yas g.yon dag mchog sbyin dang / ting nge 'dzin mdzad pa/ dge slong gi cha lugs can seng ge khri'i pad+ma dang zla bas brgyan pa la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ / 
<p>240b.4</p>shar gyi rtsibs la phyag na rdo rje mdog ljang gu dpa' bo g.yas dang g.yon na rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rgyal ba'i gtsug tor mdog sngo bsangs la/ phyag g.yas g.yon rdo rje dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu 'khor los sgyur ba mdog ser po phyag gnyis na gser gyi
<p>240b.5</p>'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rnam par rgyal ba mdog ser po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na dam pa sbyin pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyis mtshan pa can no/ /shar lhor gzi brjid kyi phung po mdog dmar skya la phyag gnyis nyi ma rin po ches mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lho nub tu rnam
<p>240b.6</p>par 'joms pa mdog sngo bsangs phyag g.yas g.yon be con dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o/ /nub byang du rnam par 'thor ba mdog dmar ba phyag g.yas g.yon na ral gri dang sdigs mdzub can no/ /byang shar du gdugs dkar po can mdog dkar po/ phyag gnyis gdugs dkar po
<p>240b.7</p>gser gyi yu ba can 'dzin pa ste/ 'di dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i cha lugs bshad pa dang 'dra ba las rgyal ba'i rigs 'ba' zhig yin pas na gtsug tor gyi ming gis mtshan pa'o/ /lha lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin no/ /phyag na rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor
<p>241a</p>
<p>241a.1</p>du ni dbus su phyag na rdo rje sku mdog dkar po/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar 'dzin pa dpa' bo'i cha byad can rgyan ma lus pas brgyan pa'o/ /phyogs bzhir rgyal po bzhi 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs can te/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du ji skad du bshad
<p>241a.2</p>pa las/ 'dir gdan pad+ma dang zla ba 'ba' zhig la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni/ ji ltar rdo rje gtsug tor du bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje nyid las cung zad khro ba'i ngang tshul can nam/ yang na
<p>241a.3</p>hUM gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang dril bu bcang bar bya'o/ /phyogs lhag ma ni bshad zin to/ /phyogs skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du yang de bzhin te lhag ma ni bshad zin la/ cung zad du ni nyi ma dang phyag gnyis mdun du shar stod dang shar smad du'o/ /gza'i dkyil 'khor du yang de bzhin te/ lhag
<p>241a.4</p>ma rnams bshad zin to/ /klu chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang de bzhin te/ lhag ma rnams ni bshad zin to/ /'jigs byed chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni/ dbus su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba de nyid 'phags pa de kho na 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ ut+pal cher sngo
<p>241a.5</p>'tsher ba'i mdog /rdo rje hUM mdzad bsdus pa ni/ /khro dang bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /g.yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /g.yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis dka'
<p>241a.6</p>zlog gi/ /nu ma'i steng du gnon pa bri/ /zhes gsungs pa gnas pa ste/ 'di ni rab tu drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i mdun du ni 'jigs byed chen po ste khyu mchog la zhon pa nag po g.yas dang g.yon rtse gsum dang cang te'u thogs pa rab tu 'jigs su rung
<p>241a.7</p>ba/ 'jigs byed ma de dang 'dra ba dang bcas pa'o/ /lhor khyab 'jug mthing ga /g.yas dang g.yon na 'khor lo dbyug pa can nam mkha' lding la zhon pa/ nub tu tshangs pa ngang pa la zhon pa gdong bzhi pa g.yas dang g.yon na spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng can no/ /shar du dbang po dkar
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1</p>po sa srung gi bu la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub g.yas dang g.yon pas 'dzin pa'o/ /byang shar du tshogs kyi bdag po dmar ba glang po'i gdong can dgra sta dang / la phug g.yas dang g.yon na 'dzin pa byi ba la zhon pa'o/ /byang du lus ngan sngon po rta la zhon pa ne'u le dang rin po
<p>241b.2</p>che'i dbyug to 'dzin pa'o/ /nub byang du b+h+r-ing+gi ri ti lus sha med pa/ keng rus su gnas pa g.yas dang g.yon na phreng ba dang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'o/ /lho nub tu gshin rje nag po be con dang / sdigs mdzub g.yas dang g.yon na 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir khyab 'jug la sogs pa thams cad
<p>241b.3</p>kyang rang rang gi phyogs 'dra ba'am/ yang ci dga' ba'i chung ma rnams kyi mgul nas 'khyud pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can du gnas pa'o/ /lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du dbus su snga ma bzhin no/ /shar du lha chen po dkar
<p>241b.4</p>po mig gsum pa/ g.yas dag na tri shU la dang khri rkang 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na thod pa 'dzin pa/ zla ba phyed pa dang thod pas mgo la mtshan pa khyu mchog la zhon pa'o/ /lhor dbang po ljang sngon sa srung gi bu la zhon pa g.yas dang g.yon dag rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin no/ /nub
<p>241b.5</p>tu tshangs pa dmar po g.yas dag na pad+ma dang tri shU la 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon dag na phreng ba dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa ngang pa la gnas pa'o/ /byang du khyab 'jug sngon po g.yas dag na 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rdo rje dang dbyug pa can nam mkha' lding la zhon pa/ byang shar
<p>241b.6</p>du tshogs kyi bdag po dmar skya g.yas dag na dgra sta dang la phug /g.yon dag na la du can byi ba la zhon pa'o/ /shar lhor 'dod pa'i lha dmar po mda' dang gzhu thogs pa'o/ /nub byang du b+h+r-ing+gi ri ti dkar po g.yas na tri shU la/ g.yon na nor bu can no/ /lho nub tu smin drug gi bu
<p>241b.7</p>mgo gsum pa lag gnyis mdung thogs pa'o/ /phyi rol du shar du nag po chen po mig bgrad pa thor tshugs can zla ba tshes pa dang thod pa skam pos mgo la mtshan pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon dang po gnyis na nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis rtse gsum pas mtshan
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>pa/ seng ge'i khri la sku rten bcas te 'khod pa/ stag lpags kyis smad dkris pa mtshan bgreng ba'am/ yang na lag pa drug pa las g.yas g.yon tha ma seng ge dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor ni stobs bzangs ljang ser sdang mig tu lta ba dang lag pa
<p>242a.2</p>gnyis tri shU la'am bshol thogs pa'o/ /nub tu dge ba'i dbang phyug ste kha dog dmar ba gsus pa che ba nag po chen po'i mtshan ma can no/ /byang du ni stobs chen te stobs bzangs lta bu las 'khor lo thogs pa lta bu'o/ /'di ltar yang rang 'dra ba'i chung mas mgul nas
<p>242a.3</p>'khyud pa'o/ /kha cig na re 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi lhag ma lus pa rang rang dang 'dra ba'i chung mas 'khyud pa'o zhes zer ro/ /lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe
<p>242a.4</p>mtha' yas sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yon dang g.yas gnyis ting nge 'dzin dang skyabs sbyin mdzad pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chas pa lta bu'o/ /shar du phyag na rdo rje sngon bzhin te ljang gu'am dkar po/ byang du khro bo rnam par rgyal ba mdog sngo smug g.yon pa sdigs mdzub
<p>242a.5</p>can/ g.yas rdo rje kun du rtse gdengs pa'o/ /g.yas su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po phyag g.yas g.yon dag na ral gri dang rin po che 'dzin pa/ nub tu 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i yu ba nas 'dzin cing g.yas pas thugs kar
<p>242a.6</p>'byed pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin no/ /de nas rgyud phyi ma'i phyi mar kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni/ dbus su phyag na rdo rje sngon bshad pa lta bu'am/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba sngon bshad pa lta bu'o/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje dang dril
<p>242a.7</p>bu thugs kar 'dzin pa mdog dkar ba bsam/ kun du bzang po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag na rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'am/ bde ba chen po dmar ba phyag dang po na rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ phyag 'og ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa dag gang yang rung ba'o/ /mdun du phyag na
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>rdo rje ste ljang gu la sngon bzhin no/ /g.yas dang nub dang byang du rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang rdo rje las rnams sngon bzhin no/ /rim pa gnyis pa las sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / thams cad skyob dang / gtsug tor can dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 
<p>242b.2</p>'od srungs dang / mar me mdzad dang / shAkya'i tog dag shar nas brtsams te/ dge slong gi cha byad can spyod lam mdzes pa gser btso ma'i mdog can mnyam pa'i skyil krung la ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can no/ /rim pa gsum pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sngon bzhin no/ / 
<p>242b.3</p>rim pa bzhi pa la byams pa la sogs pa sngon bzhin no/ /rim pa lnga pa la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams sngon bzhin no/ /rim pa drug pa la lha chen po bzhi dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bcu gcig ste sngon bzhin no/ /rim pa bdun pa la gza' dang rgyu skar
<p>242b.4</p>dang / sa'i lha nas phag gi bar du ste sngon bzhin no/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du ni/ dbus su khro bo me'i nyi ma 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor bdag po lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gsum snang ni sngon po g.yas dang g.yon rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang nyi ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'jig rten
<p>242b.5</p>gsum 'dul ni ser po g.yas dang g.yon na ral gri dang sdigs mdzub bo/ /'jig rten gsum 'joms ni dmar po g.yas dang g.yon na dgra sta dang sdigs mdzub bo/ /'jig rten gsum 'ching ni lcags kyu dang lcags sgrog go/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ni sngo ba phyag gnyis dpung par
<p>242b.6</p>bsnol ba'o/ /dbyug pa sngon po ni sngo skya g.yas dang g.yon na be con dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa can no/ /mi g.yo ba ni smug nag g.yas g.yon rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub can no/ /rta mgrin dmar po g.yas g.yon be con dang sdigs mdzub can no/ /dus kyi lcags kyu ni dkar ba g.yas
<p>242b.7</p>g.yon lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub ste/ 'og ma dag gis kyang g.yon pa rnams sdigs mdzub bo/ /dus kyi zhags pa sngon po g.yas na zhags pa can no/ /dus kyi 'ching ba dmar ba lcags sgrog can no/ /dus kyi chags pa ljang gu g.yas dril bu'o/ /dus kyi srin po ni
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>nag po g.yas g.yon be con dang sdigs mdzub can no/ /dus kyi dbyig pa ni smug nag g.yas g.yon be con dang sdigs mdzub bo/ /dus kyi gnod sbyin mo ni smug nag g.yas g.yon mche ba dang skyabs sbyin can no/ /dus kyi mtshan mo ni nag mo g.yon dgra sta
<p>243a.2</p>dang sdigs mdzub can no/ /'di rnams kyis ji lta ba 'dod pa'i ma rungs pa rnams g.yon brkyang bas brdzis pa la/ g.yon pas sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi ma mnan pa ste/ shar gyi rtsibs nas gzung ste'o/ /dus kyi srin mo la sogs pa ni lha'i snam bu'i gra bzhir shar lho nas brtsams te'o/ / 
<p>243a.3</p>yang na phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan zhing bya ba dang / rgyu ma thogs shing dbu mtha' yas/ /zhes gsungs pas/ dbyibs nges pa ci zhig bya ste/ blo la ji ltar nus pa'i dbu dang phyag dang cha lugs mi bzad par bsgom zhing bri bar bya'o/ /kha cig dgod pa gzhan du byed pa ni mi rigs te/ 
<p>243a.4</p>che ba'i cho ga ste/ rtsibs bcu gnyis zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du dbyibs nges pa yang bsal zin to/ /sgo skyong rnams ni sngon bzhin no/ /de ltar lha'i tshogs 'di snyed kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir/ /lha'i mchog thams cad kyi dga' ba'i tshal yid du 'ong ba zhes bya
<p>243a.5</p>ba gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang / rang bzhin spyod lam dang / skyes pa dang bud med dang / 'gro ba rigs sna tshogs su snang bas ji ltar rigs par 'gro ba rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa ste/ ji skad
<p>243a.6</p>du zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las kyang / res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste/ /res 'ga' 'dod pa rgyab kyis phyogs/ /res 'ga' zhi ba res 'ga' drag /res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de/ /de la sogs te mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas
<p>243a.7</p>btab pas/ /ci dga' dngos grub 'dod pa la/ /bdag gi ngo bor ston par byed/ /ces gsungs te/ de'i phyir yang dag par na bcom ldan 'das nyid 'khor phun sum tshogs par yang snang ste/ 'chad pa por ste de ni chos so/ /rang yon tan ldan pas nyan pa'ang nga zhes
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar lha'i mchog thams cad ces bya ba'i bshad pa mchog ma brjod nas/ da ni yang tha mal pa nyid la 'jug par bya ste/ lha rnams nyid mchog yin la de rnams thams cad dga' ba'i tshal lam/ yang na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na mchog
<p>243b.2</p>ni dga' ba'i tshal na gnas pa rnams te/ de rtag tu yid dga' ba'i phyir ro/ /ci de rnams la yang tha dad pa yod dam zhe na/ los kyang ste sum cu rtsa gsum zhes bya ba nyid kyang chos bzang na gnas pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum nyid/ 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye
<p>243b.3</p>bar gzhag pa las gsungs pa ni bstan bcos las grags pa yin/ drag po bcu gcig la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ni/ 'jig rten la grags pa'o/ /dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer chen po blta na sdug ces bya ba'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu 'das pa na/ skyed
<p>243b.4</p>mos tshal dga' ba zhes bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa ste/ gser gyi ra bas bskor ba bla gab can/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyor ba/ bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / shing dang rdzing dang / me tog phun
<p>243b.5</p>sum tshogs pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yod de/ de bas na yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang lha'i bu mo sna tshogs pa rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa yin no/ /de ltar na dga' ba'i tshal ni ha cang ches la/ 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das rab tu yang rgya
<p>243b.6</p>che ba ji ltar 'dzin nus she na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bsnyung gi rtse tsam gyi sa phyogs kyang rab tu yangs la yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rgyal ba zhi bar gshegs nas ni dman zhing kho re chung bar 'gyur te/ ji skad du 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las/ gang tshe rgyal
<p>243b.7</p>ba mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ /de tshe de yi zhing rnams 'grib par 'gyur/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan/ /sems can rnams kyang kun nas nyon mongs 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs la/ yang gzhan du gsungs pa/ skra tsam khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni/ /gang+gA'i klung gi
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>bye ma ji snyed pa/ /rgyal ba de rnams zhing yang de snyed de/ /de yang skal ba mi mnyam mtshan nyid bcas/ /skra tsam khyon 'dir 'gro ba lngar gtogs pa/ /dmyal ba rnams dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyang / /dogs pa dag
<p>244a.2</p>dang nye bar gtser ba'ang med/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos de bsam mi khyab/ /ces so/ /de bas na 'phags pa sdom pa gsum bstan pa las/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po de ni mtho ba zlum pa gnas 'phang dang rgyar yangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yang sdud pa pos legs
<p>244a.3</p>par smras pa ste/ ri de yang sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho ba de na de ltar bden la/ deng sang na ni ri rab tu chung bar snang bas so/ /yang chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar ma shes shing / bsod nams ma byas pa la dman zhing tha gru chung la/ de dag bsod nams byas pa
<p>244a.4</p>dang / chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes pa dag la/ rab tu yangs shing bzang la 'byor bar snang ba ni/ ji ltar 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ tshangs pa ral pa can gyis/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i
<p>244a.5</p>bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su ma dag go zhes ma zer cig /btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste/ dper na btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas bkod pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan
<p>244a.6</p>'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa yang nged kyis de 'dra bar mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar na dga' ba'i tshal de'i me tog la sogs pa ma lus pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs yin nam zhe na/ lha de dag gi rang gi las las byung ba yang yod de/ 
<p>244a.7</p>ji skad du 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ rnam rtog dge las byung ba yi/ /las dge'i 'bras bu lha rnams te/ /rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni/ /mdzes pa'i lha rnams mngon par 'grub/ /gzhal med khang pa nyams dga' ba/ /de dag gzhan sus byas pa
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>min/ /me tog man+dA ra ba yang / /de dag gzhan sus bskyed pa min/ /sgyu ma'i las las kun 'byung ste/ /byung ba rnams kyang bsam du med/ /ces gsungs pas/ de la yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa yin la/ rnam par rtsen pa zhes bya ba'i bar du lhag ma rnams
<p>244b.2</p>kyis ni rgyas par bstan pa'o/ /de la nor bu dang gser gyi zhing zhes bya ba la nor bu ni/ pad+ma rA ga la sogs pa'o/ /gser ni gser dang sa le sbram mo/ /shing ni a mra la sogs pa'i ljon pa'o/ /de dag kyang rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i yal ga dang / lcug mar bcas pa dang zhes
<p>244b.3</p>bya ba ste/ yal ga ni rang gi yal ga dang yal ga phre'u yin la/ lcug ma ni sdong po gcig las grub cing gsar bur 'thon pa/ yan lag med pa'i ldum bu rnams so/ /de yang gser gyi shing rnams kyi yan lag ni nor bu lcug ma'i dngul/ nor bu'i shing rnams ni yal ga ni
<p>244b.4</p>gser/ lcug ma ni be+e DUr+ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo sde gang dag lha'i yul gyi bde ba ston pa de dag las rgyas par drang ngo / /shing gel pa dang zhes bya ba la/ shing gang zhig rang bzhin gyis phra zhing drung rab tu stug pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu rab tu rgyas pas rang gi lcug ma'i rtse
<p>244b.5</p>mo g.yur za ba/ ched du bris pa ltar gnas pa de dag ni/ shing gel pa ste ji ltar rgun shing rab tu smin pa dag bzhin te/ ji skad du slob dpon zhi ba'i lha'i zhal snga nas/ shing gang 'bras bzang yal ga 'dud pa dang / /zhes smos pa lta bu'o/ /sman dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha yul gyi
<p>244b.6</p>shing gel pa la sogs pa de dag gi rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag ni sman yin te/ lha rnams yid rab tu dul ba'i dbang las gnas der smin pa'i rtsa la sogs pa ni dug med pa 'jam pa reg na bde ba gnod pa med pa dag yin te/ de yang srog gcod
<p>244b.7</p>pa gnod sems dang bcas te spangs pa'i rgyu las grub pa'o/ /me tog ka ma la dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi me tog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ongs pa dang / sprul pa las byung ba
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>la sogs pa bsdu'o/ /dpag bsam gyi shing gis mdzes par byas shing zhes bya ba la/ rang gi rtog pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'dod pa ster ba'i shing dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / sngon po bzhi'i phreng bas nyams dga' shing mdzes par byas so/ /rgyan sna
<p>245a.2</p>tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / me long dang / rgyan mdongs lta bu dang / gzhan yang rgyan snang ba dang mi snang ba rab tu mang pos spras pa'o/ /bya mang po sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhes bya ba la/ ngang pa dang bzhad la sogs pa rin po che'i 'dab ma dang / mchu sder
<p>245a.3</p>can ri mor bris pa ltar mdzes pa/ lha rnams yid du dga' ba der 'debs pa'i bzhon par gyur pa/ yid du 'thad cing rnar snyan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas lha rnams la gdams pa smra ba/ lha'i longs spyod la mtshungs par spyod pa/ tshul khrims dang bral bas dud 'gro'i 'gro bar
<p>245a.4</p>'gyur ba/ bde ba'i dbang po las mtho ris par bgrang ba'i bya de rnams kyis yid du dga' bar byas rnga dang cang te'u dang / kerko dang / gling bu dang / rnga mo che la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba la/ kerko ni 'jig rten na di mug kha zhes grags pa'i rnga'o/ /lhag ma ni go sla ste/ de
<p>245a.5</p>dag kyang kha cig ni yid las byung ba/ kha cig ni dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba/ kha cig ni ched du byas pa dag ste/ yid las byung ba dag ni gzugs med pa sgra tsam grag pa/ lha rnams bag med pa las bzlog pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mang po sgrogs pa/ phal cher brgya byin
<p>245a.6</p>gyi yid las byung ba yin te/ rgya cher ni 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa lha yul gyi bde ba rgyas par ston pa'i mdo sde rnams las drang ngo / /brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang lha'i bu mo mang po sna tshogs rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba la/ 'dis
<p>245a.7</p>mchod sbyin brgya byin pa'am/ rang gi srid thub pas na brgya byin te/ lha'i sde dpon rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa lan bdun pa 'phags pa'i khongs su gtogs pa dang / tshangs pa zhes bya ba rang gi sa las gzhan pa bas che ba'am/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gdung ba zhi bas bsil
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>bar 'gyur bas tshangs pa ste de dang / sogs pa zhes smos pa ni lha'i sde dpon tsan+dan dang / lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang / smin drug gzhon nu la sogs pa gang dag dbang che bar grags pa rnams dang / gzhan yang lha dang lha'i bu mo sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba la/ 'di dag ni mdzes pa
<p>245b.2</p>dang ldan pa ste/ de yang 'dod pa'i khams pa yin pas na/ pho dang mo'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ na tshod dang / bong sa dang ming dang / dbyibs sna tshogs pa de rnams bgad pa dang / chu la rkyal ba dang / me tog 'phen pa dang / khrus byed pa la sogs pa byis pa'i spyod pa grangs med pas
<p>245b.3</p>mngon par rtse zhing dal bar gyur gyi bar du yongs su mi gtong bas na/ khyad par du rtse ba ni/ rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ste/ lha rnams ni bag med pa'i dbang las rtsed mo la rab tu zhugs pas/ sngon nye gnas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu zhig gis 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu mkhan por gyur pa
<p>245b.4</p>sor mo bsgrengs pa'i gus pa la mchog tu smras so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /'o na ci'i phyir rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di dag dga' ba'i tshal der gsungs she na/ nor bu dri ma med pa la phan gdags par bzhed pas de'i 'phel bar gyur pa'i gnas der bshad par shes par bya'o/ /de yang zhu
<p>245b.5</p>bar gyur pa'i rkyen du gzigs nas 'dzam bu'i gling nas der gshegs pa ltar bstan pa ste/ rab tu thugs rje che ba'i phyir ro/ /kha cig na re rgyud 'di mchog yin pa'i phyir gnas mchog tu gsungs so zhes zer te/ de ltar na 'di gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs par ci'i phyir mi
<p>245b.6</p>gsungs so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris ni lha'i ris gong ma gong ma'i drung na phyag dar gyi phung po dang 'dra'o zhes 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa las gsungs te/ de bas na de ni mi rigs so/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na zhes bya ba ni/ de
<p>245b.7</p>dag gis lhag par brten cing longs spyad pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ ji skad du/ yon tan gang dag rgyan ltar dam pa ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa dag /de dag de ni bkra shis ldan bshad de/ /'bab stegs de yin dka' thub gnas de yin/ /zhes bshad
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>pa dang / yang gsungs pa/ gnas gang dag tu 'gro ba'o/ /mig gis rtag par khyod mthong zhing / /gang zhig khyod kyi zhal lta ba/ /'jig rten de nyid bsod nams ldan/ /zhes nges par gnas kyang byin gyis brlabs par zur gyis bstan par 'gyur ro/ /'dir
<p>246a.2</p>gzugs bor na byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba yang / sa phyogs de rdo rje ltar sra zhing 'jig pa'i mes kyang mi gnon la/ de na gnas pa rnams la bdud dang bdud kyi ris pa'i yi dwags la sogs pas mi tshugs par byas pa/ dus rab tu ring po'i bar du yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i
<p>246a.3</p>gnas su byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa ste/ de yang 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las ji skad du gsungs pa/ de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/ bsgrub pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid de/ /gang gi yul du gnas na ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur ba'o/ /gang du bdud bzhi
<p>246a.4</p>btul nas ni/ /bcom ldan mngon par sangs rgyas la/ /dngos grub mang po kun gyi mchog /rmad byung go 'phang thob gyur pa/ /chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram/ /yid du 'ong zhing 'tshe med pa/ /dngos grub zhing ni dam pa ste/ /bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyis gsungs/ /der ni bdud
<p>246a.5</p>rnams mang pos kyang / /gnod par bya bar mi nus te/ /de bas der ni las rnams kun/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrim ste brtsams/ /gang du chos rnams bstan pa dang / /thub pa zhi bar gyur pa dang / /dam pa smin par bya ba'i phyir/ /skye ba gang du bstan pa yi/ /gnas de rnams su
<p>246a.6</p>dngos grub ni/ /rnam pa gsum dag kun du bstan/ /nges shing myur la rgya che zhing / /bgegs med par yang der 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams can gyi gnas rnams gang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i slob ma/ /bskal pa chen po bzhugs bzhugs pa/ /de dag tu yang
<p>246a.7</p>'grub par bsgrags/ /zhes so/ /de'i phyogs gang du yang bzhugs pa de lhag par yon tan dang ldan par gnas pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /gal te byin gyis rlob pa po nyid kyi don ma rtogs so zhe na/ 
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni ji skad du/ gang gis sa bcu bsgrubs nas ni/ /dbang bcu legs rtogs khong du chud/ /stong pa sgyu ma 'dra ba'i chos/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen cing 'dir/ /'jig rten kun gyi tshul mkhyen pa/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin/ /zhes gsungs
<p>246b.2</p>so/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to/ /brgya byin dang zhes bya ba nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor mchog bstan to/ /tshig
<p>246b.3</p>gi don ni 'di lta ste/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bshad pa lta bu'o/ /lha dang zhes bya ba la/ rnam rtog dge las byung ba yi/ /las dge'i 'bras bu lha rnams te/ /rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni/ /mdzes pa'i lha rnams mngon par grub/ /gzhal med
<p>246b.4</p>khang pa nyams dga' ba/ /de dag gzhan sus byas pa min/ /me tog man+dA ra ba yang / /de dag gzhan sus bskyed pa min/ /sgyu ma'i las lam kun 'byung bas/ /'byung ba rnams kyang bsam du med/ /bzang por snang ba'i be+e DUr+ya/ /log par sgrub pa rnams
<p>246b.5</p>kyang brdzun/ /yang dag min las kun bskyed pas/ /lha rnams brdzun par shes pas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni/ /lha yi gzugs kyis bstan pa yin/ /zhes so/ /rig 'dzin zhes bya ba la/ gsang sngags la sogs pa'i mthus nam mkha' la 'gro bar nus pa rig sngags
<p>246b.6</p>kyi thabs 'dzin par 'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa ni rig 'dzin te/ ji skad du 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las gsungs pa/ blo can grub nas nam mkha' la/ /ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya/ /grub pa rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /'o na cis kyang mi tshugs 'gyur/ /pha rol
<p>246b.7</p>gnod pa byed pa ni/ /sdang ba rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/ /rtag tu bdag gi lha nyid ni/ /yid kyis yongs su bzlas par bya/ /bdag gi grub pa'i rdzas la yang / /rtag tu dran zhing blta bar bya/ /rig sngags rgyal po bzlas nas ni/ /sgrub pa rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/ / 
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>rigs kyi rig sngags bzlas na ni/ /grub pa 'jigs pa kun las thar/ /phan tshun dag tu mthong na ni/ /dam tshig rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / /grub pa'i rdzas kyang bstan pa dang / /mkhas pa legs par smras par bya/ /legs par 'ongs sam bde'am zhes/ / 
<p>247a.2</p>thog mar mthong nas mngon par brjod/ /gang nas 'ongs zhes zer na yang / /dri ba'i lan ni gdab par bya/ /lha yi gnas ni thams cad dang / /shing gcig lam ni bzhi mdo dang / /dka' thub nags dang byin can nas/ /mchod sbyin gnas dang bram ze'i gnas/ /mu stegs
<p>247a.3</p>la sogs grub pa des/ /nam yang 'da' bar mi bya'o/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'das gyur na/ /'khrugs nas mod la lhung bar 'gyur/ /bag med dam tshig nyams na ni/ /rig sngags rgyal po yid kyis bzlas/ /lhung ngam ltung bar gyur kyang rung / /de nas de ma thag tu ldang / / 
<p>247a.4</p>nam mkha' dag la gzugs med pa'i/ /'phrul gyi mig can lam rnams ni/ /rab tu grub pa dag gis rig /rnal 'byor can rnams 'gro ba bzhin/ /de las 'gro ba 'ong ba dag /sngon chad sprul pa'i lam nas 'gro/ /bsod nams dbang gis gnas pa'i phyir/ /khyim yang
<p>247a.5</p>ji ltar 'dod pa 'byung / /kun du ljon shing mang por ldan/ /bya rnams du ma phan tshun rgyu/ /lha yi bud med rgyu ba yi/ /rgyan gyi sgra ni rab tu grags/ /de yi glu gar sil snyan gyi/ /mngon par dga' ba'i yon tan gsal/ /me tog bzang po'i bsrung gis khyab/ /mar me'i 'od ni
<p>247a.6</p>rab tu gsal/ /gang dang gang du kun brtags pa/ /der ni dpag bsam ljon shing che/ /'dod pa thams cad kun 'byor pa/ /rmad du byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung / /rin chen rdo leb la sogs phyir/ /rin chen bzhi las 'bab pa'i chu/ /ne'u seng dag dang ldan pa'i sa/ /thams
<p>247a.7</p>cad du yang mngon par 'byung / /rgyan rnams dang ni gos rnams dang / /rtsed mo'i yo byad rnams dang ni/ /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu sogs ldan pa'o/ /dpal gyi shing yang de las skye/ /de ltar grub par 'dod pa'i rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad 'grub/ /grub par gyur nas de
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>nas ni/ /srung ba la ni 'bad par bya/ /skyed mos tshal ni gtsang ma'am/ /ri rnams kyi ni rtse mo'am/ /rgya mtsho yi ni gling dag gam/ /'bab chu yi ni 'gram yang rung / /rang gi 'phrul gyis sprul pa dang / /grub pa dka' phyir sprul pa byed/ /grub pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu/ / 
<p>247b.2</p>sngon du grub nas gnas su'ang rung / /zhes pas te/ 'dir rgya cher brjod pa ni 'og nas rig 'dzin gyi tshul brjod pa la dgos pa blo la bzhag nas brjod par zad do/ /de yang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bo ni/ /rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po yang / /kuny+dzar zhes bya ba dang / / 
<p>247b.3</p>tsi tam+ka dang ki ri ti/ /ma mo'i lus su lo tsa na/ /tsi tra b+ha na su sid+d+hA r+tha/ /rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po ste/ /bdun po de dag rigs kyi gtso/ /sngon po grub ste mthu chen rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la/ /lho yi phyogs su tha dad dgod/ /ces bya ba gsungs pa
<p>247b.4</p>rnams yin la/ de dag nyid 'khor lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa'o/ glegs bam la la las ni/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i rig 'dzin 'khor lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang zhes 'don te/ /der ni lha'i 'khor
<p>247b.5</p>gtso bo smos pas bsdus la/ 'di lha yang yin la rig 'dzin yang yin zhes gzhi mthun pa'i bsdu ba bya'o/ /gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba'i mdo las gsungs pa/ sems ni rnam par gyur pa las/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs ni
<p>247b.6</p>mngon grub pa/ /lus kyi bong tshod che ba yang / /sems gcig gis ni kun du bskyed/ /sems la 'jigs pa yod min te/ /tshogs pa dag las 'jigs pa skye/ /yod pa min pa'i las rnams las/ /mi sdug rnam pa bsam yas ltos/ /mi sdug rnam pa bsam yas pa/ / 
<p>247b.7</p>shin tu stongs par shes pas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni/ /gnod sbyin gzugs kyis bstan pa yin/ /zhes so/ /srin po dang zhes bya ba la/ /bdag bsrung ba las sdug bsngal 'grub/ /bdag nyid nye bar mi dmigs pas/ /gzhan bsrung ba las kun brtson
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>pa/ /de tshe bde ba rgya chen 'grub/ /ces bya'o/ /lha ma yin zhes bya ba la/ /a yis rgyas btab lha min te/ /skye ba med las yang dag 'byung / /'gag med 'byung ba yod min pas/ /lha ma yin gyi ting 'dzin bstan/ /zhes bya'o/ /dri za dang zhes bya ba la/ chos de
<p>248a.2</p>shin tu 'gro med kyang / /'gro ba'i sgrar ni brjod pas ni/ /'gro bas 'gro ba med shes pas/ /dri za'i ting 'dzin bstan pa yin/ /zhes bya'o/ /mi'am ci dang zhes bya ba la/ byas min byas pa'i las kyis ni/ /mi'am ci nyid kun du bskyed/ /'di dag skye ba med shes pas/ / 
<p>248a.3</p>mi'am ci yi ting 'dzin bstan/ /zhes bya'o/ /lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba las/ ming gang gis ni chos 'di dag /'jig rten dag tu sna tshogs gzhag /chos de 'di la yod ma yin/ /med pas thams cad kun du brtags/ /kun du brtags par kun shes na/ /ngo bo nyid kyi
<p>248a.4</p>kun rtog med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis bstan/ /zhes bya'o/ /klu zhes bya ba la/ mi bzod bskyed pa byas nas ni/ /yod min sprin gyi gzugs ston cing / /char pa'i rgyun dag rab 'bebs pa/ /de dag nang na mi gnas kyang / /'dzam bu'i gling
<p>248a.5</p>'dir rgya mtsho dang / /klung dang dug can yongs su 'gengs/ /sngon gyi mtha'a'am phyi ma'i mtha'/ /chu ni 'byung bar yod ma yin/ /de dang mtshungs pa'i sems can kun/ /rtsom pa sna tshogs bslabs pa rnams/ /las rnams sna tshogs ston byed kyang / /las de 'byung ba yod ma yin/ / 
<p>248a.6</p>mkhas pas byis pa rmongs byed pa'i/ /rgyu 'di ma byung shes pas na/ /bde ba ma yin bden snang bas/ /klu yi ting nge 'dzin du bstan/ /zhes bya'o/ /de ltar 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te bshad pa 'di ni 'khor mchog ston pa yin par rang rang gi
<p>248a.7</p>longs spyod dang / gzugs dang / ming gis rnam par thar pa skyed nus shing rtogs pa ston pa'i bshad pa mchog tu 'gyur ba'o/ /sogs pa 'khor du ma dang zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo dang / gza' dang rgyu skar dang / sha za dang 'dre la sogs pa rab tu mang por 'dus par
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>ston pa ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'chad par 'gyur ba las/ smos pa rnams 'dir yang 'dus par 'thad pa'i phyir ro/ /da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
<p>248b.2</p>dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ de la byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang mthun pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyis kun du bzang po'o/ /de rtogs par bya bar sems pa ni sems
<p>248b.3</p>dpa' ste/ de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la sogs pa smos te/ byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa de/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid 'gro ba'i tshogs
<p>248b.4</p>chen po'i don la sems pas na sems dpa' chen po'o/ /blo gros mi g.yo ba dang zhes bya ba la/ 'di ni blo gros chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo bas blo gros mi g.yo ba'o/ /blo gros yangs pa dang zhes bya ba la/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i bden pa gnyis 'di'i blo gros skad
<p>248b.5</p>cig ma gcig gi yul du byed byed pas na blo gros rgya che ba'o/ /kun du blo gros dang zhes bya ba la/ 'gro ba ji snyed pa de snyed du 'di'i blo gros kun du gnas pas na kun du blo gros so/ /blo gros mtha' yas pa dang zhes bya ba la/ 'di'i blo gros mtha' yas pas 'khor ba'i mtha' dang
<p>248b.6</p>mnyam pas blo gros mtha' yas pa'o/ /blo gros pad+ma dang zhes bya ba la/ 'di'i blo gros pad+ma ltar gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos pas na blo gros pad+ma'o/ /blo gros chen po dang zhes bya ba la/ 'di'i blo gros 'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas nyid skyed pas na blo gros chen po'o/ /blo gros
<p>248b.7</p>lha rdzas dang zhes bya ba la/ 'di'i blo gros bum pa bzang po la sogs par ston par byed pas na blo gros lha rdzas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /blo gros sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i blo gros ni shes bya sna tshogs pa ltar skye bas na
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>blo gros sna tshogs so/ /sogs pas smos pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs pa lhag ma rnams bsdu'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni/ drod thob pa yang can sha stag yin te/ nges 'byed yan lag nas gzung ste/ /mthong dang
<p>249a.2</p>goms pa'i sa dag la/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas/ /de 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de nyid mi phyed pas na dge 'dun te/ ji skad du/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/ /bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang / /bskal
<p>249a.3</p>pa brgyar yang mi phyed de/ /de nas dge 'dun zhes brjod do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu yang mang bas so so'i skye bos grangs kyi mi rtogs pas so/ /'o na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ci'i phyir ma smos she na/ 'dir theg pa chen
<p>249a.4</p>po kho na ston pas de dag snod du ma gyur pas ma 'dus so zhes kha cig zer ro/ /de lta na theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig ston pa'i rgyud gzhan las kyang mi smos par rigs na smos pa yod do/ /kha cig na re 'di ni rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad ma thag tu gsungs pas/ sprul pa'i skus don mdzad
<p>249a.5</p>pa'i gang yin pas/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun med do zhes zer te/ de ni rang gi rtog pa'i dri ma stug pos khyab par zad do/ /'dir gtsor theg pa chen po bstan pa'i skabs yin pas na/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ma smos kyang nyes pa med pa la dgongs nas ma smos
<p>249a.6</p>par zad kyi/ dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyang nges par 'dus par blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya'o/ /de la 'dir ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i 'khor dang por smos she na/ sdud pa po thugs rje che bas 'jig rten pa rnams spro ba skyed pa'i ched du'o zhes kha cig zer te/ de lta
<p>249a.7</p>na gzhung gzhan du/ sdud pa po'i thugs rje chung bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig na re rgyud 'di ni gzhan gyi don lhur len pa yin la/ 'jig rten pa'i 'khor dang smos pa yang thugs rjes gzhan gyi don gtsor byed pa'o zhes zer te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang smos na/ gzhan
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>gyi don bya ba la gnod pa ci yod de 'di ni gyi nar zad do/ /kha cig na re 'jig rten pa'i lam la brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam skye'o zhes go rims nges par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/ /de yang cung zad mi 'thad de/ 'dir lam gyi go rims kyi skabs la ma
<p>249b.2</p>bab pas so/ /'di ni dbang po la sogs pa'i lha gnyug mar gnas pa de dag dang lam brjod par glo bur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smos na/ lha'i bu bden par ma mthong ba rnams yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i phyir/ gnyug mar gnas pa rnams dang por
<p>249b.3</p>smos so zhes lo rgyus kyis bshad do/ /de ltar na 'gro ba tha dad pa de dag ci'i phyir dang por bya zhe na/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i 'khor du 'dra bas/ lha'i rnams kyi zhar la bstan par rigs pa'i phyir ro/ /bsti stang du byed ces bya ba ni lus kyi las kyis so/ /bla mar byed ces bya
<p>249b.4</p>ba ni yid la gcags par lta ba'o/ /mchod cing zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'i ngo bo me tog la sogs pas so/ /brjod ces bya ba ni ngag gi las kyi bstod pa don dang mthun par byed pa'o/ /rab tu mchod cing zhes bya ba ni bka' bzhin du byed pa ste 'di ni mchod pa'i mchog yin pas so/ /spel
<p>249b.5</p>te zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i dge ba rnams byang chub thob pa'i rgyur yongs su bsngos pa ste/ 'di'i ni mi zad cing 'phel ba'i mchog yin te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo las/ rgya mtsho chen por 'pho ba'i chu ni bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du
<p>249b.6</p>byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur te zhes gsungs pas so/ /'khor mang po'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni/ sngar 'das ma thag pa rnams kyi dkyil na'o/ /tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to/ /pad+ma'i gdan la zhes bya ba ni/ 'dir
<p>249b.7</p>bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba na bzhugs kyang de'i nyes pas mi gos par ston pa'i phyir pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste/ rten gyis brten pa bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang ji ltar dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa/ ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar yang / /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin gnas
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>pa'i nyes pas kyang / /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /zhes so/ /bzhugs zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa dang tshangs pa dang / lha'i bzhugs pa las ni 'dir tshangs pa'i bzhugs pa ste/ thugs rje chen pos ngan song gi rgyud sbyong ba'i phyir ro/ /spyod lam dang nang du
<p>250a.2</p>yang dag 'jog dang / chos 'chad pa'i bzhugs pa las ni/ chos 'chad pa'i bzhugs pa ste/ 'dir de gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa ston pa ste/ yang dag pa bsdus pa'i dus las/ de sngon yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gleng gzhi rgya cher bshad pa'o/ /de ltar
<p>250a.3</p>nges pa bskyed pa'i gleng gzhi brjod pas/ yid ches par 'gyur ba'i rjes las rgyud kyi don ji ltar nye bar phye snyam pa'i rtog pa zlog par byed pa/ gleng bslang ba bstan pa/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
<p>250a.4</p>ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol bar byed ces bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer sdud pa mang po'i phreng ba nyid kyis dpral ba'i mdzod spu nas phyung nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ 'dir ting nge 'dzin dang po ni de bzhin
<p>250a.5</p>gshegs pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i gzugs mngon du mdzad pa yin la/ gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ngo bo mngon sum du mdzad pa yin te/ 'od zer gyi 'phro ba dang 'du ba ni 'dra bar ngan
<p>250a.6</p>song thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa la sogs pa yin no/ /de bas na rnal 'byor pa bdag gis kyang dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur pas sbyin sreg dang po bya la/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i skur gnas te/ sbyin sreg gnyis pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyi'i
<p>250a.7</p>don te/ yan lag gi don ni ngan song zhes bya ba ni sngar brjod pa rnams so/ /de dag gi rgyud ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu ma zad kyi bar mi chad par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi mtshams sbyor ba dang / ming gi mtha' phrad do/ /ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rtse gcig
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>par gnas pa la'o/ /gdul ba zhi ba dag gi ched du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gang dag ma rung ba 'dul ba de dag gi don ni rdo rje khro bo nyid kyis ni mdzad par rigs pas na/ ngan song gi rgyud las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ / 
<p>250b.2</p>rnam par grol bar byed pa ste/ sangs rgyas su'am yang na sna tshogs par grol bar byed pa ni rnam par grol bar byed de/ re zhig rigs nges pa 'phags pa rnga bo che'i mdo las gdul ba'i rim pas gsungs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
<p>250b.3</p>sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ tshig gi don ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ snyoms par zhugs nas zhes 'dir yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /'od zer sdud pa mang po'i
<p>250b.4</p>phreng ba zhes bya ba la/ ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba'i 'od zer yin la/ bems po las byung ba'i snang ba ni 'od do/ /yang na lus las byung ba'i snang ba ni 'od yin la/ sems las byung ba'i snang ba ni 'od zer yin te/ de bas na 'dir 'od ces bya ba smos so/ /ngan song
<p>250b.5</p>rnams mtho ris la sogs par sdud pas na/ sdud ces smos te/ 'chad par gyur pa las dga' ba'i tshal thams cad kun du snang bar byas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas so/ /phreng ba zhes bya ba ni phreng ba ltar mdzes pa'am/ 'od zer de dag phreng bar sbrengs shing bar
<p>250b.6</p>chad med pa'o/ /nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyi'o/ /mdzod spu nas zhes bya ba ni smin mtshams nas dung dang kha ba ltar dkar ba'i spu sngon bla ma'i skye bo rnams gnas ji lta bar bkod pa las grub pa'i mtshan yod de/ de nyid 'od zer
<p>250b.7</p>las byung ba mi zad pa'i mdzod yin no/ /gdul bya rnams phyir mi ldog par 'god par mdzad pa'i 'od zer ni gnas 'di nas 'byin to/ /byung nas zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'thon pa ste/ 'dir slar bsdu ba'i gnas kyang de nyid yin par shes par bya'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba nas/ byang chub spyod pa nyid la gzhag /ces bya ba'i bar du ni 'od zer gyi las bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rmi lam ltar yud cig grol ba la/ yun rings su grol bar 'du shes pa'am/ 
<p>251a.2</p>skal ba dang ldan pa dag gtan grol ba'o/ /tshig gi don ji lta bu zhe na/ de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba ni/ ji skad du chos mngon pa las/ gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang / /ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang / /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/ / 
<p>251a.3</p>stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod/ /de stong la ni stong gnyis pa/ /bar ma'i 'jig rten khams zhes bya/ /de stong la ni stong gsum mo/ /mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin/ /zhes bshad ste/ skye bo blo chung dag gi ngor rje btsun shAkya thub pa'i zhing ni de tsam zhig tu zad do zhes bstan
<p>251a.4</p>pas zhing rgya chen ma smos so/ /kun du snang bar byas so zhes bya ba ni/ gang na mun nag smag gis khyab pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang mi rgyu ba'i khor yug gi bar de dag mun pa'i g.yung drung ste/ ji skad du 'jig rten gdags pa las/ rgya mtsho 'di yi pha rol na/ /gang gis
<p>251a.5</p>rgya mtsho bskor ba yi/ /khor yug dpag tshad sum brgya dang / /dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do/ /de ni khor yug rir bshad de/ /'jig rten bar mtshams tshun chad du/ /nyi zla de bzhin skar ma dang / /rgyu skar tshogs ni rgya chen kun/ /khor yug mi 'da' 'jig rten
<p>251a.6</p>gyi/ /bar mtshams phan chad mun par 'dug /ces gsungs pas so/ /de yang snang bar byas pas sems can de dag 'di skad du/ kye ma 'dir sems can gzhan skyes so zhes smra bar 'gyur bar byas pa'o/ /ci mun pa gsal ba tsam las mi 'da' byas sam snyam pa
<p>251a.7</p>las/ kun du snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pas bcings pa las rnam par bkrol te zhes bya ba gsungs te/ nyon mongs pa nyid bcings pa ste lhag ma ni go bar sla'o/ /ci'i de tsam du zad snyam pa las/ bde ba so sor thob nas zhes
<p>251b</p>
<p>251b.1</p>gsungs te/ so sor thob nas zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de dag las gang dag lhar skyes pa de dag ni sngon gyi gnas dang lhar skye ba'i rgyu dran nas/ sangs rgyas la byas pa shes par bya ba'i phyir mchod pa byed du lhags pas
<p>251b.2</p>na/ dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o/ /nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de zhes bya ba la dga' ba'i tshal de'i gzhi nor bu gser dri ma med pa'i bye ma bdal ba yin pas de la 'khod nas so/ /gser ni nor bu ma yin gyi/ rin po che yin no zhe na/ 
<p>251b.3</p>yid dga' bar byed pa'i phyir nor bu zhes bya ba la/ gser yang yid dga' bar byed pa'am nor bu'i rgyur gnas pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o/ /yang na nor bu dri ma med pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i bu 'das nas zhag bdun lon pa gang yin pa'o/ /steng du zhes bya ba ni de lha'i
<p>251b.4</p>gnas su skyes pa'i sngon du de dag gi gnas su skyes nas der 'khod pa ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i ched du der bzhugs kyang / de nyid kyi las kyi 'bras bu nges par myong bar bya ba cung zad tsam pa de dus ma rdzogs par ston pas/ 'gro
