<p>272b.3</p>du ni/ me tog dri dang me tog phreng / /mar me yang ni de la sbyin/ /pad+ma ut+pal pu shel tse/ /chang dang 'bras chan sbyin du gzhug /gdugs dkar bsang byed srad bu dang / /de bzhin me tog phreng dkar rnams/ /zhes pa'o/ /lhor ni kri sa ra dang byugs pa'i
<p>272b.4</p>zas/ /sha btsos de bzhin rjen pa dang / /me tog spos dang gtor ma dang / /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pa/ /gtor ma de dag bsdus nas ni/ /lho phyogs su yang sbyin par bya/ /zhes so/ /lho nub tu ni/ khur ba zas dang de bzhin spos/ /de bzhin sha btsos
<p>272b.5</p>rjen pa dang / /zas dang skom dang kri sa ra/ /sdig med khrag gi gtor ma bya/ /dri zhim po yi me tog rnams/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnams kyis bsres/ /zhes pa'o/ /nub tu/ bkra shis 'bras yos bu ram dang / /sa nag kyang ni de bzhin te/ /me tog phreng
<p>272b.6</p>ba bdug pa dang / /nA ga puSh+pa sbyin par bya/ /dri dmar dang ni de bzhin du/ /skud pa dmar po sbyin par bya/ /gu gul dang ni thang shing gi/ /bdug pa de la sbyin par bya/ zhes bya'o/ /'og tu ni de dag nyid dang / me tog kun dang spos kun dang / /me tog phreng ba sna
<p>272b.7</p>tshogs dang / /pad+ma ut+pal pu shel tse/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa'i sha/ /zhes pa'o/ /byang du ni/ zas kun dang ni spos kun dang / /de bzhin me tog thams cad dang / /shing thog kun dang kri sa ra/ /de bzhin 'bras kyi 'o
<p>273a</p>
<p>273a.1</p>thug dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang / /til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas/ /gdugs ser dang ni mchod phyir thogs/ /de bzhin skud pa ser po dang / /'gron bu dag dang gser dag dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshul bzhin du ni sbyin
<p>273a.2</p>par bya/ /zhes pa'o/ /byang shar du ni/ rdzas rnams dang ni 'bras yos dang / /bum pa ba dan sngon po dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang / /de bzhin khur ba zas rnams dang / /dri dang me tog dkar po dang / /'bras kyi 'o thug de bzhin sbyar/ /zhes pa'o/ /shar
<p>273a.3</p>lho dang / nub byang du ni/ swa ti ka dang u lo ba'i/ /bza' ba ci 'byor bu ram can/ /lag pan rtsa ba 'bras bu dang / /'o thug dag ni 'dod pa ste/ /de ni thams cad 'dod ces bya/ /zhes pa thams cad 'dod pa'i gtor ma bya ste/ 'di gnyis la nges pa'i kha
<p>273a.4</p>zas ma gsungs la/ gtor ma 'di nyid snga ma thams cad kyi go sbyar du yang rung ngo / /'byung ba 'di nyid las snga ma rnams lhag par bya'o zhes kha cig rtogs/ gal te sgrub pa po gtor ma rab tu rgyas par sbyin par 'dod pa na/ /rig pa mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa
<p>273a.5</p>ltar/ gdon chen po bco brgyad la yang gtor ma ma 'dres par sbyin par bya ste/ de yang dang po ni gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma bya ste/ bar chad drag po spang ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad la ste/ bar chad spang ba dang / de dag gi brnab sems dgag pa'i phyir ro/ / 
<p>273a.6</p>de nas ni phyogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma ste/ tshogs rdzogs par bya ba dang / las grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni don gyi dbang gis na rdul tshon bkye ste/ nye 'khor ba'i rnam pa lngas byugs nas mchod pa dang yo byad bkod ma thag tu'o/ /khrus sogs bya la zhes
<p>273a.7</p>bya ba ni/ ji skad du 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa las gsungs pa/ lus la dril phyis byas nas ni/ /chu chen rnyog pa med par zhugs nas kyang / /ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar du khrus byas te/ /byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas te/ /chu yis lag pa
<p>273b</p>
<p>273b.1</p>brkyang pa bkrus nas ni/ /pus mo phyi rol du ni bstan byas te/ /bar du lag gzhag tsog tsog por 'dug nas/ /sgra med dbu ba med par nye reg bya/ /lan gsum bar du chu ni 'thungs nas kyang / /mchu la lan gnyis yongs su phyi bar bya/ /so la chags pa lce yis
<p>273b.2</p>reg pa dang / /sbrid par gyur nas kha yang bkru bar bya/ /zhes pa dang / yang de nyid las/ sa phung bshang sgo lnga ste mtshan ma gsum/ /g.yon pa gsum ste lag pa gnyis la bdun/ /yang na sa dang chu yi ji srid du/ /dri ma dri bral de srid bar du bya/ /zhes gsungs
<p>273b.3</p>pas so/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par mos pa zhig yin na ni/ de nyid khrus yin pas/ 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'am/ lus la phan pa'i ched ma yin par/ phyi rol gyi khrus la ched du mi bya ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las
<p>273b.4</p>kyang / mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'byung ba che las thams cad byung / /mi gtsang zhes ni gang las bya/ /thams cad grub par byed pa'i mchog /ces gsungs te/ sogs pa byas la zhes bya ba ni/ ci nas kyang phyis bar chad du mi 'gyur bar/ bza' ba dang btung ba
<p>273b.5</p>longs spyad pa'am/ gtam gyi bsgo ba la sogs pa bya ba ma lus pa rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /dri dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tsan+dan dkar po'i 'de gus ci rigs su byug cing / ma 'byor pas kyang bzhin tsam byug par bya'o/ /phreng mchog phreng ba can zhes bya ba ni/ 
<p>273b.6</p>ut+pal la sogs pa'i phreng ba bzang po mgo bo la bcings shing mgul du yang 'phyang bar byas pa'o/ /dri zhim kha bkang zhes bya ba ni/ gla rtsi bzang po ci rigs cig khar bzung ngam/ zhal kha bsgo ba'i byug pa'i sbyor ba byas pas kha bsgo ba'o/ /mchog mdzes
<p>273b.7</p>pa zhes bya ba ni/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dar dmar po gyon pa/ sor gdub dang / mgul rgyan dang / rna cha dang / mu tig gi do shal la sogs pas mdzes par byas shing / gtsug tor dang / dbu rgyan dang / dar dpyangs kyis sgeg pa'o/ / 
<p>274a</p>
<p>274a.1</p>gal te rab tu byung ba zhig na yang / chos gos snam sbyar la sogs pa rab tu mdzes pa/ rang gi 'dul ba'i cho ga dang mi 'gal bar byas pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' yol ba chen pos bskor la/ bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi shar du
<p>274a.2</p>stan nang tshangs can la 'dug ste/ sngon bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la/ bris pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang yid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bar bskyed de/ bdag nyid dbus su gnas pas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya/ rdo rje sor mo gnyis
<p>274a.3</p>kyi rtse mo yang dag par bsdams shing / bsnyams la bkan te oM badzrod g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM zhes brjod cing rab tu khros la/ g.yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i 'dug stangs la brten te/ sgo thams cad dam shar gyi sgo dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas badzra badzra hUM zhes
<p>274a.4</p>brjod cing phyir 'byung bar bya ste/ yid dang phyag rgyas ri mo dang / /rdo rje thig kyang gdab bya ste/ sangs rgyas ri mo dri med pa/ /ldan pa 'gongs kyang nyes pa med/ /ces gsungs te/ 'dir yang ri mos bskor ma thag tu sbyor ba 'di byas la/ yang na phyag rgya ma bkod par bya
<p>274a.5</p>yang rung ngo / /de nas rang rang gi sngags brjod pas/ lha'i tshogs sum cu rtsa bdun 'grub par blta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa ni/ ched du bskyed pa dang spyan drang mi dgos kyi/ gang du dkyil 'khor chen po gnas pa der/ rang bzhin kho nas
<p>274a.6</p>byon no/ /de nas/ /gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor/ /mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rje btsun rnams so/ /rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' dang lha mo la sogs pa'o/ /'khor mang po rnams ni
<p>274a.7</p>zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'o/ /spyan drangs te zhes bya ba ni bod pa ste/ ji ltar spyan drangs she na/ de'i phyir/ phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing / /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de la phyag rgya ni 'og nyid nas/ 
<p>274b</p>
<p>274b.1</p>gsang ba'i bcing bas bcings nas ni/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te/ gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni/ phyag rgya bcings pa de nyid rab tu gsang zhing sba bar bya ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni/ /slob ma ma yin bu
<p>274b.2</p>yin pa'i/ /mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de/ /de dag gsang ba phyag rgyas 'grub/ /ces gsungs la/ zla ba gsang ba'i thig le las kyang / /dam tshig ma yin mi shes la/ /sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba ste/ /dam tshig phyag rgya
<p>274b.3</p>gsang ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bcings pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'o/ /bcings nas ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na/ /zhes gsungs
<p>274b.4</p>te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /mdzub gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /sngags ni e h+yi hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka At+ma ko\u0f85haM dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba ste/ lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni yud tsam gyis bdag nyid der mos pa'o/ / 
<p>274b.5</p>'dir don ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed cing sgo phye nas bdag shar sgo la phyogs par gnas te/ sngags snga ma brjod pas lha rnams khang pa brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor du byon par bya ste/ 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud du/ rdo rje bsdu ba'i tshul lta bu'o/ /de nas
<p>274b.6</p>rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por bdag nyid yid la byed cing de dag gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ oM sarba na ra ka ga t+ya ka sha ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba na ra gA b+hUd da ra ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+d+ha na mo tsa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya ga ti b+ha ga wA na bi nA sha ni hUM phaT ces
<p>274b.7</p>brjod la nang du byon pa dang / gnyis su med par bya ba dang / bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas mtshan ma skyes te zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang / /mi las 'das pa'i dri la sogs pa mthong nas so/ /mgu nas ni zhes bya ba ni/ bdag
<p>275a</p>
<p>275a.1</p>gis nges par slob ma smin par byed nus so zhes bsams te yid spro ba byas nas so/ /thog ma tha ma med par zhes bya ba ni/ dang po dang bar ma dang tha mar bye brag med par ro/ /mngon sum mthong zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po'i mngon sum dang 'dra bar lha
<p>275a.2</p>rnams gsal bar bltas te/ sems rtse gcig tu bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /slob dpon kha cig na re/ thog ma bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa nas/ tha ma shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams kyi bar du byon pa'i tshe bye brag med par mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid mtshan
<p>275a.3</p>ma skyes zhes bya ba yin la/ de ltar mthong bas mgu nas ni mchod pa bya ba ste/ de ltar yang lha chen po dgu'i dkyil 'khor las/ de nas byon pa mthong ba dang / /dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar sngon bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste mchod pa
<p>275a.4</p>bya'o/ /'dis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la 'og min nas spyan drang ba bstim zhing / des bris pa la thim par bya ba ni man ngag go/ /da ni mchod pa ston par bzhed nas ar+g+haM mchog phul zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dir mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid 'phags pa
<p>275a.5</p>rab tu grub par byed pa las gsungs pa/ gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang / /rdo ba dang ni shing gi'am/ /kham sa'am dung ngam nya phyis sam/ /de bzhin lo ma'i snod kyang rung / /zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang / /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /las dang dngos grub dag
<p>275a.6</p>la ni/ /rigs pa'i snod rnams sbyar bar bya/ /kha dog yon tan bshad pa las/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang ci rigs pa'i/ /snod rnams ji ltar 'dod pa ru/ /mchod yon phyir ni rab tu sbyar/ /zhi ba'i mchod yon nas dang bcas/ /til dang bcas pa rgyas pa la/ / 
<p>275a.7</p>thams cad dang ni 'gal ba'i phyir/ /ko tra bar bcas drag spyod la/ /zhi ba'i mchod yon 'o ma can/ /rgyas pa la ni zho can no/ /ba yi gcin nam yang na khrag /drag shul spyod pa'i don du shis/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dang / /las rnams kun la 'bras yos shis/ / 
<p>275b</p>
<p>275b.1</p>spos dang me tog ku sha til/ /chu rnams bye brag med par bshad/ /zangs kyi snod ni mchod yon phyir/ /las rnams kun la rab tu shis/ /'di dag bdag gis ma 'byor gyis/ /bdag la bzod par mdzod ces nas/ /yang na ci 'byor pas kyang rung / /zhes pa las zhi ba
<p>275b.2</p>la bsngags pa'i mchod yon ni/ 'dir ar+g+haM mchog ste de phul bas mchod pa lhag ma rnams bya/ glegs bam la la las ar+g+haM mchog brtags zhes 'don te/ de yang snga ma lta bu zhi ba'i mchod yon ni mchog tu brtag par bya ba'am rung ba zhes bya ba'o/ /gsang ba
<p>275b.3</p>la sogs pa zhes bya ba la/ gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi ste/ 'di dag gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchod par bya ba'i phyi rol gyi lha rnams ma yin pas so/ /sogs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me tog la sogs pa bzhi bsdu ba'o/ /de ltar mchod
<p>275b.4</p>pa gus mchod nas/ /mnyam med mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i phyir/ dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i bstod pa dang / /zhes bya ba smos te/ rol mo'i cha byad dam pa dang sbyar ba drug ldan la sogs pa'i ros bstod par bya ste/ ji skad du zla ba gsang
<p>275b.5</p>ba'i thig le'i rgyud las/ pi wang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyi/ /glu blangs dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed/ /ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni/ /'jig rten grags pa'i bden pa'i bde ba dag /bden pa'i sgra yis bskyed pa rnams bsgyur ba/ /de dag mthun
<p>275b.6</p>pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed/ /sha ta pa dang sha dza'i dbyangs/ /glu ru blangs pas pad+mo gnas/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /yid kyis byin rlabs dag pa dang / /'di yis byin rlabs bde ba rnams/ /sbyor ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod byed thams
<p>275b.7</p>cad thob par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas/ lha yi gtso bo thams cad la/ /ras ni zung re dbul bar bya/ /sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la/ /ya re phul bar rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes gsungs pa'am/ yang na lha thams cad la ras zung 'bul
<p>276a</p>
<p>276a.1</p>ba'am/ ma 'byor na re re'am/ de yang ma 'byor na thams cad la zung gcig gam/ rab tu 'byor ba dman na thams cad la gcig dang / 'byor pa yod na ba lang dang rta dang / rnga mo dang ra lug la sogs pa'i khyu rab tu brtags pa dang / rin po
<p>276a.2</p>che'i tshogs dang / bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba gya nom pa mang po dang / dril bu g.yer ka btags pa'i rta babs dri zhim po dang / rin po che bdun dang / nye ba'i rin po che bdun dang / bkra shis kyi rdzas bcu drug dag kyang rab tu yid du
<p>276a.3</p>'thad pa 'bul bar ston pa ni/ lha rdzas dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /ces gsungs pa'o/ /de la mchod pa'i cho ga ni bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzad de/ 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las/ thal sbyar mchod yon blos mchod dang / /cho ga'i
<p>276a.4</p>yan lag nyid dang bzhi/ /ji ltar rigs pa nye bar sbyar/ /zhes gsungs la/ spyod pa'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzad de/ rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las/ mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste/ /phyag 'tshal ba yi thal sbyar dang / /de bzhin byams dang
<p>276a.5</p>snying rje dang / /me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i/ /sor mo las byung me tog rnams/ /skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dag tu ni/ mchod pa rab tu mang po dag bstan te/ lha mo ku ru kul+le 'byung ba las ni/ me tog
<p>276a.6</p>la sogs pa mchod pa bco brgyad gsungs so/ /'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus par ni/ mchod pa phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang rab tu gsang ba rnams bstan te/ de bas na mchod pa rnams ni sgrub pa po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rab tu mang mod kyi/ 'dir ni mchod pa
<p>276a.7</p>dgu yan chad dang bcas pa'o/ /de yang ji skad bshad pa'i yon chab thogs te/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn ni ha wa k+te na sa ya me tsa ma ar+g+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM pra tIts+tsha maM pU dza nir dza t+ya pra sid+d+hi me/ A ha ra A ha ra sarba bid+h+ya d+ha ra pU dze te swA hA zhes bya ba'am/ oM badzra ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha
<p>276b</p>
<p>276b.1</p>AH hUM zhes pas dbul lo/ /mchod yon ni sgrub pa po'i spyi bor bzung ste dbul lo/ /me tog la sogs pa yang snying ga'am lte ba'i thad kar bzung ste dbul lo/ /de yang dang po phyag bzhi byas la/ de nas mchod yon dbul te/ de nas bdug pa dang
<p>276b.2</p>me tog dang mar me dang dri rnams sarba d+harma swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha zhes bya ba rab tu dag par mos par byas la/ rab tu mang zhing mchog tu bya ba dang / ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni d+harma tA d+hU pa ya de hUM phaT/ oM sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni
<p>276b.3</p>puSh+pa bi lo ka ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha A sha ni gan+d+ha ba ti hUM phaT ces bya ba rnams snyim pa zed pa las gyen du 'thor ba dang / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams nas mdun du 'dzin pa dang / 
<p>276b.4</p>de nyid las dung dang 'dra bar byas pa'i phyag rgya rnams bcings te phul bas/ rab tu rgyas par tshim par bsam mo/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rang gi dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor du rab tu gsal bar byas la/ rdo rje'i gar gyi bya ba rdo rje'i khu tshur
<p>276b.5</p>gnyis dku g.yas g.yon gnyis su sgeg pa'i tshul gyis bzhag la/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed cing de la rab tu dga' bas spyi bos g.yon du cung zad btud de/ oM badzra lA s+ye/ oM badzra satwa su sang+g+ra ha/ oM badzra rat+na ma nut+ta raM/ oM badzra d+harma gA ya ne/ oM badzra karma ka rong+b+ha be zhes
<p>276b.6</p>glur blang ngo / /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor phreng ba 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung bar smon pas/ /oM badzra mA le zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas 'gro ba thams cad la
<p>276b.7</p>mdo sde zab mo la sogs pa bshad pa 'byung ba yid la smon pas/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rang gi kha nas tshig 'thon pa ltar byas te/ oM badzra gI ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas yang rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis thal mo spyi bor sbyar te/ 'gro ba la nges pa'i tshig tu chos ston pa
<p>277a</p>
<p>277a.1</p>dang / spyod lam sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don la mkhas par gyur cig ces smos pas/ oM badzra nr-i ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/ /yang na de dag gi phyag rgya bstan pas de dag nyid kyis de dag nyid la rang rang gi mchod par mos par bya'o/ /yang
<p>277a.2</p>na dang po yon chab phul la/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de/ gsang ba'i mchod pa de dag gi yon tan yang / 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang / /rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing / /de nas rdo rje glur blangs la/ /rdo rje gar gyis
<p>277a.3</p>mchod byas nas/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba dbang bskur mchod/ /glu dang gar gyi bde ba las/ /bde ba gzhan ni yod min te/ /de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med/ /ces gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de nas bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa yang rung ngo / /de nas oM badzra ba
<p>277a.4</p>Ta hUM zhes brjod pas ras phul la snyim pa mdzes pa rab tu brkyang ba'i phyag rgyas bshos rnams/ oM a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbul lo/ /sngar bshad pa'i yon chab ni rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pas dbul lo/ /oM sarba bid pu ra pu ra
<p>277a.5</p>a brta ya ho zhes 'don cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ rta babs la sogs pa dbul lo/ /gal te mchod pa rnams dngos su ma 'byor na/ de'i tshe mchod pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams gro ga la sogs pa la bris te/ dngos yin par lhag par mos par mchod
<p>277a.6</p>yon tsam du dbul lo/ /de ltar ni 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las/ che ge mo 'di bzhes shig ces/ /rdzas kyi ming nas phyung ste dbul/ /ma 'byor na yang gzugs brnyan rnams/ /byas nas mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /sngags dang mchod pa phul ba yi/ /cho ga thams
<p>277a.7</p>cad tshogs par 'gyur/ /zhes gsung so/ /de bzhin du mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa tsam yid kyis mchod pa dang bcas nas mchod pa yang / de nyid las/ rnam pa kun la mkhas pa yis/ /rtag tu ci 'byor pas kyang rung / /yid kyi mchod pa khyad par can/ /yang dag
<p>277b</p>
<p>277b.1</p>nyid du brtsam par bya/ /chos kyi thog mar yid 'gro zhes/ /thub pa chen pos bka' stsal to/ /yid ni rab tu mnyam gzhag nas/ /cho ga lhag ma bya bar bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin cing / mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi
<p>277b.2</p>chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dag pa'i chos nyid can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang
<p>277b.3</p>yang bsgrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub nges par stsol mdzad pa/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ / 
<p>277b.4</p>'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pas/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang / /tshad med tshad dang bral bar shin tu yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes 'gyur dang / /khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol
<p>277b.5</p>mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa/ /khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus
<p>277b.6</p>gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /zhes glus bstod cing / nus na 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa'i rtsa ba dang / phyi ma phyi ma'i rgyud nas gsungs pa'i rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
<p>277b.7</p>dbyangs su blangs pas bstod cing mnyes par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje yin na/ rgyud 'di nyid las gsungs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa brjod do/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ phyi rol du gtor
<p>278a</p>
<p>278a.1</p>ma rab tu rgyas pa 'chad par byed pas sbyin no/ /de nas nang du 'ongs pa bdag nyid 'jug pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni/ /me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug /ces gsungs pa yang 'dir drangs te/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas me
<p>278a.2</p>tog gi phreng ba bzung bar bya ba mdun du bzhag la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban+da naM ka ro mi zhes brjod cing / dkyil 'khor la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyag lan gsum byas la phreng ba de blangs te/ dkyil 'khor la lan bdun bskor bas/ yang
<p>278a.3</p>phyag snga ma ltar byas la/ me tog de bdag po la phul te blangs la rang gi spyi bor gdags so/ /de nas pusti'i phyag rgya dang a zhes pa stong gis bdag gam gzhan la phab la/ rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir/ / 
<p>278a.4</p>bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /zhes bka' mnos nas/ bdag dang gzhan des smin par mdzad par bsams la/ slob dpon du bdag por gyur pa las/ sdom pa dang dbang ma lus pa blo yis blangs te/ de nas/ chags chen las byung de kho na/ /'khor lo'ang
<p>278a.5</p>gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs/ /oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje
<p>278a.6</p>'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyis rjes su mnyes/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba
<p>278a.7</p>de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /sems can kun gyi yid
<p>278b</p>
<p>278b.1</p>khyab cing / /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi pha yin te/ /chags pa'i mchog ste dam tshig mchog /thabs shes bdag nyid dkyil 'khor te/ /ye shes yin pa'i bden gang gis/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor kun/ /gzugs brnyan gsal
<p>278b.2</p>ba'i slob ma yis/ /skyon dang bral bar kun mthong shog /ces bya ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid bden pa dang / dam tshig gsum gyi glu dang / yang de kho na dang bden pa bsgrags so/ /gal te zhag du mar dkyil 'khor gyi las byed pa'i tshe na/ gnas skabs der dge 'dun la
<p>278b.3</p>mchod ston gsol ba dang / chos smra bar mchod par bya ste/ ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud las/ slob ma de bos bsgo ba ni/ /'di ni bsod nams zhing yin zhes/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis
<p>278b.4</p>gsungs/ /rnam dag yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /dge 'dun la ni kun gyis phul/ /dge 'dun la phul 'bras bu che/ /skyes bu mkhas pa gang zhig gis/ /dge 'dun la ni yon phul na/ /longs spyod chen po mi zad pa/ /'jig rten 'thad par skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas
<p>278b.5</p>thams cad mthun par ni/ /sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la/ /ci nus pas ni mchod ston bya/ /zhes gsungs la bya ba'i rgyud gzhan dag las kyang / /de nas bla ma'i ci 'byor pas/ /'phags pa dge 'dun mchod
<p>278b.6</p>ston gsol/ /yang na slob ma byed du gzhug /gal te mi 'byor par gyur na/ /dge 'dun gyis ni bskos pa yin/ /dge slong dag la mchod ston gsol/ /yang na sangs rgyas mchod pa'am/ /dge 'dun dag la yon yang dbul/ /zhes gsungs so/ /phyogs
<p>278b.7</p>bzhir chos klog bzhi bzhag nas/ /de la shar gyi phyogs su ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhag /byang gi phyogs su gzhag pa ni/ /gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde yin/ /nub kyi phyogs su gzhag pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo/ /theg pa chen
<p>279a</p>
<p>279a.1</p>po sdong po bkod/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhag nas su/ /gus par de dag mchod par bya/ /zhes gsungs te/ gal te dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi dus tha ma zhag gsum du byed na de dag 'jug pa'i nyi ma snga dro bya'o/ /yang na chos bsgrags pas bsrung ba ni/ phyi'i
<p>279a.2</p>sa sbyang ba nas bzung ste/ dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas 'og nas 'byung ba ltar slob ma gzhug par bya'o/ /de ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor bsgrub par byas nas gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyir/ de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya/ /sems can bkres
<p>279a.3</p>shing skom la gdung ba dang / /phyogs la gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag /de yi gtor ma rjes su mthun par bya/ /zhes smos te/ de yang dang po ni bza' ba dang btung ba mang pos mi'i 'gro ba ji ltar nus pa tshim par bya ste/ khyad par du ni khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu 'khrig
<p>279a.4</p>pa bsten mi nus pa rnams tshim par bya'o/ /de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma la sogs pa bya ste/ gtor ma'i tshul ji lta bu zhe na/ da ni gtor ma rgyas pa'i cho ga bdag gis 'dir brjod par bya ste/ ji skad du bshad pa'i gtor ma shing rta gang la'ang nyung zad kyang rung ste/ 
<p>279a.5</p>ji ltar 'byor pa phyi rol du khyer la bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste/ slob dpon bdag nyid kyis sbyin no/ /dang por sgrub pa pos 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags lan bdun gyis bsrungs te/ de nas gtor ma der mar me dang me tog dang / 
<p>279a.6</p>bdug pa dang byug pa dang bshos rnams btsal la lag tu spos thogs te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la/ yid don la bsdus te tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus
<p>279a.7</p>srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas rnams la/ /bdag ni pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis/ /gsan nas phan
<p>279b</p>
<p>279b.1</p>gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag
<p>279b.2</p>pa gang gnas dang / /mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu gsil ma can na gang gnas dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang / /dka' thub gnas dang
<p>279b.3</p>glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang mdun khang dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung / /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang / /'brog chen
<p>279b.4</p>'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling mchog rnams la gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su/ /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba/ /'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams su gsol/ / 
<p>279b.5</p>las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces brjod la gtor te/ de phyogs kyi gtor ma bya'o/ /de yang / de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas su/ /de dag phyogs skyong rnams la mchod par bya/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /snga ma ltar pus mo btsugs te/ 
<p>279b.6</p>spos snod thogs la/ dbang po 'byung po'i gdon dang bcas pa yis/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag dang / /rlung dang lus ngan 'byung po gdon dang bcas/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang
<p>279b.7</p>sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang / /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu/ / 
<p>280a</p>
<p>280a.1</p>me tog dri dang byug pa gtor ma bcas/ /'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang / bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces pas so/ /de nas bstod pa yang bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon
<p>280a.2</p>gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ / 
<p>280a.3</p>gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /bdag gis gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas
<p>280a.4</p>la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha/ /bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig srung gdon gyi bdag
<p>280a.5</p>po ste/ /rlung gi gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na dbyug to thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren
<p>280a.6</p>pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu ste sa yi lha/ /sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag
<p>280a.7</p>kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang / /zla ba nyi ma gza' chen po/ /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhes so/ /de ltar gtor ma phul ba'i yon tan ni 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las/ 
<p>280b</p>
<p>280b.1</p>de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la/ /gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa de/ /dngos grub shin tu myur zhing gegs kyang med/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gtor ma de dag rang rang gi phyogs su gtor te/ spos
<p>280b.2</p>chu lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du blugs la mig gis bltas te/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba lan bdun bzlas pas rang gi spyi bor blugs pas bsangs te/ dkyil 'khor du 'gro bar bya'o/ /yang na tshul 'dis gtor ma sbyin te/ de nas phyi rol byung nas su/ /mnyam
<p>280b.3</p>par gzhag pas gtor ma sbyin/ /'bras yos til dang chur bcas shing / /'bras chan dang ni me tog bcas/ /sran chen dag kyang mang du blugs/ /snum dang lo ma dag dang bcas/ /de ltar slob ma slob dpon gyi/ /lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas su/ / 
<p>280b.4</p>dga' zhing phyogs rnams kun du gtor/ /bdug spos mchod yon bcas pa sbyin/ /dang po dbang ldan phyogs song nas/ /cho ga bzhin du gtor ma bya/ /dbang dang ldan pa gzhu can ni/ /tshogs dang bcas la sbyin par bya/ /de nas dbang po'i tshogs bcas la/ / 
<p>280b.5</p>gsang sngags zhes pas sbyin par bya/ /sngags pa gtor ma la mkhas pas/ /me yi phyogs su gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas gshin rje'i phyogs dag tu/ /sngags pa mkhas pas sbyin par bya/ /de nas bden bral tshogs bcas la/ /gsang sngags zhes pas sbyin par
<p>280b.6</p>bya/ /chu yi phyogs su klu rnams ni/ /bdag por bcas la de bzhin du/ /cun+di gnas la gnas pa yi/ /sngags rigs pas ni tshul bzhin sbyin/ /de nas rlung gi phyogs song nas/ /rlung gi phyogs dang bcas pa la/ /rang gi ming nas smos nas su/ /sngags
<p>280b.7</p>pas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/ /dngos grub dam pa 'dod byas la/ /yid ni rab tu dang bcas nas/ /gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /srin po rnams dang sha za dang / /'byung po sha rjen za ba dang / /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs
<p>281a</p>
<p>281a.1</p>la/ /mkhas pas gtor ma gtong bar bya/ /blo las gang dang gang dran pa/ /de na gnas pa'i sems can ni/ /ljon shing gel pa la gnas pa/ /de dang de la rab tu sbyin/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru dra ya swA hA/ dbang po'i phyogs su Sha kra ye swA hA/ 
<p>281a.2</p>me'i phyogs su ag+na ye swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su ba ya bai ya swa ta ye swA hA/ srin po'i phyogs su rAk+Sha sa a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ chu'i phyogs su me ka da sha na ye swA hA/ rlung gi phyogs su ba ya be+e swA hA/ lus ngan gyi phyogs su yak+Sha bid+ya d+ha ra ya swA hA/ srin po rnams
<p>281a.3</p>la kraM ka re swA hA/ sha za rnams la pi tsi pi tsi swA hA/ 'byung po rnams la gung gung swA hA/ kun du gtor ma byin nas ni/ /lag pa legs par bkrus nas su/ /nye reg tshul bzhin byas nas ni/ /de nas nang du 'jug par bya/ /zhes so/ /yang na 'byung po
<p>281a.4</p>thams cad pa'i gtor ma phyi rol du khyer la/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA zhes sgra chen po lan gsum brjod la/ 'gro ba thams cad la bsngos te gtor ro/ /yang na lugs 'dis gtor ma sbyin te/ dang por maN+Dal zlum
<p>281a.5</p>po khru gang yan chad bcu phyogs brgyad du byed du bcug la/ maN+Dal re re'i steng du gtor ma sngar bshad pa bzhag la/ de nas dang por spyan drangs ste/ de nas dam tshig bstan cing mchod yon phul te/ dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang / mar me dang byug pa phul la
<p>281a.6</p>a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs par shar phyogs nas brtsams te gsum gtor la/ yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gtang ngo / /de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te/ rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug
<p>281a.7</p>nas/ lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya la/ g.yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur logs su bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni/ brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon
<p>281b</p>
<p>281b.1</p>brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la/ spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las/ mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas 'di'i sngags ni na mo badzra sa tsa di shi badzra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i phyogs su kha bltas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por
<p>281b.2</p>bkug ste/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la/ mthe bo lag mthil du gzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni/ me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid la
<p>281b.3</p>mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ag+ne a ha ka pa li dz+wa la dz+wa la/ da ha ni khi tho li bi rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol la
<p>281b.4</p>khu tshur bcangs nas/ srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te gshibs la g.yabs te/ nang du gzhug pa ni gshin rje dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis phyi rol du shin tu gshibs te bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /'di nyid las
<p>281b.5</p>srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni sa ma ya swA hA/ bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas kyi khu tshur bcangs pa las/ mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs la bsgreng ste gzhag /lag pa
<p>281b.6</p>g.yon pa'ang de ltar byas te sta zur phyogs su bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g.yab pa ni bden bral dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar gzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / 
<p>281b.7</p>dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni sarba b+hud+d+ha ba ya ka ya ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo dang / mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar la/ zhags mig
<p>282a</p>
<p>282a.1</p>ltar byas te g.yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas la snying gar bzhag ste/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar byas pa ni dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las zhags mig ltar byas pa
<p>282a.2</p>ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo slar btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni ti ti ba ti ti ti shi khi tu li bi rU pAk+Sha ya swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng
<p>282a.3</p>ba'i tshigs dang mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to btsugs la lag pa g.yas pa de bzhin du byas te/ sta zur logs su gzhag cing mthe bong bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / 
<p>282a.4</p>spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM swa sa kha kha kha khu khu khu swA hA/ lus ngan la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la rdo rje bcing pa nang du bzlog ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la
<p>282a.5</p>brkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo gnyis de ltar bkug ste g.yab pa ni lus ngan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni/ lus ngan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /'gugs
<p>282a.6</p>pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni ku bi rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa thal mo gcig tu sbyar ba byas la/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol/ gung mo gshibs te
<p>282a.7</p>bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ mthe bong gnyis bar du gshibs te bzhag la/ de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprad nas nang du g.yab pa ni dbang ldan dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i
<p>282b</p>
<p>282b.1</p>tshul du gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni dzruM dzruM shi ba swA hA/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug pas/ lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la/ steng du bltas
<p>282b.2</p>te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus tshangs pa la sogs pa dgug par bya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma ltar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni 'di yin te a dar ya pra ha ma ne swA hA/ 
<p>282b.3</p>sUR+Ya gra ha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tsan+d+ra ya na k+Sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ rkang pa mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mor phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bo zlum por byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs
<p>282b.4</p>pa mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bkug pa ni 'og gi lha dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni a d+hi pa ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ a su re b+h+yaHswA hA/ na ge
<p>282b.5</p>b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang rang gi sngags de nyid kyis 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig /las dang dngos grub rnams bdag cag la stsol cig ces brjod cing slar gtang ngo / /de ltar bdag gis rgya
<p>282b.6</p>cher bkod pa'i gtor ma 'di dag ni gang dga' bas slob ma dbang bskur ba dang / ro yongs su sbyang ba la sogs pa'i tshe sbyin no/ /de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la slob ma sta gon la gnas pa ston
<p>282b.7</p>te/ de nas zhes bya ba ni don gyis na bum pa sta gon la gnas ma thag tu'am slob ma smin par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa zhes so/ /sngags pas zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis so/ /bla med byang chub ces bya ba ni/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
<p>283a</p>
<p>283a.1</p>pa'o/ /de nyid 'khor ba ji srid du gnas par bya bas na gnas su'o/ /slob ma zhes bya ba ni bla ma la gus pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /smin par bya zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi myu gu 'byin nus par byas zhes pa'o/ /ji ltar bya zhe na/ 'gro la phan phyir myur du
<p>283a.2</p>byang chub par/ /de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug /ces smos so/ /slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya ba ni/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor spyi'i bya ba las kyang / de nas slob ma legs brtags nas/ /sta gon gnas la tshul bzhin du/ /de yi nub mo ci nus
<p>283a.3</p>par/ /de bzhin sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug /gtsang ma'i gos dkar bgos pa yis/ /slob ma de lta bu dag ni/ /shar phyogs kha bltas 'khod pa la/ /sta gon gnas pa brtsam par bya/ /dang por gsum la skyabs su btang / /de nas bla mas byang chub sems/ / 
<p>283a.4</p>ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa dag kyang dran par bya/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de la 'di slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'i rim pa rgyas pa 'di yin te/ dang por slob ma legs par brtags pa smyung ba la gnas pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams dkyil 'khor
<p>283a.5</p>gyi gnas su shar du blta bar rgan pa'i rim gyis dgod de/ lag na me tog thogs pa rnams la slob dpon gyis chos bstan te/ de ltar yang / yid dga' spro chen byas pa gzo/ /ngar 'dzin mi 'byed rigs mtho zhing / /yon tan dang ldan dad dang bcas/ / 
<p>283a.6</p>gzugs dang kha dog lang tshor ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni/ /sgrub pa don gnyer mngon brtson pa'am/ /gzugs ngan yon tan med pa'am/ /dman pa'am ni lhag par bya/ /rang gi bslab dang legs ldan zhing / /theg chen la dga'i bdag nyid
<p>283a.7</p>can/ /'khor ni rnam pa bzhi char la'ang / /dkyil 'khor cho ga rjes su gnang / /kha cig gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer gzhan/ /'jig rten
<p>283b</p>
<p>283b.1</p>pha rol gnyer ba yi/ /dad pa mang du byed pa 'di/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya'i/ /'di yi 'bras bu 'dod pas min/ /'di la 'dod par gyur pa yis/ /'jig rten pha rol don mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer pa'i/ /skyes bu de yi 'bras
<p>283b.2</p>bu rgyas/ /zhes so/ /de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci nus kyis bshad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slob ma la dbang bcu gsum bskur la/ de dag slob ma'i lus la bsdu'o/ /de nas slob ma rnams kyis bla ma'i zhabs la phyag
<p>283b.3</p>'tshal te/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni bdag la dgongs/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos
<p>283b.4</p>dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum de ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gcig tsog tsog por byas te/ de'i ming nas brjod la thams cad
<p>283b.5</p>gzengs bstod par bya ste/ khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag de bstan bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po
<p>283b.6</p>rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob
<p>283b.7</p>pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten mthun 'jug thugs chud nas/ /'khor lo bskor te mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces pa dang gzhan rab tu rgya
<p>284a</p>
<p>284a.1</p>cher brjod de/ snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /de ltar lan mang gzengs bstod de/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de nas slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun byas la/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po
<p>284a.2</p>rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ / 
<p>284a.3</p>ces lan gsum brjod do/ /'di ni/ 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par/ /de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug /ces bya'o/ /de nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi
<p>284a.4</p>rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung / /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /'di ni byang chub smon lam gdab/ /ces bya ba dang / brtul zhugs gnas zhes bya'o/ /de nas dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang snying gar thal mo sbyar bas/ slob ma'i gnas de gsum du
<p>284a.5</p>bzhag la/ oM b+h+ri ta b+h+ri ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM tra Ta tra Ta sarba A ba rA NA ni hUM phaT/ oM tshin+da tshin+da sarba A ba rA NA ni hUM phaT ces bya ba'i rim pa sbyar te lan bdun brjod la/ rdo rjes kyang reg par byas la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang spyi bo dang
<p>284a.6</p>mdun du rang re'i sngags kyis sbyin/ de nas byin gyis brlab ces bya'o/ /de nas so shing dor ba dang dri chu sbyin te/ /ji skad du/ so shing u dum+WA ra dang / /a shwat+tha ni rma med pa/ /ha cang mi phra mi sbom zhing / /sor grangs bcu gnyis tshad du byas/ /spos kyi chus ni legs
<p>284a.7</p>par bkru/ /skud pa dag gis rnam par bkris/ /spos kyis bkru zhing bdug pas bdugs/ /lag pas bran zhing bzlas pa ni/ /rigs kyi snying po mang du bzlas/ /yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya/ /slob ma rnams kyi grangs las ni/ /so shing la sogs bsags
<p>284b</p>
<p>284b.1</p>par bya/ /so shing mgo zhabs gcig byas nas/ /rtse mo nas ni bca' bar bya/ /de nas bdag dang slob ma dang / /gnas bsrung ba yang brtan byas nas/ /lha rnams thams cad legs mchod de/ /zhes pa dang yang gsungs pa/ slob ma mthun zhing tshogs pa rnams/ / 
<p>284b.2</p>byang phyogs su ni kha bltas shing / /thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la/ /so shing go rims bzhin du sbyin/ /slob ma shar du kha bltas te/ /mi smra bar ni so shing bca'/ /bca' ba zin nas mi dga' shing / /phan tshun du yang mi dor ro/ /so shing mdun du drang por dor/ / 
<p>284b.3</p>de tshe bdag la lta ba dang / /rtse mo gyen du bsgreng gyur na/ /des ni dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin shar du bltas na ni/ /de yi dngos grub 'bring du bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten gyi ni rig sngags 'grub/ /so shing bor ba
<p>284b.4</p>brgya zhig la/ /gal te thur du kha bltas na/ /des ni nges par sa 'og gi/ /dngos grub thob par gdon mi za/ /zhes te/ gal te ba lang ko ba tsam du lan gsum ma babs na/ de la dbang ni mi bskur ro/ /slob ma nye reg byas nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du 'khod
<p>284b.5</p>pa la/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /spos chu bla mas blud pa ni/ /re re la yang btung ba yi/ /khyor bar blugs la lan gsum blud/ /der ni 'thungs nas langs nas ni/ /phyi rol du ni kha bkru bya/ /zhes te/ 'dir ni oM hrIHsu bi shud+d+ha d+harma sarba pA paM ni bi
<p>284b.6</p>sho d+ha ya swA hA/ sarba bi kAlpa ni ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags so/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzlas pa'i ku sha stan dang sngas su byin la/ de bzlas pa'i srad bu mdud pa bdun bor ba/ /dpung pa g.yas par gdags so/ /de nas/ 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ / 
<p>284b.7</p>ku sha lag tu gtad nas su/ /g.yas su skud pa bcings nas ni/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ dor ba bca' ba byas nas ni/ /zhes smos pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yi ge brgya pa lan mang du bzlas nas de dag brtan par bya'o/ /de nas chos bshad par
<p>285a</p>
<p>285a.1</p>bya ste/ zab cing rgya che'i chos bsgrags la/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ kun mkhyen rnams ni 'jig rten du/ /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gi mnyam med
<p>285a.2</p>sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang / /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas 'byung bar gyur lags na/ /grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas
<p>285a.3</p>na smos ci 'tshal/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyad pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /'di dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu gcad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed
<p>285a.4</p>rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyi ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg
<p>285a.5</p>pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang 'byung skal ba chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha'
<p>285a.6</p>bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis/ /rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/ /las dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni/ /tshul
<p>285a.7</p>la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de nas slob ma slob dpon du 'os pas/ bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du khyad par gyi sdom pa gsol ba btab la/ slob dpon gyis de rnams la rmi lam ji ltar
<p>285b</p>
<p>285b.1</p>mthong ba nga la nang par zlos shig ces brjod do/ /de nas rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid ni/ 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos/ /slob ma rnams la bshad nas ni/ /ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni/ /shar phyogs kha bltas nyal du gzhug /de nas nang par nam langs
<p>285b.2</p>nas/ /rmi lam ci mthong dri bar bya/ /mthong na bzang ngam mi bzang ngam/ /the tshom med par bshad par bya/ /rmi lam rgyas pa mthong na ni/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong / /de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang / /dge slong
<p>285b.3</p>dag la chos nyan tam/ /yang na gzhan la nyan kyang rung / /chos ni rnam par dpyod pa dang / /de bzhin glegs bam klog pa dang / /rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang / /yang na dge slong gcig bu mthong / /de dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang / /yang na dge slong
<p>285b.4</p>dngos por gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang / /de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong / /rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang / /de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang / /mdza' bo rnams ni sna tshogs rnams/ /rmi lam dag tu mthong na ni/ /rigs rnams dang ni dngos
<p>285b.5</p>grub thob/ /de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / /kan dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang / /ri dang glang po che dag kyang / /mthong na yang ni bzang bar bsgrags/ /rgyal mdog dang ni mthong na yang / /bde gshegs spyod dang ldan pa yi/ / 
<p>285b.6</p>dka' thub dang ni bram ze dang / /phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang / /ba lang rta dang glang po dang / /seng ge dang ni ri dwags kyang / /rmi lam du ni mthong na shis/ /bkra shis pa yi bya rnams dang / /gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang / /rin po che dang dngul rnams dang / / 
<p>285b.7</p>nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang / /mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang / /'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang / /rgyan ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang / /byis pa dang ni gzhon nu dang / /bud med gzugs
<p>286a</p>
<p>286a.1</p>ni bzang po dag /rmi lam du ni mthong ba bzang / /yang na thob cing reg pa smra/ /rmi lam na ni dbang bskur dang / /rgyal por gyur cing 'byor pa dang / /dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang / /g.yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang / /gnyen dang lhan
<p>286a.2</p>cig 'grogs pa dang / /lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang / /theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon/ /de bzhin ri dang khang thog 'dzeg /ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /rmi lam du ni mthong na dge/ /yam shing me la sbyin sreg byed/ /bya ba bzang po dag la 'bad/ / 
<p>286a.3</p>chu la rkyal zhing pha rol brgal/ /rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang / /stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang / /gyad stangs rdo bcing 'gying ba dang / /rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang / /de bzhin mthu rtsal gzi byin che/ /bkra shis rnams ni thams cad kyang / /mthong na rab tu
<p>286a.4</p>dge bar bshad/ /gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang / /dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang / /sgrub la brtson zhing bsngags pa dang / /sgrub pa po rnams mthong ba dang / /de la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni/ /dge ba rnam pa du ma dag /blo yis rnam par dpyad nas ni/ /de
<p>286a.5</p>nas bzlog pa spang bar bya/ /dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la/ /dge ba rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi dge ba ni mi 'grub bo/ /mi dge ba dag shes nas su/ /de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya/ /gsang sngags dngos grub gsum 'grub
<p>286a.6</p>pa/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'o/ /mi dge ba la zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /ba yi mar las brgya rtsa brgyad/ /cho ga bzhin du zhi bar bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de ltar rmi lam bshad nas de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
<p>286a.7</p>de dag bsrung ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thams cad nyal bar bya ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi bya bar glo g.yas pa phab ste'o/ /de nas nang par rmi lam gyi tshul shes par byas te/ 'dod pa'i rgyal pos dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su phyogs skyong ba rnams bkug
<p>286b</p>
<p>286b.1</p>ste/ oM badzra kI li zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi phur pas gdab bo/ /'dis don gyis drangs pa'i sta gon la gnas pa gzhan ni re zhig dang po nyi ma shar ba'i dus su/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dri zhim pos maN+Dal khru gang yan chad byas la/ sngon bzhin du
<p>286b.2</p>sa'i lha la mchod pa dang tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsol ba btab la sa'i lha de nyid du yang thim par bya'o/ /de nas rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du dri zhim pa'i thig le byas la der lha rnams bstims te/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bskor ba byas la gsol
<p>286b.3</p>ba gdab par bya'o/ /ji skad du/ sa gzhi steng du byug spos kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rig sngags kyis/ /lag pas brab cing lan bdun bzlas/ /de nas gtso bo'i lha rnams ni/ /ming gis yid la bsams nas
<p>286b.4</p>su/ /byug spos me tog la sogs pas/ /snying po ci rigs mchod par bya/ /lha bshos dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /bdug spos mngon par bsngags pa'ang dbul/ /der ni mchod pa yang byas nas/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs nas ni/ /blo gros can gyis lha rnams
<p>286b.5</p>la/ /gus par gsol ba gdab par bya/ /gang gi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i sngags/ /de la thog mar gdags par gsol/ /de yi go rims sbyar ba yi/ /lha rnams kun la gdags par gsol/ /'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag
<p>286b.6</p>'tshal lo/ /bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de nas gnang ba mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan pa/ / 
<p>286b.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyob pa'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs pa
<p>287a</p>
<p>287a.1</p>mdzad du gsol/ /bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya/ /sang ni gdugs la dkyil 'khor ni/ /bzang po ming ni 'di zhes bgyi/ /yo byad ci yod pas 'dri na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams
<p>287a.2</p>cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad du gsol/ /de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /bsam pa thag pas phyag byas te/ /bstod pa'i tshig kyang brjod nas su/ /de nas slar ni gshegs su gsol/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bur bya'o/ /de nas bum pa
<p>287a.3</p>rnams sngon du bstan pa ltar ram/ /yang na 'di dag ni rang gi sems snang ba tsam mo zhes mos pas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang rang gi yi ge las mtshan ma dang de las skur grub cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs nas bum par gyur par byas la/ grangs dang po'i
<p>287a.4</p>mtshan ma dang 'brel par gzhag pa'ang rung ste/ bum pa ni rab tu ma rnyed na rnam par rgyal ba dang las thams cad pa gnyis kyis byas la/ rnam par rgyal ba yang 'dir lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin la rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su gzhag go/ /de la kha cig na re/ rnal 'byor
<p>287a.5</p>gyi rgyud du ni/ sa'i lha sta gon la gnas pa med do zer te/ 'di ni bla ma'i lung tha dad pas nges pa med do/ /sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni sdom gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob ma 'jug pa ston te/ sdom ni 'dir thun mong gi sdom pa la gnas pa ste/ khyad par
<p>287a.6</p>gyi sdom pa ni gdong dbog par bya ba yin pas so/ /de yang legs par sta gon la gnas pa'i slob ma de dag dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug pa'i tshul ni/ sta gon la gnas pa'i phyi de nang par dri'i thig le'i lha rnams la mchod pa dgus mchod nas nam mkha' la bteg
<p>287a.7</p>la/ sngar bshad pa ltar nang dang phyi'i thig gdab la/ tshon bkye ste khrus byas la dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad bkod nas bum par bcug ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa byas la/ sngon bzhin du phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin te nang du bdag nyid zhugs la/ de nas yol bas
<p>287b</p>
<p>287b.1</p>bcad pas slob ma re re nas bos la/ 'jug pa'i rim pa bya ste/ bla mas slob ma gcig pu ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu dbang bskur bya/ /mkhas pas cig car slob ma gnyis/ /dbang bskur bar ni yongs mi bya/ /gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi yang rung / /thams cad
<p>287b.2</p>so sor bya ba ni/ /yo byad sar pa gzhan rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur ba yi bla mas bya/ /rig sngags dbang ni thob pa la/ /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga dang / /bsgrub pa'i cho ga'ang de bzhin sbyar/ /zhes gsungs pas 'jug pa
<p>287b.3</p>ni dbang bskur ba'i dang po nyid du gyur pas so/ /de ltar bos la/ las kyi bum ba'i chu mchod yon gyi snod du blugs pa ku sha'i bam pos bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bsrung ngo / /de ltar yang slob ma re re nas bkug ste/ bsang gtor snga ma bzhin byas
<p>287b.4</p>nas/ /byug spos la sogs byin nas kyang / /snying pos mngon par bsngags nas ni/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni zhes bya ba ni/ las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /btab pa'i gos kyis gdong g.yogs te/ /zhes
<p>287b.5</p>gsungs pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas dpal gyi pad+mor lag gnyis bya/ /me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan la/ /zhes bya ba ni de nyid las sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya la/ me tog dag ni bzhag nas su/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bdag pos sngags/ /phyag rgyar bcas pas spyi bor
<p>287b.6</p>gzhag /gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i sngags ni/ oM badzrA d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bu khyod su yin khyod gang la dga' zhes dri'o/ /slob mas kyang / bdag ni skal
<p>287b.7</p>ba bzang po ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid du gyur la dga'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /de nas sa ma ye hUM zhes lan gsum bzlas te/ yan lag bdun sngon du byas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs par gyur gyis khyod kyis de
<p>288a</p>
<p>288a.1</p>bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba chen po 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba su la'ang ma smra shig ces brjod la/ oM badzra pra be sha hUM badzra hUM zhes brjod la yol ba bsal te/ 'di ni rgyud kyi dang por/ rab zhi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par
<p>288a.2</p>bya/ /zhes bya ba ste/ rab zhi zhes bya ba ni slob ma nges pa'o/ /de nas/ nga yis di ring de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi rigs su khyod bcug gis/ /gang gis shes na de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi dngos grub thob byed na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos te/ /de phyir rdo rje ye
<p>288a.3</p>shes bskyed/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i/ /mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ /brjod pa tsam gyis dam tshig nyams par byas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod la rdo rje spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros
<p>288a.4</p>nas ni/ /bdun rgyud rigs rnams brlog par mdzad/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgyas slob ma'i snying ga'i bu ga phye la slob mas/ oM badzra sa ma ya hr-i da ya me pra be sha dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha hUM zhes lan gsum brjod la/ slob dpon gyi snying ga'i
<p>288a.5</p>ye shes kyi sku dang ye shes sems dpa' las de dang 'dra ba'i tshul 'thon te/ slob ma'i snying gar gnas par bsams la bu ga med par bsams te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la kun du gnas par mdzad/ /ci ste dam tshig 'das nas ni/ /de ma thag
<p>288a.6</p>tu bkas nas bzhud/ /ces brjod do/ /de nas dri zhim po'i chu la oM badzrod da ka ThaHzhes lan mang du bzlas te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub/ /ces brjod la
<p>288a.7</p>blud do/ /de bas/ de nas gsang sngags mkhas pa yis/ /sngags 'dis dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /zhes bya ba dang / de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas der phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ gang ngas smras pa'i bya ba de khyod
<p>288b</p>
<p>288b.1</p>kyis byos shig gal te ma byas na khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo
<p>288b.2</p>'dir ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes rigs thams cad la bsgrags la/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas de bas rtag tu zhes bya ba nas/ bdag
<p>288b.3</p>nyid de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du khyad par gyi sdom pa thun mong pa phog la/ de nas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yan lag dang bcas pa'i slob dpon du 'os pa la sbyin te dbab pa'i cho gas gdab bo/ /de la dbab pa'i cho ga ni rang dang slob ma'i snying ga
<p>288b.4</p>sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas phye la rang gi snying ga nas yi ge a byung ste/ slob ma'i snying ga la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i sgong skyes la yid kyis bzhag la/ de'i 'od kyis lus thams cad kun du gang bar bsams te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+haSh+Thi ne na twaM/ badzra satwa me a bi sha du zhes brjod do/ /de nas
<p>288b.5</p>slob dpon gyis ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgya myur du bcings la/ 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med na/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /ces slob mas brjod do/ /de nas oM badzra A be sha a aHzhes bcu nas bzung ste/ 
<p>288b.6</p>nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ drug cu'am/ bdun cu'am/ brgyad cu'am/ dgu bcu'am/ brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas nas rdo rje hUM mdzad dmar po kun du 'khrugs pas yongs su gang bar bsams na nges par 'bebs so/ /gal te ma
<p>288b.7</p>babs na/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la/ rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa g.yas pa mnan nas de nyid la dbab par bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi steng na khros pa'i yig hUM gi 'od zer
<p>289a</p>
<p>289a.1</p>gyis gnon par mdzad pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor yi ge hUM las 'degs par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs par bzhugs pas/ hUM trAM hrIHa zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad
<p>289a.2</p>par bsam zhing / hUM A be sha aH zhes lan brgya zlos shing de la dbab par bya'o/ /gal te shin tu sdig pa chen pos 'bab par ma gyur na sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral bar bya'o/ /de nas/ yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me/ /raM sbar rdo rje khro bo'i me/ /mnyam par gzhag
<p>289a.3</p>pas snyoms zhugs la/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing / /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la dbus su hUM bsam pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de
<p>289a.4</p>nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje'i lus la babs pas sdig pa rnams bsreg par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du bcings pa/ dbab pa byas na nges par 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta
<p>289a.5</p>bus kyang ma phebs na/ de la dbang mi bskur ro/ /babs na skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te babs pa de 'bar bar 'gyur la de mi 'dod na/ de'i spyi bor ri rab dang dbang chen dang rdo rje dang yi ge a dang bcom ldan 'das
<p>289a.6</p>rnam par snang mdzad rnams kha dog ser por bsam mo/ /de nas nges par babs pas na/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra haM zhes bya ba la sogs pa glur blangs la/ phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas brtan par byas la lce la rdo rje bsams te/ b+h+rUM hi badzra
<p>289a.7</p>zhes brjod na/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dngos po rnams don dang ldan par ma lus par smra'o/ /dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni bzhud par gyur te/ 'di ni dbab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la dmigs te/ slob mas yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i
<p>289b</p>
<p>289b.1</p>cho ga byas la/ a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye swA hA zhes pa phyag rgya dang ldan par byas la bdag dam tshig can du mos par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes pa nas gzhug par bya zhes bya ba'i bar te/ de nas slob dpon gyis bden pa bsgrags te/ bdag la bden pa'i byin brlabs pa/ / 
<p>289b.2</p>bdag gis slob ma dkyil 'khor du/ /legs par btsud par gyur pas ni/ /lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las/ /de bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /'dis ni grub pa gang 'grub dang / /rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /bsod nams
<p>289b.3</p>mthu ni ci yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /de skad brjod nas de 'og tu/ /sgo yi phyogs su de bzhag nas/ /de nas me tog 'thor du gzhug /ces gsungs pas so/ /de nas sngags 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i
<p>289b.4</p>phyir/ /bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/ /'gro la phan pa'i gtso mchog gis/ /sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM pra ti gr-i h+na hUM zhes pas dor ro/ /me tog rin chen la sogs pas/ /gang la bab pa rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni/ 
<p>289b.5</p>dngos grub myur du the tshom med/ /ces bya ba ni ji skad du/ gang du me tog babs 'gyur ba/ /de ni de yi rigs kyi lha/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de la me tog dor ba'i tshul rgyas pa la ni/ ji skad du/ dngos grub rab 'bring rnam gsum ni/ /me tog bab pa rnams la
<p>289b.6</p>brtag /lha rnams kyi ni khyad par ni/ /gnas kyi khyad par las kyang brtag /gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi/ /dbu la me tog babs gyur na/ /de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /spyan la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang / / 
<p>289b.7</p>zhal du babs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /stod du babs na mchog rnams 'grub/ /rked par babs na 'bring rnams 'grub/ /ro smad phyogs su bab pa ni/ /dngos grub phal rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bar gyi dku la babs na ni/ /snying po la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /smad du
<p>290a</p>
<p>290a.1</p>babs par gyur na ni/ /mngag gzhug la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /rim pa de dag thams cad ni/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin rigs la/ /go rims bzhin du shes byas la/ /de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang / /dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /gal te lha yi
<p>290a.2</p>gzugs dag las/ /ring du me tog lhung gyur na/ /de yis dngos grub yun ring grub/ /nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags rnams ni mchod pa dag /gang du bkram pa tshun chad ni/ /de yi nye 'khor de yin te/ /me tog der lhung de yi rigs/ /lha gnyis kyi ni
<p>290a.3</p>bar dag tu/ /gal te me tog lhung gyur na/ /gal te nye bar gyur pa ni/ /de ni de yi yin par bshad/ /gal te dkyil 'khor 'das nas su/ /la la'i me tog lhung gyur na/ /de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing / /'di ni dad pa'ang rab tu chud/ /gal te me tog dor ba
<p>290a.4</p>dag/ /ra ba'i ri mo la babs na/ /zhi ba byas nas de nas gdod/ /nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug /de tshe the tshom gyur na ni/ /mkhas pas bzlas te dor mi bya/ /der ni gar yang nges med pas/ /des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang / /don
<p>290a.5</p>med phyi rol ltung na ni/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /snying por me tog babs na ni/ /rtag tu don med mi 'gyur na/ /srad bu dag gis cho ga bzhin/ /de yi nye 'khor shes par bya/ /rigs gsum la yang cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor rnam
<p>290a.6</p>pa gsum du brtag /ji ltar grags pa'i tshul dag las/ /gtso bo rnams kyi rigs kyi bskyed/ /gal te me tog dor ba dag /mchod pa'i steng du bab gyur na/ /de ni rgyas pa'i sgrub pa dag /khyad par du ni shes par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po la/ /gang
<p>290a.7</p>gi me tog bab gyur na/ /de ni de yi las rnams kun/ /myur du 'grub cing mchog tu gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ni/ /gang gi me tog babs na ni/ /de la rigs gsum gsang sngags kun/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad+ma la ni rigs gnyis
<p>290b</p>
<p>290b.1</p>'grub/ /rdo rje 'dzin la rang rig nyid/ /gal te gnyis las 'das nas su/ /gang gi gsum pa la babs na/ /dkyil 'khor de nas dbyung bar bya/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gzhan du gzhug /de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis/ /me tog rnams ni dor ba las/ /bdag gi mdun
<p>290b.2</p>du mang lhung ba/ /de la zhi ba brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas/ /der ni slar yang 'dor du gzhug /lan gsum spogs te bor na yang / /gal te legs par ma babs na/ /re thag bcad de slar btang ngo / /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de nas sngar yon gyis lag
<p>290b.3</p>pa bkang ste zhes gsungs pa'o/ /yon bla ma la dbul te/ oM pra tIts+tsha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pa'o/ /lhag pa'i lha'i dbang gi ngo bo me tog de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ sems dpa' stobs chen po/ 'di khyod bzhes shig brjod pa'o/ /de nas/ oM rdo rje sems
<p>290b.4</p>dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson pa ste/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra tsak+Shu ut+ka ta ya ti zhes brjod cing / gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo/ /dkyil
<p>290b.5</p>'khor bzang po 'di lta ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'byor pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /rten dang dngos grub thams cad kyang / /khyod la mngon du phyogs gyur gyis/ /dngos grub thob

<p>291a</p>
<p>291a.1</p>phyag rgya chen po dag kyang bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de lta bu'i slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ste/ the tshom la sogs mi bya ste/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi dam tshig rnams ni go sla bas ma phye'o/ /bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba la/ bdag
<p>291a.2</p>gi de kho na nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te de tsam la 'dir bdag tu gdags par zad do/ /sngags zhes bya ba ni de kho na zhes tshig lhag ma can du byas te/ 'dod pa'i lha rang bzhin gyis grub pa rnams so/ /sogs zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'am/ sems dpa'
<p>291a.3</p>'byung ba'i rim pas bdag nyid lhar byas pa lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /de bas na 'dir ye shes dbab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dag ni bdag gi de kho na nyid yin la/ mngon par byang chub pa bzhi yan lag dang bcas pa ni lha'i de kho na nyid yin no/ /de bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ de kho na
<p>291a.4</p>nyid gsum po 'di la yang yid gnyis la sogs pa dang smad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mos pa dang ldan pa nyid brtan pa ste/ mos pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i las can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang dam bcas nas dbang
<p>291a.5</p>bskur na mos pa med pa dad pa tsam gyis 'jug pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ de nas gsang ba thob pa yin pas/ /de las dang por mna' 'di'i snying po brjod par bya ste zhes gsungs pa/ de nyid kyi rgya cher bshad pa las kyang / 
<p>291a.6</p>gsang ba thub pa yin par zhes bya ba ni/ gsang bar bya ba'i don gang yin pa srog gi phyir yang su la'ang mi smra ba ste/ de lta bu'i brtan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can ni gsang ba thub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te/ de lta bu'i
<p>291a.7</p>sems can la yang gya tshom du bstan par mi bya'i/ mna' yang bsgrags te bstan par bya'o zhes bshad do/ /de bas na gsang ba bla na med pa'i lam 'di ni rab tu yang 'bad pas brtags shing bstan par byas la sbyin no/ /de bas na/ gsang ba zla ba'i thig le las/ /de bzhin
<p>291b</p>
<p>291b.1</p>gshegs pa thams cad la/ /gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /ci ste rmongs pas smras byas na/ /slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams/ /myur du zla ba phyed tshun chad/ /bstan pas rnam par 'jog par 'gyur/ /dang por dam tshig gzhag bya ste/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
<p>291b.2</p>bstan par bya/ /gzhan du byas na dpa' bo rnams/ /dmyal bar bskal pa grangs med smin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i nub tu bar du khru dos chod par dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i phyed kyi tshad la lte ba'i
<p>291b.3</p>lha'i mtshan ma bkod pa/ me'i 'od kyi bar du rdzogs par byas pa der/ khri'am khri'u la stan bzang po bting bar slob ma rgyan ma lus pas brgyan la bzhag ste/ rgyal ba dang bkri shis pa byas la dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar yang / slob ma la la brtags pa dag /gal te dbang
<p>291b.4</p>bskur 'dod pa la/ /dbang bskur ba yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /phye ma dkar pos bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag dang rjes mthun par/ /stegs bu gru bzhir byas nas su/ /de yi dbus su tshon sna lngas/ /pad+ma yongs su rdzogs par bri/ /bkra shis la sogs mtshan ma rnams/ / 
<p>291b.5</p>der ni ji ltar 'dod pa bri/ /bkra shis phyir ni gang bstan pa/ /yang na dngos su dgod par bya/ /zhes gsungs la/ yang gsungs pa/ slob ma dbang bskur 'os rigs nas/ /cho ga 'dis ni nan tan du/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga bya/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /btab
<p>291b.6</p>pa'i stan ni gsar gzhag ste/ /bkra shis la sogs kun byas nas/ /bsrung ba nan tan cher bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags zlos shing / /gdugs ni dkar po bzang po la/ /me tog phreng ba bzang pos brgyan/ /ras phran dkar po 'phyangs pa gcig /spyi bo'i steng du gzung
<p>291b.7</p>bar bya/ /slob mas yon ni cher 'bul zhing / /bla ma bsnyen bkur byas pa dag /stan de la ni bzhag nas su/ /sngags kyis skyon bsal bkra shis bya/ /bdug spos legs par sbyar ba yis/ /bdug pa khro bo'i rgyal pos bdug /rnga yab la sogs dag kyang gzung / /rnga ma'i
<p>292a</p>
<p>292a.1</p>bsil yab bdug spos dang / /zho dang 'o ma gos kyis bkang / /'di rnams kun kyang bshams te dgod/ /de bzhin bum pa bzhi rnams dgod/ /glu dang sil snyan rnga sgra bsgrags/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad bsgrags/ /de bzhin bkra shis ched du brjod/ / 
<p>292a.2</p>cho ga rgyas pa byas nas ni/ /de la sogs par 'dod byas nas/ /yid kyis dkyil 'khor lha kun la/ /mkhas pas gsol ba btab nas ni/ /bum pa bzlas brjod brgya byas pa/ /de ni legs par blangs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor dal bus lan gsum bskor/ /rtsa ba'i gsang
<p>292a.3</p>sngags kun 'don cing / /blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /gsang sngags zlos shing spyi bos gtugs/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ 'dir sdom pa gang yang mi 'dzin pa de ni/ 'jug pa tsam bya'i dbang gang yang mi bskur ro/ /thun mong gi sdom pa
<p>292a.4</p>'dzin pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar thug pa bskur la khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin pa la ni thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang gi bar du bskur zhing / dbang dam pa de thob pa'i bya ba yang lung de nyid las gsungs pa/ de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /de ltar sar pa'i gos rnams bskon/ /

<p>292a.6</p>btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag pas legs par blang bar bya/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /

<p>292b.1</p>'dod pa'i rgyal pos lha rnams bstims pa 'di sbyin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de slob mas lag tu bzung la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e
<p>292b.2</p>Sha s+t+waM d+har ya mi hi hi hi hi hi hUM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /ces brjod do/ /de nas AHlas byung ba'i dril bu 'dod pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams
<p>292b.3</p>cad bstims pa 'di sbyin no/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /ces pas so/ /des bzung la/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral
<p>292b.4</p>byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin/ /zhes pas gsil lo/ /de nas/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bsrungs/ /'dod pa'i
<p>292b.5</p>longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par

<p>293a</p>
<p>293a.1</p>bton/ /kye rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs/ /grub pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag/ /'di yis lung bstan byas pa yis/ /sngags pa 'gro ba kun bdag yin/ /zhes pas lung bstan to/ /yan lag de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang gi bar du thob pa la bya zhing / de nas dbang

<p>293a.3</p>'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi gsod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyed 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa
<p>293a.4</p>'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i dka' yin no/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya gang / /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /dam pa'i
<p>293a.5</p>chos ni nam du yang / /dor ba dag tu mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis/ /rnam par dbye ba bya ba min/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis ni mi gdungs shing / /ci bde bar ni rab tu gzung / /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril

<p>293a.7</p>te/ /rims dang gdon dang yams nad dang / /nyer 'tshe chom rkun la sogs pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la smod pa yi/ /rmongs chen de ni gsod par byed/ /rgyal po'i gyod dang me dang sbrul/ /rkun po chu dang mkha' 'gro dang / /bgegs dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad
<p>293b</p>
<p>293b.1</p>nas sems dmyal ltung bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che/ /dge ba rab tu mi spyoms par/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma de la gus pas yon/ /rjes su mthun par dbul bar bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyin chad
<p>293b.2</p>'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrubs/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de phul bsod nams tshogs yin pas/ /tshogs las byang chub bla med pa'o/ /de phul sangs rgyas
<p>293b.3</p>thams cad la/ /rtag tu phul ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par/ /gnas par gyur par the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis tshe ldan dbang bskur te/ /khams
<p>293b.4</p>gsum rgyal po'i srid che yis/ /rgyal po bdag po brtan pa yin/ /de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /deng nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde skyid bsten par gyis/ /
